title: Communite
logline: A Creative Multiplayer CityBuilder for communities to build their perfect world together
description: Communite is a multiplayer town building simulator   Create your own village in a shared world while helping others construct theirs   Unlock new tiles as you level up Cooperate with others to finish higher tier buildings Build your own Home in your personal area and invite others to visit Rescue adorable NPCs around the world and become their friend Play a relaxing minigame to decompress if you can find it   Be kind and use your creative spark to bring joy to others PC HOTKEYS   WASD  Move Camera  Num Keys Starting right to left from 17  Place Tiles Shortcut Arrows KeysMouse Swipe  Change Menu Pages U  Undo J  Join Q  Quickbuild Enter  Submit Text

title: Odd Realm
logline: Take control of a group of settlers to build a settlement that survives the passing seasons
description: INCLUDES A STEAM KEY  Unless you buy the game through a bundle     Features   4 races to start your kingdom with each with unique playstyles   Unlimited procedurally generated deserts mountains tropical islands and frozen tundra   Dynamic weather and seasons unique to each biome   Hundreds of plants animals and items   A research tree with options for each race that unlock new blueprints and rooms   Outfit individual settlers with tools weapons and gear   Manage your kingdom and view other kingdoms on an expansive world map   Battle raiders invading armies and underground horrors   Choose from thousands of generated landscapes to make your new home A desert oasis The ribcage of a longdead giant A magical mountain range Where you choose to settle will determine what resources you have at your disposal what you encounter and how challenging your experience will be Use the resources in your environment to build well whatever you want A sandstone castle in the desert An underground fortress Or maybe an island beach house You decide Dig mines into the earth to uncover lost tombs dormant gods and lakes filled with creatures watching from the deep Just make sure not to go too deep Welcome the lessthanfriendly arrival of your neighbors with cold steel and hugs made of arrows Ask questions later   Community   Discord  httpsdiscordgg2hwG8by

title: Roses in The Flames
logline: One day you wake up in reality and the next day is a fantasy What if that fantasy is a world full of dragons
description: Great news Roses In The Flames is now free to download once more Have fun You can now download this game Game banner  created by Ace       Snowy  Fandom   Magma  Fandom     Gwendolyn  Fandom     Margaret  Fandom       Saxor  Fandom           Asher  Fandom         Thomas  Fandom       What would you do if you woke up tomorrow not knowing you will be stepping into another reality that very same day What if that reality is inhabited by dragons You are the main character who had the mysterious fate of walking through a magical pond and only to discover after resurfacing you find out its a world inhabited by Dragons  At first everything seemed so strange after meeting the first dragon and then the second After seeing this world for yourself you realize its not so bad to be living in Draconia However living with dragons comes with its own problems This game is a current work of progress and the official demo version will be released  You can support us here Roses In The Flames    Follow us on Twitter Facebook and Reddit too   Facebook   Twitter   Reddit   Join our Discord Group   Discord     Wanting to donate and support the project Donate to us either on our Patreon or Paypal     Patreon  Roses In The FlamesNaomi23295  Curious about checking out our website  RosesinTheFlames Wiki  Fandom

title: Balls Dice  Stickers
logline: A roguelike deckbuilder with balls dice and stickers
description: Hi This is the alpha version of the game It likely needs balancing bug fixes and a lot more content Please let me know if you have any issues or suggestions Thank you for playing     ABOUT THE GAME   Balls Dice  Stickers is a roguelike deckbuilder   You throw balls at dice and use stickers to trigger wild effects     FEATURES   50 stickers more are coming with multiple unique effects 36 quirky characters to defeat A lot of ball throwing Frogs can hijack spaceships     Please add the game to your  wishlist  and  follow  for updates

title: Welcome to Elderfield
logline: A spooky farming RPG
description: Synopsis   Nothing is usual in the secluded town of Elderfield The townsfolk are odd strange beings shift about in the dark and the local news reports seem more mysterious by the day This is where you were born and rarely do those born here leave     But there is work to be done Now finished with your schooling you have an endless supply of free time and very little direction Explore earn money make friends solve mysteries start a farm cook food go fishing beseech the Old Gods talk to the dead cower beneath the pale moon and try not to die in you sleep Welcome to Elderfield         Features   Explore a mysterious open world   Start a farm  growing crops raising animals and processing goods   Cook different kinds of food to sustain your exploration   Fight deadly creatures and bosses as you delve deeper into forbidden places   Go fishing   Explore randomly generated mines with shifting layouts and hidden secrets   Forge new gear to best tougher foes   Explore without end  you choose when to sleep if at all   Interact with local townsfolk many of which live on their own varied schedules   Give gifts and complete tasks to befriend the locals   Forage for materials that generate around the world   Find randomized loot around every corner   And much much more         Demo Info   The Welcome to Elderfield alpha demo is a verticalslice of what is to come The demo features one area of the town the farm and ranch the first dungeon area  the local mall  and several smaller places to explore The final game is expected to have more than 3x the town size at least 2 more dungeon areas like the mall and multiple levels to each of those areas The final game will also include new features such as Old God alignment calendarbased events quality of life features and much more of everything that is already here The demo represents roughly 16 of the planned finished game     Alpha updates beyond the demo will be available to play for  Patreon  members These updates will be released as the game is developed so Patrons can provide feedback and experience the full game as it comes together  bugs and all     Your feedback is vitally important       Any comments left on Itch our  Discord  or our  Patreon  page will be read and considered for future updates     Please let me know if you experience any bugs have any game balancepacing feedback or if there are any changesfeatures youd like to see

title: When Civilians Dig Holes
logline: An idle game about digging a hole to the other side of the world
description: This is a demo of my new idle game about digging a hole to the other side of the world The game is still in development so any feedback or bug reports are greatly appreciated   LATEST UPDATE The game will ask for your consent to collect player analytics data I am using this data to understand player behaviors and understand which features players gravitate towards But you can always choose to opt out too    TIP if the game starts lagging you can click the eye button in the top right of the 3D hole view to toggle some of the UI animation on the grid I am working on a more robust solution to the lag now      Current version  032     If you would prefer to leave feedback via Google form  you can do so here   Discord server for the game is here   httpsdiscordggSJn88X9p

title: Nubbys Number Factory
logline: A game where you run a number factory
description: Nubbys Number Factory  is a game about running a number factory The goal is to make big numbers to level up your factory and make even bigger numbers    Full release   372025   on steam  Find it here           Join the Nubby discord      Buy the full game on steam   Play the demo on steam      You can enjoy the demo release of Nubbys Number Factory by downloading the file  below As far as I know it works well on Windows machines but I cannot guarantee it will work smoothly on Mac or Linux machines  In future updates I will add support for mac and linux I will also add localization for CIS regions  Russia among other languages by play request This game can only be played with a keyboard  mouse   In this demo youll find   A complete tutorial   60 levels       Lots of replayability value   24 unique items to be discovered   17 unique perks that modify your runs   5 bosses 3 encountered in each game   7 special events    7 different pegboard layouts   Developer console for doing crazy things shift  enter while in game to enable

Thank you for the kind words Always has been a big dream of mine to at least attend the game awards  fingers crossed hahaFor Nubby I used GameMaker Studio 2 and its native language GML From what Ive gathered its similar in some ways to javascript Good luck with your game development journey Its a heck of a time for sure

title: Terraformental
logline: Try to survive and perhaps eventually even tame an unknown planet in this incremental semiidle game
description: Try to survive and perhaps eventually even tame an unknown planet in this incremental semiidle game   Inspired by  Increlution  though if youve played that game please be aware that the looping mechanic in this doesnt start unlessuntil you reach a certain point So you do have to do some planning to make sure you survive long enough first time around   This project is currently in early access with a prologue and two chapters of the story available I aim to release major content updates at least once every 2 months   Discord Server  Shady Games Discord   Roadmap  Trello Roadmap   Donate  KoFi   All known bugs are pinned in the bugs forum on the Discord server Please check there before posting bug reports   If youd like to donate to help the development of the game Id very much appreciate whatever amount you feel its worth If possible please donate via  KoFi  rather than here on Itch as I get a much larger percentage of the amount you send
recent_comments: Im honestly not even mad about losing the skills in the update I see where the dev is coming from where it will cause balance issues while incorporating timers in the late game when you have all these maxed out skills So far the familiarity system they incorporated instead has been great I do feel like breaking doors should kinda be a true to each other type of thing each door broken in a loop will make it easier to break all doors in every loop I understand it probably will never be like that because it would be a pain in the backside to code into the game

Im finding that after some initial hesitation the peraction experience speed boost works pretty well Good callAfter so many times doing it it really seems like there should be a Prep Rover option for Talos that gets all the initial stuff ready to go Leaving the optional stuff like the generator and such separate etcThe game feels more polished now

There will be another combined action to combine more of the rover actions but its unlikely to include the generator since you dont always want to bring that with youGlad you enjoyed the update though

Alright this is a pretty cool update Some thoughtsThe new area was pretty cool to explore I love how the Lauriontier challenge of Can you survive in the rover for X amount of time is flipped to Can you clear Santorini in X amount of time which is pretty neat I also liked how reading the logs in Santorini unlocked new stuff to do in Laurion Excited to see more stuff like this in the future Im split on the new resource system On one hand it does a much better job at creating a sense of progression with long timesinks like repairing the rover and longdistance travel able to be reduced much more substantially without making later parts too easy On the other hand it does get a bit weird in some circumstances whats so different between exitingentering the rover in various locations Its the exact same action in principleThe new game balance in general is a bit harder than before I appreciate that the changes   make installing the generator a viable option rather than useless like it was beforeWhile the resource priority system is really cool in theory in practice having it reset everything to auto every loop is rather annoying especially since this must be done at multiple points per loop as various resources are rediscoveredCombined tasks system was really cool for the most part but it had an issue in some cases where youd want to do the subtasks For example once you unlock the gather supplies option theres no way to enter laurion directly without installing the generator or interrupting the gather supplies action

Glad you enjoyed it overall To address some of your issues Ive already planned a v2 of the familiarity system which should smooth over most of the biggest problems with the current one like the rover actions being different bonuses between locations  Familiarity v2 on the Roadmap I do plan to add a toggle option for saving the resource priorities between loops Personally since the preferred priorities wherever you end a loop are unlikely to match the ones at the start of a loop Id rather they reset to auto so I dont forget to change them and the character does something stupid But I can see why people would want the option Combined actions are also queued for an upgrade The main thing will probably be making travel actions appear both inside and outside combined actions so that you can still travel

You can click on the chevron next to combined tasks to get the subtasks with that its fairly easy to just queue the exit rover gather supplies parts or even just the gather water part of the gather supplies combined actions etc Does look kinda funky with the four tiered combined action for repairing the rover tho so much ungrouping possible
Ah so you can Not sure why I didnt think of clicking on the subtasks thanks for pointing that out

Thank you so much for the kind words and detailed response I definitely agree that having a better indication of limited vs unlimited actions would be useful though Im unsure how Id do that without making the action buttons larger to fit a donemax counter An icon or different colour would work but people still have to learn what it means in the first place Ill throw a note on the list to think about for ifwhen I work on a content update I had intended to make tooltips for the skills which wouldve broken down your current multipliers but ran out of time for my selfimposed deadline I may be able to fit them into the bugfix patch Ill do in the next few days That combined with the postloop breakdown screen should clear things up Added note to tweak the Force Ground Floor Door action in the bugfix It was only actually hidden initially due to a technical limitation which I then fixed for the Admin Door I have a few plans for the Action and Inventory panels but theyll all likely have to wait for the content update Currently items are consumed in order of how much they restore which honestly is just a holdover from Increlution but Terraformental has increasingly become a slightly different style of game so you may be right that it should change Yeah Ill try to fit this into the bugfix It can be difficult to decide how much to fit into a single log message as I didnt want to have a single message scrolling off the screen or generally put people off reading them But you do raise a good point that I could add extra Explore more carefully actions once you have access to all the unlimited resources and are stabilised As you say harvesting when full would be very exploitable for farming XP The closest Id consider is if your inventory is full but youre missing enough of the resource that you could instantly consume it then maaaaybe But Id want to build up more of the game so I have a better idea of what impact that might have on balance before I made that kind of change I can definitely add a disable other actions warning of some kind on some actions but itd likely be in the content update Thanks for the offer  Ill be sure to keep you in mind if I get around to doing beta tests Though if Im honest I doubt Ill get it to the front page as nice as that would be xD

title: Delectatio Morosa A Conclave Visual Novel
logline: The conclave is over you are still a manager
description: The conclave is over you are still a manager   Delectatio Morosa A  Conclave Visual Novel  is a  dating  managing sim fan project   Play as  Dean Thomas Cardinal Lawrence  as he prepares for All Saints Day  After the conclave the Vatican only has  one week  to prepare for the upcoming celebrations and the responsibility to manage his Curia members and growing feelings for them falls upon you   FEATURING     Expressive character sprites   70k words of Curial management 16 original illustrations to unlock   Managing all your Curia members simultaneously but watch out   Vatican secret endings       CAST MEMBERS   DEAN OF THE COLLEGE OF CARDINALS      Thomas Lawrence   Papalcule manager aka You   6 CURIA MEMBERS TO MANAGE       Pope Innocent XIV   Gods official bestie         Aldo Bellini   The liberal secretary not the drink         Goffredo Tedesco    Vaper fascist worstie         Sister Agnes   Silently judging matron style         Joshua Adeyemi   Recovering misogynist         Joseph Tremblay   Gaslight gatekeep girlboss   SECRETARY TO THE DEAN     Ray OMalley     Your constant companion   FAQ AND OTHER LINKS   FAQ   Meet the team   Submit a bug report Walkthrough coming soon   Love your neighbor as yourself  Matthew 2239

title: Spirits of Steel A New Dawn
logline: An alt history simulator  grand strategy game
description: The world stands on a precipice as nations scramble to forge the new world order Take charge of any country throughout historical and alternative history scenarios Build industry forge alliances and wage war to spread your sphere of influence   An althistory grand strategy game and the sequel to Spirits of Steel With 400 playable countries 8 maps based on history and popular alt history scenarios and more   Special thanks to Sonak Damien and Kate for testing the game ahead of release   Join us on our  discord server  for game updates feedback and news on other projects     Maps   The Great War 1914 Second World War 1936 The Darkest Hour 1941 Iron Curtain 1949 Cuban Missile Crisis 1962 Modern Day 2024 Kaiserreich Red World     Controls   W  A  S  D up  left  down  right  camera controls space  open  close side bar close decision tree escape  open menu f1  screenshot f2  disable  enable UI f3  disable  enable timelapse divisions   f4  tutorial   f5  population statistics f6  military size statistics f7  region count statistics f8  industry statistics left click  UI controls right click  division controls brackets scroll wheel  zoom in  out

I havent tried however russia does have the most overpowered defensive terrain on the map so that may help when whittling down white russia Also civil wars only start if your ideology does not match the nation you are trying to become so you can skip it by changing your country to being communist first
How did you make the province system I am big into the hoi4 community on scratch and want to know how it works so I have the ability to potentially recreate it

Each region has a culture associated with it When you annex a region it checks the culture of that region and adds it to a dictionary which every country has with the key being the culture and the item being a list of all the regions the country owns with that culture From that you can get the region ids of each region in a province by just getting the item associated with a certain key within the country class
Interesting also how do you get the computer to recodnize that the regions are separate on scratch we have to copy every region into a clone How did you do it here

The regions are all represented by one large dictionary where the first element is a unique color associated with that on the region map the second is its location on the map and the third is a list of every region which that region connects to It works to be a very rudimentary way of implementing a graph data structure

title: Dungeon Duel Monsters
logline: Yugioh Constructed  Draft Simulator
description: Dungeon Duel Monsters         DDM is a multipurpose platform for 2player Yugioh gameplay           Enjoy unique  Dungeon Draft  experiences or build decks for any  Constructed Format       then duel against opponents in a sleek manual simulator all in the same program       Join our Discord server  to explore the       many Draft Campaigns  available to play         Constructed Duels     In Constructed Duels you have access to all cards legal for the format youre playing    You can create your own Constructed Format from a cardpool of your own creation    Or try out any of the retro formats builtin to the App such as Goat Edisonand Tengu       Duel Features     Intuitive duel interface    Combo at the speed of lightpulsar dragon with hotkeys    Save brain power with automatic LP  ATKDEF buttons    Dedicated Card Rulings button    Many other qualityoflife features such as automatic Tokens  Trap Monster Stats       Dungeon Draft     In Dungeon Drafts players build decks from scratch with cards from packs and events    After dueling return to the dungeon to grab more cards    Repeat until one duelist stands victorious   Create your own Dungeon Draft    Create your own Dungeon Draft Campaigns     or download one of many communitycreated ones    Allows for Custom Cards Errata Cards and Rush Duel Cards       Dungeon Cube     Create your own Dungeon Drafts with an easyto learn syntax    or import any YGOPRODECK Cube CSV to immediately start Drafting    Create the Dungeon Draft experience of your dreams within seconds         Discord     Join our Discord server  to explore the       many Draft Campaigns  available to play     httpsdiscordcomwidgetid1186549382187855982themedark

title: Tungtungs Nightmare
logline: tungtungsahur is real
description: is tungtungsahur real   This game is inspired by the brainrot meme Tungtungtung Sahur from Indonesia In this meme if someone doesnt wake up for sahur they will be terrorized by a creature called Tungtung  What is Sahur Suhoor  Sahur also known as Suhoor is the predawn meal eaten by Muslims during the month of Ramadan It is an important part of fasting as it provides energy before abstaining from food and drink until sunset Missing sahur can make fasting more difficult which is why people are often woken up in creative or loud ways   This game tells about   You stay up late and feel sleepy Instead of having sahur Suhoor you decide to go back to sleep butp     Play time   It depends on you if you are good at playing it the game will finish quickly because this game uses a chase mechanic   Support me     Untuk orang indo        Thank You      Play my other games     Finally Last Laugh is now available on Steam

title: Velistra Failed State
logline: Politics power and a nation on the brink
description: Description   The nation is on the brink of collapse and youve just been handed the reins of power In  Failed State  you must navigate the murky waters of politics diplomacy and survival in a world where every decision shapes the future This darkly satirical strategy game challenges you to hold your nation together  or let it spiral into chaos   Key Features   Shape the Future  Decide the fate of a divided nation with tough choices and moral dilemmas   Navigate Alliances  Deal with ministers diplomats and the opposition  each with their own agendas   Unique Playthroughs  Every decision matters Reach every of 8 possible endings or die trying   Credits   CodeGamedesign  Ivan Antsiferov ArtCovers  Polina Antsiferova

title: PancitoMerge
logline: Merge matching breads to create new ones in PancitoMerge a Mexican bakery twist on dropmerge fun
description: PancitoMerge  is a delightful drop merge game inspired by the beloved  Suika Game  but with a delicious Mexican bakery twist Immerse yourself in the vibrant world of Mexican breads which are a cornerstone of the countrys culture and cuisineperfect for meals celebrations or a quick snack As you play discover and learn about each bread by clickingtapping on them in the info panel   How to Play   The goal is simple merge matching breads to create higherlevel ones aiming for the highest score possible while unlocking every type of bread in a single run But be carefulthe game ends if the breads stack up to the top of the bag   Unique Twist   Every 5 drops a customer arrives with a specific bread request Fulfill their order by clickingtapping on the requested bread in the bag    Why Youll Love It      A charming Mexican bakery theme with authentic breads to discover   Simple yet addictive gameplay with a strategic customer mechanic   Perfect for quick sessions or long playthroughs     Help Us Grow   Were considering expanding  PancitoMerge  into a bigger version for PC console and mobile If youd love to see that happen let us know in the comments   Technical Details      Made in Godot   Works seamlessly on mobile   Partial controller support included   Note  Safari iPhoneiPad users may experience occasional reloads we recommend using another browser for the best experience   Credits Art by  Vanila Ryder Music  SFXs by  Rich Cervantes Code  Design by  Fyer Darumadrop One font by  Maniackers Design   Special Thanks    To all our friends family and the amazing communities  IndiEs   Arts Friends   ScoreVG Cacasa   Gamedevs Sur  and more who tested early versions and provided invaluable feedback     Hope you have fun playing  PancitoMerge lets bake some high scores together

title: Sort to 15
logline: A recreation of the number sorting challenge from Survivor Season 48 Episode 2 Humble Traits
description: Sort the Numbers   Think you have what it takes to beat this tough journey challenge Sort the numbers from 1 to 15 just like they did on the Survivor journey Warning this puzzle is a lot tougher than it seems Can you figure it out in time   Inspired by Survivor   This game is a tribute to the memorable number sorting puzzle featured on  Survivor  Season 48 Episode 2  Humble Traits  Fans of the show will love this faithful recreation of the challenge       Disclaimer   This game is not affiliated with the show  Survivor  or CBS It was created by an indie developer and fan of the show as a homage to this puzzle All credit for the original design goes to the Survivor production team     How Fast Can You Finish   Choose from 4 different modes   Easy Medium Hard  or  Casual  The first three give you various time limits to put your skills to the test Or take all the time you need in  Casual  mode Challenge yourself to complete it as quickly as possible and share your fastest time with friends   Share Your Feedback   Have questions comments or need to report a bug Id love to hear from you     Reach out to me on     Bluesky  httpsbskyappprofilewildcockatielgamesbskysocial   Email jonathan AT wildcockatielgames DOT com     More Games   Do you like my games Want to support me as an indie developer Please consider wishlisting my upcoming Steam game   Zombie Barrel Blast

title: Draw  Slay
description: About the Game   This is a  prototype for an idle cardbased RPG  loosely inspired by  MineCards on Itch  The core gameplay is simple  draw a card and your character acts based on its effect       This is the first time Ive taken a game this far in terms of completion Im not sure whether this demo has the potential to grow into a full game so Id love to hear your feedback      Tips  Strategy   Icons guide     First icon   Buy new cards    Second icon   Upgrade character stats     Third icon   Modify your deck currently only allows card removal    Fourth icon   Unlock new monsters     First upgrade card is crucial invest in it early   Early game tip  Buying multiple  Draw 3 Cards Immediately  skill cards can speed up progression   Skill cards  marked with a diamond icon  increase in price  as you acquire moreplan your purchases wisely

title: Null Element
logline: Harness the elements of a ravaged world to fight the machines and save your planet
description: Find Your Way In A Wartorn Kingdom    Controls can be customized in the game settings you can also press ESC for the pause menu    Find out the truth behind your creation in Null Element An  EPIC  action adventure through a vast postwar civilization of cute elementals and scary machines Explore abandoned factories and mystical fire forests beat bosses and encounter unique characters in this classic pixel art  M etroidvania  experience     Made for the  MVM 27 GameJam  by  Project Null  We highly recommend you play the windows version over the web version This game is a work in progress and is scheduled to continue development post GameJam      Game Features     Classic Metroidvania with all the modern luxuries     Carefully finetuned controls Jump and Dash your way through anything the machines throw at you     Explore 2 carefully handcrafted zones with unique bosses waiting for you to confront them        Make your way through diverging paths and numerous secrets         Turn into different elements like Fire and Air that alter the way you play        Evolve with powerful new skills and abilites Blast your way through walls with a Gooey Hammer or set enemies and vines ablaze with the Fireball         Find tons of different upgrades that make you stronger and tougher Will you find them all       A cute cast of elementals to befriend and machines to beat brought to life with framebyframe pixel art animation         Solve numerous puzzles and navigate through platforming challenges        Beautiful pixel landscapes with carefully made parallax giving you a sense of depth        Dont forget to use your map in case you get lost in this interconnected world         An atmospheric nostalgic score to accompany you on your journey of self discovery echoing lost peace and the ever bright hope for the future      Screenshots             CREDITS      A  Project Null  Game   Team Members     Colin C Funky Fresh Fellow   Writing UI Design Sprite Work    Jose Ayala   Team Lead Sound Design Game Design     Leona Stajkovic SavQ   Tile Set Asset Background Art    Manuel Sambour   Original Music   Marvin Kn   Programming Lead Game Design    Milivoj Stankovic   Game Design and Concept Level Design    Ray G Maladaptive_M   Art Lead Character Design Animation Assets    RoyalPizza   Enemy Programming   Special Thanks to   Zacchary Dempsey Plante   Font   Antonia Dragosevic   Logo Design Conceptual Level Design Help   Playtesters   Cactus Katsu   Spenser Dooley    Worcestershirey   Vidan Dugalic   Todor Stojkovic   Aleksandar Krajacevic   Kristijan Kovacev

title: National Park Girls Love Our Parks Edition
logline: All 5 episodes of National Park Girls in one release  improvements
description: National Park Girls Complete    All five episodes of National Park Girls in one complete release Weve updated the game to the Love Our Parks edition which contains the full NPG story plus numerous new improvements and features     If you already owned National Park Girls as a release from Studio Coattails go check out that game page to get a free download of the Love Our Parks edition                                All Eve ever wanted was to protect and preserve the land but after  five years of being a ranger in Yosemite National Park shes just about  ready to throw in the towel The people are careless her coworkers  are annoying and thanks to an increasingly tight budget she can hardly  do her job Fed up and burned out Eve lashes out but after being  transferred to a remote cabin post in return she only finds herself  more uncertain of the value of being a ranger         Soon after arriving three strange girls corner her in the cabin Not  only do they claim to live there but they also say theyre the  manifestations of Zion Yellowstone and Yosemite National Parks Are  these girls really who they say they are Why is Yosemite so obsessed  with her research And why does one of them have a volcano on their  head Follow Eve as she gets closer with these spritely cuties that put  the natural in supernatural and maybe even discovers a new kind of  love for the parks                                          Fully complete story with all 5 episodes of National Park Girls plus multiple improvements to the UI art and direction   New bonus features like a trivia game Adorable character art and CG art from Satchely and a new key visual by Konett    Beautifully rendered backgrounds featuring several famous American landmarks   Original soundtrack by Sarah Mancuso  Please Be Happy   Heart of the Woods    FULL English voice acting    National Parks come to life as cute girls            Follow us on                Bluesky      Discord      Newsletter      Patreon

title: Death of a Wish
logline: THE NEOSANCTUM SHALL FALL A hackandslash actionRPG where style is salvation
description: Death of a Wish  is a vicious actionRPG set in a nightmare filled with horrifying monsters and terrifying people    Play as Christian a Marked child raised by a cult and struggling to escape indoctrination as he bands with others to challenge their oppressors By taking down the four Sanctum Faiths Father Sister Cardinal and Priest they will upend the order of the world     CHALLENGING REWARDING COMBAT   Rend your foes asunder with magical combos called Arias in a demanding combat system that emphasizes tactical aggression Enhance your abilities with powerful perks that significantly alter your approach to battle and the rhythm of combat With a limitless array of ways to fight stylishly build your character your way to destroy your foes   THE POWER OF GRACE   Christians Corruption will constantly rise throughout his journey pulling him towards a tragic end He can hold back the Corruption by achieving high ranks in combat and performing long graceful combos Only by mastering battle and fighting with true elegance will he stand a chance against the Nightmares    A DARK ADVENTURE   Explore a bleak dreamworld filled with surreal new characters encounters and stories The theocratic city of NeoSanctum sets the stage for a struggle to determine the shape of society and the fates of Christian and his companions Delve into the secret underworld of the esoteric and abandoned to meet new allies who will aid you on your journey    SURREAL AND SPECTACULAR   Christians world is rendered with a visual style like no other Battles come to life in an animated spectacle of blood light and motion Nicolo Telescas chilling score mixes electronic sounds with live instrumentation to unite the game with tense anxiety and crackling catharsis

title: BigLittle A Story of Ups and Downs
logline: A small little RPG
description: When a strange turn of events causes MacKenzie to end up somewhere he never thought hed be he must put together a collection of others to set things in the world right and find a way home     BigLittle is a aiming to be a full scale RPG   currently only the Prologue is available at about 3045ish minutes of game play   The game has sizechange elements and while t he current release has some shrinking and other small tidbits  in the future content warnings will be added as needed   Im a solo dev and Ive dabbled in making a little game here and there so now Im trying my hand at something full fledged The goal from the start was to call back to the days of PS1 half spritehalf 3D RPGs Made in RPGMakerMV the intention was  to tell a lighthearted story of party hijinks Im creating all the CGs myself and you can find more examples using the links below to my DA and other social media sites BigLittle will be a  FREE  game for all to play with major updates coming to Itchio while my patreon will see the smaller more rapid testing releases between major chapters     More consistent updates and news can be found on my socials as well as the discord   Patreon   DA   Twitter   BlueSky     BigLittle Discord Group

title: Sunny Smiles
logline: A psychological horror with elements of exploration and technoanxiety
description: After a mysterious incident at an abandoned toy factory the companies involved are desperate to bury the truthbut lost data keeps resurfacing As an operator your job is to decode looping signals from the past but the deeper you go the more you realize the factory hasnt forgotten And it doesnt forgive     Gameplay   Record coordinates sent by your superiors   Upload them into the factorys system and wait for rendering   Analyze the generated images which may reveal traces of the incident   Explore the area and compare images to reality   Survive if something goes wrong     Im a solo developer and this is my first 3D project so please dont judge it too harshly The game is still in early development and any feedback or bug reports in the comments would be greatly appreciated     Inspired by  Poppy Playtime  and  VotV  this psychological horror blends signal decoding with unsettling discoveries     Note   The shift starts at 9 am on Day 0 and dont pay attention to the coordinates

title: Box Out
logline: A LogicBased PuzzlePlatformer Adventure
description: It would mean a lot if you would take the time to  RATE  the project andor give any feedback in the comments below Any feedback constructive criticism or comments is always encouraged Box Out is a puzzleplatformer adventure where preplanning your route and working together with your space companions will determine your success or your demise   Music  by  xDeviruchi Other  SFX Art Code Level Design  by ZeggyGames   Player Controls

title: JetPac Miner
logline: JetPac Miner
description: JetPac Miner     El juego de plataformas donde TU haces las plataformas     Ha vuelto a pasar Nuestro amigo el minero Willy se ha ido de vacaciones a Mallorca y se ha gastado todo su dinero en casinos y mujeres de dudosa reputacin Y ahora sus acreedores amenazan con quedarse con su mansin a no ser que pague las 10000 libras que les debe   Pero no todo est perdido Nuestro valiente protagonista se ha vuelto a poner su casco de minero y ha comenzado a excavar en el jardn de su mansin Esta vez contar con la ayuda de un JetPac para recorrer la mina as como un taladro de alta potencia   Tu misin si deseas aceptarla es ayudarle a encontrar los suficientes minerales preciosos para poder pagar la deuda   Controles   Arriba saltar mantener pulsado para usar el jetpac Izquierda correr a la izquierda Derecha correr a la derecha Disparo  direccin taladrar en la direccin seleccionada Recover permite volver a la tienda si te quedas atascado pero pierdes todos los minerales que hayas recogido hasta ese momento   Puedes seleccionar tres niveles de dificultad Los ms fciles te darn algo de dinero al inicio de tu partida   Contadores    A la derecha encontrars los indicadores que debers vigilar durante tu partida     LEVEL  Nivel de la mina en el que te encuentras Depth  Profundidad actual Money  Dinero que tienes Necesitas llegar a  10000 para ganar la partida Life  La vida que te queda Fuel  Combustible restante Ojo tanto el jetpac como el taladro gastan combustible Bag  Es donde transportas los minerales hasta  que los vendes en la tienda Si est llena los minerales que intentes recoger se destruirn Lights  Necesitas una luz por cada nivel que desciendas o no podrs ver la mina Minerales  Cantidad recogida y precio de venta en la tienda   En la superficie del nivel 0 encontrars la tienda en la esquina superior derecha Acrcate para entrar     Cuando entres en la tienda automticamente se vendern todos los minerales que lleves en la bolsa y se te ofrecern mltiples opciones   1 Rellenar vida 2 Rellenar combustible 3 Aumentar un 50 tu vida total 4 Aumentar un 50 tu combustible total 5 Aumentar un 50 la capacidad de tu bolsa 6 Duplica la velocidad del jetpac y reduce su consumo 7 Duplica la velocidad del taladro y reduce su consumo 8 Comprar luces El precio de los artculos aumentar segn aumentes su nivel   En tus aventuras por las minas encontrars distintos objetos unos agradables y otros no tanto    Tierra  En rojo y magenta en este nivel puedes y debes taladrarla para buscar minerales Pero ten cuidado Si taladras sin pensar tal vez no puedas volver a la superficie Bajar es fcil subir no tanto Y ten cuidado con las cadas Minerales  En azul en la imagen Tu objetivo no es slo recogerlos sino regresar a la tienda para ganar dinero Rocas  Esas bolas blancas estn esperando la mejor ocasin para arruinarte el da Tu deambular por la mina har que se desprendan en el momento menos adecuado Puedes romperlas con el taladro pero son ms duras que el terreno Y no intentes romperlas con la cabeza perders Ratas topo mutantes de mediana edad  Esos encantadores ojillos No son muy listas pero s pueden ser molestas Trales una roca encima para ganar un bonus     Agradecimientos   Boriel por su maravilloso compilador Dr Gusman y Duefectu por el entorno ZX Basic Studio y libreras Arda Erdikmen por el editor de pantallas de BasinC   Notas    Se ha utilizado IA nicamente para el dibujo de la portada pero todo el coloreado se ha hecho a mano sin ningn retoque adicional Por eso tiene esa apariencia cutre porque lo es  El juego se puede jugar en 48k pero no funcionar la msica El cdigo del juego est incluido por si quieres aprender como programar o hacer tus propias modificaciones El juego est inspirado en  A Game About Digging A Hole  de steam que os recomiendo mezclado con el boulder dash que aprendes a valorar cuando intentas programar algo parecido

title: Night Maniac 2 The Legacy Of Blood
logline: The Red Valley Killer returned and is now in GreenFord
description: NIGHT MANIAC 2 HAS RECEIVED AN IMPORTANT UPDATE WE RECOMMEND THAT YOU UPDATE IF YOU HAVE THE FIRST VERSION   AND IF YOU UPDATE AND YOU DONT SEE THE LANGUAGE SELECTION SCREEN AFTER LOADING GO TO OPTIONS AND THEN CHANGE THE DIALOG LANGUAGE     Terror returns in  Night Maniac 2 The Legacy of Blood  diving even deeper into the darkness that haunts Red Valley Years have passed but the scars of the past never truly fade Now a new wave of blood threatens the town echoing a horror many believed was long buried   Obsession and fear walk hand in hand as mysteries unravel revealing that some shadows never disappearthey only wait for the right moment to resurface Face the terror headon uncover dark secrets and fight to survive because the blood legacy is far from over     The game is available in the following languages       English   Portuguese     Spanish     French       Contact email  studionoxus021gmailcom       Special thanks to CaseOh and his community     Mode  Single player video game     Genre  Horror     The music and sounds in the game are not copyrighted     Developer  Diego Victor       Controls     W A S D   Move   Shift   Run   Left Mouse Button   Interact   Q Drop item Space   to skip dialogues or stop hidin

title: LIMERENCE
logline: a conversation over dinner
description: limerence   limrns   the state of being infatuated or obsessed with another person typically experienced involuntarily and characterized by a strong desire for reciprocation of ones feelings but not primarily for a sexual relationship      a short story of a captive and a captor chatting over dinner not so much horror but more a tense uneasy atmosphere and an imbalance of power  named after the  yves tumor song  of the same name   made for the  O2A2 jam  this jam has restrictions that require 1 cg or sprite and background 1 sound effect 1 bgm and 1k words    this game is about 510 minutes in length   for additional information check out the 500 download devlog listed below   contains   977 words one choice one bastard who wont stop staring at you   music is by  makoto hiramatsu  under  CC BY 40

title: Heisenberg
logline: Explore the Breaking Bad universe in a brand new way
description: Explore the Breaking Bad universe in a brand new way Taking place during the events of Season 4 the story picks up as Walt is called to the Lab and told that some of the product in Jesses care has been stolen Help residents around town with their requests and with Mikes help discover the location of the stolen product

title: POOT and the Mysterious Signal
logline: The alien from Uranus
description: Controls   Arrow KeysWASD  Move POOT   ZJ  InteractConfirm   XK  Cancel SHIFT  Menu ESC  Pause Game   POOT and the Mysterious Signal     About   POOT and the Mysterious Signal  is a 1bit adventure game inspired by GameBoy classics and games like Minit Play as POOT a young alien inventor from Uranus who discovers strange signals interfering with the towns toilets Team up with the eccentric Professor Gaseous to build a device capable of decoding these mysterious transmissions        Explore a charming town solve puzzles and uncover the beginning of POOTs grand adventure in this first installment of the POOT saga      Features     Classic 1bit Aesthetic  Crisp black and white visuals inspired by GameBoy classics and Minit    Intriguing Story  Unravel the mystery of strange signals and discover POOTs family secrets    Exploration  Navigate the town docks caves and abandoned power plant    Puzzle Solving  Collect parts and solve environmental challenges    Hidden Secrets  Find journal fragments and special items throughout the world    Minigames  Unlock POOT Runner once you complete the game   Development   POOT and the Mysterious Signal is the first in a planned series of games exploring POOTs adventures Created by a solo developer with a passion for pixel art  Music   Special thanks to beatscribe for the awesome music packs   httpsbeatscribeitchio   Software   Made with GBStudio and Aseprite   httpswwwgbstudiodev   Connect     Twitter  pootcoinsol

title: Sailing with Stans  Chapter 1  A Sea Grunks Dating Sim
logline: Stan and Ford stumble upon an anomaly at sea which turns out to be you While they patch you back up romance blossoms
description: Welcome to Chapter 1 of the full game    For updates on Chapter 2 and beyond find us on  Tumblr  3   SUMMARY   Stan and Ford stumble upon an anomaly at sea which turns out to be you While they patch you back up romance blossoms     FEATURING   A brand new game menu layout Updated sprites and new emotions New illustrated backgrounds Three new special scenes Pronoun selection Easter eggs   CREDITS     Chapter 1    VICARTLESS  WritingSpritesSpecial ScenesOpening IllustrationProgramming     Kiwicartwheels  Lead Editor   LINUXVALOARE  Background Artist Stan O War II     Music In Order     Sailing with Stans Title Screen  VICARTLESS   Untold Journey  The Pirate King     Johnny Easton  Deep Blue     FOLLOW THE GAME     Follow the games progress on  Tumblr  Please also feel free to message usgive feedback on what you thought   Stay tuned for Chapter 2 and the other talented creatives on our time Release date to be announced 3   MOBILE USERS   Because the game is optimized for browserdownload some elements are not as polished on mobile devices We apologize for the inconvenience We hope to improve this in the future

title: Pool GAMBIT
logline: Chess  pool with jazz Enjoy
description: Chess  pool   Thinking about the game I decided to break the concepts of chess and billiards to create something new  Besides these two games I was also inspired by games like Balatro Peglin and Shotgun King     Tips   1 Develop figures  look for places where you can most advantageously place a figure   2 Have an attack plan  each figure has unique properties use them with maximum benefit this can be read on the About Figure button   3 Use bonuses  by knocking out enemy pieces you get points that you can spend on doubling your attack turning a pawn into a queen and other useful features   4 Remember  your goal is to knock the enemy king into the pocket      Aim precisely to hit the figure or win positionally     This game was made in 10 days for a jam by one person Enjoy and be sure to leave a review Thanks

title: ALPEN GHOUL Prologue
logline: Run Hide Slide
description: Lost confused alone and hunted You need to reach the top but a relentless creature bears down on you and all you have to protect yourself are your wits and skill Youll need to try different approaches honing your strategy as you playbut be careful mastery of this game leads to discovery and some things are better left unfound     Dont find it Dont let it find you   Its trying to control you    You have been warned   Follow us for more    YouTube        TwitterX         Patreon        KoFi    DEV NOTE IMPORTANT  This game is a completely different experience from AM Its much harder and unforgiving when starting out but its fun once you master it Be prepared to die a lot If you are struggling and dont mind spoilers we have a written guide for you  HERE  Good luck

Exploration is key Try different routes and inch your way to victory If you want to beat Alpen Ghoul youll have to earn it Its one of those games Your playstyle is up to you but I recommend staying crouched keeping your flashlight off and searching around the mountain slow and safe until youre more familiar with it Once you have an idea of whats out there crank up the speed and aggressive sliding Sliding is the fastest way to moveBeyond this advice I cant help you Its up to you to pull off a win The mountain is cruel and there is no easy way to beat it but it is beatable

Legitimately impressive what 3 people can put together in 4 monthsAn expansive area with a handcrafted mazelike cave system gameinfluencing collectibles for you to find that stay persistent between deathsplaythroughs NG and hard mode satisfying to control mobility that hasnt glitched out on me in the 2 hours of play dynamic music used as audio cues for enemy alertness and speaking of a cunning yeti that makes RE2makes Tyrant look like a newborn kittenReaching the summit ends the game but the real goal actually lies below it The death counter on the end screen kinda gives away the devs want you to treat deaths as a learning experience instead of failure Theres quite a bit to map out and theres even one secret lying in wait in the caves I figured out the cypher but havent found it yetI loved this Im done hiding in lockers Let me swooce away from monsters at breakneck speeds down snowy slopes Only feedback I have is its maybe too easy to end up in the same death trap at first and progress could maybe be represented visually a bit to help players feel like theyre on the right trackmade it further this time

Thank you so much for the kind words Trying to help players with navigation  hopefully in subtle ways  is at the top of the list for future updates I want people getting lost a little but not for the wrong reasons like areas looking too similar Like you all Im experiencing a learning curve of my own Enjoy the tape huntupdate I changed the intro area to have a place to chill right after you respawn and adjusted some elements in the level Ive been working like crazy trying to update it and help players without it losing its core Player vs Monster feel I love this stuff Dissecting what works and what doesnt is what got me into trying to make a game in the first place

Exploration is key Try different routes and inch your way to victory If you want to beat Alpen Ghoul youll have to earn it Its one of those games Your playstyle is up to you but I recommend staying crouched keeping your flashlight off and searching around the mountain slow and safe until youre more familiar with it Once you have an idea of whats out there crank up the speed and aggressive sliding Sliding is the fastest way to moveBeyond this advice I cant help you Its up to you to pull off a win The mountain is cruel and there is no easy way to beat it but it is beatable

Intensity levels higher then expected yet the AI  too BUFFY I loved the concept of this game Rarely do I come across the indie project which has this level of detail quality and hard work put into it The sound design and atmosphere shine brightest same as the visuals and that creature  looking terrific Yet the game has its issues For the demo the project is brilliant I would say adding the difficulty levelmeters for other players can create less confusing gameplay or maybe making the checkpointssaving system just in case something goes wrong The map overall looks neat yet at some corners the player might glitch and end up in the creatures hands Those improvements would benefit the game for sure Best of luck with the development and will see what you can make out of it Cheers

I think I just need to communicate better that too much running is basically an instant death because he is tracking you and hears you I have learned so much about level design in the last 24 hours from watching people play the game This guy is the only person to pay the game as I saw in my head  He might be the first person to enter the building though the intended path Im thinking of ways to get more people on the right track and help people get over that initial hump Thank you for the feedback No monster AI nerf just yet The full game will have safe rooms double as checkpoints and allow for the player to have ways to escape the monsters grasp I think the high difficulty of the demo helps condense all the feelings of what I want the full game to feel like but in under a few minutes Its just the demo version so if some players cant beat it thats totally fine The full version will be a bit more forgiving because I want everyone to be able to get through that version Again thanks for the feedback This is the exact type of thing I was looking for I would love to hear from more devs

With all due respect I disagree with you The intent of creating a playable application let it be demo or a full version is to consider the outside perspective People should not and wont play the game the way you want If 1 person out of 10 finds the same path that means just that Sorry but you are making the general players feel guilt and frustration and defending your game as if they should play it the way you want Sorry but no When I make games I always consider that some players might walk or run or do that and this It is a big mistake Watching other people play can improve your development unless you are willing to face the criticism and be humble It is your choice do what you want but if the marketing of the game is monster too fast and hard to complete they wont come back for more And just because 12 people out of 4050 play the game as you say correct means nothing Good Luck
w game

title: DreadVault
logline: Dreadvault
description: Free Sale  Special Offer         Due to multiple player requests We are making the game  free on sale  for a limited time Additionally anyone who has already purchased the game will receive our  next game for free  as a thankyou for their support                               Story    When Daniel inherits his uncles remote estate he expects an old empty housenot strange whispers and unseen movements     Dr Adrian Lowe a famous neurologist disappeared without a trace leaving behind a house full of secrets and a hidden  bunker that was never meant to be found       As Daniel searches the dark halls and the depths below he uncovers the truth about  Project Strosh an experiment to extract and save memories But something went wrong The memories didnt just stay  They became something else Something alive Something hungry   Daniel must uncover the truth before he becomes just another trapped memorylost forever in his uncles final experiment          Key Features     Psychological Horror   Lose yourself in a nightmare where memories twist reality Whats real Whats just a stolen thought       Exploration  Puzzles   Uncover the houses dark past solve mysteries and unlock hidden paths to the truth         Supernatural Encounters   Shadows move whispers grow and something watches your every step       Multiple Endings   Your choices shape Daniels fate Escape the nightmareor become part of it   Gameplay Time   18352445min   Disclaimer    The game has been translated into the following languages      English Original    Portuguese Google Translate    German Google Translate    Spanish Google Translate   Russian Google Translate    Indonesian Google Translate   JapaneseGoogle Translate        There may be semantic errors in translations       Since the author is not a native speaker   Controls   MOVE  WASD INTERACT     E FLASHLIGHT     F MOUSE Look Around ESC Pause Left Mouse Button Keypad Interaction Updated the game files Minor Bug fixesIntro Time Increased Enhanced Audio Download the new game file

title: Quiet Roads
logline: Slow down Breathe Explore
description: Untitled Cosy RPG for IGO721 Indie Games Module at Falmouth University Known Bugs Some menu screens occasionally freeze  This is because of Z ordering with some transparent bits of UI overlapping buttons preventing them from being clicked   All inventory items have a 2D icon and a 3d world object  I havent implemented all the 3d objects so some Apples  This includes quest items and there is no way of turning them back into the original item  As all items are saved every time they transfer to  from the players inventory you will need to delete and reinstall WASD or Joypad left stick for Movement  on foot W  Accelerate When in Vehicle   S  Brake  Reverse When In Vehicle   A S  Steer Left  Right When in Vehicle   Space  Handbrake E or Left Face Button  Enter Exit Van  Interact with NPCs Enter Buildings interact with other game objects I  Display Inventory Tab  Display Quest Log P or Esc  Pause Currently only works when on foot All UI screens still require Mouse

title: Monochrome Pixels
logline: Can you bring back the colors into your life
description: Diana a Senior Game Designer from Mad Lobster Interactive deals with burnout night terrors and work harassment at the hands of her narcissistic boss Godric on a daily basis    One morning like any other without paying any mind to her already busy schedule Godric tasks her with mentoring their new employee Enya an upbeat and passionate newbie whos yet to see the struggles of the game development industry    Very much at her wits end Diana has to make an important decision that may affect not only her career but her life as a whole Will she mentor Enya in her own way and get to know them better Or will she be at the service of Godric and her own inner demons           Although the characters and story of Monochrome Pixels are fictional the issues of abuse and mistreatment in the games industry are not This game contains the following content   Toxic workplace Abusive and oppressive boss Struggles with mental healthdepression Nightmares Burnout   Harassment Misogyny       29k words roughly 15  3 hours depending on reading speed 3 Endings 4 CGS An original soundtrack Partial Voice Acting A cute budding friendship between coworkers depending on your choices Developer notes Accessibility Options Font options Change UI Colors Sound  Image captions Reduce Animations This will disable bright flashes SelfVoicing     Project Lead Writer Programmer  Kristi logline: True open world adventure
description: Ive been working on this off  on for a few years The main idea of the game is to be a large true open world adventure with unique quests with different ways of completing them   What do I mean by true open world Anywhere that you see on the map can be explored You see a forest You can go in there You see a mountain You can explore it I try to keep the map as open and explorable as possible   For the quests I want them to have different ways of completing them depending on factors like statsparty membersitems how the quest was startedetc The quests dont take into consideration all of that stuff at once but usually one or two of them   Some features of the game right now include   5 races  8 Starting classes to choose from 24  companions to recruit and join you VisuStella FTB Combat FTB AKA Free Turn Battle means you get a pool of actions and you can choose which member uses them 2 cities and a small town 6 forests 5 dungeons 7 small replayable dungeons Each class has unlockable skills as they level up Each class has access to 4 weapons that can be upgraded to a 5 16 more that can only be upgraded to 1 an assortment of accessories Not much in the way of armor right now Several items in the form of potions bombs and materials 5 marked quest from the Adventurers Guild  5 untracked quests on the map several more secret areas that I wouldnt consider quests Id say at least a few hours of gameplay   I dont plan to make the game story focused and prefer a more soulslike approach where the story and world building are through environment and item descriptions Not that there wont be  a story for the game but I prefer to keep it light I personally hate how much reading and cutscenes there are in JRPGs and RPGs in general because they always seem to drag on and I start losing interest real fast and just start skipping it all Ideally any interactions in my game that happen will be no more than a minute or two to get through    While the game is in early alpha it doesnt mean  there isnt much in the game right now  It just means that compared to what the full game will be this is basically just a taste of what to expect   The core mechanics and gameplay are somewhat there  Things change and get added as I get ideas but the main idea of what the game IS is there   Why release it now  Well its in a playable state and Id like to get feedback on what others think about it Plus It keeps me motivated to see interest in the project   What about the future of this game  Im going to keep working on it for the foreseeable future after all Im really only scratching the surface for what I want this game to be  Theres currently two quests that are partially complete that arent in the game I need to finish those up and Ive got at least 2 more classes that I want to add to the game when the balance is in a better place  Ill keep working on it as long as theres an interest in it   Will I start charging for the game Whats the financial model   Its my belief that incomplete games shouldnt be charged for I remember back in the day when a game was complete when you bought it and so I wont be charging anything for this until its complete At least until theres a full bug free experience to be had The earliest I would start charging anything would be when I completely finish the Aquanis area the region of the map that the playable area takes place in and even then it would only be a couple bucks  But any donations are greatly appreciated it lets me know you really believe in the project   How buggy is the game right now   Well I cant say its bug free or without its problems The combat balance is an on going process with the game  There always seems to be something that comes up with random softlocks or things not working properly in rare cases I try to take care of these as soon as possible if they are a major issue   I really enjoyed the game  concept how can I help  Honestly Just letting me know what you thought giving suggestions and letting me know of any bugs is enough You can also share the page around wherever you want to promote it The more people that know of it the better Otherwise unless you want make artwork for the game bug test  or provide plugins just showing support is enough to keep me motivated    I really didnt enjoy the game  Well I hope if thats the case youll let me know why I know the game has its issues right now  but I want to make it the best experience that it can be Its gonna take some time to get there  but Im committed to getting it there   The game is too ambitious Are you going to cut back the amount of content  I dont plan on cutting back on my vision for the game thats the problem  I know that the game is going to be incredible when its complete so I cant bare the idea of cutting any of it out  If I can make a game that surprises people with how good it is from the amount of quality content my role as the game developer will be fulfilled and I can be proud to call this my creation    Will saves carry over to future versions  You can move your saves to newer versions and they should be compatible but I cant guarantee it The only problems that would occur would be if a quest softlocked you in this case if you have an older save from before then it might be recoverable if a future quest relied on new code added to old quests that cant be repeated in this case I can just add a way to get whatever was needed or if an old area was reworked and you got stuck in an immovable spot In this case you could use the travel scroll to teleport out of it   How often are you going to release updates  Short answer I dont know If theres a game breaking bug discovered then Ill try to get an update out as soon as possible As far as additions of new content I cant really say I really want to make sure the core gameplay is solid first before going all out with new content  Ill try to get new updates out whenever theyre ready maybe an update every month or two    Summary   Its in early alpha but the main mechanics are there Im releasing it now to get feedback and to motivate me Im pretty sure most of the major gamebreaking bugs are fixed fingers crossed The game will continue to be free until there is a full experience to charge for Love it or hate it Id appreciate the feedback so I can make it better Expect updates to fix game breaking bugs main updates about every month   If you make a video on the game let me know Id love to see it   Discord Server  httpsdiscordggGXHucC4HHC   Copy and paste the link I dont know why the hyperlink wont work   BTW I have no idea if the Mac version works because I dont know anyone with a Mac to test it on and nobody has said it hasnt Please let me know if theres an issue

title: MERP The Game
logline: The most adorable game of wackamole
description: Download the game to save your highscore and recommended for some levels Known bug with Web version  UI elements may not size properly in some browsers Fullscreening sometimes fixes it otherwise please download the game       You find yourself standing in a white void What is this place How did you get here Doesnt matter a Sergal is standing before you and its looking up at you asking for pets       Are you just going to stand there and not boop the Sergals snoot Of course not So you do and it merps at you in response It scampers off only for another Sergal to appear and ask for a boop and you do But for every Sergal you boop two more seem to show up It looks like this void isnt so empty after all               In the most adorable game of whackamole you must boop the snout of each eager Sergal that comes up to you But be quick as Sergals can be somewhat impatient and if you leave them waiting too long theyll walk away       The Sergal herd is coming and youll only have 60 seconds before they run off again How many can you boop before time runs out and youre left alone in this void once more       Plenty of Sergals to boop  Enjoy an abundance of adorable Sergals to boop Test your reflexes and see how many you can pet within 60 seconds Can you set a new record     Boop Sergals with Precision  Perfectly aimed boops build combos that rack up even higher scores How long can you keep your streak going     Watch out for Protogenstheyre not as boopfriendly  While Sergals love the attention Protogens require extra caution Their digital screens are delicate and a misaimed boop could end your streak with a sharp penalty               Credits       Original inspiration by  Tytolis  Programming art and design by Stick Shift Games     Fonts from Fontspace and Dafont     Sound effects from Freesound

title: Cards of the Abyss
logline: A game about slaying monsters with some cards
description: Fight your way through a mysterious dungeon in this roguelite deckbuilder adventure game Build a strong deck of different attacks and defences as yout try to reach the Abyss   FYI There are some bugs and balance issues as the game was literaly made in two days But I will update it soon enough In the mean time try to reach the end Because not even I could yet LOL   And leave a comment if you can Id love to have some feedback    This project was an undergraduate teaching assistantship test for my games university course The assignment was to create a roguelite card game in approximately two days    The game was made in Construct 2 using free assets from itchio All of the programming and game logic was made by me     LInks for all of the assets used in this project    Enemies  httpszerieitchiotinyrpgcharacterassetpack     Characters  httpspixelpoemitchiodungeonassetpuck     Music and SFX  httpsleohpazitchiominifantasydungeonsfxpack     Cards  httpscafedrawitchiofantasycardassets Font  httpskushionitchioneolithicfont

title: Marlow ZX Spectrum
logline: Malow in Apocalyptic Acid World is a platform game for ZX Spectrum 128k inspired by The Great Giana Sisters
description: Now you can also buy this beautiful Cassette release by Teknamic  httpsteknamiccomproductmarlow     Marlow in Apocalyptic Acid World is a platform game for ZX Spectrum 128k inspired by The Great Giana Sisters What You thought the inspiration came from a certain mustached plumber No way   Navigate this vast apocalyptic world by jumping stomping on enemies collecting crystals throwing molotov cocktail and breaking blocks with your head across 4 worlds in a total of 17 levels and 5 Boss battles   You can donwload the Beta Demo for free to test the game before you buy the full package   Marlow Key Features   5 Bosses and 17 stages Spread through 2 Episodes 2 programs 7 catch sound tracks more info on readmetxt 10 Full screen illustrations loading title intro cutscenes and endings Fluid gameplay mechanics in a style rarely seen on the ZX Spectrum     This project was only possible thanks to MPAGD Gen2 modified version of the engine by Xavisan that expands memory usage beyond the 48kb without which the complex title screens introduction and ending as well as the large number of music tracks screens and code would not have been possible   More info on teh Readmetxt file that cames along the game package   Have fun     Find me on social media    facebook  httpswwwfacebookcomamaweks   Instagram  httpswwwinstagramcomamaweks_   Bluesky  httpsbskyapp   Twitter  httpstwittercomamaweks     Website  wwwamawekscom

title: Trapped in the Tomb
logline: amiga game platform action adventure
description: As you opened the ancient tombs gates you unknowingly triggered a mechanism that sealed you inside Around you stretches a dark labyrinth filled with mysteries traps and riddles of the past To escape to the surface you must find crystal skulls that will unseal the closed passages Every step is a race against time and your own fear but somewhere in the darkness lies the path to freedom Will you uncover the tombs secrets and break free from its grasp   The tomb is never the same twiceeach time you enter the artifacts are hidden in different locations and your journey begins from a new starting point    Purchase the Boxed Version Here   The digital version of this game is completely free to download and enjoy However if youd like to support the developer and own a special boxed edition includes a floppy disk and USB drive   The  Box Edition  of  Trapped in the Tomb  is a special collectors set for true retro gaming fans Inside you will find       A floppy disk  with the full game delivering an authentic Amiga experience   A USB pen drive  featuring     The  ADF version  of the game ready to play on the  A500 Mini just plug it in and start your adventure   The  HDD version  of the game for those who prefer a hard drive setup   A  custom Amiga emulator  allowing you to launch  Trapped in the Tomb  with a single click on  Windows and Linux  available in versions for x8664 and ARMv8   The  full game soundtrack  by  Shadowolf  with extended versions of the tracks used in the game   A paper instruction manual  providing essential details about the game   A collectible sticker  to complement your retro collection   A commemorative token  designed like an ancient coin with a skull motifa small treasure from the tomb itself      The  Box Edition  is available for purchase at the following links At the moment all units have been sold out However a new batch has already been ordered and will be available soon If you were planning to purchase one but didnt get the chance please dont worry  more are on the way We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience and appreciate your patience   Poland    Worldwide including Poland    Before purchasing make sure the game works on your computer  the digital version is completely free   Are you ready to uncover the secrets hidden within the tomb       WHDLoad  version by Amiga Vault Team FB Page  httpswwwfacebookcomAMIGAVAULT FB Group  httpsfacebookcomgroupsamigavaultproject   Hardware requirements   minimum  Amiga  ECS  05mb Chip  05mb Slow  68000  kickstart 13  fdd recommended  68020 processor hdd   Game Controls   Movement  left  right   move left or right down  fire   shoot up or fire  left  right   diagonal jump up or fire   jump up Jump near a rope to grab it automatically   Movement on rope left  right   drop or grab a nearby rope up  down   climb up or descend the rope   Special keys F1  M  LMB   view map and status F2  R  RMB   reset position ESC   exit to menu   Game Modes   Hold My Hand Infinite lives and unlimited ammo Perfect for casual fun or learning the game   Start Easy 21 lives and 12 bullets A gentle introduction with room for mistakes   Go Balanced 9 lives and 6 bullets A fair challenge for experienced players   Face the Challenge 3 lives and 3 bullets Only for the brave  can you survive   Credits   Programming Concept Graphics   Marggines Music   Shadowolf Testing Gajaada Adamzeku  Polish Amiga Floppy Preservation Group Saberman Stoopi     Special Thanks     I would like to express my deepest gratitude to the creators of the game  Fred  for the ZX Spectrum Its unique atmosphere and the unforgettable charm of the 1980s were a major source of inspiration for me during the development of this project     Fred is a game that showed me how powerful creativity and ingenuity can be in crafting memorable experiences for players My project is a tribute to that era and to everyone who contributed to its legacy     Thank you for inspiring me and for showing that even the simplest ideas can leave a lasting impression in the hearts of gamers

title: Hell Breaker
logline: A new puzzle game for Game Boy Color
description: Prerelease alpha demo of Hell Breaker a new puzzle game for the Game Boy Color   Every century since the dawn of man a battle has taken place between Heaven and Hell over the souls that get lost between the realms Each side nominates an angel to fight and the winner collects these souls for their side    In this our year 20XX dark angel Lilith enters the puzzle arena to battle light angel Muriel for the title of Hell Breaker   How to Play    Score points by making matches Lay gems of the same type and color in sets of 3 or more to make a match Create combos for extra points    Controls     DPadArrow Keys  Move    AB Buttons or ZX Keys  Rotate Piece    Coming Soon     Character select     Revised scoring system inspired by character action games like Devil May Cry and Bayonetta     Leader Board     Difficulty Options     And more   Credits    Mike Leisz  Game Design Programming Art     Tara Touzie  Game Design Production Sound FX     Original Music by  Robotmeadows      Additional Music and Sound FX by  Tronimal       Made in GBStudio   Brought to you by Technofantasy   Thank you for playing Feel free to leave a comment

title: Guivoio
logline: Competitive Match3 with Elo ranking
description: Guivo Competitive Match3   Enjoy Guivoio a competitive Match3 game playable directly in your desktop or mobile browser Battle players worldwide strategically destroy ice and climb global ranks in fast rounds     Forget ads and paytowin Guivo emphasizes skill with its Elo ranking system similar to chess ensuring fair competition The better you play the higher youll rank up and if you win your name will be displayed in the banner     Key Features     Competitive Multiplayer  Battle players globally in realtime   Strategic Match3  Simple to learn with depth in controlling ice   Elo Ranking System  Fair ranking based on skill   FastPaced Rounds  Quick and engaging gameplay   No PaytoWin  Focus on skill and strategy   Play Anywhere  Accessible in your browser on desktop and mobile     Challenge yourself and climb Guivo leaderboards     Play Guivo now  httpsguivoio     Install Guivo as an App  Open guivoio website in your mobile browser and look for the install menu It cant be installed directly from within the itchio website     As a passion project developed over many years community feedback is valued Let me know your thoughts and suggestions for improvement

title: Fabled Warlords 2 The Winds of Magic
logline: Lead powerful factions in a turnbased strategy game where tactical mastery and unique units shape epic battles
description: A turnbased fantasy strategy game of war magic and shifting alliances   The wartorn world of  Fabled Warlords  stands on the brink of chaos As ancient powers awaken and new alliances are forged factions across the lands of  Alderon Kyrondor Thistlemere and Astralis  must fight for survival conquest and vengeance        Rebels Campaign  Lead Kaelen Thorne and his freedom fighters as they resist invaders and overthrow Stormguards rule      Arcanist Campaign  Defend the ancient mage kingdom from agressors      The Fallen Campaign  Wield forbidden dark magic as Varax the Exiled a sorcerer seeking revenge after centuries in exile      Primordial Campaign  Aid the mystical beings of Kyrondor as they flee from a growing war and return to Thistlemere      Beastmen Campaign  Reclaim a lost homeland and unite the Beastmen tribes against old enemies   Key Features    Tactical turnbased battles with factionspecific abilities   Territory control and strategic resource management   Unique units from Arcanist mages to Beastmen trolls   A deep evolving story shaped by war magic and destiny   Strategic variety in every battle with different game modes like conquest capture the flag survival and battle of attrition   Will you rise as a hero or will the  Winds of Magic  reshape the world in darkness   Controls     Left Mouse Button   Select give move and attack orders to selected units Doubleclick a tile to inspect terrain properties   Right Mouse button   Rightclick a tile to inspect terrain properties   WASD or Arrow Keys   Move the camera   Z   Zoom in the camera   X   Zoom out the camera   R   Open the unit recruitment panel   F  Toggle onoff the faction ability panel   T  Toggle onoff the faction time cycle panel   I   Toggle onoff the unit details panel   M   End your turn      Select previous unit      Select next unit       Windows Build   For those who want to download the game and play it on your windows machines you can do so by downloading the zipped file below and extracting it Windows Build Please note that this build is an experimental version of the game and may have bugs or other problems that I am not aware of This version of the game is optimized for browsers only
