logline: Lead the world to apocalypse with lemonades in this incremental clicker with branching gameplay and stories
description: This Prototype contains the first stage of the story driven incremental clicker Lemonade Apocalypse The Great Filter   SUPPLY  DEMAND SIM   At its core is the supply and demand mechanic Use dubious means to manipulate the sales      ENVY THE NEIGHBOURHOOD KIDS   All your friends has a bicycle and you want one too             HUMBLE BEGINNINGS OF GREED   After getting a bicycle you realize that this can become a business  Choose between Cheap Lemonade Aesthetic Lemonade and Sugarfree  Lemonade Each with its unique twist on the gameplay and affects the  story More choices in the Factory stage and End Game          HANDDRAWN ART   All art is drawn by hand with a unique style     PRESTIGE   This Prototype has a separate prestige system so that youll be rewarded for trying the different paths and playing through multiple times     PLAY UP UNTIL THE FACTORY   Once you get the factory youll prestige in this prototype

title: CDawgVA in Sumimasen
logline: A Crane Game Challenge VS Connor Himself
description: WARNING   This game features some loud noises flashing lights cartoon violence light gore strong language and worst of all a Welsh person   Have you ever been so parasocial about a YouTuber playing Japanese crane games that you made a game about him just so that you can come close to replicating the feeling of playing with him   Cant say I have but if that sounds familiar   DO I HAVE A GAME FOR YOU   In this comedy  horror  game you join CDawgVirginia on a trip to an arcade filled with fun and challenging crane games Do you have what it takes to beat them   By accepting this challenge you will   Turn everything you can into a crane game  Even yourself Get to experience the average SeaDog commenters dream Meet actual real life  Connor Marc Colquhoun    For legal reasons it should be clarified that the mentioned individual did not at any point participate in the process of development of this video game and a meeting will NOT be arranged with any individual that plays through it   Overthrow the government Be blown away by all of the art and animations made by  me    Vibe to the  BANGING ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK  by  qourxkk    Try to survive   This is a love letter to the communities of  CDawgVA  and others that continuously inspire me and help me get through it all I even got an interview at the best uni in the country cause I showed them my last game about Connor Thats insane right    Btw please watch the trailer I worked really hard on that thing     You can follow me on my  youtube  and  twitter  or you can support me on my  boosty

title: FAR WEST ZX SPECTRUM 128K
logline: No Guts no Glory
description: NUEVO JUEGO DEL VIEJO OESTE   Spectrum ZX 128K   Estimados amigos del ZX Spectrum   Estoy encantado de anunciar esta pequea joya para nuestro querido ordenador clsico un juego del oeste creado con mucho cario y dedicacin Aunque el gnero del oeste cuenta con numerosos ttulos espero que este juego se distinga por la pasin y el esfuerzo personal que se han invertido en su creacin     Far West es el resultado del trabajo de un principiante inquieto nacido del amor por los videojuegos y el deseo de aportar algo especial a la comunidad ZX Spectrum Sin fines comerciales ni ambiciones desmedidas este juego es una obra de desarrollo personal que espero disfrutis tanto como yo al crearlo     Me siento muy orgulloso de poder presentar esta novedad homebrew y confo que os dar horas de entretenimiento y nostalgia Espero que os guste     Antrilles     PRESENTATION   Im excited to present a new western game for the ZX Spectrum 128k created with a lot of love and dedication As a hobbyist with no commercial ambitions this project is a personal effort I hope you enjoy the game as much as I enjoyed developing it     INTRODUCCIN   Extraos crmenes en la frontera norte de Ro Bravo obligan al Virreinato de Nueva Espaa a enviar a un agente a las minas de Santa Fe La desaparicin de unas antiguas reliquias indias han provocado una revuelta apache Encuentra las diez monedas doradas para resolver el enigma y restaurar la paz en la frontera   PROLOGUE   Strange crimes on the northern border of Ro Bravo force the Viceroyalty of New Spain to send an agent to the Santa Fe mines The disappearance of some ancient indigenous relics has sparked an Apache revolt Find the ten gold coins to solve the puzzle and restore peace on the border     COMANDOS   Far West se puede jugar en el hardware original del ZX Spectrum 128k o con un emulador como Fuse o RetroVirtualMachine en Windows Tambin tenis la opcin de descargar unos ejecutables para Windows y Linux   Y para quien le guste jugar en el mvil tambin hay emuladores para Android   Puedes usar tanto el teclado como un joystick incluyendo los modelos Kempstom y Sinclair    En el teclado las letras que debes usar son   Q   Arriba  Up A   Abajo  Down P   Derecha  Right O   Izquierda  Left Espacio  Space   Disparo  Fire     MECANICA             HISTORIA   En el salvaje y desrtico confn de Nueva Espaa donde las arenas del tiempo se mezclan con leyendas de oro y peligro se encuentra Santa Fe en la frontera difusa de Nuevo Mxico Una sombra se cierne sobre las vastas y misteriosas tierras del norte En las entraas oscuras y labernticas de las minas cercanas rumores de extraos sucesos han comenzado una circular mineros desaparecidos ecos inexplicables y sombras que parecen cobrar vida alimentan el miedo y la supersticin de los lugareos   Los rumores sobre antiguas reliquias apaches y leyendas de tesoros ocultos como las mticas diez monedas doradas han avivado las creencias y temores en la regin Alarmado por estas historias y por una serie de crmenes y eventos inexplicables el gobierno de Nueva Espaa decide enviar a uno de sus ms valientes y astutos investigadores Su misin es doble desentraar los misterios ocultos bajo la roca y el polvo y restaurar la paz y el orden en estas tierras indmitas     A medida que el agente se adentra en las profundidades de las minas y en la intrincada red de leyendas locales descubre que las fronteras entre la realidad y la supersticin son ms borrosas de lo que imaginaba Desentraar los secretos que se ocultan en las profundidades no solo implica resolver los enigmas que afligen a Santa Fe sino tambin enfrentar fuerzas desconocidas que han permanecido ocultas bajo tierra     AGRADECIMIENTOS   Este videojuego ha sido posible gracias a  ZX Spectrum Game Maker  un programa gratuito creado por  Juntelart  y con la colaboracin desinteresada de muchas personas Quiero agradecerles de todo corazn la oportunidad que me han brindado ya que no tengo conocimientos de programacin Crear un Juego de Spectrum es un sueo cumplido     Anmate a crear tus propios videojuegos con ZX Spectrum Game Maker   Si yo pude hacerlo t tambin puedes     httpsgmretrojuegosorg       Tambien quisiera expresar mi agradecimiento a  Beyker  quien desinteresadamente ha prestado la msica para este videojuego Al que considero un nuevo amigo ya que no dud en ofrecer su talento y apoyo sin conocerme   Beyker no solo ha contribuido con su msica sino que tambin me ha animado a continuar creando mostrndome la enorme comunidad que hay detrs del spectrum     Seria injusto no mencionar a  Flopping  La primera persona que se paso el juego en 2 sentadas y que es un autentico entusiasta del viejo ZX Spectrum Su increble labor como beta tester su dedicacin y paciencia al identificar y reportar errores han mejorado sustancialmente la experiencia de Far West No dejis de ver sus trabajos en  httpsfloppingitchio     Y por ultimo  agradecer a mi familia y amigos la paciencia infinita que me han tenido  Pero no por mi ausencia sino por la turra mtica que les he dado     CONTACTO   Gracias por Jugar   Si te ha gustado el juego te invito a que me dejes tus comentarios sugerencias o incluso tus felicitaciones Siempre estoy buscando mejorar y disfrutar de nuevas colaboraciones     Contacta conmigo en  antrillessoftwaregmailcom     Este pueblo es lo suficientemente grande para que quepamos todos y tus comentarios tambin

title: SuperHoldem

title: Horror project
logline: Just a simple horror game to use what I have learned
description: Recently there have been many consecutive disappearances in the town The police were confused and did not know who the perpetrator was and what the motive for the crime was However a strange rumor appeared at the same time as the disappearances took place in the town They say there is a haunted house that will kill everyone who dares to enter it As a reporter you have a responsibility to venture into the house and bring the truth to the light or be stuck in that house forever

title: Roguecraft Amiga
logline: A modern roguelike for the Commodore Amiga
description: SCENARIO     The dungeons of Moredecoom await   For time immemorial legend has told of a dark deadly dungeon containing unimaginable horrors and riches beyond belief Enough riches and magic to make you a king or more   You have searched for this dungeon ever since you stumbled upon the legend in an Egyptian library many years ago It started with the rumor of an ancient dark being and a magic amulet The legend tells of an awakening and of unspeakable horrors to come Your search carried you across the world one riddle at a time   Through many trials and perils you are now standing at the entrance of a dark and mystical dungeon far from where you started You Zendar a fighter a mage or uh a rogue are ready to defeat the monsters and gather the riches waiting below   You just need to take a leak first     FEATURES   Fully procedurallygenerated levels A unique experience with every playthrough A plethora of potent potions and pickups Glorious pixelated isometric graphics Atmospheric soundtrack by Jogeir Liljedahl Gruesome sound effects by h0ffman No easter eggs  just lots of chickens     WHAT THE PRESS SAID   The Lovecraftian look has been achieved splendidly The dungeon levels ooze with atmosphere and characters have charm and bags of personality Roguecraft will definitely not disappoint  Amiga Addict 96       With gorgeous graphics an atmospheric tune and irresistible gameplay this is one game that youll certainly want to return to   Retro Gamer 90     CREDITS  ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS     RICKI SICKENGER Programming   HENNING LUDVIGSEN Graphics   JOGEIR LILJEDAHL Music   HOFFMAN SFX   ANDY ROBERTS Production  Inspirational input     PLAYING THE GAME   The downloadable Amiga digital version is an ADF file designed for use with an Amiga emulator For best results we recommend playing the game using the  WinUAE  emulator     Alternatively use a suitable utility such as adf2disk to write the ADF file to a floppy disk to play on real Amiga hardware           COMPATIBILITY   PAL version Supports A500 ECS Agnus A500 A600 A1200 A2000 ECS Agnus A3000    A4000 and CD32 Requires 1MB Chip RAM  1MB Other RAM or 2MB Chip RAM         PHYSICAL VERSION   The physical version of Roguecraft comes in multiple flavours and includes a glossy box CD32compatible game CD game manual Roguecraft postcard Thalamus sticker and much more Click  here  to visit the Thalamus online store

title: Hyperspace Quantum Fracture
logline: Blast enemies in  this scifi bullet hell A hardcore shmup adventure in space
description: Hyperspace  Quantum Fracture A SciFi Bullet Hell Shmup Survival Game   Embark on an epic journey through the cosmos in Hyperspace  Quantum Fracture a scifi shmup combining roguelike progression bullet hell chaos and intense autoshooter action Face relentless enemy waves and test your survival in the depths of space   Key Features    Relentless Waves of Enemies  A True Shoot em Up   Brace yourself for an escalating challenge as swarms of enemies from agile fighters to massive laser ships attack from all sides Only skillful dodging and quick upgrades will keep you alive    Upgrade  Customize Your Ship Level up and choose from powerful upgrades to enhance your ships abilities Adapt your build each run to survive the unforgiving onslaught    Roguelike Bullet Hell Action Every run starts freshno second chances With permadeath looming each decision matters as you push further against endless waves of enemies    AutoShooter with ReflexBased Dodging Your ship automatically targets the most dangerous threats allowing you to focus on skillful movement to evade enemy fire in true bullet hell fashion    Adaptive Difficulty  Survival Challenge The longer you last the tougher the enemies become Defeat foes gather experience and unlock stronger upgrades to push your limits in this intense survival game   How to Play    Survive  Dodge waves of enemy fire and stay alive as long as possible  Upgrade  Collect XP level up and enhance your ships power  Conquer  Face massive bosses and push your limits in this thrilling shmup adventure   A SciFi Roguelike for Every Player   Whether youre a fan of shoot em ups permadeath survival games or highintensity bullet hell action Hyperspace  Quantum Fracture offers a rewarding experience for both newcomers and seasoned pilots   Playable on mobile as well as PC landscape  portrait supported   Follow GameFizz on X   httpswwwgamefizzcom

title: Frostfang Fighter 2025
logline: A fighting game that was designed by students in Game Animation class at Shenkar College of Art Design and Engineering
description: Frostfang Fighter 2025  is a collaborative project from the Game Animation class instructed by Zach Cohen at the School of Visual Communication Shenkar College of Art Design and Engineering As part of their thirdyear coursework in the Gaming and Animation track each student designed and animated their own unique character creating all assets and bringing them to life within the game   Participants    Alina Sidlenikov Ayala Avganim Bar Markovich Chen Bor Eyal Hochberger Itamar Matalon Liam Palmorm Noah Avni Platnick Omer Nachmias Ron Tamir Rotem Feldman Sarah Lerner Noa Lev Yotam Liberman Zoya Klinovski

title: Poop Killer  Flush or Die
logline: The real trash horror of the 80s
description: THE POOP KILLER IS BACK AND THIS TIME ITS PERSONAL   Get ready for a  disgusting dive into true 80s horror trash  Poop Killer  Flush or Die  brings back the filthiest killer of all time now in a crazier bloodier and absolutely hilarious experience   With authentic VHS visuals a disgusting horror atmosphere and a ridiculously disturbing story this game is a tribute to the golden age of trash horror mixing scares courage and bathroom humor like never before     SYNOPSIS   Bob and Case just wanted a quiet night in but fate and a clogged toilet had other plans   In the suburbs of New York in 1985 two pot dealers spend the evening eating smoking and settling a few scores But when a clueless friend ignores an important warning and decides to take a dump in a broken toilet the nightmare begins   The Poop Killer has escaped from the asylum Hes out there And he doesnt forgive   Now Bob and Case must survive a night of absolute insanity where one wrong move could be their last   FLUSH OR DIE     GAMEPLAY   Basically an atmospheric and immersive walking simulator with combat and firstperson shooter elements A throwback to the trashy horror movies of the 80s with nostalgic visuals

title: Egbert
logline: A classic  Commodore 64 game rewritten on Nintendos Gameboy handheld console by WLS
description: This is a homebrew game run on Gameboy DMG Original version Alan G Osborne  Games Machine Ltd  1983  Commodore 64 Created with GBStudio 200 beta5     Also available for download in CIA format for the Nintendo 3DS virtual console       A fast Arcade Action Game for all the family to play  Egbert works on the production line at LEYSPACE It was comfortable life until the invasion of the TEBBITES from the planet TOR Egberts union has been exterminated and the Tebbies have left their deadly Pets and Items running wild in the workplace      As if wasnt enough the evil invaders have forced Egbert to take care of an Egg  damaging the Egg will have fatal consequences for poor Egbert     Egbert is now on piecework  can he earn a decent wage Can he even survive     WARNING You may get an ulcer by playing this game     SEVEN levels of SKILL     1 Novice  2 Average  3 Good  4 Excelent  5 Gentleman  6 Wizard  7 The God     Anybody who can do level 7 should write and let us know          Start the game   Start     Move  Cursor Keys     Information  Select         Start the game   Start     Move  Arrow Keys      Information  Shift         Egbert  Lemon64     You can download the ROM file of the game from the  WLS  website

title: JETASC
logline: Jupiter Electronics Testing and Storage Center
description: GAME HISTORY   The game tells the story of the Jupiter complex where a person suddenly disappeared and the lights went out The head of the complex decides to hire a night guard the main character until the situation is resolved   GAMEPLAY   In the game we will be pursued by various animatronics If they come close you need to close the door In the game you also need to control a robot that does something around the building For each completed task you will be shown a VHS tape with a storyline   Game Features   This game is not just a regular fnaf parody The gameplay will change each time depending on the circumstances for example a mode without cameras where our camera will be a robot interesting plot of the game            DISADVANTAGES OF THE GAME   bad graphics Not the best optimization      All this will improve    Other        This game is free but there is a paid version       which will have many different advantages more details are given in the description of the paid version the game is developed manually by 1 person My youtube chanel In the future the game may be translated into these languages     languages voice acting text russain German English         devices important   It is STRONGLY recommended to play this game on PC rather than Android   If you want to play on your phone make sure it is powerful enough

title: Reviving An Angel
description: How do you revive an angel      Reviving An Angel is a turnbased RPG set in a world where Archangels the greatest creations of the Almighty are in a path of war Wanting to revive his beloved Harold a young Fallen Hunter saw himself facing an Archangel as he challenged the limits of his mortality   Wishlist now on Steam   Reviving An Angel promises to offer a different experience derived from the older classics with a unique turnbased system engaging storylines and interesting characters     Utilizing Critical Effects provides a new strategy for players during combat And along with Harolds unique Next Effects and Counter Effects to customize Reviving An Angel competes with its oneofakind and intriguing combat system     Join Harold in exploring the Regalia Continent where a war with Archangel Lucifer imbued the lands for thousands of years Collect artifacts learn powerful skills and craft the best equipment while relishing unforgettable storylines full of twists and turns All to Revive An Angel     Wishlist now on Steam          Developer      Hi Im SolemnGravity Im pretty much a solo dev inspired by Final Fantasy games and this is my first game Im a writer first developer and right now Im struggling to obtain assets that will complete the story in my mind If you think the game has potential you can donate funds for me to afford commissions and complete the game by clicking the Support This Game button      Donations are very much appreciated

title: Cow Milker
description: Game by minindo and Nacho in order to learn Python and Pygame   Graphics by minindo and Nacho   Music by minindo     Welcome to Cow Milker   The US government has identified a mutant cow Barbara which can produce infinite milk at extremely high speeds They are looking for a new director for the DMC Department of Milk Collection to optimize the milking of Barbara    Prove to them that you are a better milk collection strategist than their computer algorithm Click on Barbara to begin collecting milk Milk can be spent on 5 different items that collect milk automatically Items further down the list collect milk more efficiently but are at least to start more expensive   With each purchase the cost of an item increases by a constant factor Reach 1 million milk before the computer to win   Notes    Play with sound for full experience    Clicking is strange with trackpad Use of mouse is recommended    The general concept for our game is taken from the classic Cookie Clicker game

title: JM Ranked
logline: 3D Multiplayer Shooter
description: JM Ranked   Fastpaced multiplayer arena shooter where you face off against both players and zombies in intense combat Team up or go solo as you battle through waves of the undead while competing against other players   KEY FEATURES    Competitive  Cooperative Gameplay  Fight other players while dealing with zombie threats    Dynamic Weapon System  Multiple weapons with unique recoil patterns and ADS mechanics    Upgrade System  Spend your hardearned points to upgrade your sprint speed    Pickup System  Find weapons ammo and health around the arena to stay in the fight    Smooth Movement  Fluid player controls with adjustable mouse and ADS sensitivity   Grab your weapons watch your corners and dont forget  the zombies arent your only enemies in this arena   Controls    WASD  Movement    SPACE  Jump    Left Click  Shoot    Right Click  Aim Down Sights    E  Pickup items    U  Upgrade sprint speed when available    ESC  Toggle cursor    TAB  LeaderboardChat   Tips    Keep moving to avoid both zombie and player attacks    Watch your ammo count and look for ammo pickups    Use ADS for more precise shots at range    Save points for sprint speed upgrades to outmaneuver enemies

title: League of Monsters  Interactive TikTok Live Game
description: Only available on  GameTik Studio       CONCEPT   Your viewers can choose a team Each teams objective is to destroy the enemy tower to win To do this viewers can send monsters through likes or TikTok gifts      FULLY AUTOMATED    After setting up your game interactions with your spectators are managed automatically You have nothing to do       8 DIFFERENT MONSTERS   Discover all the different monsters of League of Monsters  Each with their own abilitys       MULTIPLAYER   Challenge other TikTok creators in 1vs1 and enjoy a 7day free trial of multiplayer once you purchase the game       RESOURCE PACK    Create your overlay for your live easily with our GameTik resource pack Including a multitude of pictures corresponding to our games it simplifies your use of GameTik There are also premade overlays for simple and efficient setup      COMPATIBLE WITH TIKFINITY   GameTikStudio games are compatible with tikfinity We provide you with preconfigurations to simplify your use of GameTik Note that if you do not have TikFinity premium we provide you with a free software to manage your interactions      LIFE TIME ACCESS   Once purchased you will have access to League of Monsters and its updates for life           FAQ       Q How can I download once purchased      A You can download our launcher  here     Q How to connect with TikTok Live      A The game work with external software like TikFinity or Live Show     Q Is there a tutorial to setup the game      A Yes you can find a complete tutorial for League of Monsters  here     Q  Will there be any updates      A Depending on community requests there will be updates to our games     Q Where can I find support if something goes wrong       A If you encounter a problem during your purchase do not hesitate to contact us on discord   httpsdiscordggCPgawVtYU

title: EDEN
logline: CREATE THE PARADISE ON EARTH
description: KEEP ALL SPECIES ALIVE   MAINTAIN BALANCE   CREATE PARADISE ON EARTH HASA DIGA EEBOWAI     CONTROLS         HOW TO PLAY   The game works in an influenced autoplay way Every animal and plant acts depending on several rules but you can influence said rules by grabbing and dragging the animals to different positions    Rules   1 Grass expands into adjacent tiles   2  Grass dries up after a long time   3 Animals need to eat to not starve to death   4 Animals may procreate when there is enough room and 2 of em are together and both are not too hungry    5 Sheep eat grass    6 Wolves eat sheep    7 Thunders kill animals and set the grass on fire   8 Fire expands to nearby grass    9 Fire expands faster through driedup grass   10 Fire kills animals   11 Animals die by old age after a long time

title: BOLF A Golfoxing Game
logline: Golf and boxing combined at last  its Bolf baby
description: BOLF A Golfoxing Game   Two polar opposite sports meet at last  its Bolf   Box your golf ball and try to hit it as close to the hole as possible  only one stroke per hole Watch for wind water and bunkers  careful not to get knocked out Play 9 or 18 holes     Controls   This game is controlled entirely with the mouse Click buttons on screen to perform actions and progress   Players can also hit the R key to give up and go back to the main menu intended for hardcore golfoxers going for a good score     Credits   All music the font and a large portion of sounds are original All outside sounds and images are licensed under  CC0  and have been heavily edited     Software Used   Godot  Game Engine Adobe After Effects  Graphics yes really REAPER  SoundsMusic PixelForge  Font Editor     Desktop Version   The core game is exactly the same between the web and desktop versions of the game The only differences are in the options  such as additional settings for graphics and the game remembering your settings     This game was made for the  2025 Code Ninjas Sensei Game Jam

title: I Forget to Avoid
logline: Use hand movement to trace and trap runaway thoughts
description: Title  I Forget to Avoid   Created for the one day Geidai x USC game jam in Tokyo Japan March 2025 By Samuel Tang Bernice Wang Kang Xue Ning    Music by Ari Sol   How to play   This games uses webcam to track hand movement 1 Raise any hand to control the pink line 2 Loop the pink line around the moving marble to capture Listen and see the thought map youve created If there is too much brain activity the mind explodes and you have to start all over again    About   Some thoughts are more difficult to articulate than others  I Forget To Avoid  uses webcam to track the path of a players hand Players trace loop and reveal the thoughts of this persons mind  Our experience visualizes chasing after runaway thoughts some of which are funny and easy while others are introspective and harder to reconcile with  The more a player moves the more activity is tracked and too much means the mind overheats When the pink bar fills all the way up we start again from an empty brain to retrace her thoughts Will you be able to understand this persons mind

title: Minotaur
logline: A classic gridbased puzzle game about escaping labyrinth rooms while avoiding a minotaur
description: Controls     Arrow Keys     Move the main character Space     Wait Backspace  U     Undo move  warning  die reset history and prevent undoing Return  E     Go through stairs and traps R     Restart current level     What is it  This is a classic puzzle game named  Theseus and the Minotaur  Note that most of the levels are took from  this  andor  this    Context  I have done in this game alone in a week as a study While making this game I had several ideas so I might do a second and more thoughtful version   Note  The last image used in the victory screen was made by the generative AI dallE I wanted to do it myself but I was missing time in the end The rest is all done by me

title: Gramary
logline: Focused fastpaced metroidvania
description: Seek whats left of the holy tome Read your wish into being    Entry for Metroidvania Month 27   Tight focused 15 minutes exploreaction experience   Thank you so much for checking out our game We worked really hard on it Gramary is Ryans first project in Godot and a lot of the one month dev time was spent learning the ins and outs of the engine Some areas were rushed and are visually halffinished and there are a couple of minor bugs But the game is complete experience and we hope youll enjoy the meticulous pixel art authentic SNEShardware soundtrack and our first foray into a new fantasy world   art and code by  ryan k   httpsxcomryankeeton   httpsbskyappprofileryankeetonbskysocial   music by  mellorine   soundtrack    httpsbskyappprofilemellorinemusiccom   CONTROLS   Movement  Crouching  arrow keys  DPad  Stick Jump  Space  South Face Button Sword  V key  West Face Button Bow  B key  North Face Button or Triggers Slide  C key  East Face Button or Bumpers Pause  Esc  Start Button   TIPS   Swinging the sword in the air is slower but more powerful You can slide or crouch under projectiles at head level You can swing the sword out of a slide Drop through platforms with Down and Jump

title: Wandering Okali
logline: Discover magical creatures while exploring a whimsical fantasy world
description: Kalops dream has been writing an encyclopedia on Okalis fauna and flora ever since she became old enough to read on her own One day early in the morning she decides to depart the village shes never left before and meets a strange old lady who seems to know a bit too much about the world     Wandering Okali  is a visual novel with strong focus on fantasy creatures and their biology which lets you follow Kalops her best friend Saspi and strange lady Gloria on a world trip around Okali discovering and learning about unique animals magical plants and even mysterious entities   Each chapter is expected to be around 10k words or more   This VN is a kinetic novel This means there is only one main narrative and any choices you are presented with will only have very shortterm consequences     What you can expect   Lots of art  Feast your eyes on the many painted CGs and backgrounds the field notes in the style of old scientific illustrations and the many silly doodles that complete the visuals of the story Perhaps even an animation or two once in a while   Immersive worldbuilding  With the storys focus on the natural world you will learn about the tiny bugs and the grasses unique to this world as well as the giant magical beasts and the ethereal landscapes    Girls girls girls  Most if not all the characters will be girls or girladjacent And lesbians most likely    A bright and whimsical atmosphere  You can expect to see lots of beautiful vibrant colors and intricate details     Chapter 3 is out   Get updates previews and extra lore and concept art in the Tumblr blog  httpswanderingokalitumblrcom

title: Type to Die
logline: Deep Web
description: Multilingual PTBR   Type to Die   uma experincia curta de horror psicolgico em que voc se v preso em uma conversa com um agressor na Deep Web O que comea como um batepapo aparentemente inofensivo logo se torna uma interao perturbadora No h escapatria A morte  inevitvel   Tutorial     Clique nas bordas da tela para rotacionar a viso   Clique no texto para enviar a sua resposta   Boto direito do mouse para dar zoom   Este jogo  simples e foi feito em apenas algumas horas  Esperamos que voc aproveite a experincia     EN   Type to Die  is a short psychological horror experience where you find yourself trapped in a conversation with an aggressor on the Deep Web What begins as an apparently harmless chat soon turns into a disturbing interaction Theres no escape Death is inevitable      Tutorial       Click on the screen edges to rotate your view   Click the text to send your reply   Right mouse button to zoom   This is a simple game made in just a few hours We hope you enjoy the experience

title: Easy Ride
logline: In Easy Ride you can simply relax and enjoy a peaceful journey embracing the freedom of this charming lowpoly world
description: Easy Ride  is a game I made for the RoadTrip Game Jam 2025   Its all about fun and relaxationjust sit back enjoy the ride and feel free in this charming lowpoly world      I wrote the code and designed the car myself in Blender while all other assets come from free asset packs     1  SimplePoly City  Low Poly Assets  3D Environments  Unity Asset Store   2 ENGINES  Audio Sound FX  Unity Asset Store     Controls WAD   If you get stuck press the  R  key on your keyboard to restart the ride     About me Im 36 years old and currently studying game Programming Right now Im in my first semester      This is my first solo project for a game jam created to improve my C scripting skills I hope you all enjoy the little minigame I made for the jam

title: The Hollow Shift
logline: A psychological horror game set in a rural Philippine town in the 1980swhere the past never stays buried
description: THE HOLLOW SHIFT   A psychological horror game set in a rural Philippine town in the 1980swhere the past never stays buried You arrive to visit your  grandfathers cabin  hoping for a quiet stay and a chance to earn some extra funds by taking a  night shift at Litoys small sarisari store in rural quiet town    But as the nights pass something feels off Strange noises Odd occurrences  Whispers of the past that refuse to stay buried     What begins as a simple job soon spirals into a terrifying mysteryone that forces you to  confront the horrors hidden in the dark  and uncover a truth that was never meant to be found      Features     Classic Psychological Horror   Slowbuilding tension eerie atmosphere and a creeping sense of dread    Authentic 1980s Provincial Setting   Explore a small rural town a  grandfathers old cabin  and other unsettling locations inspired by reallife Filipino provinces    Retro Horror Aesthetic   Inspired by  PS1style visuals  and atmospheric horror games with a  classic music box soundtrack  that holds more secrets than it seems    PuzzleSolving  Exploration   Search for clues uncover hidden objects and solve  environmental puzzles  to piece together the horrifying past    A Story of Tragedy  Regret   The past never forgets  Can you escape the nightmare or will history repeat itself   CONTROLS   Control Action WASD Move Left Click  E Interact Right Click Zoom Tab OpenClose Inventory F Flashlight Esc Pause   Alternative Payment for Filipino Players     I understand that not everyone in the Philippines has access to  PayPal or creditdebit cards  If you want to buy the game using  GCash  you can message me directly on  Facebook  and I will provide the payment details Once the payment is confirmed I will send you the game files manually        Message me on Facebook   httpswwwfacebookcomKoniiPinka     Are you ready to  face the unknown  Or will you become just another forgotten soul in the dark     Murushii Gameplay

title: Game Set Fetch
logline: Dog Tennis
description: About   Game Set Fetch  is an arcadestyle sports game inspired by the fastpaced tennis games of the SNESN64 eras It can be played singleplayer against a CPU or with a friend via local multiplayer Gameplay is twitchy and each player has their own physical attributes and playstyle   Note This game  requires  a gamepad with analog sticks and an additional gamepad if playing multiplayer   Features   Two unique playable dogs Singleplayer against an AI opponent with three difficulty settings Twoperson localcouch multiplayer Customizable match length Two camera options singleplayer only multiplayer always uses an overhead camera Two distinct shot selection modes Button input traditional tennis game inputs where each button maps to a type of shot topspin backspin or lob Stick input in this novel mode shot selection is done by manipulating the right stick similar to inputting commands in a fighting game Tricky to master but its a little more immersive and can be a fun changeup from button mashing Silly ragdolls Getting hit in the face is fun again Perhaps it always was Practice mode a pressurefree session with the ball machine A full interactive tutorial teaching  everything you need to know to play a match   Tested on Steam Deck works well on medium graphics settings

title: Sunday Morning 2021
logline: A goofy pointandclick Scratch game I made when I was 15 but still has a special place in my heart
description: Its a normal Sunday morning You roller skate to the nearest JackintheBox to try out its new Jackburger only to realize you forgot your wallet whatever Except somehow you get involved in a huge conspiracy involving cults Olive Garden and the FBI   Controls    WASD or Arrow Keys to move the player    Click on things to interact    X to advance dialogue    Z to eavesdrop when told   There are two possible routes in this game Choose wisely the fate of countless people lie in your hands   If you are unsure what to do watch the WALKTHROUGH          Play Saturday Morning first if you havent  httpsscratchmiteduprojects411199002   If you got the Pastafarian ending watch this       Tips    Read through all the dialogue carefully It gives you hints for what to do next    Memorize all the characters names    Remember which room is which   Credits    Shannon Alyelle Wang referred to as Berricake in project  Programmer Graphics Artist Scriptwriter    My sister hiohbye  The person who came up with the beautiful plot    Gameplay Music Kubbi  Up In My Jam    Ending Music Jack Stauber  Buttercup 8bit cover by Mooph    Main References JackintheBox Olive Garden the Church of the Flying Spaghetti Monster    Special thanks to Jonathan and Anjini for repetitively playtesting this

title: Panzerjaeger C64 by Sander Alsema
logline: BASIC 10Liner 2025 PUR80
description: Panzerjaeger    Written by Sander Alsema for the 10liner competition 2025   Language Commodore 64 Basic v2   Category PUR80    Description  Instructions    The days of peace are a distant memory Intense fighting on both sides has led to a death toll of unprecedented proportions Somewhere in all this carnage a tank battalion was on manoeuvres Unfortunately however during the night it was ambushed and decimated The few remaining tanks managed to take up defensive positions but the battle is lost let there be no doubt about that Less than a handful of noble heroes are left standing against an overwhelming enemy Determined to give them a run for their money it is up to you to take out as many enemy tanks as possible before capitulating   Move your joystick in port II left and right to move your tank back and forth Press the fire button to fire a shell   Youve got plenty of shells but you can fire only one at a time Whenever you destroy a tank it will make the others more daring and they will approach quicker If a tank reaches your line then your tank is lost After losing three tanks you have no option but to surrender   Press any keyboard key to play again    Code Explanation    Line 0 Read string data from somewhere else in the program namely             Spaces above enemy tank that erase it when moving down             Enemy tank barrel facing right             Enemy tank barrel facing left             Players tank             Bottom part of enemy tank           Set a variable with an often used value to save code space           elsewhere in the program           In a loop build the vertical orientation string and initialize           the registers of the sound chip           Set the horizontal position variable of the players tank           Set the number of players tanks lives to three   Line 1 Clear the screen display the score and number of players tanks           Set the horizontal position variable of the enemy tank           Set the horizontal destination variable of the enemy tank           If all players tanks are lost then display SURRENDER wait           until a key is pressed and restart the game   Line 2 Move the enemy tank towards the horizontal destination           If the enemy tank was hit or has reached the players tank then           decrease number of players tanks if enemy reaches player           clear the direction variable of the enemy tank increase the           score if enemy was hit clear the vertical position variable           of the enemy tank clear the keyboard buffer clear the boolean           tankwashit variable and jump to line 1   Line 3 If the enemy tank has reached its horizontal destination then           calculate a new one with a formula that works like this             Pick a random horizontal position             Determine the difference with the current horizontal position             Divide this by a number greater or equal to one depending on              the score             Finally add this to the current horizontal position           This will make an enemy tank spend less time moving horizontally           as the score increases Therefore approaching quicker and making           the game harder           Calculate the new horizontal direction           Move enemy tank down           Use the string variable of the tank barrel facing right           If the horizontal direction is left then use the string variable           of the tank barrel facing left   Line 4 If the vertical position of the shell was set then erase the           current position and move the shell up If the vertical position           is still set then display the shell   Line 5 Display the enemy tank           Read the joystick values           If the fire button was pressed and the vertical position of the           shell is clear then set the vertical and horizontal position           of the shell to the barrel of the players tank   Line 6 Display the players tank           Set the boolean tankwashit variable when the character above           the shell was not space and the vertical position of the shell           was not at the top of the screen           Set background colour to black or yellow if enemy tank was hit   Line 7 Use the joystick values to calculate the horizontal direction of           the players tank           Use this value to calculate the new horizontal position of the           players tank           If the enemy tank was not hit then jump to line 2           This line also contains string data   Line 8 Clear the vertical position of the shell           Set sound chip register to white noise           In a loop gradually decrease the volume of the explosion           Jump to line 2           This line also contains string data   Line 9 This line only contains string data

title: Alice in Public Domain
logline: Alice is back and ready to save Wonderland
description: Experience an unprecedented adventure where public domain favourites like Alice and Pooh Bear come together for the first time each bringing their own quirks challenges and stories into an interconnected narrative In this satirical action adventure Alice is ripped from the real world back into Wonderland this time through an  i nternet rabbithole      She must save not only Wonderland itself but the Public Domain as a whole TVheaded brutes run rampant causing chaos and destroying the art that once was Have conversations with characters like Shakespeare and Mad Hatter and use abilities such as shrinking smashing grenadethrowing and rabbithole destruction    Its an unmissable improbable combination of classic childhood characters that have grown alongside us and a call to AI usage in todays art market Fantasy nostalgia and public domain art meet adult humour and unrelenting fun Come join the Public Domain youll join us 70 years after your death anyways might as well see what youre in for     Supports both controller and keyboard  mouse                                   Alice is an experience card thrower making her aim lethal against the average man  Quick witty and nimble Alices gameplay is fastpaced    Personalitywise Alice is a 23 year old fiercely creative soul with an attitude as sharp as her artistry She never wanted to be a hero but it seems history repeats itself and here she is again She wouldnt even think about hinting at her heart of gold shed rather insult you instead A bee that craves to sting and a sense of humour that she finds hilarious but does anyone else                                            Bulky strong and cuddly Pooh dons a giant honey mace that deals huge damage to his enemies  His massive weighty gameplay makes him the perfect companion to the blonde agile heroine    Personalitywise Pooh is a lifesized teddy bear that cares about honey and honey only He doesnt like tight spaces but is simply unbothered by everything else Wonderland has to offer Hes on the hunt for something sweet and wont stop swinging at brutes until he gets it

title: MUKKE Technical Playtest
logline: MUKKE is a storydriven music RPG Dive into Mukke Citys wild music scene  make your own tunes
description: MUKKE is a storydriven music RPG   this is a technical playtest version only working on Windows systems     Explore the  80s  in the  WestBerlin inspired  Mukke City and dive into its music scene Create your own music meet new friends  get your tapes on the radio    MUKKE is a mixture of  music creation tool  and  narrative game      This is a technical playtest version of the game MUKKE Play the first chapters of its story  get acquainted with its music creation Complete quests unlock new music features  enjoy your new life in Mukke City   Help us create a smooth experience by testing all of MUKKEs systems mechanics and finding any bugs technical problems or just elements that you personally dont like Submit your feedback and hardware specs  here  to help us with the development   And if youve enjoyed your time feel free to wishlist the game on  steam   join our  Discord  for development details feedback opportunities  more   Thank you very much     Who are we   Were APETENSE Interactive a small indie game collective based in Berlins southeastern district of TreptowKpenick   Were dedicated to making creative  meaningful games that we hope will inspire you to be creative yourself     Thank you for being part of this journey

title: CTRL
logline: Literal Space Shooter
description: Heres an explanation of the provided HTML game code   This is a crossplatform shooter game implemented in HTML5 Canvas with modern web technologies Lets break down the key components    Structure    The game uses a single HTML file containing CSS styles and JavaScript    Employs a responsive canvas that fills the entire viewport    Features both desktop and mobile controls    Visual Elements   1 Background Elements    Stars with twinkling effects    Two layers of cities large and tiny with parallax scrolling    Buildings with gradient effects and lights    Mode7style perspective scaling for depth effects   2 Game Objects    Player ship with rotation and movement    Enemy ships that chase the player    Laser projectiles with glowing effects    Explosions with particle effects    Muzzle flashes when shooting    Controls    Desktop ESDFArrow keys for movement mouse for aimingshooting    Mobile Dual virtual joysticks movement and shooting    Gamepad Supported with analog stick controls    Technical Features   1 Performance Optimizations    Request Animation Frame for smooth animation    Delta timebased movement    Efficient canvas rendering with minimal state changes   2 Audio System    Web Audio API for sound effects    Dynamic sound generation for shots and explosions   3 Collision Detection    Precise hitbox calculations    Scaleaware collision detection for Mode7 effects    Game Logic    Score tracking    Enemy spawning system    Projectile management    Particle effects system    Pauseresume functionality   The code demonstrates modern web game development practices with attention to crossplatform compatibility performance and user experience

title: Future Fronts EARLY PLAYTEST COPY
logline: CustomMecha Action Game
description: Future Fronts working title is a custommecha action game built in the Godot Engine in this early playtest copy you can build your mech from a selection of playtest parts and weapons and play through five missions as well as three challenge arena fights Your part choice effects your stats and the handling of your mech   Send feedback to this email address futurefrontsfeedbackgmailcom   THIS IS A VERY EARLY ROUGH BUILD OF THE GAME MEANT ENTIRELY FOR PUBLIC PLAYTESTING AND FEEDBACK IT IS NOT REPRESENTATIVE OF THE FINAL PRODUCT   A tutorial is available ingame but important information for the user interface the control layout and stats can be found at the bottom of this page  Currently controllers are not supported controller support will be offered in the next playtest build  Currently there are no weight or generator capacity limits on your build  so you can freely equip anythinghowever a heavy weight will still make you slower This will change in the next build as well   Not all mechanics are completed or finalized some stats and systems havent been integrated A few of these systems will be designed based on playtest feedback Some of these statssystems are the following   Armor and Resistances   Arm Recoil Reduction   Energy Weapon interactions and Power Distribution System mechanics   Targeting Evasion and Targeting Interference   Extension Modules Maximum weight burdens for arms and legs maximum energy load on generator   Feedback is highly encouraged and valuable for the development of this project below are a list of known issues they will be addressed before the game is complete   The sound is bad Yes it is it is entirely placeholder and will be replaced with custom sounds in the future The Main Menu UI is bad It sure is it is also mostly placeholder If you have specific recommendations for how to change the UI however do send them There isnt enough Melee Melee has been on the backest of backburners currently there is only one melee weapon but there will be many options in the future There should be build saving There will be in the future The head choice doesnt change my stats  Heads are purely asthetic and dont have stats     UI CONTROLS    To enter the customization menu click on the HANGAR button on the main menu Cycle through parts using the buttons on the left side of the screen changes to important stats can be tracked on the right side of the screen and part stats will be displayed anytime a part is changed  To confirm a part change make sure to click the CONFIRM button in the upper left portion of the screen To cancel any changes and revert to the last saved build press CANCEL  To switch to the paint menu click the PAINT MENU button and click it again to switch back to the part selection Similarly there is a CONFIRM and RESET button in the paint menu To switch which part of your mech you are currently painting use the buttons on the left side of the menu There is a  SIMPLE  mode which will let you paint either the entirety of your frame or the entirety of your weapons and an  ADVANCED  mode which lets you paint each part seperately The UI is pretty bad looking will be fixed in the eventual UI rework   GAMEPLAY CONTROLS   WASD  Controls movement F  Toggles boosters onoff When boosters are off you will fall at a normal rate instead of gliding  Moving with boosters does not consume energy SPACE  Jump and UpwardBoost while in the air LEFTCLICKRIGHTCLICK  Use your equipped left and right hand weapons QE or 12  Use your equipped left and right backmounted weapons IT IS RECOMMENDED TO USE A MOUSE BUTTON SETUP FOR THIS R  Action key this has a few different uses If you hold down the action key and use any of your reloadable weapons you will manually reload them If you hold down the action key while moving against a wall and jump you will execute a wall jump C  Overboost toggle SHIFT  Quickboost use this to dodge and dash around   STAT TIPS   Your quickboost has technical properties based on your part stats It has a duration given by your thrusters an impulse time given by your thrusters and a peak time given by your power distribution system During the duration of your quickboost your velocity will approach the maximum speed of your quickboost based on your impulse timethe lower the faster and then stay at that speed based on the peak timethe higher the longer before decreasing back down to your normal speed during the remaining duration   Your power distribution system is a component that applies modifiers to your generator properties and tweaks the performance of other systems currently the PDS only affects thruster and generator stats    Your thrusters have an acceleration value this determines how quickly you reach your maximum traveling speed while moving  This also affects how quickly and snappily you can switch from moving in one direction to the other  Your thruster acceleration will start at its base stat and be reduced based on how heavy your build is You can counteract this reduction with the MANEUVERABILITY stat that is on your frames legs A heavy frame with low maneuverability will feel weightier and require more mindful control   Your targeting system has an ideal range and a range spread It also has an acquisition level and acquisition rate When you lock onto a target your aim will initially not be on them perfectly but it will improve by your acquisition rate over time to a particular level This lock level is improved greatly if you have your target within the range spread of your ideal range There are three playtest targeting systems one for each range  You will know your lock level as your lock box and reticule will turn from white to green and then red when you are above a 90 percent lock quality At higher quality locks your frame will lead its shots

title: Wake UP
logline: Accentuate the positive eliminate the negative and WAKE UP to a world thats better than it was For Red Pill Jam
description: The world is bad People are evil Good things happen to bad people And bad things to the good ones Page after page headline after headline rumour after rumour   Did you know   That crime is actually going down That world hunger is ebbing off That reforestation is on a good way That we harvest more renewable energy than ever before That there are more kids in school for longer and more are vaccinated Some cancer types are about to go extinct Polio will be soon   Who is telling you the world is bad And  cui bono   who profits from you believing this Open your eyes It is  not  pointless  not  fruitless it  does  work it  is  worth the effort to make a future a better future           An arcade shooter Fire with mouseclick pause with P Q to quit Let only the good thoughts through blast the negative     Audio  CormalvaMusic   Art game design programming  Jennifer S Lange   A jam game by Make it a Triple 2025 Get in touch  Bluesky    Mastodon    Discord   Created for Red Pill Jam 1

title: Dementia Kitchen
logline: Keep the restaurant running
description: Controls   arrow keys  move x  interact z  map   About   Your grandpas memory hasnt been the same lately Step in and help him keep the restaurant going until he retires in 10 days     This game plays around with procedural level generation so each run feels fresh and different Its also a nod to the reality of aginghow memory fades and conditions like dementia can affect loved ones Instead of resisting or avoiding it the game is about embracing that reality and finding ways to support the people we care about Hopefully it sparks a little reflection on how we can be there for each other   grosgg   oklmxyz

title: GZERO
description: This is Gzero a WIP racing game with mode 7 style rotation background inspired on Fzero for the Sega GenesisMegadrive   Download the file and use with an emulator of your choice   The game works on real hardware so if you have a SEGA GenesisMega Drive and an Everdrive you can copy the file to the SD card and play the demo   In the 7z file there are 2 Rom files   gzero_main_newbeta3b_15carsbin   gzero_main_newbeta3b_5carsbin   The first one is just a test to see how behave the game with many cars in this case up to 15   The other file is the normal game where it will be with up to 5 rival cars

title: Potion Punch
description: Potion Punch  is a small onebutton action game that was developed during the  PULS GAME JAM    The theme was Kaputt      Kaputt adj Broken damaged or destroyed to the point of being unusable     Henry has unfortunately fallen out of favor with his superior Miss Dragonfly After the little goblin has once again spilled the coffee in the backmost corner which nobody can see anyway he is now expected to clean up the whole store Henry has had enough Its time for a loud but perhaps secret rebellion Push all the potions down the shelf to really get back at the old dragon It would only be for the best if she didnt catch him while doing so   Hit SPACE to punch and move forward  simple as that    Vincent Will   Linda Adelmann Fabian Jdden Sharon Sacks Vincent Will   Sound snippets from  freesoundsorg  Including Shattering Glass Small by Czarcazas  CC 30 Glass breaking by Samgd14  CC 30  sounds from soundpacks bought on  ovanisoundcom

title: FlightGear
description: After many years of work the new stable release of the free opensource flight simulator FlightGear is finally here FlightGear 202411 now replaces 20203 as our supported stable version   The 20241 release series will only receive relatively minor updates as development efforts are being focused on the  next  major release that includes a new rendering pipeline     As always theres also internal improvements to the flight models and other simulation systems bugfixes and performance improvements     To get started straight away visit the  download page      Feature highlights       Theres been a  ton  of changes since the last release but heres a few particularly interesting ones     Realtime dynamic shadows and lights   Added preliminary support for VR headsets using OpenXR   Added a preview of World Scenery 30 a new scenery system that uses multiple levels of detail to provide higher framerates and lower memory occupancy at higher visibility ranges   Fixed a large number of crashes bugs and memory leaks as well as a highseverity security vulnerability  CVE20250781

title: Schmorgus and the Quest for a Sandwich
logline: A comedy actionadventure RPG about a sandwich
description: Dunglandia a kingdom ruled by King Dung III is at constant war against the evil Dark Prince Theres only one hero who can stop such a fiend That hero is none other than the kings son SCHMORGUS Schmorgus is destined for greatness and now should be the time when his journey begins   but first   HE NEEDS A SANDWICH   Travel across the kingdom of Dunglandia as Schmorgus and his party as they learn more about the world around them get to know new faces and most importantly get the last sandwich in ALL OF EXISTANCE or at least until Sandwich Man restocks the club sandwiches     So who is this band of rascals   Schmorgus 19  The Headfirst Homunculus While quite the opposite of rude Schmorguss title of Brash comes from his tendency to go into every conflict headfirst literally Hes very soft spoken and enjoys very simple things Definitely not the kind of guy to be a main character of a video game   Aaron 19  The Brave Swordsman Aaron loves going on adventures and never goes anywhere without his trusty sword Wherever Schmorgus is you can always count on Aaron being right next to him Theyve been best friends ever since they were little kids and since then have never left each others sides They say theres a friend that sticks closer than a brother thats true in their case   Wifey 18  The QuickTempered Mage Wifey is the daughter of the great mage Abra Cadabra so shes for sure got a lot to prove She doesnt really care about that though she just wants to find love although love is a strong word Shes only a part of this party in order to get closer to  Schmorgus Maybe shell be able to romance him and they can have some fun together Good luck with that Wifey   Mavrik 27  The Heroic Gunslinger Sheriff of the city Sandima Bralls Mavrik is the best gunslinger this side of Dunglandia and an even better cook When hes not having showdowns with delinquents he likes to spend time at home with his wife and kids He quickly becomes Schmorguss mentor in being the best hero he can be He joins the party just cause it seems like a fun getaway from the Bralls What could be more fun than going on a quest for a sandwich GRAHAHAHAHAH      JRPG style turn based combat Interact with and complete missions for civilians 6 different cities to explore Plenty of side quests and secrets     Currently only for Windows Mac version planned     Arrow Keys  Movement     Esc  CancelBack     Enter  ConfirmSelect     Shift  Dash     Space  Skip     If you experience ANY issues AT ALL let me know immediately I will resolve the issue to the best of my ability   Feedback on the game is greatly appreciated     THIS GAME IS IN DEVELOPMENT EVERYTHING IN THE DEMO VERSION IS SUBJECT CHANGE IN THE FINAL VERSION OF THE GAME THINGS IN THE TRAILER LOOK DIFFERENT IN THE DEMO SINCE THE TRAILER FOOTAGE IS FROM A LATER BUILD

title: Shoddy Architect
logline: Build wobbly structures and accelerate their downfall
description: Why take the time to make a perfect structure when you can spend the time to destroy an imperfect structure Although it is a fun sandbox to mess around in for a couple of minutes this project is really just a proof of concept for procedural destruction in Godot It is a good foundation for more intense forms of destruction so perhaps I add to it in the future   How to Use   Select one of the three tools from the expandable list in the bottom left and drag the mouse while holding the left mouse button to use it    Slice Draw Rectangle Draw Circle   Pressing the right mouse button will delete the object under the cursor Holding the right mouse button and dragging the mouse will create a box wherein every object will be deleted   You can press TAB to toggle the list visibility and press left and right keys to toggle between different tools Changing the size of the window will interact with your objects by pushing them around though its a bit delayed Not to mention if you fill the screen with too many objects and shrink the window it leads to some unrealistic results

title: Street Empire Neon Tycoon
logline: Trade evade and conquer in Nova Grids procedurally generated cyberpunk underworld Build your neon empire
description: Not mobile friendly Yet     In the neondrenched streets of  Nova Grid  youre a trader saddled with a debt to a ruthless mob boss Your mission Buy low sell high and scrape together enough cash to pay off what you owe But every deal comes with a catcheach trade increases your  static  a measure of unwanted attention from the authorities Hit 100 and youre done for   Explore six procedurally generated districts from the shadowy  Rust Slums  to the towering  Sky Nexus  each pulsing with its own risks and opportunities Trade exotic futuristic goods like  Spark Leaf  and  Prism Mist  but stay sharprandom events like market crashes or watcher patrols can flip your fortunes in an instant      Assemble a crew to tip the scales  traders  to widen your network  enforcers  to keep your static in check and a  crew car  to zip between districts Upgrade your cache to haul more goods and outmaneuver your rivals      With multiple difficulty levels and endless replayability  Street Empire Neon Tycoon  is a textbased strategy game where every decision counts Will you pay off your debt and claim your place as the ultimate neon tycoon or will the static swallow you whole Step into Nova Grid and find out

title: BATHROOM GURLS 2023
logline: A short visual novel bullet hell about why girls always go to the bathroom in groups
description: BATHROOM GURLS 2023  is a short high school project made by Shannon Wang Sunny Huang and Minsui Tang with strong Unity contributions from SwiftKraft   This was my first time using Unity and it was pretty rushed for the deadline As this project has not been completed after its submission it is very unfinished  glitchy  only has halfassed boss battles implemented soundtracks fsr not stopping like literally no settingsUI and if you die you have to restart the entire game but enjoy what we have I guess  oh yeah that coming to steam 2023 thing in the summary video  long story short it was kind of a joke   This game tells the story of 4 girls who initiatally disliked each other reluctantly going to a field trip to their schools only bathroom Throughout their adventure they set aside their differences realizing theyve only hated each other for petty reasons As us three developers were all high school girls we have resonated with this theme throughout our social lives growing up as the problem of internalized misogyny has been a huge obstacle in our girlhood Some girls have grown with the toxic mindset that other girls are competition BATHROOM GURLS explores the consequences of that narrow mindset such with selfdestruction loss of selfidentity and the missing out on strong female friendships Ultimately the game outlines the importance of the girls supporting girls culture rather than girls putting each other down     PLAYMODE CONTROLS  MECHANICS      WASD or ARROW KEYS to move      MOUSE1 to dash      1 to switch to CECILE MOUSE0 to shoot projectiles Your shooting cooldown is 1 second      2 to switch to LILITH MOUSE0 to swing her bat      3 to switch to ATHENA MOUSE0 to give the player a temporary shield for a few seconds You can only activate this ability upon switching to ATHENA for at least 2 seconds      4 to switch to LEAH MOUSE 0 to shoot a paint beam that does a lot of damage You can only activate this ability upon switching to LEAH for at least 10 seconds      ESC to pause during PLAY MODE Press ESC again to unpause      VISUAL NOVEL CONTROLS       MOUSE0 to advance in dialogue      MOUSE0 or MOUSE1 to skip dialogue      CTRL to fastforward dialogue      CREDITS    Shannon Alyelle Wang   Director Thumbnail Artist Player Sprite Artist Soundtrack Composer Programmer Scriptwriter Listen to the OST here  httpswwwyoutubecomplaylistlistPL5LDaKVL3jSTc22QNPlD7KSj8hHvA_bFo   Sunny Sunnie Huang   Visual Novel Character and Background Artist essentially drew everything visual novelrelated Scriptwriter   Minsui Jenni Tang  Background Sprite Artist Scriptwriter   SwiftKraft  volunteer  Programmer  Thank you for teaching me Unity

title: Stickyban
logline: A bitesized puzzler about pushing sticky blocks
description: Stickyban is a short puzzle game from the creator of  Ouroboros  that can be played on the  Playdate  handheld Its a Sokoban style game in which you have to push blocks in order to press switches with the twist that the blocks stick to you and each other This completely changes the way these types of puzzles normally work and various aspects of this concept are explored in increasingly tricky puzzles   Features   15 puzzles Manageable to finish in one or a few short sittings Unlimited undos Straightforward controls DPad to move B to undo A to redo can optionally use the crank for undoredo as well   Enjoy

title: Egg Hunt REMASTERED
logline: An Easter Themed horror game with an evil bunny hunting you down this time remade to be a lot better
description: Egg Hunt is a game where you wander through a forest trying to collect eggs while an evil easter bunny hunts you down and tries to kill you You must collect 50 eggs in order to succeed and for every egg you collect the bunny becomes more and more alert of you   Also if you are ever struggling with getting around the bunny here is a tip you can hide behind trees and the bunny will lose track of you just throwing that out there lol     For a while now Ive been wanting to remake the 2 day version of this game and here it finally is This is Id say like 2 months of work compared to 2 days  and yes I know its not that good Id still consider this my first horror game despite this technically being a remake

title: Operation Earth Shield
logline: Earth is under attack by relentless Space Invaders and you are humanitys last hope
description: Welcome to Operation Earth Shield   Mission Overview    Earth is under attack by relentless  Space Invaders  and you are humanitys last hope Defend the planet across  3 intense levels  each with unique challenges Unlock  Level 2  and  Level 3  by achieving victory in the previous level  Level 3  features  2 stages  complete Stage 1 to advance to the  final showdown  and save Earth       How to Play       Level      Conditions     Level 1  Eliminate all Space Invaders and protect Earths defenses       Level 2  Survive waves of invaders while repairing critical systems       Level 3     Stage 1  Defeat the invading fleet       Stage 2 Final  Destroy the mothership to secure victory         Controls     OnScreenKeyboard  Move with arrow keys or onscreen joystick on mobile shoot with left ctrl or onscreen button and use special abilities with designated keysbuttonsjoystick         Tips      for Success     Dodge enemy fire collect powerups and strategize to conserve resources       Pay attention to mission briefings for levelspecific objectives         Prepare for Battle   The Space Invaders are relentless but Earths survival depends on you Complete all levels defeat the final boss and become the hero of  Operation Earth Shield        Level 1 Defend Earths Perimeter     Objective    Protect Earth from the invading Space Invaders by destroying them and achieving the winning conditions         Gameplay Details     Player      Stats     Max       Lives  5      Starting       Lives  3      Lose       a Life  When you collide with an enemy       Scoring      System     Destroy       an enemy  10 scores   Gain       an extra life  20 extra projectiles  when your score reaches       a multiple of 200 scores       Projectiles     Starting       Projectiles  50      Use       them wisely Running out of projectiles makes it harder to defend       yourself       Winning      Conditions     Reach  500       points  AND have  5 lives  to unlock  Level       2        Game      Over Conditions     Lose       all lives or become out of projectiles before meeting the winning       conditions           Tips for Success     Avoid      collisions with enemies     Aim      for high scores to gain extra lives and extra projectiles and ensure      victory     Manage      your projectiles carefully to avoid running out        Prepare for Battle   The Space Invaders are closing in Destroy them protect Earth and unlock the next level to continue your mission         Level 2 Fortify Earths Defenses   Objective    Hold off the relentless Space Invaders and strengthen Earths defenses to achieve the winning conditions       Gameplay Details       Player      Stats     Starting Lives  5       Max Lives  8       Lose a Life  When you collide with an enemy or are hit by their laser beams         Projectiles     Starting Projectiles  100       Bonus Projectiles  Gain  20 projectiles  for each extra life you earn         Scoring      System     Destroy an enemy  10 scores     Gain an extra life  20 points  when your score reaches a multiple of 100 sores         Winning      Conditions     Reach  300 points  AND have  5 lives  to unlock  Level 3          Game      Over Conditions     Lose all lives or become out of projectiles before meeting the winning conditions       Tips for Success     Dodge enemy laser beams and avoid collisions at all costs       Use your extra lives to replenish projectiles and stay in the fight       Focus on scoring points to gain lives and projectiles for a stronger defense       Prepare for the Onslaught     The Space Invaders are more aggressive than ever Defend Earth achieve the winning conditions and unlock the final level to save humanity         Level 3 Stage 1 The Final Stand  Part 1   Objective    Survive the relentless assault of the Space Invaders and achieve the transition conditions to advance to  Stage 2  the final battle       Gameplay Details       Player      Stats     Starting Lives  1       Max Lives  5       Lose a Life  When you collide with an enemy or hit by their  laser beams          Protection      Mechanic     Activate  5 seconds of protection  by pressing  Left Shift  keyboard or tapping the  Shield Icon  onscreen on mobile       Cost  Losing  1 life  you must have  2 lives  to activate protection         Scoring      System     Destroy an enemy  10 scores     Gain an extra life  1 life  when your score reaches a multiple of 100 scores         Stage      Transition Conditions     Reach  300 points  AND have  5 lives  to advance to  Stage 2          Game      Over Conditions     Lose all lives or become out of projectiles before meeting the transition conditions       Tips for Success     Use protection strategically to survive intense enemy waves       Focus on scoring points to gain extra lives and build your defense       Avoid collisions and enemy laser beams at all costs       Balance offense and defensedont waste lives unnecessarily         Prepare for the Ultimate Challenge   The Space Invaders are stronger than ever Survive achieve the transition conditions and advance to the  final stage  to save Earth       Level 3 Stage 2 The Final Showdown     Objective    Destroy the enemy  Mother Ship  to save Earth Be prepared for its defenses including  mines   child enemies  and its powerful  immunity shield        Gameplay Details       Player      Stats     Lives  3       Starting Shields  5       Shield Protection  Activates for  5 seconds  when used       Lose a Life  When you collide with or are hit by       Child Enemy  small spaceship that shoots projectiles       Main Enemy  Mother Ship       Mines  stationary defenses in front of the Mother Ship       Child Enemy Projectiles  or  Main Enemy Laser Beams          Controls     PC     Shoot  Left Ctrl     Activate Shield  Left Shift     Mobile     Move  Joystick     Shoot and Activate Shield  OnScreen Buttons       Enemy      Mechanics     Mother Ship     Has an  immunity shield  that activates for  20 seconds  and has a  10second cooldown        The shield can withstand  5 hits  before breaking       Child Enemies     Small ships that attack you directly and shoot projectiles       Mines     Stationary defenses placed in front of the Mother Ship         Winning      Condition     Destroy the  Mother Ship  to win the game and save Earth         Game      Over Conditions     Lose all lives lives  0       If you lose you must restart from  Level 3 Stage 1        Tips for Success     Use your  unlimited rockets  to destroy enemies and mines       Activate your shield strategically to avoid losing lives       Focus on breaking the Mother Ships immunity shield during its cooldown period       Watch out for child enemies and minesthey can overwhelm you quickly       Prepare for the Ultimate Battle     The fate of Earth rests in your hands Destroy the Mother Ship overcome its defenses and become the hero of  Operation Earth Shield

title: Elephant Maintenance Inc
logline: A game about fixing things you broke by trying to fix something else
description: This game is an entry of the ARD Puls Game Jam 2025 with the theme Kaputt   Play as an elephant that is tasked to fix the lights in an office building Try not to break more stuff Please Leave the office as clean as possible Keyboard controls   WASD to move E to interact M to toggle mute music and sound Arrow keys to control camera   Gamepad controls   left stick to move bottom face button to interact top face button to mute music and sound right stick to control camera     We used asset packs from      Office and Furniture  httpskaylousbergcom   Elephant  httpsdogzerxblogspotcom   Godot Starter Kit  httpswwwkenneynl Sounds Community Die Acht Music  httpswwwfabcomlistingsa1cb5fbae92b43009b85f7d7854edba6

title: I hate this F car
logline: get away with your money
description: You hate your car  Very much You need a new one But cars are expensive arent they But there is a simple yet elegant solution To rob a bank   Drive your rickety car using  Mouse  to run away from cops Beware Cops may be on foot but your car is not what it used to be   Dont leave your budyincrime behind Hes important for maintaining your damaged old vehicle Use  WSAD  for moving around and  SpaceE  for interaction     Controls   Mouse   driving a car   WSAD   movment of masked man   SpaceE   interaction with parts of vehicle     Hints    Masked character can jump into the car Stand behind the car when the trunk is open and jump in using W Try not to be to close to the car before jumping    There is a hole in the ceiling of the car You can use it to get into and out of the car without opening the trunk    You can stand on the rack on trunk door when its closed From it you can easily get on the ceiling of the car    Every gear has hardcoded range of speed it can be used on Ranges of consecutive gears overlap slightly but these overlaps are not generous    Auto Kaputt  you can kill your engine irrevocably if you drive on high speed for to long gear 4 or higher Try to not overuse high gears     PATCH NOTES     As stated by the Host of the Jam we were allowed to update our game and page after the shortlist voting We fixed a rare but major bug that could potentially completely destroyed experience and made little improvements to audiovisual layer To stay within the rules and remain transparent heres what we changed      Fix occasional bug allowing player character fall behind left edge of screen and be completely lost      Change money font      Add car shaking effect      Improved audio feedback of the engine for better feel of the gearbox      Improved visuals of upper minimap      Moving steering wheel just visuals no effect on gameplay     PS Above disclaimer was inspired by similar one from Mind the Glitch page  httpssherlockliniitchiomindtheglitch          Made for PULSGameJam by   Adam Nieurawski   Jakub Orliski   Jan Zygmunt

title: WarBot 10
logline: Combat terrorific zombies How many can you kill
description: Welcome to version 10 beta of WarBot Survival for PC Mac or Linux Developed in 2015   Recommendations    This is the beta of the official version of the game    You can see the command keys in the pregame window by clicking on Input You only need to move    the character with the W A S and D keys for forward left down and right directions respectively    Use the mouse to aim Left click to shoot    Any unusual behavior or error within the game should be reported immediately to the author This is essential as   this is a beta version   Your objective is to eliminate all the enemies that appear in the game Once you have eliminated them you will move on to the next round or level   There are boxes scattered around the map with ammunition from the second round onwards Shoot them to get more bullets   Remember that with each round that passes there will be more enemies in the next one Your mission is to reach the highest possible round   Good luck and enjoy the game   Press Esc to pause the game a small menu will appear if you want to continue restart the game or exit   You can zoom in or out by turning the mouse wheel   Regards your developer

title: Bubble Farmer
