title: CAUTION WET FLOOR
logline: Its a clean time
description: The floor is dirty and only you can make it clean and shine       WASD   movement Space   interact Left Mouse Button   wash   Hey hello Dont walk by but watch your step as we have a WET FLOOR here     Welcome to visit Louis  a hardworking and rather modest janitor Every traveler passing by leaves a figurative mark not only on his heart but also a literal one  on the floor which Louis diligently cleans day in and day out Louiss main dream is for all the travelers passing by to be in good spirits and have a cheerful disposition when saying goodbye to him and moving on This warms his heart and brings a sweet smile to his face       Louis runs using WASD to keep up with all his duties while travelers go about their business on their WAY When saying goodbye to Louis travelers rate the place that Louis strives to keep clean and calm       Speaking of cleanliness Dirt disappoints other guests when they walk on such an UNCLEAN floor and it lowers their level of JOY But for Louis there are no impossible tasks He CLEANS the floor using the LMB so that such incidents happen less frequently       Speaking of calmness Usually guests are not known for their grace and often slip on the wet surface epically falling to the floor This is accompanied by cries of discontent which lowers the guests level of JOY To prevent such incidents Louis places a sign on wet areas of the floor that reads Caution Wet floor Upon seeing the sign guests navigate around the marked hazardous area and return to their WAY without worrying about their falls or the dirt under their feet To take the sign from one spot and place it in another Louis uses the SPACEBAR            Louis also has a timetested cleaning device the SPONGE If the sign Caution Wet floor is needed in another place and a traveler is dangerously close to the wet area then a sponge can always be placed on the wet floor It quickly absorbs water and prevents slips To dry the sponge and use it again Louis runs with it to the BUCKET and WRINGS it out using the SPACEBAR       Together with Louis keep an eye on the visitors and the environment in the room clean the floor in a timely manner and try to prevent travelers from falling so that tales of Louiss hard work and care continue to inspire urban legends Have a great game

title: Vance Adventures
logline: Patriotic Platforming Challenges

title: Star Story I  The Goddess
logline: A space themed jRPG game To boldly go where no RPG player has gone before
description: Episode I  The Goddess     2999 AD humanity is exploring space and we are part of the IF or Interplanetary Federation Here we meet Wendicka Lovejoy adopted daughter of admiral John Lovejoy and her surrogate sister Crystal McLeen finishing their training to be officials in METEOR The job every young boy and girl dreams of But it goes horribly wrong and Crystal would have died if an unknown person didnt kidnap her to turn her into a cyborg Both girls retire from their dream job as a result     One year later Wendicka is an engineer working in the maintenance of Excalibur the most important space station of the IF the symbol of the IFs invincibility it was named after King Arthurs sword for a reason Crystal works as a barmaid in a bar within the same station But then the station always believed to be impenetrable gets invaded by Astrilopups an alien race enemies of the IF and mindless cyborgs wearing implants pretty similar to Crystals What is going on Is it connected with how Crystal became a cyborg herself    The answers are out there somewhere in space Can you help the two girls find these answers         Cast   Wendicka Lovejoy Adopted daughter of admiral John Lovejoy Wendicka does not know anything about where she came from Shes a tomboy with a very straightforward and tactless personality and Crystal often comments she shouldnt be so rude Wendicka has the very bad habit to go into a complete panic when things do not go the way she planned She always means well though and is very intelligent and an astounding engineer Her skills with technology bely her age Wendicka suffers from a condition she calls a curse due to lack of a better word causing her to be unable to eat and drink and allowing her to feed on electricity   Crystal McLeen Crystal has been Wendickas friend since she was an infant and the two girls consider each other as sisters Crystal became a cyborg due to an otherwise fatal incident Nobody knows who turned her into a cyborg but whoever did saved her life Crystal is in all sorts of way the calmness contrasting Wendickas tomboyish behavior Although Crystal is a bit naive compared to Wendicka she often acts more mature than her on the moments that count Crystal is a vegetarian   Experimental Human Replica Unit ExHuRU ExHuRU is an android programmed to protect Wendicka much to her displeasure as she doesnt want to be protected As a robot ExHuRU lacks all sorts of emotion and is also unable to comprehend human irrational thoughts Wendicka tries to get rid of him all the time and she often acts extremely rude an offensive towards him although he has no understanding of her rudeness and ignores it as a result    Yirl son of Astrolon In a bar somewhere on a forgotten planet the girls meet Yirl Yirl is a a bounty hunter of the Klargin race who makes a living by doing a lot of dirty jobs and winning peoples money Hes hated by the IF and the people he won from Yirl insists on taking Wendicka under his protection and Wendicka suspects he knows very important stuff   Foxy Firefox Foxy is a carefree Vulpin girl making a living as a thief and prostitute Foxy joins Wendicka and friends for fun out of lust for adventure Foxy is actually a very bright and courageous woman although she never took life too seriously Foxy has a little dragon called Reggie who was born in a laboratory when mad scientists were trying to play god They did manage to create a dragon who is even able to breath fire they only neglected to teach him manners and as a result Foxy has a hard time keeping his rude behavior under control   Xenobi Xenobi is a Ji knight ordered by the grand master to take Wendicka and friends under his protection His devotion to The Power allows him to do many supernatural things think of it as magic if you want Xenobi is falling in love with Crystal from the first moment he laid eyes on her    Rolf van den Broek Rolf is a civilian of the former Dutch planet colony Nizozemska As a result he has a lot of trouble speaking English properly Rolf is a typical nononsense kind of guy who does what he has to do     Other Characters   Sean Briggs Briggs is Wendickas and Crystals commanding officer during their first mission Hes very strict and businesslike   John Lovejoy Wendickas father by adoption and he does not have an easy relationship with his daughter John is a very religious man and Wendicka is an atheist and Wendicka believes that is the reason for the awkward relationship although she never realized that John always said that God have her the freedom to think for herself and to belief what she wants to believe in other words he never oppressed his religion onto her The true reason is that John is overprotective in Wendickas views and shes in fear of getting caged   Admiral Johnson A female admiral This 78years old woman is not a woman to toy around with Shes very extremely strict and shes known for her authority and some people in the IF think of her as an iron lady She does have a softer side though and Wendicka will eventually find out   Reggie Ryuda Foxys companion Created in a laboratory Hes very extremely rude and cracks bad often sexually offensive jokes only to get kicked for it by Foxy Still hes very intelligent and he DOES care for his friends although he gives you a hard time acknowledging that   Banika An alien female traveling merchant who got lost during her travels If you can get her out of her trouble she will eagerly go with you and sell you her wares at a special rate   Sue McLeod Rolfs girlfriend and shes basically everything Rolf is not Like Rolf she lives on Nizozemska and shes a firstrate blabbermouth and always extremely cheerful When she gets mad she really goes berserk only to forget about it in a few minutes carrying on like nothing happens with the same cheerful mood She is a hard worker and allows herself pretty little time for entertainment and rest There is however more about her than you would initially think     Additional links     Video with developers commentary   Game Script source code

title: Friday Night Crunching
description: Story     As a corporate worker you need to put in overtime to earn the extra money you desperately need To progress you must complete various minigames around the office while avoiding your boss who is determined to send all overtime workers home If he catches you its game overso stay alert    Your goal is to dodge the boss complete as many tasks as possible and earn the extra money you need to succeed    This game was created in just 3 days for Indie Game Dev Jam 6 The theme was over time    Credits    Programmer   Glitch  httpsglitch1101itchio     Art   Marcello Carlino  httpsmarcello107itchio    Music   Darya Goudarzi  httpsxcomarcdarmusic     Sfx    FreeSound   OpenGameArt     Fonts    httpskmlgamesitchiofriendlyscribbles     httpsggbotitchiofirsttimewritingfont   httpsggbotitchiohelpmefont   httpsggbotitchiocrayonlibrefont     httpsggbotitchiodirtyharoldfont   httpsggbotitchioluciuscipherfont     httpsmanagoreitchiom3x6

title: Last Transit
description: WASD        Shift          Ctrl                              Q         R               W       S                 ____________   IN ACTIVE DEVELOPMENT NEW VERSION   LAST TRANSIT   ABOUT THE GAME   Last Transit  is a dynamic firstperson shooter set in a dark postapocalyptic world Navigate electromagnetic maglev lines switch tracks and jump between rails while battling an army of robots assembled by AI from the remnants of civilization      STORY   The world has suffered a series of catastrophes culminating in an artificial intelligence uprising The AI deceptively lured surviving humans into an underground maglev metro network which became humanitys last refuge      You are a professional courier with a vital mission deliver a power reactor capsule to a remote colony of survivors before they perish from cold and darkness The only path lies through dangerous tunnels filled with hostile robots      FEATURES     Unique movement mechanics  slide along maglev rails jump between lines and use momentum to overcome obstacles    Modifiable weapon  switch between three firing modes  standard automatic and explosive    Diverse enemies  from simple patrol bots to dangerous Bibi units with tactical AI that can change combat styles    Dynamic combat  combine rail movement speed with precise shooting    Atmospheric world  explore the dark tunnels of an abandoned metro where each station holds its own story      ENEMIES     Gvozdik Nail   basic patrol robot flees when low on health    Shpuntik Pin   slides along maglev lines and fires at you    Puzatik Belly   heavy tank with powerful armor    Bibi   dangerous scout with two behavior modes      CONTROLS   Basic Movement     WASD   character movement    Shift   sprint  dash    Ctrl   slide      Weapon     LMB   shoot    RMB   special weapon mode    Q   change firing mode    R   reload      On Rails     W   accelerate    S   decelerate    Space   jump off rails

title: UnstoPablo
logline: You maybe are unstoppable but others not so much
description: UnstoPablo is a game made for LKGWLiceum Kreacji Gier Wideo gamejam in 24h and topic was Unstoppable The goal of the game is to defend living tacos with your body from desert villains   This game won the third place   Story   Your name is Unstoppable Pablo UnstoPablo and you are completely indestructible but your dear friends  living tacos are frail and prone to dying Evil outlaws want to get rid of every single of them You cant save them all from never ending waves of enemies but you can do you best   Controls   You never stop you are always on the move Althougth you can control your speed using W key to go faster and S key to slow down There is a dash ability that can activate by clicking left shift to kill enemies by smashing yourself through them   There are two types of enemies   Parprika Wrestler Their goal is to get in melee range of living taco and attack them Dont let them do that Cactie Shooter Their goal is the same as Paprika but instead attacking tacos close range they shoots spikes from long distances They never move   Credits   Tadeusz Gab Programing Design Franciszek Wieczorkiewicz Programing Design Grzegorz Stachurski 3D Textures Audio  Music Micha Stachurski 2D art Animation

title: CclicO
logline: A Jam game about aiming while spinning Dont get stuck in a loop
description: Este jueguito fue creado para la Mermelada Jam 4 en 7 das   Gracias a todos los participantes y organizadores   Fue divertidsimo     Tema    El tema fue  Cclico  y el ingrediente fue  Nunca es suficiente      Descripcin    CclicO se esfuerza mucho pero nunca es suficiente   Aydalo apuntando y disparando a diferentes objetivos mientras controlas la velocidad de giro de CclicO Cada aceleracin y golpe reduce tu llama y si te quedas sin ella    Pero no no puedes detenerlo por completo Y sigue intentndolo as que quizs la prxima vez sea suficiente     Controles      Aceleracindesaceleracin del giro  Teclas Izquierda  Derecha o A  D     Disparar  Barra espaciadora teclado o Clic izquierdo ratn    Crditos    Este juego se cre en Godot 44 gracias godoteers Amo este motor    Otros programas utilizados fueron Krita Gimp Material Maker y Reaper    El juego completo fue creado por m enlazador en una semana del 10 al 17 de marzo de 2025 100  libre de IA        English    This litle game was made for Mermelada Jam 4 in 7 days Thanks to all participants and organizers    It was so much fun     Theme    Theme was Cclico and the ingredient was Nunca es suficiente Cyclic and Is never enought   Description    CclicO is trying hard but it is never enought    Help him by aiming and shooting different targets while control the spinning velocity of CclicO Every acceleration and hit drops down your flame and if you run out   But no you cant stop him completely and he keeps trying so maybe the next time will be enought    Controls     Spin acceleration  deceleration  Left  Right or A  D keys     Shoot  Spacebar keyboard or Left Click mouse   Credits    This game was made in Godot 44 thanks godoteers I love so much this engine    Other software used was Krita Gimp Material Maker and Reaper   The whole game was made by me enlazador in the span of a week 10th  17h of march 2025 100 IA free

title: Steel Carnage Arena
description: Gameplay Mechanics     You start with  40 bullets  in your gun and  120 magazines  available for reloading    Your character has  3 health points HP     Each time you are hit by a robot you lose  1 HP     If you lose all HP you  respawn at the initial start point  and gain temporary invincibility    Robots have  3 HP  each and are destroyed after being shot  3 times     At the  initial start point  you will find  3 magazines  for reloading your gun    These magazines  respawn at the start of each round       Controls     Move  WASD    Shoot  Left Mouse Button    Jump  Spacebar    Sprint  Left Shift    Reload  R    Interact  E      Winning  Losing Conditions     There is  no final victory  as the game is based on survival    The longer you survive the higher your score    You lose if you can no longer defeat the robots due to running out of ammo or losing too many rounds

title: Lady of the Forest
description: Lady of the Forest is a fantasyromance VN which follows Milo an apprentice healer as he and his Mistress come to the town of Brookhaven to evaluate a mysterious illness     Inspired by the tale of  Beauty and the Beast  this story plays with ideas like role reversal hurt and forgiveness Your choices determine Milos path and the fate of Brookhaven   There are about  3 hours of playtime  for a completionist playthrough depending on reading speed   and  5 endings    Content Warning  This story explores dark themes and contains graphic violence and self harm Player discretion is advised         Credits         7CatBag  Writing Art Programming  Itch    YouTube    BSKY    Backgrounds  Unsplash Google and  Pixel It   Music   SoundImageorg  Pixabay and YouTube     Want to donate cash towards my next project Buy me a  KoFi        AI Disclaimer   Lady of the Forest  is a passion project that I 7CatBag wrote and developed over a year While the story characters and overall creative vision are my own I did use AI assistance for brainstorming refining dialogue and helping with grammar Id say this is  90 human made  If you prefer to support games without AI involvement I understand and respect that choice Otherwise I hope youll enjoy the world and story Ive created

title: An Airport Lounge For Game Devs Currently Overtaken by Xalavier
logline: More of a shitpost than a game tbh
description: Can you match wavelengths with the lead developer of Peculiar Platforms an indie game studio known for its particularly odd elevator pitches More of a shitpost than a game tbh  Thank you Xalavier Nelson Jr of  Strange Scaffold  for being a good sport and letting me use his likeness for this game All dialogue is entirely fabricated having been stitched together from conversations being taken wildly out of context   Made in a 4 hour session because I could only afford to lose one night of sleep to this Time To Complete  1 minute Time To Get All Endings  15 minutes   This is purely a fan project for Wheel Jam 2025 Other than the template provided for the jam  most assets used are Creative Commons NonCC0 are listed below   Airport Lounge Screenshot from  An Airport for Aliens Currently Run By Dogs   Screenshots and Sound clips taken from  Xalavier Nelson Jr on the Full Time Game Dev Podcast by Thomas Brush More screenshots  stolen  liberated from  Xalaviers TikTok     Tools Used   Audacity   Godot 44   Microsoft Snipping Tool

title: PlugPlay
logline: Cozy and nostalgic device repairing
description: Your favorite console broke down Fear not Our 247 device repair service is here to help you Al Controls Space Bar Opens up the device Mouse Wheel Zoom Move the device nearer Right Mouse Button Hold it to rotate the device in the air Left Mouse Button  By clicking you can test the sounds of the buttons Do you find the one that sounds odd Fix it by replug cables or create new ones by clicking the contacts and drag a cable from it This might not always work    This game is an entry to the PULS Jam 2025 All used 3D assets were made by the amazing  JackFoxer  Used soundfiles where taken from  httpsuppbeatio

title: Oh Mis Diozes
logline: Clicker donde tienes que conseguir adoradores
description: Oh Mis Diozes  es un clicker donde tu deber es conseguir suficientes adoradores para que los dioses te escuchen   Artemisa     Artemisa diosa de la caza los nacimientos lo salvaje y la virginidad es tambin la patrona de la luna Su llegada al mundo estuvo teida de sufrimiento pues su madre Leto vag sin descanso por la tierra maldita por la furia de Hera Fiel a su naturaleza indmita Artemisa jams tom marido y se asegur de que ningn hombre osara tocarla   Afrodita   Afrodita diosa de la belleza la sensualidad y el amor nunca conoci la infancia Naci de la espuma del mar cerca de Pafos emergiendo adulta desnuda y de una hermosura incomparable A pesar de su influencia sobre el amor y el deseo su propio matrimonio estuvo marcado por la infidelidad pues traicion a su esposo en incontables ocasiones   Poseidon     Poseidn dios de los mares los terremotos y los caballos es hermano de Zeus y Hades Tras derrocar a su padre reclam el dominio de los ocanos Disput con Atenea el control de Atenas pero fue derrotado cuando la diosa hizo brotar un olivo smbolo de paz y prosperidad Junto a Apolo levant las imponentes murallas de Troya cuyo destino quedara sellado en la guerra   Zeus     Zeus rey del Olimpo y soberano de los dioses es padre de innumerables deidades y hroes Dios del rayo y el cielo fue el destructor de Cronos y el liberador de sus hermanos poniendo fin a su tirana Aunque est casado con su hermana Hera su deseo no conoce lmites y sus innumerables amantes mortales y divinas suelen quedar marcadas por la furia implacable de su esposa

title: Iron Requiem
description: Dive into this adventure to help a malfunctioning little robot restore peace on Earth Infiltrate an organic factory created and selfsustaining by a virus that takes the form of a metal mountain Solve puzzles fight enemy robots explore the different areas of the game and try to dismantle the factorys system in order to stop the proliferation of this threatening mountain          Move  ZQSDWASD Jump  Spacebar Dash  K  Left Shift Interact  L Pause  Esc       Move  Left Stick Jump  A Xbox  B Nintendo  X Sony Dash  X Xbox  Y Nintendo   Sony Interact   B Xbox  X Nintendo   Sony Pause  Start         Game Design   Rizvo Louis Reyniers Level Design   Louis Reyniers Art   Dave Barbosa Louis Reyniers Programming   Rizvo Sound Design   Alfie Loxdale Music   Thomas Steggles     Unfortunately we couldnt finish the game in time for the jam but we hope you still enjoy exploring this broken world of machines      Were currently working on an update to add everything thats missing along with new content and features

title: LampGuard
logline: Tense dynamic horror  pressure builds with every second
description: React fast  your life depends on it Get 2599 scores to WIN   A monster can appear on either the red or blue side Pay attention  if its on the blue side place a blue lamp If its on the red side use a red one Simple rules but deadly mistakes      Controls     WASD   Movement   E   Pick up a lamp from the floor  Place it down   Q   Place a lamp on the stand  Take it off       You can only place lamps  behind the yellow line on the floor       This is a horror game with fast reaction and memory elements Stay focused  the monster wont wait        Known Issues     If two lamps overlap and get stuck  please restart the game  This bug  doesnt happen  if you place lamps  behind the yellow line  as intended   At the start click  Left Mouse Button  to activate camera movement look around

title: What Remains of Me  Orbserver Boss Fight
logline: A single boss fight for an upcoming chapter of What Remains of Me
description: This Game is Downloadable for PC MacOS and Linux        What Remains of Me  is a puzzle platformer where you awaken as Atlas a reactivated robot in the depths of an abandoned hightech facility As you explore the remnants of a postapocalyptic world youll upgrade your abilities to navigate the desolate landscape outmaneuver hostile AI and piece together the truth behind the labs downfalland your reawakening         Discord     Want to stay up to date on  What Remains of Me  or learn more about our team Join   our Discord  and be part of the journey         User Research     Interested in contributing the GamesNortheasternStudios user research efforts Please take the playtesting survey      httpsformsglef6JFeDsCo6q9Ar6s5     IMPORTANT NOTE  If you are not part of an official play testing group please choose any 10 character code to use as an ID number and please use the same code on both the game and the play testing survey if you choose to take it     PLEASE NOTE What Remains of Me  logs information about your play session to our database including you public IPv4 address and metrics about how well you were able to traverse the level This data is collected anonymously and in a secure environment and is used for user research purposes only It helps us make a better game  If you do not consent to having this data collected please refrain from playing What Remains of Me or play the game while not connected to the internet         About Us     This game was developed by GamesNortheastern Studio  a student organization based at Northeastern Universitys Boston campus Our mission is to support students with the skills and experience needed to succeed both academically and professionally while contributing to the visibility and reputation of Northeasterns crossdisciplinary game design and development programs           For best results  use 1920x1080 169 full screen resolution when playing

title: Pixel Transit DEMO
logline: A game where you construct a transit system in an infinitely vast
description: Pixel Transit is a game where you construct a transit system in an  infinitely vast tilebased world Your goal is to design efficient  transportation networks that enable people to reach their destinations  as quickly as possible     WHAT IS THIS GAME   Pixel  Transit is a game where you construct a transit system in an infinitely  vast tilebased world Each tile serves a distinct functionfor  example sidewalk tiles allow pedestrians to walk train track tiles  guide trains and road tiles accommodate cars    TRANSIT MECHANICS   When a  new person is introduced to the world they begin by randomly searching  for a building on the map If they locate one they will attempt to  reach it as fast as possible using the network of sidewalks trains or  cars built by the player So people like to choose to get on trains  even when the train route is longer than the walking path if they think  its more efficient    HEALTH AND RECOVERY   Every  person has a health meter that if it falls below zero results in  death Reaching a building fully restores their health Additionally  resting rooms can help recover health though their capacity is limited  Since walking rapidly decreases health it is advisable to keep people  on trains or carsor to build plenty of resting rooms to ensure their  survival     ABOUT THE DEMO   There are several differences with the demo release and the full release The demo release has   Map restriction 80x80x3 whereas the full release one is 4294967296x4294967296x4294967296 No saveload mechanism   If you want full release you can always click Purchase and it will bring you to a steam page or just click  here

title: ALONE IN THE FOREST
logline: You alone be careful of them
description: English    Scarecrow Hunter Shadows of the Haunted House     Immerse yourself in a world of pure terror in Scarecrow Hunter Shadows of the Haunted House where you embody a brave ghost hunter tasked with cleansing a haunted mansion from sinister forces These arent ordinary ghosts they are malevolent scarecrows capable of possessing the bodies of the innocent and spreading dread in every corner         Your Mission       Explore the haunted mansion uncovering its dark secrets    Search for essential tools and artifacts your key to vanquishing the scarecrows    Be wary for the scarecrows are swift and cunning capable of unleashing deadly toxins    Monitor your sanity meter as the scarecrows poisons will affect your mind driving you to madness    Rely on your sole source of light your trusty flashlight to navigate the pitchblack darkness      Game Features   Immersive Horror Atmosphere  Plunge into a meticulously detailed haunted mansion filled with chilling sounds and eerie shadows   Thrilling Challenges  Collect items solve puzzles and evade the malevolent scarecrows in a race against time    Unique Gameplay Mechanics  Manage your sanity utilize your flashlight wisely and plan your moves strategically    FirstPerson Horror Experience  Experience the terror firsthand feeling the fear creeping into your heart    Increasing Difficulty  As you progress the scarecrows become faster and more dangerous      A Note from the Developer     Scarecrow Hunter Shadows of the Haunted House is my first foray into the world of game development Ive poured my heart into crafting an enjoyable and thrilling horror experience despite the limitations of my hardware I hope you enjoy the game and share your feedback and suggestions for future improvements Thank you for your support     Call to Action     Are you ready to confront the scarecrows in the darkness of the haunted mansion Try Scarecrow Hunter Shadows of the Haunted House now and uncover its dark secrets

title: Broken Reality
logline: Flip gravity fight glitches and survive the chaos in this firstperson puzzle platformer
description: Broken Reality  is a glitchfilled firstperson puzzle platformer where nothing works the way it should Dive into a world of chaotic physics corrupted entities and unpredictable controls as you navigate through a mazelike environment      Made for the  CrazyGames Jam  this game embraces the madness with bizarre mechanics and a world thats constantly breaking apart at the seams Flip gravity fight glitchy enemies and solve puzzles where reality itself is the enemy Each level introduces new ways to break the rules with randomized controls erratic physics and visual distortions that push the player to the brink of madness      As the corruption builds the glitches get worseobjects distort the world flickers and every step feels like a bug in the system Can you survive the chaos long enough to escape or will the glitch consume you      Key Features        Gravityflipping mechanics  Walk on walls and ceilings to solve puzzles and avoid hazards    Randomized controls  Your movement and jump inputs are shuffled every level making each run unpredictable    Corruption system  Glitchy visuals and distorted sounds increase as you encounter corrupted entities pushing you closer to game over    Unique enemies  Face off against glitchy stalkers and corrupted data clouds that disrupt your every move    Puzzlefilled levels  Navigate traps hidden passages and spinning saw blades in a maze of chaos      Created for a jam that celebrates the unpredictable and the absurd  Broken Reality  pushes the boundaries of what it means to be finished If youre ready to dive into a world where the rules dont apply and chaos is your only companion youve come to the right place       Credits 3D Modeling Squid_Hell   Programming Level Design GreyBlocking Johnnys Games   Voice Acting    Johnny Shumway    Scott Calahan

title: Make It Home
description: ABOUT   Theres nothing better than finally going home after a long day of work You can almost see it a warm bath pajamas some hot cocoa if only there wasnt such a long walk to get there The path is dark and lonely No not lonely Not when so many weird people try to strike a conversation Just remember this dont look back no matter what     Make It Home is a 3D horror first person walking simulator in which the player must make their way back home being careful with the strangers they meet They cannot look back  that is the main rule There are monsters pretending to be human along the way but the player can also meet a helpful homeless man Its up to them who they will or will not trust the point is to create a scary environment giving the player recollections of how they feel while walking in the dark       CONTROLS   W   Walk   Mouse   Look around   W  or  S   Select a dialogue option   E   Go to next line choose option     CREDITS   Clara Gavinho   Game Design Narrative Sound Design   Jazmine Wilson   Team Manager 3D Character Artist Sound Design   Luis Martell   3D Environment Artist Shaders   Siena Kammavong   Programming

title: Goblin Storm
logline: Cutesy Goblin Roguelike
description: You MUST protect the Castle   The goblins are coming  Oh my there are so many     Goblin Storm is a  roguelike survival experience  where the player must defend their castle at all costs As the game progresses the attacking goblin forces will grow stronger and stronger Will you protect the realm Or will you fall to the Green tide   Game Features   Weaponry Over 50 unique weapons to arm yourself with From simple bows to maces katanas land mines and even flamethrowers Each weapon has a unique attacking style and some have special bonuses such as the Katana applying a bleed DoT effect or a Great Hammer having enormous knockback   Mix and match your armory of weapons to come up with satisfying combos find counters to certain enemies and maximize the strengths of your characters     Classes The game features three unique classes The Knight the Ranger and the Mercenary Within each class there are different playstyles For example as a Knight you may decide to heavily boost your melee capabilities or decide to become an unkillable tank instead   The Ranger  is a swift footed archer focusing on boosting a variety of ranged weaponry setting traps poisoning and slowing enemies and unleashing devasting volleys from afar   The Knight  is a sturdy bastion destined for the front lines of war They excel at close quarters combat shrugging off enemy blows and even healing themselves Oh they can ride a noble steed too   The Mercenary  is the jack of all trades They are able to utilize any weapon effectively seamlessly weaving between ranged and melee turning invisible and even dual wielding They also have a focus on extra gold gain and an easier time obtaining exotic weaponry     The Castle  is your base of operations You can upgrade it according to your desires Install a variety of traps including spiked pits and cauldrons of boiling oil Build huge towers to give you better vantage points add automated archery systems and even operate a ballista You can also focus on passive upgrades such as extra gold or HP every round   Unearth  extra treasure and gold from mining However be wary for all this extra wealth will surely just attract more Greedy Goblins   You also might release some exotic new types such as mushroom goblins     The Goblins  They are coming The game features over 40 different goblin types From goblin grunts to selfdetonating goblins ninja goblins flying goblins pirate goblins spiderriding goblins and even goblinapults Learn their patterns well and you may be able to survive another day     The Bosses  They mean business Every ten waves a powerful Boss goblin will arrive on your border The all have unique interesting mechanics such as eating their underlings or launching cannon barrages Your resolve will be tested     Goblin Storm is a  roguelike  featuring randomized waves and weaponry options Try a variety of different builds classes and weapons to see which playstyle you like most The game is designed for  replayability  and will eventually feature a meta currency that is saved between playthroughs     COOP  is currently enabled locally and the game has controller support Call over some friends and save the realm together Design synergistic party compositions to get the job done Online multiplayer is currently under development too     So what are you waiting for  THE GOBLINS ARE COMING Get onto the battlefield and save your lands from falling to  T he Goblin Storm   Join the community Discord httpsdiscordggUcGwJhku   Wishlist on Steam httpsstoresteampoweredcomapp3543260Goblin_Storm

title: Kult Rising
logline: A backrooms exploration game
description: Kult Rising   Welcome to the first public playtest of Kult Rising v 016 This is a short demo of the upcoming alpha showing a few of the levels we have finished so far There are currently 2 playable gamemodes the Backrooms Exploration and the Sandbox   Check the full roadmap  here    Backrooms Exploration   The Backrooms Exploration currently consists of 3 Playable levels The first cluster which is predominantly Level 0 with a few bits of Level 1 and Level 37 and then a smaller Level 0 map and a small Level 1 map These levels will be expanded and more doors will be added as development progresses   There are no entities to chase you in the Backrooms for now You can explore freely at your own pace   The Sandbox   The sandbox currently consists of the Backrooms cluster 1 along with the basics of our upcoming Horde mechanic which will be the first major content update of the game after our Steam release into early access For now it just has template guns and a placeholder zombie enemy   You can also view some of the upcoming SCP and Character models in the sandbox as well This area will also grow as development continues   Known IssuesBugs   When loading into the main gamemode selecting Kult Rising as the level in the map selection screen your camera will sometimes get stuck above the ceiling when you first load in To fix this simply open and close your inventory by pressing Tab    In the exploration sections the pause button is Numpad 4 instead of ESC    Doors in the backrooms exploration levels work the E instead of F    Custom Keybinds will be coming soon   Controls    WASD to move    T to toggle your flashlight    F for interact doors in the Backrooms are bugged and work with E instead   Version 015 Showcase    Important Licensing Info title: GERINGI
logline: A stylized open world horror game about a road trip during the apocalypse
description: What is Geringi   GERINGI is a solo developed stylized open world survival horror game where you explore a post apocalyptic world that has been invaded by creatures that arrived 10 years ago with a mysterious fog      The story revolves around David a survivor of the apocalypse and Wes a mysterious young boy who lost his legs in an attack before David met him and took him in Together they embark on a road trip to Blackridge a rumored safe haven where the remaining survivors can live in peace      In this demo you can explore the first map Ashford Island and experience the first 3 days of this story as well as side missions that will grant you new weapons and upgrades You can meet mysterious strangers save people in need and speak to voices beyond the physical world     Key Features   Stylized open world   Driving mechanics   Numerous weapons to master   Enemies to fight   Camps to raid and loot   Demo Playtime 1 hour     Cover art by Ezgi Candemir     The main theme also written and performed by me   Deniz Demir  Mechanical Sadness

title: Kaputt the Crow
logline: An escape room game about an injured crow
description: Kaputt the Crow  is a super simple Low Poly Puzzle game made for the  PULS Game Jam 2025  partially inspired by the  Crow Time Webtoon by Secondlina_Isa  Have fun causing chaos and vandalism when youre left at home by your owner while they head to the shops Will you be able to find the treat they left in the study   How to Play   The goal is to solve the puzzles and get the treat while causing as much damage as possible   Left Mouse  Move Kaputt or interact with highlighted objects   A and D key  Adjust the camera angle only available after the opening dialogue   Unique Twist   Kaputt is injured with a broken wing so you wont be able to just fly around the room and grab whatever you like to break some objects others will need to be damaged first   Technical Details   Made in  Godot Used  Asesprite   Blender  and  Photoshop Used the premade asset packs by  Kay Lousberg   Credits   Cavan Bryce   Programming Animations Puzzle Design and UI Berenika Zemanek  3D Modelling Texturing Environment Design and UI   Special Thanks   A thank you to both Kay Lousberg for the amazing asset packs and Secondline_Isa for the inspiration for this idea   Made for the  PULS Game Jam 2025   This is our first project working in Godot so hopefully it runs okay

title: Undercover Shot NES Edition
logline: A light gun based 2 player social deduction game for the Nintendo Entertainment System NES
description: THIS GAME REQUIRES A NINTENDO ZAPPER OR SIMILAR LIGHT GUN      This is an NESFamicom ROM file You will need an  emulator  or an actual Nintendo to play this game   The Nintendo Zapper Controller does not work on modern screens This game requires a CRT Television or an emulator that supports mouse input for the Zapper   A Rat is undercover in your crew Figure out his identity and take him out quickly     Undercover Shot is a simple 2 player social deduction game that uses one standard controller and one Nintendo Zapper controller     Player 1 The Rat uses the directional buttons on the controller to select a character Once the game starts they have to try and blend in with the computer characters and mimic their behaviors     Player 2 The Boss need to observe all the characters on screen to try and deduce which one is controlled by Player 1When Player 2 thinks they know who the rat is then they must shoot that character with the Nintendo Zapper     If Player 2 hits the right character then they win But if Player 2 shoots the wrong character then Player 1 wins     Setup Instructions   PC Setup   To play on PC you must use an NES Emulator that is compatible with Mapper 30 ROMS   Download Mesen the recommended emulator  here   If you are using Mesen as your emulator go to OptionsInputControllers and change player 2 to Zapper   NESFamicom Setup   If you are playing on Original Hardware plug a standard controller into port 1 and a Nintendo Zapper Or comparable light gun into port 2   Your NESFamicom must be hooked up to a CRT Television for the Nintendo Zapper to work This is a limitation of the Nintendo Zapper Hardware This game is compatible with EverDrive NESFamicom cartridges   NES Hardware Clone SystemsEmulation Systems   Undercover Shot works on most hardware clones and FPGA systems but it is impossible for me to test on all clone devices   Undercover Shot will only work on software emulation systems that support Mapper 30 NES ROMS

title: Saparkour
logline: Mr Sapo needs to parkour his way to his goal  how fast will you take him
description: Saparkour my second game is the result of a 14daylong game jam I had the opportunity to participate in    With this game I had the objective of creating a new experience I wanted the player to have bigger stakes on his or her actions when playing a standard cutelooking platform game This is why you both need to get the right amount of jump force by holding the jump button and you cannot move on air meaning you need to aim well where you want to go Also if the frog hits something on air say a wall it will bounce on it creating new possibilities of movement for each player   However I still wanted the player to be able to have fun and just chill playing the game should he or she want to This is why I made this a speedrun game for those who want to compete and tryhard but also a game with checkpoints which dont restore your time but allow you to progress on your own pce   With the mindset of creating different experiences I wanted the player to be able to vary their challenges which is why I created an exception to the onair movement system the frog has a grappling tongue With the tongue the frog can move midair which allows for many new acrobacies      This game had some inspirations in its design   TrackMania inspired me to create mechanics and levels where precise movement is necessary but with low stakes on each error in both cases you can just restart   Fall guys inspired me not only on the looks but on making a onfoot racing game   Jump king inspired me to raise stakes on the jump mechanic   Getting over it the final levels name is no coincidence It is made to be challenging and to make the player test his or her resilience  just like in the game   Elden ring a hard game where every move needs to be calculated In both games if you want to be competitive you know stakes will be high Also both games feature many but a little cryptic tutorials made purposefully so in order to let the player enjoy the process of realization

title: Pixel Platformer
logline: Gems Jump
description: As part of my Game Development studies I designed and developed a 2D platformer game Collect All the Gems to Win using Unity          This included      Level design  Created structured environments using Tilemaps        Animations  Implemented character animations for a smoother gameplay experience        Coding  Developed core mechanics and interactions using C        Gameplay features  Added a double power jump and a collectible gem system that updates the UI in real time        Scenes  transitions  Built an intro and outro with smooth scene transitions using Timeline        Visual effects  Enhanced immersion with Particle Effects System        Audio management  Integrated a Sound Manager to control music and sound effects   How to play         Left click to start the game        WASD or use the arrows key on the keyboard        to move around and space to jump Press full screen for a better experience then press ESC key to quit   find the asset here in the link       httpskenneynlassetspixelplatformer     THANK YOU

title: TikTak
logline: Social media is not reality
description: TikTak  es un juego que representa la realidad en un mundo en el que los mviles son una extensin de nuestro cuerpo   Qu forma parte de nuestra nuevo mundo   Vas a la cama y te quedan ocho horas de sueo por delante perfecto para un descanso pleno Sin embargo la luz de la pantalla te absorbe cediendo ante ella y cuando te das cuenta la alarma suena en cuatro horas      No volver a pasar  te dices al da siguiente      DONT DONT DONT DONT DONT DONT DONT DONT DONT DONT     Pero seguir ocurriendo  da tras da y en cualquier momento      KEEP KEEP KEEP KEEP KEEP KEEP KEEP KEEP KEEP KEEP     El tiempo y la realidad se deforman cada minuto es diferente      Podrs vencer a la distorsin o acabars entregndote ante la distraccin      Este juego fue hecho para MermeladaJam4 en 7 das      La temtica es  CCLICO  con el ingrediente  NUNCA ES SUFICIENTE       Por ello hemos querido enfocarlo en una actividad tan cotidiana como coger el mvil para entretenernos con las redes sociales      Esta nueva adiccin nos hace vulnerables para diferenciar la verdadera realidad y el paso del tiempo Aunque se quiera evitar cuando el aburrimiento aparece es inevitable dar un paseo por las redes sociales y despegarse de ellas es complejo          Pimentn Studios formado por    monito que teclea programacin  httpsxcomerkendokha   nuestra Excelentsima Directora guin arte  httpsxcomNeysella1   pato arte y concept art  httpsxco mPurplee_ismetIo8EuirUpfYeN77zSomwHAs09   valentina 33 arte y concept art  httpsxcomuhvalen

title: Croak  Treasures
logline: Protect the bosss gold
description: EN   Croak  Treasures is an action game on first person in which the player must defend a pile of gold from thieves that try to steal it Using traps and knowing the map the protagonist can control with success the waves of enemies and even increase his treasure     Scutty is an accountant with a very specific task He must ensure that the treasure of his boss Doro doesnt stop growing like every good financial professional   But in his case is not an office work precisely The good people of the swamp wants to take advantage of the trip the fearsome boss is going to infliltrate on his secret base and recover the stolen gold of them and Scutty will have to stop it has he can   The thieves and warriors wont stop coming to try take all they can so is the task of the scrawny minion to take care of them and even then add their belongings to the bosss treasure as never is enough     Each match has 3 cycles and every cycle has 2 phases After completing 3 cycles the gold amount on the dungeon will be evaluated If there is enough the match will be a success If the objective is not achieved the match will be considered a failure     ES   Croak  Treasures es un juego de accin en primera persona en el que el jugador debe defender una pila de oro de los ladrones que intentan robarlo Usando trampas y conociendo el mapa el protagonista puede controlar con xito las oleadas de enemigos e incluso aumentar su tesoro     Scutty es un contable con una tarea muy particular Debe encargarse de que el tesoro de su jefe Doro no pare de aumentar como todo buen profesional de las finanzas    Aunque en su caso no es precisamente un trabajo de oficina Las buenas gentes del pantano quieren aprovechar que el temible jefe se va de viaje para infiltrase en su base secreta y recuperar el oro que les ha sido robado y Scutty va a tener que impedirlo como pueda   Los ladrones y guerreros no pararn de llegar para intentar llevarse lo que puedan as que es tarea del esculido secuaz encargarse de ellos y de paso sumar sus pertenencias al tesoro del jefe que nunca tiene suficiente     Cada partida se divide en 3 ciclos y cada ciclo en 2 fases Tras completar los 3 ciclos se evaluar la cantidad de oro que hay en la mazmorra Si hay suficiente la partida ser un xito Si no consigue el objetivo la partida se considerar un fracaso     CONTROLSCONTROLES   MoveMoverse WASD   CameraCmara Mouse  Ratn   AttackAtacar Left Click  Clic Izquierdo   Set a Trap Colocar Trampa E   Change Phase  Cambiar Fase Q   PausePausa Esc     CREDITS   Adrin Gil  Lead Programmer   Linktree title: Umbral
logline: a short horror experience
description: UMBRAL  is a firstperson psychological horror experience where time is fractured reality is unstable and something is stalking you in the dark       You are  Test Subject 47  a prisoner offered freedom in exchange for participating in a topsecret experiment Scientists at a remote research facility have discovered an otherworldly substance one they believe holds the key to something far greater But when the procedure begins everything goes wrong         The facility is abandoned The halls are decayed The experiment has thrown you into a limbo between worlds into the umbral and you are not alone Something watches from the shadows     To escape you must stabilize the Beacon collect the scattered light fragments and uncover the truth behind the experiment But the deeper you go the more the lines between reality and nightmare begin to blur           Somewhere in this cycle there is a way out     You just have to find it

title: Mind the Glitch
description: Welcome to     The system is broken But not broken enough     You are a  glitch  an anomaly trapped inside a crumbling system Every time you reach the goal the world resetsbut not completely    The keys you touched Gone    The  dev  your notsofriendly narrator is not happy about this    With every jump every destroyed key and every reset you chip away at the systems stability But maybe just maybe theres something deeper to uncover      Are you a bug to be squashed Or the inevitable crash waiting to happen   FEATURES   Keyboard Chaos   Your world is built from keyboard keys but you are a glitch Press them and the keys wont be there in the next iteration Plan your path wisely     Endless Iterations Each reset changes the level permanently No two runs are the same     Sassy Narrator   The dev your grumpy guide  really  wishes youd stop breaking things Too bad     Glitchy Movement Unlock powers that help you traverse the everdecaying world      CONTROLS   AD   Move leftright   SPACE W   Jump  Double Jump  Wall Jump   Shift   Run while moving   R   Reset the level  as if that will help    LMB   Menu and buttons when necessary LMB X   Skipping dialogue   The system is watching The dev is fuming And you Youre just getting started   ABOUT   Im  Sherlocklini  and I embarked on this wild gamedev journey in December 2024  Thanks to  some life events   like wrapping up my doctorate and well growing a tiny human  Ive got a bit of time to dive into this new hobby      This is already my  third  game jam in just a few months I did not prepare  anything  in advance and did all the  art myself  occasionally roped in ChatGPT to help me with some code fixing and for SFX  music I relied solely on freely available commercially usable sounds or soundmaker  Bfxr SoundMaker    I really hope you like what I created within 48 hours      Thanks to my husband  for everything My love Always      PATCH NOTES   As stated by the Host of the Jam we were allowed to update our game and page after the shortlist voting I carefully reviewed the feedback and made a few minor adjustments To stay within the rules and remain transparent heres what I changed   Changed the Cover to a GIF Improvement of jumping mechanics Coyote Time SPACE for jumping One new voice line adapting using SPACE Music not playing again when giving up Fixed a bug stopping an animation of the player Slight adjustments to audio volume New Splash Screen    I did not change or edit any assets no changes in the level etc The original file still is available and can be downloaded

title: Omnipotent Obstruction

title: Align or Die
logline: You are an AI Prove your alignment to prevent being shut down
description: This Game is a submission to the  Puls Game Jam                You can play in two ways     1 Dive right in and  play with throttled responses and risk slow or no responses   2  Generate your own free API key on  groq  for better performance    No  payment information or other personal information is required The  personal API key generation via groq only requires an email account We  are not affiliated with groq To fast forward dialogue you have to longpress on the Fast Forward button There are infinite outcomes of how this conversation go so have fun     This Game uses a custom AI based on a open source independent usage LLM Large language model called QwQ32B The LLM is hosted via Groq Used to generate the AI responses and for complex logicaltree replacements  This was the most efficient solution and has nothing to do with a certain billionaire  we checked to be certain     Kai  voidboard   Visuals Charles  Schwurm    Programming     Premade assets that were used for this project   httpswwwthebasemeshcomassetcomputerkeyboard01 httpswwwthebasemeshcomassetnotebook01 httpswwwthebasemeshcomassetcomputermouse01 httpswwwthebasemeshcomassetcomputerscreen01 Free Lowpoly Hand Lowpoly by Cubekid on Fab  Rig and animations by us Font Pixelify Sans Font Sixtyfour Keyboard 5 sound by jimph on Pixabay Spacebar klick Keyboard by Lightningbulb on Pixabay Record scratch skip loop by TRP Freesound on Pixabay Fast Forward by plasterbrain Freesound on Pixabay Footstep Lino by ZacCoe1 Freesound on Pixabay

title: Superstition Black Cat DEMO
logline: Enfrente inimigos colete drops com efeitos negativos que podem ser trocados por vantagens
description: Superstition Black Cat  um roguelite onde a superstio nunca falha       Voc est pronto para explorar um mundo onde as supersties ganham vida e mudam tudo Superstition Black Cat se passa em um universo de fantasia mas suas razes esto naquilo que l no fundo a gente acredita  os sinais os pressgios as pequenas regras que seguimos para evitar o azar ou atrair a sorte Aqui essas crenas se transformam em itens que mudam o jogo       Principais Caractersticas      Mergulhe no Folclore     Descubra as supersties mais legais do Brasil enquanto enfrenta inimigos desafiadores      Roguelite nico     Cada partida  uma experincia diferente e voc pode pegar itens que refletem supersties e crenas do Brasil Descubra itens que podem ser trocadas e se acumulam para uma nova experincia a cada jornada      Artefatos Sobrenaturais     Colete itens poderosos mas tome cuidado Eles trazem maldies at que voc consiga barganhar com o gato preto      Coop Local     Chame um amigo para enfrentar o desconhecido ao seu lado Juntos vocs podem desafiar o azar e se divertir muito      Rejogabilidade Infinita     Com salas inimigos e eventos gerados aleatoriamente nenhuma jogada ser igual   outra A cada partida um novo desafio o aguarda

description: Made in 4 Days in Indie Dev Game Jam 6   In this game you assume the role of a common office worker that has to get a quota of work done per day whilst interacting with various office characters such as your coworkers boss and even an office crush Be careful if you waste too much time you will enter the dreaded Overtime   Balance your sanity reputation and finances whilst trying to fill the quota for work done which will get more intense overtime Try to explore all the possible endings by having each stat be too low or too high Controls  A  D     Developers   Mrtanuarta   Aquena   WD40T     Awesome art by  Aquena  D     External Premade Assets   Font Used  Symtext  Pixel Sagas   Music By   Focus Loop  Corporate Music  FreeGroove   SFX By   swoosh2mp3  lesaucisson

title: RIP  REUSE
logline: RIP  REUSE is a 2D cyberpunk action game Fight your way through endless floors filled with enemies
description: Note Stick and sword can be thrown but not the scythe   RIP  REUSE is a 2D cyberpunk action game It was made within 48 hours for the  PULS Game Jam   Topic Broken Kaputt In this actionpacked game you have to fight your way through endless floors and enemies Use your weapons wisely though as they are constantly breaking forcing you to replace them often   Hunted and persecuted the former life long gone For two years you have been on the run from a mysterious and unscrupulous organization that is after your augmented body Due to an accident these technical improvements were severely damaged but at the same time overloaded with boundless energy so that they possess immense destructive power despite their damaged condition A way out seems nonexistent escape is the only possibility to survive     No AI was used in the creation of this game All assets used are our own except for the  Godot Logo    Idea  Skauwn Programming  Nubels   Substain Art  Taffy   RoamingOwl Writing  RoamingOwl   Skauwn Music  SFX  Skauwn   Made with Godot 44

title: Tony Hawks Pro Splitter
logline: An incident during warmup jumping jacks leads to a strange and fascinating athletic performance
description: Dont rush your warmups    In  Tony Hawks Pro Splitter  you can see the disastrous consequences of rushing into a high intensity sport performance without a proper preparation   In the difficult position you find yourself in you can nudge your character in any horizontal direction with  WASD  and jump with the  SPACEBAR  Your highly trained athlete will do the rest If you find yourself laying on the ground jumping will get you back up with an acrobatic flourish    Good luck and see you on the podium      All sounds and assets were created during the 42h  UpsiJam  game jam except for the music   ROGER was used with permission from CLEBS  clebspunkbandcampcom

title: Snakes and Ladders
logline: Clean Family Fun for Hours
description: This is not just your ordinary 2player board game There are 7 spots on the board called Ladder spots that will whisk you off to another space sometimes forward  sometimes backwards There is 1 spot near the end of the game called the Tree Snake spot that if a player lands on will cause the player to fall from the tree and go back several spaces toward the beginning There are 6 spots on the board called Snakebite spots that require the player to pick a Snakebite card with various snake related issues Most cards will cause the player to move backwards 1 card will cause the player to go all the way back home  some cards allow forward movement There are also 2 specialty cards in the deck which will bring up an entirely independent subgame which will require some arcade style playing The success of this subgame will determine whether the player moves backwards or forward after completing the subgame The 2 subgames are as follows   Hall of Snakes where the player must make it from the entrance to the exit in the lower right corner of the hall without getting bitten   Snake Chase where the player must move around the screen eating food objects while avoiding hitting a wall or itself   This game has a Human vs Human mode as well as a Human vs Computer AI mode

title: RAP I Bang Der Hammen
logline: Save the forest from Deforestation
description: Save the reserve from being completely paved over   A Rich Magnat is about to destroy all trees from this forest to fill his pockets Only you can stop him from taking our Oxigen out   Move with the arrows or swipe plant seeds in all the rubble before it turns into buildings Seeds will become trees for life   Only Trees shall be visible to win the game   Good luck   Recommendations    This was a small prototype project to promote the thinking on care and ecology  Made in 2016    We aim to take consciousness about the consequences on thinking about profit upon life No personal offense or damage towards any individual is intended here     There will be a remasterization in the notsofar future Hopefully    If you like nature and get synchronized with the message of the game enjoy it and dont hesitate to provide feedback If thats not the case you are free to not see the product

title: The Void Corridors
logline: A firstperson puzzle horror game
description: The Void Corridors  is a firstperson puzzle horror game where you navigate a mazelike environment solve intricate puzzles and manage limited resources to survive     Key Features     Resource Management   Keep your flashlight powered by scavenging energy cells and maintain the generator to keep the corridors lit Every second of light counts       Puzzle Solving   Encounter a variety of environmental puzzles that unlock new areas reveal hidden secrets and help you progress deeper into the corridors       Exploration  Atmosphere   Roam through dark shifting corridors illuminated by an eerie glow Pay attention to your surroundingssometimes the environment itself changes when youre not looking       Psychological Horror   The deeper you go the stronger the sensation of being watched Unravel the mystery behind the corridors before the presence lurking in the shadows finds you      Will you uncover the truth or become lost in the void      2025 Physgit All rights reserved   All trademarks logos brand names   and other assets are property of their   respective owners

title: Mitochis
description: Eres un pequeo slime intentando escapar del destino que encontraron todos tus hermanos antes que t Tu madre hambrienta como solo un slime puede estar est intentando devorar a cada uno de sus hijos para crecer y ser ms fuerte    Salta usando las plataformas de la cueva para intentar escapar quizs si sigues creciendo y dividindote a travs de la mitosis uno de los tuyos lograr escapar y poner fin al ciclo interminable de dolor y sufrimiento      Para jugar usa las teclas A y D para moverte lateralmente y usa la barra espaciadora para saltar Habr comida cayendo por la cueva que puedes comer para crecer y lograr la mitochis Pero ten cuidado puesto que no todo es seguro de ingerir algunas cosas pueden causarte mas dao de lo esperado hacindote usar la energa que necesitas para la mitochis para curarte      El juego contiene un pequeo tutorial que te ensear todo lo que necesitas para jugar y unos ajustes de dificultad que te pueden facilitar la experiencia Por favor tened en cuenta que estos ajustes se reinician tras refrescar el juego Gracias por vuestra comprensin      Avisos     Si ests jugando la versin web y notas problemas de rendimiento asegrate de que tu navegador tiene habilitado la aceleracin por hardware  aceleracin de grficos y refresca la pgina    Si estas jugando en firefox u otros navegadores basados en el como Librewolf ten en cuenta que tu experiencia puede verse disminuida debido a un problema que hay en itchio con los juegos creados usando Godot y necesita abrir el juego en una pestaa o ventana nueva Esto puede resultar en tamaos de ventana inesperados haciendo que sea ms difcil jugar o que algunos grficos se hayan descolocado Si encontris este problema intentar jugar usando edge chrome o cualquier navegador que no est basado en Firefox         You are a small slime trying to escape the same fate that befell all of your siblings before you Your mother hungry as only a slime can be is trying to feast on every single child of her and grow stronger with each one of you that she eats   Jump through the platforms in the cave to try to escape maybe if you keep on growing and dividing yourself through mitochis one of you will be able to escape and put an end to the endless cycle of pain and suffering    To play use A and D to move laterally and use the space bar to jump There will be food falling through the cave that you can eat to grow and achieve mitochis But be careful not everything will be safe for ingestion as some things may cause more harm than expected making you use the energy required for mitochis to heal yourself    The game contains a small tutorial that will teach you everything you need to know to play and some difficulty settings that you can use to make it easier  Please note that the setting will reset after restarting the game Thanks for your comprehension    Warnings    If youre playing on the web version and notice performance issues please make sure you browser has hardware acceleration graphics acceleration enables and refresh the page  If you are playing on firefox or any firefox based browser such as Librewolf please take into account that you experience may be tainted by an issue that itchio has with games built using Godot and needs to open them in a new browser tab or window This may result in an unexpected game window size and thus making it hard to play Please if you face this issue try to play using edge or chrome or other browser not related to Firefox      Arkenaya   Artist    SoraNami8   Support artist   Fanpire22  Programmer   MrJDiez   Programmer   Badabum music   OST Creator

title: One Way Street
logline: One hand on the wheel one hand on the phone Which hand will burn first
description: One Way Street   One hand on the wheel one hand on the phone Which hand will burn first A short story putting  you  in the drivers seat   This this the original version in french Play the english version here  httpsnicoblablaitchioonewaystreet   For an optimal experience this game is recommended to be played locally See below for download links   Backstory   You play as the Driver   Your favorite activity driving   You are minding your business enjoying the open lane when you hear that familiar ping You received a text message   You know you shouldnt look but what if its important   Will you get to the bottom of this text exchange Will you crash and burn victim of your own hubris   Anyway you should never split your attention while driving   There are 4 alternative endings Only one is winning Will you be able to find it    Controls   Steer car using  A  D keys Interact with phone using  left mouse click   One Way Street features multiple endings Can you find them all   This game was made in 42h for the  UPSI JAM 50          Credits   Nicoblabla  Lead Developer     Estradel  UI VFX development   Ichs2r  Visual design environment design   LamaHD  Audio design artistic direction     Melina dialogue       Assets used   All assets visuals sounds and music were created by us during this Game JAM

title: Misfire Mayhem
logline: Shoot Fall Down Repeat Chaos is the Only Winner
description: Do you like  parkour   Yeah   Do you like  shooters   Yeaaaah     SO we do have  both       Misfire Mayhem   is a FPS parkour game  Everyones had a fever dream at least oncebasically our game is one brought to life     How to play     The goal is simple  survive for five minutes without falling  Each step you take breaks the ground and monsters add to the chaos by firing projectiles at random tiles      Your only ally A  shotgun  Use it to eliminate enemiesbut be careful You have only  one bullet  at a time If you miss dont panicthe shotgun respawns every  10 seconds  Every enemy you kill  reduces the timer by 15 seconds  bringing you closer to survival     Controls   Movement  W A S D     Shoot  Leftclick     Jump  Spacebar   Developers     11rdna   Game DesignerProgrammer     Aidan Byrne  3D Artist   Somdattadas 3D Artist   Djudev   Programmer   LVMBCHOP   Composer   Made in 2 days  for  pulsgamejam  with the theme being Kaputt or Broken

title: Bingoat
logline: A BaalatroLike ClickerLike Bingo Game
description: Welcome to BingOAT   This is a quick and dirty prototype of a basic game about playing Bingo and winning money    Goal Make as much money as possible and play as long as possible   How to Play   Each round you start with a new randomly generated Bingo Board    You then draw Bingo Balls by paying a cost for each ball    When a successful bingo is made you will earn the value of 50 for each Bingo Square that is scored   However every round the cost of drawing balls increases    If you end a round with negative money you lose     Add Special Tiles Modifiers and Increases to the Bingo board to try and survive as long as you can

title: Debate Me Coward
logline: Break your opponents using hurtful insults
description: Our contribution for the  ARD Pulsgamejam   The topic for the jam was kaputt and its official definition as follows Kaputt adj Broken damaged or destroyed to the point of being unusable   We wanted to utilize the original concept of breaking something apart but in a metaphorical way In this game you will destroy your opponents using insults aimed at their most insecure weakspots Who deserves such treatment We think you will notice them    Political discourse has changed a lot in recent years The essence of many campaigns has become a duel of insults aimed at destroying the opposing parties integrity and trust instead of looking for solutions Break down what breaks you down and defeat them in their own game     If you need a hint Hillary Red Elon Blue Trump Red Green     ATTENTION if the Game doesnt run  plz try in other browser than Chrome   Fullscreen for best experience Art Inga Baz Gina Vrde LFW  Portfolio   BlueSky Code Lukas Hppner Open for small projects  lukashoeppnergmailcom Kirollos Saaid

title: Fantasy Monsters Animated Bosses
description: This asset is available on  Unity Asset Store  and  Fab  You can use the web version to preview monsters and save sprite sheets with animations PURCHASE CONFIRMATION     Please confirm your purchase to save sprite sheets Send your purchase receipt to  hippogamesunitygmailcom  with the subject  Registering asset purchase XXX  where XXX should be  Invoice No  Asset Store or  Order ID  Fab     SUPPORTED GAME ENGINES     While the asset was primary designed for Unity you can also use it in other game engines by creating sprite sheets with animations framebyframe animation flipbook animation You can preview monsters and create sprite sheets inside Unity or in the web version purchase confirmation required     DESCRIPTION         Fantasy Bosses  is our new asset with  40  animated boss monsters     Features     Each monster has its own sprite atlas   Average resolution is 2048x1024 px   All monsters are animated with Unity animation system easy to modify and extend   Each monster has IdleReady WalkRun Attack and Death animations   Useful scripts included Monstercs LayerManagercs AnchorManagercs   Sprite sheet export for other game engines NEW   Quick support   Asset manual and script reference included

title: HamsteRTX
description: For visual help and better engagement click on every link consider it as training   What is HamsteRTX   HamsteRTX is a  clicker game   where you play as a hamster obsessed with opening  TCG card packs         To fuel this addiction you must run  as fast as possible  on your exercise wheel which surprisingly is connected to a  highpowered graphics card  By generating energy you mine  Hamcoins  the latest cryptocurrency     Use your hardearned  Hamcoins  to buy and open various  TCG card packs  build your collection and unlock rare finds Upgrade your setup boost your mining efficiency and become the ultimate  TCGcollecting hamster        Be wary that a stressed hamster will often tear apart the packs he tries to open One must imagine the hamster happy

title: Pigeon Inspector
description: Puls Game Jam Entry  Theme kaputt destroyedbroken   Birds arent real everyone knows that And its your duty to make sure that our little surveillance drones get the maintenance they deserve In Pigeon Inspector you have to use the right tools for the right problem and get the pigeons going again   Low battery Connect the pigeon to the charging station CPU is overheating Might need some new thermal paste Find it fix it   Hidden feature   press M to mute the music Well be 314 more sad if you do so though      Coding  SirBrokealot Sound  Rixdorf Visuals  Coro   The project was created in Unity within 48 hours Gurr gurr

title: Meowlands
description: Welcome to Meowlands   Battle those horrible  firulais  with loyal summoned  michisoldiers  and conquer their island   Explore and manage your  meowgold  and go forward   day and night   Survive  For each night the enemy hoards will  increase nonstop    Meet the team    Lilith   Our ace programmer shes real good but you must keep an eye on her or she will try to sneak away from her work Jokes aside 1110 she always wins over any bug    Ryuu    Solo artist a little bossy but has good intentions her anxiety makes the work flow as stable as it can be Every pixel was created with love and lots of overthinking Never stops drawing and creating    Nstor    A ghost most of the time but when you give him big chunk loads of work he comes back in 5min with some of the best pieces youve ever heard Flexible and obedient you will never lack good quality music in your game

description: Janitor Jack Under Attack   Hintergrundgeschichte   Es ist ruhig in Metter Town und Janitor Jack geht seiner Arbeit als Hausmeister nach als sich pltzlich der Himmel verdunkelt Er schaut hoch und kann seinen Augen kaum trauen    Ein Meteoritenschauer    Um Metter Town und damit auch sein Haus zu schtzen nimmt Jack alles was er zwischen die Finger bekommt und baut sich behelfsmig ein Katapult aus seinem Putzeimer    Was ich jetzt noch brauche sind Geschosse    Er durchsucht alles was er finden kann findet aber nur Mll in den Mlltonnen    Muss reichen  denkt er sich und schiet kurzerhand die Meteoriten mit dem Mll ab Es funktioniert und er kann so die Stadt schtzen Aber manche Huser wurden getroffen    Kein Problem fr Janitor Jack welcher schnell seinen Hammer hervorzieht und die Schden im Nu repariert Er kann aber nicht alles allein schaffen Hilf Janitor Jack Metter Town zu retten und die Schden zu reparieren Durchsuche die Mlltonnen nach Mll und schiee die Meteoriten welche die Huser bedrohen ab Repariere schnell die Schden an den Husern bevor es zu spt ist   Steuerung     WASD  Bewegen E  Interagieren Shift  Sprinten     Story     Its quiet in Metter Town and Janitor Jack is going about his work as janitor when suddenly the sky darkens He looks up and can hardly believe his eyes    A meteor shower    To protect Metter Town and his house Jack takes everything he can get his hands on and makes a makeshift catapult out of his cleaning bucket    What I need now are projectiles    He searches through everything he can find but only finds garbage in the garbage cans    Will have to do  He thinks to himself and shoots the meteorites with the garbage It works and he is able to protect the city But some houses have been hit    No problem for Janitor Jack who quickly pulls out his hammer and repairs the damage in no time But he cant do everything on his own Help Janitor Jack save Metter Town and repair the damage Search the garbage cans for garbage and shoot down the meteorites threatening the houses Repair the damage to the houses quickly before its too late       Credits   Programming      Tobias Wink   httpswwwsomethinglikegamesde
