title: Sleepwalker
logline: Repent for your crimes and find a new life in death if theyll let you
description: CONTENT WARNINGS Sleepwalker involves themes of hallucinations death and murder acts of violence adolescent abuse suicidal ideations suicide and feelings of guilt and despair      Youre a troubled soul wracked with guilt and trauma and too many problems to even know where to begin Luckily thats what the doctors for     To unpack your past in the day and reflect on the day in the night This is your life     No not life Death      But its not so straightforward One person strives to help you while the other strives to keep you trapped in the clutches of limbo forever You dont know whose intentions are pure     Youre trying to earn your rite of passage to the afterlife but the whispers in your ears conflict each other at every turn Who do you trust to see you through to your final destination        Sleepwalker is a solo dev effort for NaNoRenO 2025   Script Art and Coding by Bree Frankel of Summer Light Studios      Team and Assets   Links to all Music and SFX   Voice Actors   Dr Morana  Gina Leigh Smith   Sammy  Carson Croft   Shane  Ryan X Messcher   Melania  Bree Frankel   Additional voices  Harry Gill   Sian Luxford   Lee Bergantino

title: Tetris
logline: Consigue el mayor puntaje posible
description: Utiliza el modo pantalla completa para una mejor experiencia   Tetris es un juego el cual ya es muy conocido en el mundo esta es una versin simple de un aprendiz de programador en Unity   Objetivo  Consigue el mayor puntaje posible apilando las piezas a modo de completar las filas de manera horizontal una vez completes una fila esta te dar el valor de 1 de puntuacin y desaparecer dejando espacio para ms filas Filas de 1 a 3 completadas dan 1 de puntuacin cada una al completar 4 o ms de manera consecutiva en un solo movimiento conseguirs un  Tetris  que equivale a una puntuacin de 5 en total   Cada 10 puntos adquiridos la dificultad del juego aumentara incrementndose la velocidad a la que caen las piezas   Controles      Mover a la izquierda   Mover a la derecha Flecha de abajo  Acelerar la cada de la pieza Barra espaciadora  Rotar la pieza   Este juego se desarroll con fines educativos para aprender a usar el motor de juegos Unity por lo que carece de algunas cosas como Pausa en el juego audio animaciones chidas etc   Desarrollado por Christian Rojo Carrera ChrisLesser

title: Solid Snek Game
logline: A 2D browserbased dungeon crawler inspired by Metal Gear Solid
description: I built a 2D Metal Gear Solidstyle game using Phaser This is the first game Ive built Its very simple to start with 3 levels The AI is probably the most interesting part  Created with Claude 37s  Groks help Works best on desktop Let me know your thoughts  buildinpublic   You can try the full version at  http solidsnekgamecom  Submit  feedback here  and view the  roadmap here

title: Downfall Into Hell
description: Life is cut short and the soul finds itself in the abyss of hell where darkness clutches it in its cold embrace But somewhere in the distance through the darkness there is a faint glimmer of hope  a chance to escape the depths of despair and ascend to heaven The question remains is this the true path to salvation or just a clever ruse an illusion to prolong the agony and prevent the soul from winning peace                                 At the moment the first floor and the second floor are ready in the game This promises to be something really interesting

title: Stitches
logline: NO AI
description: In Stitches you play as a beloved plushie that tries to repair the kaputt broken soul of its owner by stitching soul pieces together       Controls           Gameplay   Complete all three levels by connecting pieces with enough other pieces left number and make sure to only connect it to the right amount of unique pieces right number            Credits       Nema   xeetsh   Feint       All content of the game including but not limited to fonts music art and code was created during the 48 hour time frame of the PULS GAME JAM   No AI was used in the creation of this game

title: Last Spark of Earth
description: Please Play Fullscreen   Bitte Spiel Vollbild       Last Spark of Earth   An entry for the PULS GAME JAM 2025     httpsitchiojampulsgamejam     Story  Lore     The Earth is gone Not in flames not frozenjust exhausted Humanitys hunger drained every resource poisoned every drop of water and left nothing but dust where oceans once roared The last survivors You and a handful of desperate dreamers huddled inside a cobbledtogether space station orbiting a dead world         Controls   A  D   Rotate Planet   LMB   Interact   Leertaste   Drill     Gameplay  Features     Genre  Arcade Miner      Goal  Drill planets for resources and upgrades Travel as far as possible to escape Earths grave     Team   my Tabtaste     Technische Infos   Engine  Unity   Plattform  Browser WebGL   Steuerung  Tastatur  Maus            Known Issues  Bugs    wrong Text in top right corner    reset from Planet show UI and show is KAPUTT D    Drill and Push Return Earth button shakes the screen forever          Credits  Danksagung   Assets from  httpsitchios148783pixelspacesale    Ships from  httpsopengameartorgcontentspaceships32x32   Particle from  httpsassetstoreunitycompackagesvfxparticlessimplefxcartoonparticles     Disclaimer   Dieses Spiel wurde innerhalb von 48 Stunden fr die  PULS GAME JAM 2025  entwickelt Es kann Bugs oder unfertige Elemente enthalten Feedback ist willkommen

title: What Remains of Me  Vox Fight
logline: A single level within What Remains of Me  GDC 2025 build
description: This Game is Downloadable for PC MacOS and Linux        What Remains of Me  is a puzzle platformer where you awaken as Atlas a reactivated robot in the depths of an abandoned hightech facility As you explore the remnants of a postapocalyptic world youll upgrade your abilities to navigate the desolate landscape outmaneuver hostile AI and piece together the truth behind the labs downfalland your reawakening         Discord     Want to stay up to date on  What Remains of Me  or learn more about our team Join   our Discord  and be part of the journey         User Research     Interested in contributing the GamesNortheasternStudios user research efforts Please take the playtesting survey      httpsformsglef6JFeDsCo6q9Ar6s5     IMPORTANT NOTE  If you are not part of an official play testing group please choose any 10 character code to use as an ID number and please use the same code on both the game and the play testing survey if you choose to take it     PLEASE NOTE What Remains of Me  logs information about your play session to our database including you public IPv4 address and metrics about how well you were able to traverse the level This data is collected anonymously and in a secure environment and is used for user research purposes only It helps us make a better game  If you do not consent to having this data collected please refrain from playing What Remains of Me or play the game while not connected to the internet         About Us     This game was developed by GamesNortheastern Studio  a student organization based at Northeastern Universitys Boston campus Our mission is to support students with the skills and experience needed to succeed both academically and professionally while contributing to the visibility and reputation of Northeasterns crossdisciplinary game design and development programs           For best results  use 1920x1080 169 full screen resolution when playing

title: FlappyDunk
logline: A Flappy clone but with basketball
description: Sorry in advance I know the banner is AIgenerated but admit it it looks pretty cool right    Alright so basically this game is just a little practice thingy     Its actually my very first Pico8 game   I paid homage to Flappy Bird because why not But then I thought Lets sprinkle some hot sauce on it So I added a dunking mechanic And then because I wanted it to look cooler I threw in a backstory     Lets make it a basketballshaped hovercraft in a postapocalyptic world     Dont ask why Really just dont    How to Play     Press XLeft mouse buttonTouch the screen whatever to flap your ball   PS If you hate it remember Its just my first try    Must mentioned   Journey to Silius BG artGruberBG music

description: DO NOT WORRY THIS IS NOT A VIRUS   Even though this game doesnt stop blurting out error messages ITS NOT A VIRUS   Just restart your computer

title: Uppers Beta
logline: Uppers Beta Version 1
description: About The Game   Uppers is a multiplayer game in development where you face an opponent in a fastpaced and fun dispute Blocks are falling from above and you must climb your way up avoid getting crushed and dont let the red line get you Be quick and use walljumps to be the last one alive and win   The game has a lobby system and supports two players matches After a match is over it restarts automatically You can press esc key to quit the game   Hit Create Lobby button to start a lobby as a host or List Lobbies button to see available lobbies you can join   Uppers  is currently a prototype that might evolve to a full game with much more content but as my first attempt creating any online multiplayer the goal here is to see if it actually works and test the concept It was developed with unity multiplayer services   Im eagerly waiting for comments and feedback   Controls     Move the character   space Jump   esc Quit ps Im a solo dev and 40 days ago i didnt knew a thing about making online games I know i dont have a lot to show yet but i honestly think the game concept is genuinely fun and youll have fun playing if it works  so please invite a friend to play and give it a chance Right now the game dont have a single player mode Also probally releasing a webgl version soon

title: Tap Blitz
description: RU       Tap Blitz                                                                          EN   Hi everyone this is my first project Tap Blitza twoplayer mobile game for one device In this game you can challenge your friend for speed of reaction and analysis of the situation   There are two buttons on the playing field and a timer in the middle To start the game click on the check mark button and wait for the timer to complete Who has time to press their button firstremoves the enemys hp The one who completely runs out of health bar loses    Have a nice game

title: REPLAY
logline: You Should Never Have Found This Game
description: After a long and busy day you found this old looking game on your way home it seems interesting so you take it with you   You quickly realise that the  controls  are simple    A   and  D  to move left and right   Spacebar  to jump and use doors   And your  computer mouse  to look around the room   You decide to play the game at night     This game was made in 30 days as a fun challenge I hope you all enjoy   Now with a visual upgrade

title: Tiny Cemetery
logline: Devenez gestionnaire de cimetire
description: Comment grer un cimetire   lheure de la transition cologique  Prenez en main un petit cimetire communal et rpondez aux demandes multiples de ses usagers Transformez votre cimetire depuis la taille de lherbe jusqu  la cime des arbres    Contrles   Souris et Clic   quipe    Game  designer    Lucas Vially    Programmeurs    Augustin Guyot    Evan Dubois Artistes     La Tassoni    Marie Le Mezec Sound designer    Tristan Walger Scientifique    Louise Dallaglio   Aspects scientifiques    Dans les cimetires franais   partir de la seconde moiti du XXme sicle le recours systmatique aux pesticides et le dveloppement des monuments en granit a contribu   vacuer la nature spontane et organique Avec linterdiction des pesticides les communes principales gestionnaires des cimetires se retrouvent   chercher dautres faons dentretenir ces espaces socialement trs sensibles  Alles en herbe ruches intertombes btonns arbres lagus  derrire les choix oprs par les communes se cachent des raisonnements   la fois techniques financiers managriaux et politiques Chaque cimetire reflte une certaine vision de la communaut des citoyens et de son audel     Documentation supplmentaire  Un article sur la nature dans les cimetires dans le journal  The Conversation   httpstheconversationcomcequelescimetieresdisentdenotrerapportauviv Un chapitre douvrage scientifique sur la transition cologique dans les cimetires   httpsbooksopeneditionorgefr56388 Un chapitre douvrage sur les cimetires paysagers   httpsbooksopeneditionorgpsorbonne30643langfr Petit plus      Si le jeu vous a plu votez Tiny Cemetary pour le coup de coeur du public de la Scientific Game Jam  Formulaire ici    httpsformsgleoVoBxXvjDXBxV8PY7

title: Winds Of Fate
logline: Controle pssaros mutantes dispare projteis e sobreviva em cinco mapas cheios de desafios
description: Em um mundo devastado por experimentos genticos fora de controle as aves deixaram de ser meras criaturas do cu e se tornaram guerreiros mutantes com habilidades incrveis Em  Winds Of Fate  voc assume o controle de um desses pssaros mutantes cada um com habilidades nicas e a capacidade de lanar projteis devastadores para enfrentar inimigos cada vez mais desafiadores     Ao longo de cinco mapas distintos voc explorar desde florestas radioativas e runas de cidades abandonadas at laboratrios subterrneos e vulces em erupo enfrentando inimigos grotescos e chefes colossais Cada fase traz novos perigos exigindo reflexos rpidos estratgia e domnio das habilidades mutantes para sobreviver     Colete melhorias desbloqueie novas mutaes e descubra os segredos por trs da origem dessas criaturas enquanto luta para libertar o mundo do domnio das foras que criaram esse caos O destino do cu e da terra est em suas garras     Caractersticas do jogo     Pssaros mutantes com poderes e projteis nicos   5 mapas repletos de desafios inimigos e chefes picos   Ao frentica e combate estratgico em um mundo psapocalptico     Preparese para alar voo e lutar pela liberdade em  Winds Of Fate

title: Hitman Suicide
logline: Youve got a death wish Hitman lifestyle isnt for you anymore
description: Youve got a death wish Hitman lifestyle isnt for you anymore and youve got nothing left As a final action of gratitude you try to kill every single rival of the boss for the boss   Enjoy this hypercasual scrolling shoot em up kill rival gangsters avoid shooting civilians and go out with a bang

title: ikinokoru
description: story    People suddenly turned into strange beings The player fights against this world of despair and  headed to the facility the survivors gather together     Features    In order to survive you have to find food and drink and sleep on benches   Graphics that change every moment from morning to night and then again in the morning There are also weather conditions such as rain and cloudy weather   The basic idea is to avoid them but sometimes it is necessary to fight against infected people     How to operate   MoveWASDcross key      Viewpoint move Mouse   ActionSpace    DashLeft Ctrl    AttackLeft Alt    UseE    Take C    Open backpackQ    View statusZ    Light L   Possible after obtaining    Compass H    MAPM

title: Lasersplinter
logline: a Puzzle Game about Lasers
description: Employee 34F12B just needs to do his Job at  LaserFun Inc but apparently he is too good for it Somehow his Monitor got broken and thus his objective got much harder because his screen is KAPUTT   Controls   LEFT Mouseclick  drag Objects   RIGT Mouseclick  rotate Objects   To pause the Game press SPACE   Hint You can rotate more precicely if you move the mouse away while rotating   Information   Lasersplinter was made in one Week for the  PULS GAME  Jam with the theme Kaputt by  gabl18  and  sir_lordmike  You can also check out our  Pygame Gamejam  Game  The Perfect Drink  D   This was our first complete Godot Game It consists of 8 Levels and implementing Sounds and Music gave us a hedache   Thanks for playing hope you have fun     Third Party Credits   Music  musicloopbundle   Sketchbook 20240703  by  Abstraction   Sound Effects  pixabay  and  8bitsfxpack  more detailed in the ingame Credits   Font   Montjuic  by  Rugi

title: Power Shapes
logline: Blast through 3 levels in this shapeshifting neon 2d shooter
description: Blast through 3 levels in this shapeshifting neon 2d shooter   Change between three different shapes to blast through enemies to try and get a high score 8 different colors can be used as well   Feel free to post your high score in the comments Id love to see them

title: Reverend
logline: You found shelter in an old church overseen by a strange man Reverend Jagger
description: About   A short horror game I made for a PS1 game jam in just over a week where you a fugitive on the run find shelter in an old church Reverend Jim Jagger takes you in asking only for a bit of help around the place in return But as you go about your tasks something about the place feels off just like this sentence    Controls   Movement   W A S D   Interaction   E   Attack   LMB   Objectives TAB   More Information   Estimated playtime 1015 minutes I would really appreciate it if you could share your playtime in the comments     Contact mail vukkdobricgmailcom   Feel free to reach out in the comment section here by email or on YouTube Im active in all of those places     Since the game was made in a very short amount of time there may be some bugs I would appreciate it if you could write down any issues you encounter in the comments     Thanks for checking out my game     Added a downloadable version without dithering this is probably a better option if you plan on streaming or making a video since YouTubes compression tends to destroy the visuals Or if you simply dont like the dithering Thanks for your time

title: squimplus sanctuary
logline: a sandbox game where you make small animals and they fight
description: this is the game i made for the jame gam 2025 in this game you can print these creature called squimplus in a map where they fight between colors and evolve the stats you can modify are strenght  how much damage the squimplus does speed  how fast the squimplus roam around perception  how far the squimplus can spot an enemy precision  how likely it is for the creature to actually deal damage stealth  a damage boost if the squimpus spotted the enemy before range  how far the squimpus can deal damage mating  the range in wich the squimplus can detect a partner opportunism  the range the squimplus can hear an enemy fighting health  the health ammount lively  the time before the squimplus dies of old age they reproduce and evolve after a squimplus killed an enemy they can mate with another squimplus of the same color and the offspring will have the statistics of the parent plus a mutation that buff a parameter and nerf another have fun the game is a pure sandbox spawn a lot of them do something stupid have fun credits the assets for the map trees and bushes are from  httpselegantcrowitchio

title: Card Chaos
logline: Multiplayer Strategic Card Game
description: Card Chaos is a multiplayer strategic card game where 2 players fight with their selection of cards to see who comes out on top     Heres a description of the mechanics as this version is an early release and things arent explained very well in the game     Important Stuff       Health   You have 100 health Run out of it and its game over     Ability Points  AP    Each card costs 1 AP to use You can use as many cards as ability points     Hand   At the start of the game your deck is randomly shuffled Your hand is composed of the first 3 cards from the shuffled deck These are the 3 cards you can play   At the end of your turn your empty slots are filled with cards from the rest of your deck It will not pull from the deck if there are no cards to pull     Pass   Passing will end your turn and grant 1 AP     Shuffling   Randomly shuffles your deck Brings your card count back to 12   does not grant AP   Status Effects       Burn   Deals 25 damage to afflicted user after every turn   Also removes 1 stack of burn after afflicted users turn     Drowsy   Afflicted users attacking cards  impact bloodsiphon  will cost double AP   Removes 1 stack of drowsy after afflicted users turn   Cards       Wildfire   100 Accuracy   Magic Type   Applies 23 stacks of burn to your opponent     Nightmare   80 Accuracy   Magic Type   Applies 13 stacks of drowsy to your opponent     Blood Siphon   100 Accuracy   Sharp Type   Deals 610 damage to your opponent heals half of the damage it deals rounded down     Impact   100 Accuracy   Blunt Type   Deals 1015 damage to your opponent     Sharp Block   80 Accuracy   Protection Type   Stops your opponent from using Sharp Type cards on their next turn     Blunt Block   80 Accuracy   Protection Type   Stops your opponent from using Blunt Type cards on their next turn     Magic Block   80 Accuracy   Protection Type   Stops your opponent from using Magic Type cards on their next turn     Guard Break   80 Accuracy   Protection Type   Stops your opponent from using Protection Type cards on their next turn    Mush 3

title: Blade Wielder VR
logline: Temper is a weapon that we hold by the blade
description: Want to possess a great amount of power Look no further     Overview    You are a mysterious assassin who has been tasked to enter an old abandoned weapons facility to locate a secret weapon that has been long forgotten Once this weapon has been obtained it will grant the user unimaginable power and will allow them to destroy anything in their path      What are the Main Gimmicks    In this game your main protection is your blade the weapon you were tasked to locate With this weapon you will be able to slice anything that stands in your way   When you enter the facility you will need to defend yourself against the buildings security turrets Make sure to dodge and slice projectiles and show those turrets whos boss      There will also be certain boxes laid out throughout the facility that can be used as shields against your enemies By blocking enemy attacks with these shields you will have a better chance of defeating them without damaging yourself      Controls     Use the motion controls to swing your blade to hit enemies     Credits   Game By  Liam Sidaway   Level Design By  Liam Sidaway   Music By  Oliver Sidaway   SFX Used From Pixabay     Scan the QR Code to access the questionnaire for the game

title: Beyond Thy Sphere
logline: What the heavens might sound like from beneath Europan ice
description: An exploration of the motion of the Galilean moons using an orrery to simulate the relative positions of the moons from Europa This game uses Sacred Harp music a middle American singing tradition to position us within that celestial motion   Music is The Last Words Of Copernicus by Sarah Lancasterwith words by Philip Doddridge performed by Bradley Estacio and Wellington Owen

title: Play Things
logline: Investigate haunted dolls in a bizarre facility where you may or may not be alone
description: Play Things v11   In this game youll be investigating a collection of dolls Some ordinary others hiding a dark curse Through a series of tests you must determine which dolls are merely toys and which conceal something sinister     However not everything is as it seems     WARNING   This game includes slight jumpscares suicide sexual abuse murder domestic abuse blood and flashing lights   Average Play Time 1 hour for one ending     HOW TO PLAY   Start by ringing the bell After doing so youll receive a doll and a test sheet There are 5 tests you MUST do with each doll Audio Test Name Call Test Photograph Capture Test Temperature Test and Physical Discomfort Test After completing a test you can mark its result in the test sheet After finishing all tests youll determine if the doll is Ok or Dangerous   Credits   Created by ReynTheStrange Released by Burning Eye Voice Acting ReynTheStrange Viktorie  rajberov Testing and support  Histmy  Dobytrna  cesky_vaclav   Pablo   Nickion   Thank you so much for taking an interest in our game I hope youll enjoy   All music in the game is original  Play Things OST  YouTube   Special thanks to the Unreal Engine community

title: SiNe Wave
logline: VR GameJam 2024
description: Welcome to SiNe Wave     In a world dominated by machines youre here to prove that humans still have a place As a rebellious courier your mission is to deliver packages in a city controlled by AI     Get a job  At the Main Tower in the heart of the map get a delivery to be done      Deliver packages  Go to the designated building as shown on your screen and deliver your box      Avoid turrets  If your package gets hit youll fail the job and need to retrieve a new package from the Main Tower      Keep up your combo  Avoid collisions with buildings and your wave to increase your combo meter and earn extra bonus points      VR Controls Tether  Trigger Reel In  Grip Jump  Right Pad Move  Left Pad Equip Crate  Grip   when tether is not active Launch Crate  Trigger   when crate is equipped   Keyboard Controls Tether  Left Mouse Button Reel In  F Jump  Space Move  WASD Launch Crate  Right Mouse Button

title: Shrink Rooms
logline: Run The rooms are shrinking A boxpushing escape game
description: This is the Shrink Rooms demo Players can try out typical early  game level puzzles and embark on an intense puzzle  solving escape journey fully engaging their brainpower   Unique Demo Version   The demo version will open more than 30 levels of game content   In the demo players can experience the main puzzles of the first chapter of the game and the representative levels of subsequent chapters   New Level Mechanism   New level mechanisms such as Slime and Portal will appear   Advanced Puzzles Rack Your Brains   Are you still not satisfied with the basic puzzles Lets increase the difficulty level for you       The basic gameplay of Shrink Rooms is to solve puzzles by pushing boxes  Different from other puzzle games the walls of the levels room will contract inward at the end of each round You must accurately plan the number of steps for pushing boxes to escape from the secret room so as to avoid being crushed into a puddle of flesh by the walls       There are various interesting mechanisms in the shrink rooms The characteristics of different mechanisms are combined to generate many puzzles with rich variations and high difficulty Welcome to challenge       You can move freely in the selection scene You can choose easier puzzles to continue the game or try to solve all difficult puzzles   At the same time in addition to solving puzzles you can also explore and collect virtual exhibits and find hidden levels in the scene to explore different fun       200 levels   5 themed chapters   X  exhibits with unique drawings and descriptions     Wishlist on Steam   Shrink Rooms on Steam

title: HoloAttack
logline: A fastpaced combostacking Hololive fan game
description: Descriptions   HoloAttack is a fastpaced combostacking game where you demolish landmarks and buildings using unique skills on each characters Play as the  Hololive EN Myth  members Gura Ame Ina Kiara and Calli as you chain combos to achieve your goal The game features a variety of destructible buildings that add strategic depth to the gameplay   Stay tuned for updates as development progresses     Characters         This version of  HoloAttack  features all five  Hololive EN Myth  members    Gawr Gura Dino ver  Amelia Watson  Ninomae InaNis  Mori Calliope  Takanashi Kiara    There is a possibility of expanding the members in the future if development     Gameplay         In HoloAttack players begin by selecting a character each with their own unique skills and abilities The core objective is to stack combos by progressively destroying buildings starting from the smallest structures and working up to the largest landmark         Throughout the game youll encounter a variety of  special buildings  that provide helpful effects These can  buff your character  enhance your destruction power or even  trigger chain reactions  that help demolish other buildings more efficiently       This game also has a  debuff  system that you need to manage including     Slower movement speed  making it harder to manoeuvre   Reduced attack speed  affecting your combo potential   And more   More Gameplay Previews             Game Modes         HoloAttack offers two distinct game modes catering to different playstyles   Time Attack Mode    Race against the timelimits Players must  destroy buildings as quickly as possible  within a time limit stacking combos efficiently to achieve the highest score before time runs out Timeless Mode    A more relaxed experience where players can  practice experiment and enjoy the environment  without any time restrictions Take your time to master combos and explore different strategies at your own pace   System Requirements   Minimum   OS  Windows 10 64bit  Linux via Proton or Wine Steam Deck compatible   CPU  AMD Ryzen 3 1300X or Intel Core i38100   RAM  8 GB   Storage  1 GB HDD   Graphics  NVIDIA GTX 950 Radeon 660M or Steam Deck APU 2GB VRAM or better   Performance  Lowest 60 FPS 720p Graphics API  DirectX11     Recommended   OS  Windows 11 64bit  Linux via Proton or Wine Steam Deck compatible   CPU  AMD Ryzen 5 3600 or Intel Core i511400F   RAM  16 GB   Storage  1 GB SSD NVMe 30 or faster recommended   Graphics  NVIDIA RTX 4060 or Radeon RX 7600XT 8GB VRAM or better   Performance  60 FPS at 1080p STP or DLSS4 Quality with RayTraced Global Illumination Shadows Ambient Occlusion and Reflections on Medium settings   Graphics API  DirectX12 Ultimate DXR   Latest Patch Notes   v026140320251553     UIUX     Minor UIUX navigation fixes   Fixed an issue where the pause menu animation would not play under certain conditions     Gameplay     Most balance changes focus on reducing excessive movement speed in the late game     Threat Level Adjustments  Level 2   Movement Speed MSPD 5  10   Attack Speed ASPD  10   Level 3   Movement Speed MSPD 10  125   Attack Speed ASPD 10  15   Level 4   Movement Speed MSPD 20  15   Attack Speed ASPD 15  20   Level 5   Movement Speed MSPD 35  20   Attack Speed ASPD 20  25   Level 6   Movement Speed MSPD 50   25   Level 7   Movement Speed MSPD 75  35   Level 8  Movement Speed MSPD 100  50   Level 9  Movement Speed MSPD 125  75   Level 10  Movement Speed MSPD 150  100   Special Building Buff Adjustments Burger Restaurant  Buff duration reduced 15s  75s   Donut Restaurant  Buff duration reduced 15s  75s   Ice Cream Restaurant  Movement Speed MSPD multiplier adjusted 125x  115x   Buff duration reduced 15s  75s   KFP Restaurant  Movement Speed MSPD multiplier adjusted 125x  115x   Buff duration reduced 15s  5s     Graphics  Performance     Fixed a regression where water foam was not rendering in DirectX11   Removed occlusion culling due to rendering issues in certain scenarios A new occlusion culling solution is needed as most objects in the game are dynamic expect lower performance on current build     Characters     Gura Dino   Ability Movement Speed MSPD buff reduced 15x  115x   Ame   Ability attack speed buff duration reduced 3s  23s   Speedup ability DoT interval reduced 025s  015s   Ina  Speedup ability DoT interval reduced 05s  025s   Kiara  Stomp hitbox range increased 40   Ability hitbox range increased 60   All patch notes versions are always updated at this link    Patch Notes   DevNotes   Subsurface scattering ray tracing is still experimental and may not work as expected Ray tracing is not recommended due to high performance costs but it can enhance lighting quality This is a fan project that is still in development Donations are welcome but not required any contributions will go directly towards development If youd like to help by creating SFX music or other assets feel free to contact me Development will continue based on project interest and availability Updates depend on community engagement and whether I have sufficient free time to dedicate to further improvements

title: Ages of Conflict World War Simulator
logline: Create a massive FreeForAll across multiple maps with Randomization Statistics and History tracking
description: Ages of Conflict is a versatile Map Simulation game   Spawn and observe AI nations battle it out across an infinite number of worlds Command nations to nudge the world events into your liking       Full Version   50 Updates worth of new stuff   Larger maps Premade Scenarios Robust Scenario Creator Highly effective God Mode ability to disable AI more terrain types economy and much more       AI Simulation   In this game you observe custom created AI nations battle it out and ultimately try to control the world in a massive freeforall including alliances revolts and all kinds of political twists   Map Variety   The game comes with multiple premade maps and scenarios Create your own scenarios and maps in the robust editor You can also  use maps and scenarios made by others   God Mode   You can affect the world by changing the names of nations force them to battle peace ally or simply collapse with a click of a button

captured land will be shared equally between all of the nations of that alliance 2 Nation traits Like the ideology idea of MewsterGames This will be like the nature of the nations for example Aggresive Peaceful Rich Powerful etc So you can make the nations more unique 3 Tecnologies A tecnology tree that you can see when you see a nations info Nations will be researching more and more over time and some tecnologies only unclock when the world reachs a certain age or era You can also add this for example Stone Age Bronze Age Medieval Age etc It will be cool to have distinct brands on the tech tree and that nations develop their own style for example Army and Economy Colonization and Politics Relationships and Army etc 4 Army raids This could add more use to the Armies tabs basically its that the armies move around the map in big groups It can be sea or land also sea ones could transport land armies and fight each other 5 Distinct types of war There could be different types of roles in wars for example One nation declares war to another that nation is in the role of Attack while the other depending on their traits and the situation could be Defense and hold still until peace or be Fight Back and try to fight back the enemies while conquering their land 6 Recources Not only land resources can make the difference in a war Things like gold food or soldiers will do 7 Trade NationsAlliances can make trade routes and trade resources with other nationsalliances 8 Cities Besides of the capital and the forts this ones would be strategic points for nations and alliances speeds Maybe you could make that colonization speed depends on size resources and tecnologies of a nation 12 World peace Wars cannot occur just because you need to justify that with something it could title: Project BrainForge
description: BrainForge The Logic Maze is an educational platformer game that aims to combine engaging gameplay with meaningful learning by challenging players to solve math problems as they navigate through mazes filled with obstacles and enemies BrainForge seeks to improve logical reasoning and problemsolving skills in a fun and interactive way

title: BRIDGE TO NOWHERE
logline: Can you cross this bridge
description: Imagine standing on the edge Before you lies an endless bridge stretching into the distant haze Its broken its planks creaking under the weight of time and weather or perhaps because of someoneor somethingelse Yet you take a step forward Because beyond this bridge lies something greater than just an end or a beginning   Youre about to face a trial where every step is a balance between risk and calculation Gather resources repair the shattered sections and carve your path forward But beware the bridge shows no mercy Falling panels vanishing platforms and endlessly shifting sections make each journey unpredictable and unique   Will you conquer infinity Or will you become another victim of this mysterious bridge Time will tell Just remember one thingnever stop Because stopping means falling

title: Necropolis
description: Hi this was a game jam i completed solo in 3 days The theme was build it and they will come   needless to say its not the most polished and Im going to need to explain some things as there is no tutorial   1to build structures click on the hammer on the top left and enter build mode   2building houses will increase your max population   3once a mine or barrack is built you need to assign workers to it in order to produce  materialsincrease your military score   4upgrading workstations like the mines and barracks just increases their worker capacity   5The final goal is to upgrade your central tower until it reaches the top of the screen  This will also create more spaces to build on   6After a certain point there are no more events and youll get the same message over and over again   7Trying to start a new game will  of course break the whole thing so you can just altf4 at that point

title: Drinkemist
logline: Its time to show your bartending skills
description: The Challenge   Can you make not unstable LEMONBERRY without adding those annoying solid particles in your glass  If you succeeded share an image   Drinkemist   In drinkemist you will have to pour drinks for your costumers and you will gain point based on how good you followed the instruction and how clean you were when making the drink   How To Play   Click on the 4 buttons yellow  beer red  strawberry lime  lemon light bue  water to pour the liquid in the glass then try different ones and the magic will occur   During free time you can make whatever you want and you can try all kind of combinations   When a customer wants a drink you have 60 seconds to make a drink theyll like Click serve if youre ok with what youve done or retry if you want to start from a clean glass   If you click serve during free time you will skip the free time     Trijam info   This game was made in under 3 hours   What was already done before    part of  the beer cell fluid simulation   What I didnt do myself    music    httpsfreesoundorgpeopleTiagoThanossounds571236    pour sfx   httpsfreesoundorgpeoplecraigglendaysounds517176

title: onewaystreet
logline: One hand on the wheel one hand on the phone Which hand will burn first
description: One Way Street english version   Play the original here  httpsestradelitchioonewaystreet   One hand on the wheel one hand on the phone Which hand will burn first  A short story putting  you  in the drivers seat     For an optimal experience this game is recommended to be played locally See below for download links     Backstory   You play as the Driver       Your favorite activity driving       You are minding your business enjoying the open lane when you hear that familiar ping You received a text message       You know you shouldnt look but what if its important       Will you get to the bottom of this text exchange Will you crash and burn victim of your own hubris     Anyway you should never split your attention while driving   There are 4 alternative endings Only one is winning Will you be able to find it      Controls   Steer car using  A  D keys   Interact with phone using  left mouse click     One Way Street features multiple endings Can you find them all     This game was made in 42h for the  UPSI JAM 50      Credits   Nicoblabla  Lead Developer     Estradel  UI VFX development     Ichs2r  Visual design environment design     LamaHD  Audio design artistic direction     Melina dialogue       Assets used   All assets visuals sounds and music were created by us during this Game JAM

logline: Shadows will be your best allies
description: PlayStation Talents Awards 2022 finalists          A thirdperson adventure game with riddles puzzles and melee combat  where you must focus all your attention on controlling your own  character and the environment         Using the ability shadow immersion you will be able to move through  places where you would not be able to in a corporeal form climb walls  and ceilings avoid enemies move in a more agile way against bosses  etc           Light has always symbolised peace and tranquillity knowing what is  around us makes us feel comfortable and safe  The concept of the game  tries to invert this fact so that darkness becomes this symbol where the  player feels really safe           Search for the members of your tribe decipher the luminescent  paintings discover the hidden clues and solve the puzzles to find out  what happened         Remember          Shadows will be your best allies  dive into them to discover the TRUTH

title: Split The Gazon Simulator
logline: Become the best lawn splitter
description: SPLIT THE GAZON SIMULATOR   The most faithful grass mowing simulator available in the Jam   John Landmower   HOW TO PLAY   The mower always moves forward automatically You can turn it using A and D keys You need to mow the biggest surface in a limited time represented by your fuel gauge  Your score will be saved in a global leaderboard accessible by everyone    Dont go in the water the mower wont like it and you will lose the game    OBSTACLES   There is multiple different obstacles    Ballon and deck chair     Beware of the ballon and the deck chair  They will stun you and decrease your fuel gauge   Sandbox       The sandbox slows you down    THEME JUSTIFICATION   For the theme split we made a lawn mower simulator called Split the Gazon Simulator  gazon means lawn in French The idea is simple youre mowing the grass and each blade or plant you cut gets split Its a 2D game where you have limited time to mow as much grass as possible trying to achieve the highest score Splitting grass blades connects directly to our theme Good luck mowing   ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS   All sprites are created by itchibli and Utorque   Main font    Title font   UI Elements   Landmower sounds   Music by jayster

title: Acute Coronary Syndrome Escape Room
logline: Escape room game to review Acute Coronary Syndrome knowledge
description: Escape the ER An ACS Crash Cart Challenge     Can you restock the crash cart before its too late     Escape the ER  is an interactive  escape roomstyle game  designed to teach  acute coronary syndrome ACS management  in a fun and engaging way Learners must solve  14 pharmacybased puzzles  to unlock and restock critical  STEMI medications all while racing against time in a highstakes emergency setting        Game Features     14 puzzles  covering realworld  ACS treatment protocols    Escape room mechanics   solve puzzles to unlock new areas    RenPypowered gameplay   interactive  item manipulation inventory movement image transformations  and  sequencebased problemsolving    Gamified learning   learn  aspirin dosing fibrinolytics timing HIT management and more  while having fun        How to Play    Click and interact with objects in the  ER setting   Solve  clinical puzzles  to find missing medications   Unlock the  crash cart  step by step   Complete the game by restoring all essential  ACS treatments       Play Now     Play in Browser   Recommended for easy access    Download for WindowsMacLinux   For offline play       GitHub Repository   httpsgithubcomHydroCodyAcuteCoronarySyndromeGame   Opensource code for developers  educators        Who Should Play     Pharmacy students  residents   Reinforce ACS treatment in a unique way    Educators  preceptors   Use this as a teaching tool in  active learning sessions    Escape room  puzzle fans   Enjoy a  medical twist  on classic escape room mechanics    Developers   Explore how  RenPy  can be used for creating educational content to leverage asynchronous learning     This game was created to explore the possibilities of RenPy in education  Feedback is welcomelets keep innovating in  pharmacy education     PharmacyEducation EscapeRoom SeriousGames Gamification RenPy MedEd STEMI CriticalCare Python GameBasedLearning      This version is  engaging informative and optimized for visibility  on Itchio Let me know if youd like any adjustments

title: Cardcrifice
logline: Sacrifica tus cartas para contentar a la deidad retorcida del culto
description: Como lder de un  culto  tendrs que jugar bien tus  cartas  realizando  sacrificios  diarios a la deidad retorcida que planea destruir el mundo en 7 das para reiniciar el  ciclo  Alcanza los  sacrificios  requeridos  por esta entidad sobrenatural antes del  Da del Juicio Final  para evitar la obliteracin y romper  el ciclo    O no    Juego creado para  Mermelada Jam 4  con el tema Cclico y el ingrediente Nunca es suficiente   Mecnicas Bsicas   Puedes sacrificar cartas gastando puntos de Autoridad las monedas segn su coste   Las cartas que no sacrifiques se descartan e irn a la pila de descartes   Al final del turno recibes 1 punto de Autoridad por cada carta descartada Cuando el mazo se agota se  recicla  la pila de descartes convirtindose en tu nuevo mazo   CICLAR  el mazo otorga un bonus de 3 puntos de Autoridad   Efectos de las Cartas          El Mrtir    Cadenas de martirio  Sacrificarla permite sacrificar  1 carta adicional sin coste  en el prximo turno siempre que sea  El Campesino  o  El Mrtir                       El Hereje    Cisma herejtico  Cada vez que es  descartada  resta  1 punto de autoridad  en el prximo turno                      La Profetisa    Revelacin proftica  Al  sacrificarla  reduce en  1 el coste de 3 cartas aleatorias  en la prxima mano                      El Apstata     Blasfemia fatal  Mientras est  en tu mano  aumenta en  1 el coste de todas las dems cartas                     La Clarividente    Clarividencia final  Al  sacrificarla  permite  robar 1 carta adicional  en el prximo turno                      La Peregrina    Camino incierto  Al  descartarla   regresa al mazo  en lugar de ir a la pila de descartes                    El Cordero    Sustitucin ritual   Sacrificarla  otorga  2 puntos de autoridad  en el prximo turno pero  no otorga puntos de sacrificio                     El Campesino   No tiene efectos especiales               Busca un equilibrio entre sacrificar y descartar cartas para obtener autoridad a la vez que planificas la prioridad de cada sacrificio para sacar el mximo provecho de los efectos especiales de las cartas      Equipo   Sastre de Desastre   Juanje  Game Design Music Sound Design Pistacho Cerrao Game Developer Camanance Art   RageWolf Programming PinoMatutino Art    Advertencia  Nos quedamos cortos de tiempo y algunos aspectos de las mecnicas y el arte no pudimos implementarlos como planabamos Cuando sea posible intentaremos subir una versin mejorcita

title: Unholy Temptation demo
logline: Ghost themed visual novel
description: Available in  Spanish and English Step into the shoes of a newly arrived Sibling of Sin at the Ministry Are you ready to meet the various characters who inhabit this place   Well maybe not just yet because this is only a demo But this first taste will help you get a glimpse of what awaits you in the full game For now heres what you can expect in the demo       15 minutes of gameplay   Set in Era III Meliora   Meet the main characters and maybe a few others   This demo covers the prologue of this little story the first of five days It wont give you much time to explore but even on the first day you should be careful with your choices      But come on no need to worry about that just yet Its only the first day No one cares about the possible 12 endings right   A game made by and for fans of the band Ghost For suggestions contributions etc wed love to hear from you    This is our first game ever please be kind         Encarna a un nuevo Hermano del Pecado que recin llega al Ministerio Ests preparado para conocer a los diferentes personajes que habitan este lugar   Quizs an no porque solo es una demo Pero esta toma de contacto te ayudar a saber lo que te espera en el juego completo Por ahora esto es lo que te espera en la demo    15 min de gameplay    Situado en la era III Meliora    Conoce a los principales personajes y quizs algn otro   Esta demo abarca el prlogo de esta pequea historia el primero de los 5 das No te dar para mucho esta vez pero an siendo el primer da debers tener cuidado con tus decisiones   Pero qu poronga ya te dar tiempo a preocuparte por esto Es solo el primer da a nadie le importan los posibles 12 finales cierto   Juego hecho por y para fans de la banda Ghost Para sugerencias contribuciones etc  estaremos encantados de leeros    Es nuestro primersimo juego sed gentiles

title: SurvivalGameConcept
logline: This is a mediumhigh level Prototype of a Unreal Engine v5 Survival Game done mainly in C C  C
description: Survival Game Concept   The source code is here  httpsgithubcomJustinBytesCodeSurvivalGameConcept       Intro     This is a mediumhigh level Prototype of a Unreal Engine v5 Game done mainly in CC  C In this protoype its a proof of concept of the basic mechanics of a survival game It includes Eating Harvesting trees Mining Rocks Other creatures Health Stamina Hunger Inventory system  A building system with even more to discover The level uses Unreal Engine v5 landscaping tools to create a simple level that could be added upon if wanted too     Gameplay Implemented     Most of the game was done completely in some form of C or C or C Here is the mechanics done in these     Player Camera   Player Movement   Building Mechanics   Item Rotating   Tree resources   Rock resources   Berry resource   Objectives   Player Inventory   Player Jumping     I also used some blue prints to handle the simpler things in the engine for instance these     Huds   Player Stats   GUI     Controls     Player Controls     W Forward   A Walk left   S Walk Backwards   D Walk Right   Space Jump   Mouse Camera   Left Click Interact Button     Menu     F Invenotry Menu   F Exit Invenotry Menu     Building     E  Rotate Building 90 degrees   Left Click Place Building   Mouse Change location of building     How To Play     The game is currently in a sandbox state Where your Objectives are displayed on the top right of the screen to give you direction Your Main goal is to build a small house using 5 pieces As well as collect 500 materials before your hunger goes down to 0 and you lose all your health     The main gameplay loop will be harvest resources Enter your Inventory Menu and eat the berries collected or create buildings you can later place     How It Can Be Exapanded     The game could easily be woven into any Survival game as the ground work is already laid out and requires minimal effort to create new resources Here however are some things you could do to expand the game     Replacing Programmer Art   This allows for the game to look more polished   Create more building types   This gives the player more insentive to find other materials   Adding Enemies   Adding a way for a player to lose health aside from eating will be perfect to go along with the fact as eating allows the player to gain health     Frequently Asked Questions     Q How do I Collect resources A Walk close to the item to where its most of your screen then press the Ineteract Button     Q Why Post this open source A I believe a good programmer should have code anyone can understand if they look at the source With this project I wanted other to look at the code I created as it is neat and completely commented for easy documentation I also wanted to demostrate that this game was mainly done using only C coding lanuages Youre also free to take this code and create anything you want with it Id appreciate credit but you dont have too    Q What do the other people do A Nothing as of currently They are a proof of concept of animals that could be running around as the player collects resources as well as other surivalist     Q I cant interact with Menus when I press F A This is by design I wanted to create a menu system like runescape where you can walk and glance into your inventory while walking Left click when bringing it up and it will lock your cursor onto that window

title: Grannys Garden
logline: Peaceful Gardening Simulator with almost no maneating plants
description: Welcome to Grannys Garden     Granny has a beautiful conservatory where she tends to her plants  Accompany her on her journey by growing plant life together as it brings great joy Now with almost no flesheating Flora   Dont worry about Grandpas old shotgun I doubt youd need it here   Created by myself for the Indie Dev Game Jam6 March 2025   This game was inspired by old classics like Resident Evil and a multitude of gardening sliceoflife simulators   This effort took me about 18 hours of development to create  It is designed to have very simple controls and contextual interactions   It was developed for gamepad support but a keyboard can be used just as easy   Analogue stick or WASD  Move   Space or A on gamepad  Action   ESC or Special Left Select on gamepad  Quit game   Thank you so much for playing and I hope you enjoy   Tested on   Xbox One controller Intel I5AMD 5600 and Nvidia 1060 and 3060 respectively

title: Block Merge
description: Block Merge is a simple yet addictive puzzle game with a unique merging mechanic Blocks fall from the top of the screen and your goal is to shift them left or right to combine identical blocks and create larger values Blocks merge smoothly doubling their number with each successful combination   The game challenges your strategic thinking as new numbers unlock gradually making each move important Be carefulif the blocks reach the top the game is over   With intuitive swipe controls and a clean lowpoly design Block Merge offers an enjoyable and relaxing gameplay experience for all ages Can you reach the highest value

title: Lunar
description: Lunar  Game Rules   Overview   In Lunar Colonization you  command an alien fleet tasked with the colonization of the Moon Your  mission is to clear difficult lunar regionsobstructed by rugged  terrainusing your scouts Once cleared these regions transform into  Lunar Beacons that serve as strategic waypoints for further exploration  Ultimately you build fullfledged lunar colonies by assembling  complete suit sequences Every card in your deck represents a part of  your invading fleet and each move brings you closer to establishing a  dominant alien presence on the Moon        Setup     Alien Fleet Deck   A standard deck of 52 cards is shuffled This deck represents your alien fleet       Columns Scouting Areas   Four columns are created each representing a lunar region that must be scouted and cleared   Each column is set up as follows   Region Card  Drawn from the deck placed face up at the top of the column This card marks a specific lunar area that requires clearance   Terrain Cards  Three cards are drawn next and placed face down These represent the difficult lunar terrain that must be overcome   Scout Card  One final card is drawn and placed face  up at the bottom of the column This card is your initial scout unit  ready to explore the region         Discard Pile   Starts empty Cards drawn from the fleet are placed here face up       Colony Piles Lunar Colonies   Four foundation piles where you will build colonies They must be built by suit in ascending orderfrom Ace to King       Objective   Your goal is to complete all  four colony piles by transferring cards from the alien fleet and the  scouting columns according to specific movement rules When each colony  pile has 13 cards from Ace through King you win the game        Gameplay Mechanics   1 Drawing from the Alien Fleet     Drawing a Card    Click the deck alien fleet to draw the top card This card is turned face up and placed in the discard pile        Recycling the Fleet    If the fleet runs out of cards a doubleclick on the deck will recycle  the discard pile back into the deck all cards are turned face down in  the process        2 Scouting and Clearing Regions     Region Cards  Terrain   Region Cards  Represent specific lunar areas that require clearance   Terrain Cards  Placed over the region card in each column these represent the difficult terrain that must be cleared       Flipping Terrain Cards    When no playable scout remains in a column the next terrain card  currently face down is flipped to reveal additional scouting  resources Only when all terrain cards in a column are cleared is the  region card unlocked and transformed into a Lunar Beacon        Scouts    Only faceup cards other than locked region cards can be moved Scouts  are used to explore and clear the terrain and can be moved either  individually or as part of a substack that follows the proper sequence        3 Moving Cards Between Columns Scouting Moves     Building Substacks    Cards in a column may be moved together as a substack if they form a  descending sequence in alternating colors This represents your scouts  moving in formation to clear obstacles        Restrictions on Region Cards    A region card is locked in place as long as there is unrevealed  facedown terrain Only once all the terrain is cleared flipped face  up and moved can the region card be shifted When the final Terrain  card is moved the cleared region becomes a Lunar Beacon        DoubleClick Moves    A doubleclick on a card automatically attempts to send that card to a colony if the move follows the rules for quick play        4 Building Lunar Colonies   Colony Piles    These foundation piles are built by suit in ascending order  Starting a Colony  The first card must be an Ace   Subsequent Cards  A card can be added if it is of the same suit as the top card and exactly one rank higher     Objective    Complete all four colonies each must have 13 cards to win the game     5 Additional Controls     Back Button    A blue BACK button allows you to return the top card of the discard pile to the fleet if you need to change your move        Reset Button    Clicking the RESET button restarts the game reshuffling your alien fleet and redealing the scouting columns        Winning the Game   You win Lunar Colonization when  all four colony piles are completeeach colony must have exactly 13  cards built in order from Ace to King        Strategic Tips     Plan Ahead    Consider your moves carefully especially when moving substacks between  columns A misstep might block a potential clearing of a region        Clear Terrain Promptly    Flipping and clearing the difficult terrain facedown cards is key to  unlocking your region cards and turning them into Lunar Beacons        Efficient Fleet Management    Use your discard pile and the back button wisely to cycle through your  alien fleet ensuring you have the right cards available when needed        Quick Moves    Use the doubleclick feature to quickly move cards to your colonies when  the conditions are metthis can save valuable time and prevent clutter  in your scouting areas        Thematic Interpretation     Alien Fleet    Every card in your deck symbolizes a spacecraft or unit from your  invading alien fleet Managing this fleet effectively is crucial to your  success        Regions  Lunar Beacons    The region cards represent untamed areas on the Moon Your scouts must  clear away the rugged uncharted terrain so these regions can be  converted into strategic Lunar Beaconsguiding posts that enable further  colonization        Lunar Colonies    The final destination of your operations Once a region is cleared and  transformed you build a colony there securing your alien foothold on  the Moon

title: Legend of Sky Wizards 3D
logline: Obstacle course game where you save baby chest monsters and collect coins
description: A short obstacleadventure game made in Unreal Engine 54 for a college project     In this  lowpoly cartoonstyle platformer  youll explore a floating island map while collecting  baby chest monsters  and  coins  Along the way youll need to avoid hazards like  spike traps  and  spinning cabers  that move up and down Frequent  checkpoints  keep the challenge fair so mistakes wont set you back too much      Features     Platforming and exploration   Jump across floating platforms and avoid traps    Collectibles   Gather  coins  to unlock an alternative ending and track progress    Rescue baby chest monsters   They react to your presence hide when youre far speak when collected and return to the  spawn island  where they celebrate when youre nearby    Dynamic soundtrack   A selection of  11 songs  randomly chosen as you play    Short but fun   The game can be  100 completed in around 15 minutes  but firsttime players may take closer to  30 minutes     No pressure gameplay   No time limits or leaderboards but players can track their own progress   Bugs  Issues   Settings Menu   This was a plugin I paid for and shoved in poorly so not all features specifically audio settings work End Game   When you end the game the UI hides to fast to note time Controls   WASD   Walking Space   Jump  Skip into Mouse   Control camera Tab   Menu     This game was developed as part of a college project using  Unreal Engine 54       Download and give it a try

title: Waiting for disaster
logline: A game about skill where one waiter has a quite difficult work day
description: A waiters job is never easy Handling and managing a tray is a delicate act of balance   Your job is it to transport a carafe to the waiting guests without breaking it or your legs But be careful Not all guests are patient and will throw objects at you to hinder you at your job   Earn a lot of money by being the best at your job and compete with other waiters all around the world for the biggest paycheck   This game was made within 48 hours for Puls Game Jam 2025   Known Issues   In some occasions the players hand are being teleported outside of the map We did not have enough time to fix this bug before submissions closed Sometimes if you push the carafe from below while carrying an object on the tablet itself the carafe can fly out of the playable area If it is not destroyed a new carafe is not spawning softlocking the player    Controls   Waiter   Keyboard AD    Controller left stick Mouse LeftRight Button  Mouse need to be enabled in menu   Hand with tray   Keyboard all Arrow Keys Controller  right stick   Mouse moving  Mouse need to be enabled in menu   You can open the pause menu with Tab or Escape   Credits   Aliviessa   Development    Gorgorax  Pixel Art Matse007  Development   All  Game Design    Used Assets   Sound Effects by freesound_community from Pixabay   boxingbell1wav boxingbell2wav boxingbell3wav karaffe_succes_soundmp3   Other Sounds Effects created with  jsfxr generator     Music by Lesiakower from Pixabay     epicbattle153400mp3

title: Epic Rhythm Game Heaven  Hell Edition
description: Welcome to  Epic Rhythm Game Heaven  Hell Edition  This is a rhythm game where you will press arrow keys  UP   DOWN   LEFT  and  RIGHT  to score points and bring your little ghost friend to heaven The more you successfully score the more combos youll achieve   The game is  neverending  so try your best to  score the highest points possible  before missing 15 notes Press the  ESC  key if you would like to pause the game or return to the Main Menu Created by Puyo Puyo Karena Wing Yan Lau Wooseong Aiden Chang  Skyler Wormac

title: FuzzyFarms
description: Intro     This is a medium level Farm Prototype of a Unreal Engine v4 Game done in only 2 weeks using ONLY unreals blueprints I was given a challange in a college assignment to create a farming game using a design requirement sheet they gave me for resources I also had to create a 3d model rig it and then implement in my game as a main mechanic which this prototype was mainly showing the proper implementation of my 3d model as well as texturing This prototype includes AI NavMeshes Custom Blender Models Highly detailed blueprints Spawning Mechanics and basic inventory     Gameplay Implemented     Due to the strict time constraint not everything was implemented in as I wanted too however this is implemented     Wild Area where animals spawn Each with Unqiue properties   Pen Area where animals are already spawned with AI You can see the Animals animations as well as their color changing properties You can also see the AI implementation here   Farm Area Where you can Pick up food   Fuzzy Explaination It allows you to view the model from multiple different angles to check for clipping issues     Things  NOT  Implemented     Capture mechanic I wanted to implement a mechanic where you can capture the animals and place them in pens   Shopkeeper area This was a place where you can sell your captured Creatures   Garden area I wanted to implement an area where players can grow seeds that you can purchase from the shop keeper     I do not plan to Implement any of these however in the future I might remake this game and polish it Making it a real demo     Controls     Player Controls     W Forward   A Walk left   S Walk Backwards   D Walk Right   Space Jump   Mouse Camera   E Interact Button   ESC Quit Game     How To Play     The game is currently in a sandbox state There is no objective in this prototype its simple a proof of concept and a gallery of what I created with a week long endevor There is currently only 1 interactable actor inside the game which is the food you can pick up Everything else can only be looked at and admired Though you can test the AI and try to get infront of its way     How It Can Be Exapanded     The game could be expanded multiple different ways a good place to start is the things I havent implemented due to time constaints     Capture mechanic I wanted to implement a mechanic where you can capture the animals and place them in pens   Shopkeeper area This was a place where you can sell your captured Creatures   Garden area I wanted to implement an area where players can grow seeds that you can purchase from the shop keeper     Frequently Asked Questions     Q How do I Collect resources     A Walk close to the item then press E     Q Why Post this open source     A I believe a good programmer should have code anyone can understand if they look at the source With this project I wanted other to look at the code I created as it is neat and completely commented for easy documentation Feel free to look and take any blueprints you like even the model     Q I think the shop keeper is broken as I cant interact with him     A This was something I wanted to implement in the future It serves as a place holder for a future shop     Q Why are the wild area fuzzies not moving     A This is mainly due to a bug While they do spawn they do not move because of a small bug with their code With the 1 week long time constaint instead fixing that bug I made the hard choice to implement the AI and work on the coloring mechanic as it was more worth my grade

title: Stellar Cardworks
logline: Build colonies through tactical card combos in this scifi strategy sim
description: Here are a few words to say   Firstly a huge thank you to Yahaha Games for helping us publish our game and bringing a glimmer of hope to our humble team Grateful to Yahaha     Im still updating the game demo the full version will be on Steam by late April Add it to your wishlist                Welcome to  Stellar Cardworks       ABOUT THIS GAME     As a robotic agent of the prestigious Interstellar Construction Bureau your mission is simple take on contracts to terraform planets into habitable colonies Each world brings unique challengeslimited resources unexpected obstacles and strategic decisions to make your colony thrive         As an agent of the  Interstellar Construction Bureau  youll face the ultimate test of efficiency and creativity Start by selecting a planet review its unique requirements and use your arsenal of tools and cards to transform it into a vibrant habitable world Each project pushes you to balance between time resources and profits       Are you ready to turn barren worlds into flourishing colonies and climb the ranks of the Interstellar Construction Bureau           CardDriven  Manage planetary development using resource tool character and technology cards Strategic Balance  Coordinate resources technology and political tasks to achieve goals and maximize profits SciFi Immersion  Explore diverse planets each with unique environments and secrets Dynamic Progression  Complete tasks improve planets unlock advanced cards and master the art of terraforming High Freedom  Randomized events and multiple strategic paths ensure fresh challenges every game         Thank you for playing if you like it please rate it 5 Stars

title: Hrnful
description: Hrnful  is a deep dive into the  neuester Schrei  of Germancore culturea commentary on the commentary on contemporary German society   Created by a diverse collective of European artists it offers both an internal and external view of the postmodernism of Central Europe It is an immersive descent into the absurdity of hypernormalization where nostalgia technocapitalism and existential dread intertwine   Through interactive installations soundscapes and digital distortions  Hrnful  immerses participants in a space where reality and satire blur Visitors navigate a landscape of overinformation cultural contradictions and uncanny familiarity forcing them to ask Is this critique or just the new normal   Interact with the experience WASDPCTFLeftclick   For more cultural title: Early Access in a Nutshell
logline: Early Access Games are mostly broken
description: This game is a submission to the  Puls Game Jam   The theme was Kaputt german for broken  Early access games are a complete mess most of the times Even with a few updates it doesnt only get better  In this Game you are bored and want to play another game But what to play Double left click  Open Program Left Click  Interact with buttons etc WSADArrow Keys  Movement  In game and menu SpaceEnter  Confirm Menu ESC  Main Menu   Sorry its kinda short and maybe a bit tricky to find out what to do next I planned some kind of narrator that gives you hints but I ran out of time    Complete Solution     Step 1   Click on the button on the screen bottom right and wait the intro       Step 2   Open the internet browser double click  In the internet browser you can see that Heros of Epicness is now in early access Go to your beam shop and enter in the search bar Heros of epicness Press enter       Step 3   Click buy and download the V 10 of the game       Step 4   Navigate to the desktop and start the game double click       Step 5   In the game menu press space to start the game the game should crash restart the pc by pressing the button on the pc screen 2 times       Step 6   You should see that an update is avaliable Click the Heros of Epicness Beam Store shortcut on your desktop Choose the new V 11 Version and click install        Step 7   You can now start the game properly Open the game and select Play You can move around now But there is not much you can to Go to the sign at the far right and you should unlock a new version       Step 8   Install the new version via the beam game store page In this version the collisions with the plain bushes are buggy You can move through them on the right and go to the city You will unlock a new Version       Step 9   Install the new Version You can now interact with some specific npcs Find the npc thats friend is lost Press E to interact He should tell the guard to let you pass in the east       Step 10   Go to the east You will see the lost goblin but you cant really reach him Your hitbox is too large Go to the beam store page and install V 11 With this version you can rotate your hitbox to squeeze through       Step 11   Install version 13 again to talk to the goblin       Step 12   Go back to the village The world is saved and you are a hero Thank you for playing 3

title: Kraft Cup Challenge  DAD New Blood Proof of Concept
Jump Seat
logline: A nostalgic Galaga style game of two brothers defending their ship from the jump seat
description: Jump Seat  is a reimagining of the classic  Galaga style arcade shooter blending retro gameplay with a deeply personal touch Designed from the ground up by Miles Wilson this game explores the fundamentals of game development leveraging prefabs scene management user input and collision systems   while delivering a dynamic and responsive arcade experience Players pilot a spaceship modeled after my childhood family car a Mercedes station wagon complete with pixel art depictions of my brother and me in the jump seats and my father at the wheel     Gameplay  Engage in fastpaced wavebased combat against incoming enemies weaving through projectiles with fluid movement mechanics Enemy patterns evolve across multiple levels challenging players to adapt and refine their reflexes A minimal yet functional UI tracks score and lives staying true to the classic arcade aesthetic   A Nostalgic Soundscape  The soundtrack features 8bit covers of songs from our childhood road trips composed by 8Bit Arcade while the sound effects were designed entirely by me bringing the world of  Jump Seat  to life with every shot and explosion      A Labor of Love  Every aspect of the gamefrom its mechanics to its handcrafted visual and audio elementswas developed with intention and care with background art contributed by Gina Condotti  Jump Seat  is more than just a game its a tribute to childhood imagination sibling adventures and the magic of bringing dreams to life

title: AM
logline: Jesus take the wheel
description: The twisting roads seem to go on forever Music blares to fend off the silence and the only thing keeping you from slamming into the guardrail is a lukewarm gas station coffee On nights like these its important to ask yourself what makes you so sure youre alone     Hop into the drivers seat and prepare for anything as you navigate a vast network of rural roads in search of salvation  AM  is a highspeed horror game that will keep you on the edge of your seat  and your foot on the gas as you try to keep the horrors lurking in this abandoned world in your rearview   Key Features   Miles of roads to explore in a uniquly oppressive game world High speed gameplay with intense and terrifying encounters An interactive radio with over an hour of content to keep you company A massive demo with over 40 mintues of gameplay Change the difficulty at any time to play how you prefer Progress is saved play at your own pace Languages  English Japanese and Korean   If you enjoyed playing let us know and please share with a friend ALL MUSIC IN THE GAME IS PUBLIC DOMAIN OR MADE BY US   Follow us for more    YouTube        TwitterX         Patreon        KoFi      Special Thanks Dimitri Bouniol   Creator of the anime scheduling app  jiiiiimoe   for the Japanese translation    Lang_Kun for the Korean translation You can find him playing horror games on his  YOUTUBE    HUGE THANKS to everyone who donated You have no idea how much it helps

title: Descendants
logline: Your mother disappeared when you were little Descend the mines and find her no matter what
description: Notice This game has been updated but the original jam version is always available for download Your mother disappeared when you were little They say she was last seen descending the mines of Mt Dine Find her no matter what    CONTROLS   Left arrow or A   Move left Right arrow or D   Move right Space bar   Interact with something in front of you Up arrow   or W   Climb rope or ladder  Spoilers for game mechanics    Courage  Perseverance Each time you descend the game will pick a number from 09 If that number is greater than the amount of perseverance you have you lose one courage If the number is lower then you keep that amount of courage but lose one perseverance       Chests  Roses When  you open a chest the game decides which resource it should use  Theres a 90 chance of courage and 10 change of perseverance Then  the game decides whether you gain gain nothing or lose that resource  Those percentages are roughly 77 13 and 6 respectively Roses give  you one perseverance   Ghost  Headstones When you complete a ghosts side quest you receive 5 courage If you speak to a ghost and havent completed their quest yet theyll give you one courage     Headstones are randomized from a list of 5 names and death causes so theres a high probability of repeated names Logically this doesnt make sense  but I ran out of time to make a proper system that removes names  and deaths from their lists      Floors  Rooms There  are 10 rooms per floor which are randomized so youre likely to  repeat some within any given floor Generally speaking as you descend  the number of chests you can encounter decreases and the number of  ghosts and headstones increases Roses start appearing from floor 3 and  laddersropes start appearing from floor 4    The Miner Has dialogue each time you fail  When he stops having unique responses hell give you one courage before you descend     SPECIAL THANKS     Vandalorum  Music  vandalorumbandcampcom

title: Timescape
logline: minecraft furnace but 100x
description: Flowing Machines   Disclaimer This game works best at 1920x1080 so there may be some UI bugs with smaller resolutions      Play as  schrondingers cat  trying to collapse reality However  the realm is completely stagnant and frozen over Only schrondingers cat  can influence time of nearby tiles All machines require time warp to run but luckily once running they are able to spread timewarp to near by tiles in an inverse fashion More time warp makes machines run faster but with too much timewarp they start to become unstable      Controls    wasd move   spam z in order to create time warp for nearby tiles   left click to place and mine left click can also take from machines   right click a machinedrone in range to destroy it gaining anything inside the machine    1 5 to place machines must have required resources in inventory    click an item in bottom left and then left click a machine to to add it to its inventory   shift left click to take 64  and right click take half a stack or half current amount    machines that need coal drill  furnace  alloy furnace    Progression   Furnace  Drill  Drone  Alloy Furnace  Crystal of flowing time     time warp spreads in an inverse way for farther machines gain more time warp also too much timewarp makes machines in efficient    Credits   Flamebom Appl313245   Assets Added   LPC cats and dog   httpsopengameartorgcontentlpccatsanddogs   LPC ore and forge   httpsopengameartorgcontentlpcoreandforge   Top down snow tile set   httpsopengameartorgcontentverybasic32x32topdownsnowtileset   Music    mysterious dark background universefield from  httpsfreemusicarchiveorg  eerie crimnal atomsphere universefield from  httpsfreemusicarchiveorg
