title: Tainted by the Stars
logline: Realistic 2D Zombie Shooter with fog of war
description: Tainted by the Stars  is an indie game in Early Access  a topdown twinstick shooter set in a dark postapocalyptic world You play as a lone survivor fighting off relentless zombie hordes with limited visibility due to a realistic fogofwar system Every bullet counts and careful movement is key to survival      Key Features Early Access     Twinstick shooter mechanics   Move with one stick or WASD and aim with the other or mouse    Realistic visibility   Only see what your character sees creating tense unpredictable encounters    Tactical movement   No sprinting every step matters    Scavenge for supplies   Limited ammo search carefully    Challenging zombie encounters   Right now only basic zombies  but more are coming      Future Plans     More enemy types including fast zombie dogs    Multiple levels connected by a simple story    Expanded weapon selection and scavenging mechanics      Id love to hear your feedback Try it out and let me know what you think

title: Energy Defense
description: In a world where climate change threatens the planet players take on the role of a strategic leader tasked with defending the environment from destruction The game unfolds across multiple levels each representing different environmental challenges caused by unsustainable energy practices As waves of industrial threats advance players must build and upgrade towers powered by renewable and nonrenewable energy sources to counteract the damage    Every decision impacts the environment requiring players to balance power production pollution control and strategic defense to protect the world from ecological collapse       About Energy Defense  This  tower defense strategy game  blends  education and entertainment  designed to raise awareness about climate change and sustainable energy practices Featuring  progressive difficulty levels  the game challenges players to adapt their strategies as enemy waves grow stronger Players can utilize  various energy sources  including solar wind and fossil fuels each with its advantages and consequences    The game incorporates  interactive decisionmaking  rewarding ecofriendly choices while demonstrating the longterm effects of unsustainable practices With engaging mechanics visually appealing environments and an  informative gameplay experience  the game provides both entertainment and insight into realworld climate issues   Games Assets   httpsfoozleccitchiospiretowerpack1   httpskenneynlassetsuipackadventure

title: Scrap Speedsters
logline: Scrap Speedsters is a game where you build and race custom scrapbuilt cars through challenging tracks
description: You are faced with a classic junkyard challenge design and build vehicles out of whatever you can find and navigate through the courses In this chaotic midden the only parts available are  absolutely kaputt  But if you can get creative and free yourself of any regard for life and limb your rat rod doesnt have to be     How to play     Drag and drop items from the Attachment Select sidebar onto your bathtubs attachment points to assemble a vehicle    When you are done building press play and hold AD or the leftright arrow keys to spin your cars wheels    Hold the up arrow or W to activate hot air balloons if your car has them    Reach the blue station to complete the level     Component reference    Wheels They spin when you hold AD or arrow keys    Boat Sled extremely slippery can be used as a sledge to slide along the ground    Balloon a hot air balloon you can activate by holding W or the up arrow    Heavy bundle Lots of heavy pieces of scrap weighs down your vehicle     This game was made in 48 hours for the Puls Game Jam    Programming   TollGnoll   worron studios   Art   regler842   MusicSound   fiberbundles

title: Gongoozler
logline: Gongoozler is an exploration game set on the waters of the Trent River in a futurepast setting
description: About   In this game world players explore a semiaquatic zone known as The Silt where rising water levels have dramatically reshaped the landscape Instead of fleeing the local community has adapted to this new environment seeking symbiosis rather than fighting to dominate their habitat    Gongoozler is the culmination of an artist residency with  Open Doors  Inspired by the Newark Museums collection it aims to examine the districts historical relationship with water and envisions an optimistic and speculative future    This experience has no defined path or puzzle the focus is on atmosphere and exploration  dip in and out of the water as you please   Notes   The 3D models made as part of this project are publicly available  here This is a prototype and you will likely come across some bugs   Credits   Ryan Heath  Design Programming Art   Score  Written and performed by Tom Goodwin and Heather Perkins   Additional audio written and performed by Les Reid   Special thanks to Katy Culbard Tom Cable Glyn Hughes Miles Herbert Denise Greaney M Pindar Heather Perkins Thomas Goodwin Les Reid and Ruth Terry   Open Doors The National Civil War Centre Newark and Sherwood District Council and Arts Council England kindly supported this project    Minimum Specs   Windows PC   Processor Intel i58400 or Ryzen 5 2600   Memory 8GB RAM   Graphics GTX 1060  RX 580 4GB VRAM   Storage Game size  2GB Apple Mac macOS 12 Monterey or later   Processor  Apple M1 or Intel i58400  Ryzen 5 2600 equivalent   Memory  8GB RAM   Graphics  Apple M1 GPU or AMD Radeon Pro 560X or better 4GB VRAM   Storage  Game size  2GB

title: Code of Restoration
logline: We were built to last but not to matter
description: Code of Restoration   First of all thanks for trying it out This app is my submission for the  Puls Game Jam   My second submission ever   This game was made in  48 hours    The game is designed for fullscreen mode         Story   Ah the good old dayslong gone much like your usefulness Left to rust forgotten by those who once depended on you But dont let reality stop you Drag yourself forward hold yourself together with sheer stubbornness and provemostly to yourselfthat youre not completely obsolete     How to use   Use  W A S   D  to move   Use  E  to interact Use  Q  to attack   WebGL Version   Unfortunately my particle effects dont work in the WebGL version    Further notes     Two days were really tough but at least its a cool foundation for a fun puzzle platformer I hope the idea comes across clearly     Assets i used   Text Animater DOTween VFX  which we cant see on the WebGL build     Feel free to leave your opinions and if you would like to see more content         I would love to hear some feedback  Thank you for reading

title: Wordiculum
logline: A Word Finding Puzzle
description: Wordiculum  The Word Discovery Puzzle Game Challenge your vocabulary and wordfinding skills in this addictive puzzle game where you connect letters to discover words Perfect for word game enthusiasts and casual players alike MULTIPLE GAME MODES  Classic Mode Take your time find words at your own pace  Blitz Mode Race against the clock  find as many words as possible in 180 seconds  Rush Mode Start with 25 seconds and keep the timer alive by finding words  each letter adds precious seconds FEATURES  Clean intuitive interface with both light and dark themes  Simple to learn challenging to master  No ads no inapp purchases  No personal data collection  Works offline  perfect for travel  Automatic game save feature  High score tracking HOW TO PLAY Start with a 4x4 grid of random letters Connect adjacent letters including diagonals to form words Each letter can only be used once per word Score points based on word length Find special Qu combinations for bonus scoring opportunities SPECIAL FEATURES  Dead and dying letters  as you find words letters will die off as the number of words that pass through them decreases Corners will round off until the letter is just a circle  Big Words progress tracker for longer words  Word definitions available in Classic mode  Automatic plural word finder option  Share grids with friends to compete on the same puzzle  Adjustable minimum word length 26 letters  Visual path tracking as you select letters  Colorcoded feedback for found words  Complete word list revealed at game end  Medals 100 complete a game with a score above 74 and gain a medal Medals and scores give you ranks and titles  Hinting system get help with the last handful of words with word definitions vowel and consonant reveal first letter reveal ACCESSIBILITY  Support for both touch and keyboard input  High contrast color schemes  Large text sizes  Clear visual feedback PERFECT FOR  Word game enthusiasts  Vocabulary building  Quick mental exercise  Educational use  Coffee break entertainment  Travel time entertainment No internet connection required after installation  play anywhere anytime Challenge yourself to find all possible words in each grid compete with friends by sharing grids and watch your vocabulary grow as you play Download Wordiculum today and start your wordfinding adventure Note This is a free game with no ads or inapp purchases We respect your privacy and collect no personal data wordgame puzzle vocabulary educational offline free

title: Hadro
description: Description du jeu   Aidez une horde migratrice dhadrosaure    se dvelopper Faites survivre les plus jeunes de la horde dans un environnement nouveau Et faites les migrer pour coloniser de nouveaux territoires Le carnet du palontologue vous aidera   mieux comprendre le mode de vie de ces animaux fascinants   Ce jeu a t conu dans le cadre de la Scientifique Game Jam Lquipe est compose de deux artistes  Eloi et Nathan de deux dveloppeurs  Sophie Villenave et Arthur Pardieu dun sound designer  Hadrien Grasland dun game designer  Florent et dun scientifique  Le blaireau masqu Le but de la jam est de faire en 48h un jeu sur la thse dun blaireau masqu qui porte sur lcologie des hadrosaures ou dinosaures   bec de canard       Message scientifique     Ce jeu a pour but de se familiaris avec les hadrosaures ou dinosaures   bec de canard et de comprendre   travers leur cologie leur succs volutif au Crtac   Les hadrosaures forment une des familles de vertbrs les plus diversifis dans lhistoire de la vie sur Terre Ils sont notamment connus pour la diversit de formes de leur crte frontale et leurs capacit masticatrice unique dans lhistoire de la vie sur Terre  A travers 5 pisodes de dispersion ils colonisent au Crtac tous les continents et de nombreux environnements des palotropiques aux paloples Cest exceptionnel  Certains scientifiques pensent mme quils sont responsables de la chute de la diversit des dinosaures triceratops et ankylosaures avant la chute de mtorite qui causera leur extinction il y a 66 millions dannes        Hadro est un jeu qui a pour but de faire dcouvrir le mode de vie des hadrosaures ces sympathiques animaux teints Qui taientils  Que mangeaienttil  Qui les mangeaient  Hadro offre une exprience immersive et ludique du suivi de la vie de lhadrosaure  Hypacrosaurus stebingeri  Combien dufs pondaitil  Les couvaitil  Aidaitil ses jeunes   la naissance  Migraientils en horde  Toutes les rponses se trouvent dans le jeu  Des informations complmentaires et surprenantes sont prsentes dans le carnet du palontologue          quipe                Le blaireau masqu doctorant au LGLTPE              Arthur Pardieu Dveloppeur             Sophie Villenave Dveloppeur             Hadrien Grasland Sound design             Eloi Landes Artiste 2D             Nathan Krier Artiste 2D             Florent Jamin Game Design     Remerciement               Axel Montigny doctorant au LGLTPE pour les plantes du Crtac

title: Busters
description: The year is 1999 and Busters is one of the last standing VHS rental stores in Washington The looming switch to DVD has the manager Benjamin stressed and he is a little more harsh than usual When the daily newspaper shows up and reveals a local woman went missing everything changes    Your job is to find out what happened to the woman can you solve the mystery     Busters started development in September of 2024 with four people working on it During the first few months there was a change of character artists and a new direction for the story Originally Busters was going to take place in 1984 and have two main story branches the player could choose from mystery or drama Looking at the deadline the drama branch was dropped and the mystery narrative became the focus The year was changed to 1999 because of the incredible movie selection to incorporate for example But Im a Cheerleader Scream Silence of the Lambs and many more In January of 2025 the team expanded to eight and the new programmers hit the ground running and got the demo to where it currently is This is just a slice of what Busters has to offer and there is going to be much more coming in the next few weeks   Kayla Ricker Columbia College Chicago undergraduate Blake Larpenteur Columbia College Chicago undergraduate Meghan Patnode Columbia College Chicago Undergraduate Aeon Schell Columbia College Chicago undergraduate Isaac Christophe Columbia College Chicago undergraduate  Adelle Raymond Columbia College Chicago undergraduate Thomas Kesling Columbia College Chicago undergraduate Sean Brown Columbia College Chicago undergraduate

title: DineoRama
logline: A fast paced game about keeping up in the restaurant industry
description: Are you ready to start your dream business Open a diner in the busy part of town Business is booming but so is your rent How long can you keep your diner afloat while rent increases every month   Features   Realistic Diner Physics Handle your food with a spatula just like real cooks do The food can be a bit unpredictable at times so dont mix up your ingredients Intense Diner Simulation Feel the pressure of managing a kitchen by yourself as rent piles up and you tend to the backlog of orders Believable Diner Graphics According to one playtester Your mileage may vary

title: Sinus
logline: A cyberpunk action roguelike where you hack turrets capture enemies synergize items with millions of weapons
description: SINUS is an actionroguelike RPG set in a cyberpunk universe Capture any enemy you encounter and equip them to fight for you Hack control panels to access powerful turrets and even put a twist on death Find a multitude of items and upgradable weapons Combine them with unique skills to create your build and match your play style           HACK  Control Panels to virtualize and control powerful turrets or regenerate from death     HACK  Enemies to equip and give them commands Evolve them to stronger versions     HACK  Upgrade Stations to increase your weapons elemental power strategy or upgrades     HACK  Signal Centers to reveal new locations and progress             Discover an endless supply of powerful and upgradable weapons tailored to any playstyle Items are procedurally generated making every playthrough unique Create synergies between them to unlock your true potential             Explore a universe with infinite replayability through procedurally generated levels Conquer cities filled with enemies traps and exploding barrels at every turn Discover hidden secrets that offer helpful loot or an entire new zone to explore          Choose a different character to kick off your journey and scout out talented crew members with different traits and abilities Every member of your crew is a playable character         Use the console in your ship to unlock new items or permanent upgrades to boost your fighting chances in the next run         Challenge your friends in an intense local multiplayer experience with Deathmatch and Teams game modes All the hacking mechanics are here including control panels regeneration and weapon upgrading so you can bet there will be some competitive and clutch moments         Fluid player movement and twinstick shooting with unlockable special moves   Millions of fierce weapons   Capture any enemy to fight for you   Take control of powerfull turrets   Infinite replayability through procedurally generated levels   Multiple playable characters with different traits and abilities to suit any playstyle   Interesting skills that add new mechanics   Plenty of optional routes for extra loot or upgrades   Metaprogression through the ship console to increase your chances in the next run   A multitude of secrets       If you enjoy our demo please consider wishlisting Sinus on  Steam

title: LaLa

title: Gomoku Online
logline: Play Gomoku online with other people
description: Introducing Online Gomoku  The Ultimate 2Player Strategy Game   Gomoku also known as Five in a Row is a classic board game that challenges your strategic thinking and foresight Now you can enjoy this exciting game online with friends or random opponents anytime anywhere      In our Online Gomoku game players take turns placing their stones on a 15x15 grid with the goal of getting five of their stones in a row either horizontally vertically or diagonally The first player to achieve this wins the game      Features       RealTime Multiplayer  Challenge players from all over the world and enjoy thrilling matches    FastPaced Gameplay  Experience quick matches with easytounderstand rules making it accessible for players of all ages    Instant Matchmaking  No need for menus or waiting  just jump straight into a game and start playing with a random opponent    UserFriendly Interface  Simple and clean design making it easy to focus on your next strategic move    Online Leaderboards  Track your performance and see how you rank against other players    InGame Chat  Communicate with your opponent in realtime using the builtin chat feature Share strategies banter or just enjoy casual conversation during the game      Whether youre a seasoned Gomoku player or a beginner looking for a fun challenge our online version offers a seamless engaging experience Join now test your skills and become a Gomoku master

title: Morse Attack
logline: Morse training game with SciFi Theme
description: Story   In the year 2050 Martians made contact with earth demanding all valuable minerals and metals from earth in exchange for Star Dust If they would not receive it they would annex earth President Ronald Rump of USA was the first to make the deal This is a great deal for America He said I dont know what Star Dust does but im sure its the best Star Dust there is As it turned out the Star Dust was useless and earth was slowly turning in to a toxic wasteland Earth tried to get out of the contract they signed with the Martians but it was rocksolid The Martians started lunched their invasion of Earth in late 2050 But to their surprise the humans had a secret weapon a Ham operator had noticed that the Martians ship system where weak against Morse signals And so the earth started to fight back sending Morse out in to space to eliminate the evil Martians once and for all   Description   This game is developed to help teach people to send and receive Morse Its meant as a fun spin on one of my favorite movies of all time Mars Attack and combining one of my favorite hobbies Morse The game is in early development and i release  it here to help me find bugs and errors that need to be fixed would love your feedback on what i need to improve    How to play   In options you can chose what key you wish to send Morse with in the options The default is set to CTRL  set your desired speed in the slider and start sending  you can also add Numbers and special characters to the list In the lower left corner you will se what the game picks up    Upcoming Changes   Remaking the Font used in game to a clearer and more readable Font  Highs core for all 4 different modes Make sure the Beam is Aligned on all resolutions Scale the left and right Hud to fit better on small resolutions Fix bugs reported in by testers   Update information   Updated help information in training mode Added sound to when you send wrong letter Aligned the Stars Life Increased the paus between sending next letter in listen mode its now 7 units The game stops sending the sound when you completed that letter added box that shows what you sent in lower left corner fixed bug with hard to click Play button Fixed the spawn points of UFO they now spawn outside view Added WPM settings slider Added Numbers and special characters Minor bug fixes

logline: Explore the contraptions of primitive engineers Avoid traps as a human fly around as a scarab
description: Explore  a lost temple Learn how ancient  mechanisms  work to avoid traps and solve puzzles   The scarab amulet will free you from your human form Die explore  fly  and come back to life   What if someone built ancient traps using advanced engineering with primitive materials   This is what some of our previous play testers said about Escape from Mu   A puzzle game but you can see the behind the scenes of the contraptions  Sbastien   I like that everything moves You can turn a cog and you see everything move in the world You can see the inner workings of the systems  Thomas   Flying around is fun After dying instead of going back for my body I just flew around for a while  Jay   Still in development   Every bit of support either monetary or sharing your thoughts is appreciated   This game is in development and at  a point where a lot of things can still be improved    Menu UI is functional but not pretty No story elements yet Lightning and sound polish levels are very inconsistent right now Meaning you can find rooms with less than good illumination or sound Graphical style mostly locked needs more decorations overall Wondering about how to convey more feel rewards and sense of progression without breaking immersion too much

title: My Pong
description: In short this is my Pong clone so far AI needs tweaking I will get to that soon    AI updated and is better balanced   httpsmediumcomtmaurodotbuildingasingleplayerpongcloneinunitystep   How to Play SinglePlayer Pong   Start  Click Play on the menu screen scores 0 timer Time 60   Round Begins  Gameplay music starts ball resets with a 2second countdown 2 to 1 then launches   Control Paddle  Use W up and S down keys for the left paddle   Catch Ball  Hold Spacebar to catch the ball on hit release to throw it right   Score  Get the ball past the AIs right paddle Player scores AI scores if it passes your left paddle   AI Paddle  Right paddle follows the ball may catch and release it leftward   Audio  Hear paddle hit sounds music switches between menu and gameplay   Round Ends  Timer hits 0 gameplay stops scores stay visible   View Scores  10second countdown 10 to 1 shows before reset   Reset  Scores clear menu music plays Play button returnsclick to restart       How to Play SinglePlayer Pong StepbyStep Guide   Welcome to SinglePlayer Pong This guide will walk you through how to play the game compete against the AI and enjoy the unique features like catching the ball and roundbased gameplay Lets get started   Step 1 Start the Game   Launch the Game  Open the game in Unity or your built executable   Menu Screen  Youll see a Play button in the center scores at 0 top left and right and a timer showing Time 60 top center Menu music will play in the background   Action  Click the Play button to begin a round     Step 2 Begin the Round   Round Start  The Play button disappears gameplay music starts and the ball resets to the center   Countdown  Watch the center of the screen for a 2second countdown 2 then 1 before the ball launches in a random direction   Timer  The top timer starts counting down from 60 seconds or the set round duration indicating how long the round lasts     Step 3 Control Your Paddle   Player Paddle  You control the left paddle   Movement  Use the  W  key to move up and  S  key to move down or UpDown arrow keys The paddle stays within the top and bottom walls   Catch the Ball  Hold the  Spacebar  when the ball hits your paddle to catch it Release the Spacebar to throw the ball rightward with some vertical speed based on your paddles movement   Goal  Hit the ball past the AIs paddle on the right to score     Step 4 Understand the AI Paddle   AI Paddle  The right paddle is controlled by the computer   Behavior  It follows the balls vertical position to block your shots Occasionally 50 chance it catches the ball on contact and releases it leftward after 052 seconds   Challenge  Try to outmaneuver the AI to score points     Step 5 Score Points   Scoring     If the ball passes the AIs paddle and hits the right goal you Player gain 1 point topleft score updates   If the ball passes your paddle and hits the left goal the AI gains 1 point topright score updates     Ball Reset  After each score the ball returns to the center pauses for a 2second countdown 2 to 1 then launches again keeping the round going     Step 6 Listen to Audio Cues   Music  Gameplay music plays during the round switching to menu music when the round ends   Sound Effects  Hear a ping sound each time the ball hits a paddle adding to the classic Pong feel     Step 7 End the Round   Round Duration  The round ends when the timer reaches Time 0 after 60 seconds or your set duration   End Screen     Gameplay music stops and the ball resets with its 2second countdown   Your final scores Player vs AI remain visible   A countdown text appears below the center ticking down from 10 to 1 over 10 seconds showing how long until the game resets       Step 8 View Final Scores and Restart   Score Display  For 10 seconds after the round check your final scores eg Player 5 AI 3 to see who won   Reset  After the 10second countdown ends   Scores reset to 0   Menu music resumes   The Play button reappears     Next Round  Click Play again to start a new round and keep the challenge going     Tips for Success   Master the Catch  Use the Spacebar strategically to catch and release the ball at the right moment to throw off the AI   Stay Alert  The ball speeds up slightly each time it hits a paddle so keep your reflexes sharp   Outsmart the AI  Move your paddle to trick the AI into missing the ball     UPDATES Star Date 3182025   Summary of Updates   Initial Setup Pong Clone Basics    Created a singleplayer Pong game with a player paddle left WS keys AI paddle right and one ball   Added scoring player vs AI paddle hit SFX and basic ball reset with a 2second countdown     EndGame Display    Added a 10second delay after the round ends timer hits 0 to show final scores before resetting to the menu   Included a countdown text 10 to 1 during this delay for visual feedback     Player Instructions    Provided a stepbystep guide for end users start round control paddle WS Spacebar to catch score points pauseresume adjust volume     AI Paddle Improvements    Fixed AI paddle issues   Prevented upwardonly movement when catching now moves randomly updown while holding   Eliminated rapid shaking by updating movement direction every 0515 seconds     AI tracks the closest uncaught ball with twoball setup     Screen Shake    Added a 03second screen shake 01 magnitude when a score is made triggered in  IncreasePlayerScore  IncreaseAIScore      Scoring SFX    Added an  AudioSource   scoreSFX  to play a sound eg ding alongside the screen shake when scoring     Volume Slider  Pause Button    Added a UI Slider to adjust music volume menu and gameplay from 0 to 1 always accessible   Added a Pause Button to toggle gameplay freeze with  TimetimeScale  0  resume with 1 shown only during rounds     Two Balls    Replaced single  ball  with a  Ball balls  array size 2 in  PongGameManager  and  AIPaddle    Both balls reset and launch on round start AI tracks the closest uncaught ball   Fixed premature round start by removing  ResetBall  from  Ballcs s  Start  controlled by  PongGameManager      Stuck Ball Handling    Added dual stuck mechanics   3 Seconds  Ball redirects with a new random direction if stuck velocity  01   5 Seconds  Ball resets to center with countdown if still stuck     Logic only runs when  isRoundActive  is true preserving menu state     Menu Restoration    Fixed game starting on launch by initializing balls as stopped  isKinematic  true  in  Ballcs s  Start  launching only when  StartRound  sets  isRoundActive  true        Thats it Youre ready to enjoy SinglePlayer Pong Have fun bouncing the ball scoring points and beating the AI in this modern twist on a classic game

title: Cards of Loop Sonic SVM
logline: A dark memory game about Monsters and Time built on the Sonic SVM API
description: A revamped version of an old memory game where if you forget your past actions you get hunted by spacetime and lose Integrated on Sonic SVM and Solana blockchain you can earn SOL as you play Though its only on the Testnet for now     Literally uses all of these themes at the same time   Delay the Inevitable   Creatures of the Night  Daily Challenges Dj  Vu   Pick any action out of three for a given scenario     Loop back in time     Complete the old actions the same way     Or be erased by time and space      unless               TIPS     Some scenarios may repeat like how you might bump into a friend more than once in a day Make sure you choose the same actions in the same order for these   eg You meet a stranger three times in one loop and picked  greetgreetmock  you cannot choose greetmockgreet or greetgreetgreet You have to choose  greetgreetmock  again     JUST PLAY THE GAME IT ALL MAKES SENSE IN THE LOOP     Use the mouse or keys 123 to select a card     Maybe f1 makes it full screen Not sure     Dont get lost in the loop

title: Sleep Donut
logline: Put government agents to sleep with delicious sleeping pillinfused donuts
description: Who knew donuts could cause this much chaos   Sleep Donut is a chaotic 2D topdown game with puzzle AND shooter levels It has 10 levels and a goofy story   In this game your mission is to disguise as a donut shop delivery guy invade government installments and give out sleeping pillinfused donuts to secret government agents What for So you can reach the holes in each floor until you reach the very end   In puzzle levels you have a limited number of donuts you need to strategize where and how youll use your donuts You need to feed all agents with donuts to make them sleep so you can pass If they run out and there are still awake agents you lose You can also lose if you take too long to feed the agents   In shooter levels you just gotta shoot an infinity of donuts at enemies buttons etc They are split into two halves falling and walking Falling sections titularly you fall while defeating enemies and walking sections were aforementioned   Made for  Mini Jam 180 Refresh  under the limitation of Falling down   NOTICE Movement is only available in Level 5 and Level 10 the falling levels and the ones after them

title: Scarlet Sorceress
logline: Find adventure and romance in an adorable fantasy world
description: Find love and adventure in the Kingdom of  Seraphine Solve mysteries go on quests and work to resolve a conflict between two factions Go for romantic outings with your companions and perhaps decide the one for you   Inspired by otome visual novels Scarlet Sorceress is a 370000word interactive novel set with cuteness and charm in a fantasy romance world Play as a sorceress with the freedom to customize your name specialization and appearance   Blessed with the gift of magic you are a sorceress able to manipulate the power of fire Sorcery is tightly controlled in the Kingdom of Seraphine forcing spell casters to live under the watch of the Guardian Order or live as outlaw mages Living in the Eterna Forest away from the city with your pet cat you soon find yourself tangled in a conflict between both factions   Romance your childhood companion your Guardian protector or one of two mysterious mages   Play as a sorceress Romance male or female characters Choose from four romance interests two male and two female as well as another two minor romance interests Customize your appearance with the magic mirror Use different styles  to optimize your stats or choose the Blessing of Inner Fire to customize your appearance without worrying about stats Collect different jewelry sets each with different impacts on the game Play the game on standard mode for a traditional statmanagement experience or opt for story mode to play the game without having to worry about stats In addition to the main storyline enjoy two mysterybased sections and ten side adventures   Stock images from Pixabay PublicDomainPictures and Rawpixel were used to create the art in the game I strive to keep AI generated images out of my work but do let me know if you find anything AI generated   The Choicescript Save Plugin is included in this release

title: Dungeon Dump
description: Loots not cheap in this economy so the forces of evil have to be efficient when it comes to filling their dungeons treasure chests Luckily adventurers keep parting ways with their equipment after being lethally made to exit the dungeon   Its up to you to repair the broken items by recombining the correct parts and sending them back up through the portal Gather bonus points by delivering the requested item and make sure not to miss the deadline Minions are cheap after all     Move WASD Pick up items Hold Left Mouse Button Drag Items Mouse Jump Space     Credits   Janik Helbig Tobias Maushammer Jakob List

title: Cravebound Dungeon Escape
logline: Suddenly you find yourself craving monstersteak
description: Made in 8 hours for Trijam 313   InstructionsControls   WASD  Arrow keys  Move character   Left clickSpace bar  Swing sword towards your mouse cursor   M key  DeActivate dungeon map   Stand by the anvil in the centre to repair your minecart  when it is fully repaired you can escape the dungeon However cravings for certain types of monster meat will distract you from your work making you less effective Hunt down the monsters specified at the top of the screen to increase your efficiency again   Hurry to repair the minecart before the time runs out   Development   My original idea was for an Overcooked style recipe craving system  where there would be multiple monsters required per craving along with a time limit to fulfil it otherwise the player would lose health   In the end due to lack of timeknowhow I settled on individual monsters for each craving but that not fulfilling them reduced the players effectivness to repair their minecart   Overall a great theme and a fun jam to take part in   Updates   190325 Post Trijam judging period     Added difficulty options Easy and Hard mode with Hard being the original game and Easy having extended time and a weighted spawn system favouring easier to kill monsters Additionally in easy mode cyclops are reduced to 2 hitpoints    Fixed a bug where killing multiple monsters in the same frame sometimes didnt register as clearing more than 1 craving  Corrected shader compilation was working for the blood effects but not for the anvil sparks upon initial release    Added control text above regarding map functionality Im so embarrassed that I forgot to include mention of it in the first place   Credits   Kenney  kenneynl   Tileset from the Tiny Dungeon pack   Kevin Macleod   incompetechcomwordpress   Background music Call to adventure     Pixabay  Sword swing visor openingclosing and anvil sfx   Zapsplat  Monster hit sfx

title: MahtaMinute
logline: Mind bending card matching meets chess on a 16card grid
description: Welcome to MAHTAMINUTE           MahtaMinute is an introductory and practice tool to familiarize yourself with the mechanics of the comingsoon online version of a tabletop card game growing in popularity and known as MAHTA MAHTI     HOW TO PLAY      The general game play is about strategic card matching atop an everchanging    16card grid Upon card placement all matching numbers calculate as points   But be careful all mismatches count against you    Its not as easy as youd think even with Wilds   MahtaMinute is all about the right card choice in the right orientation and the   best board placement to maximize matches and minimize mismatches              Its a mindbender Think twisted matching meets chess

title: Deadbeat Daddy
logline: Being undead cant stop you from finding a date
description: Intro   A story based dating sim deckbuilder   Go on blind dates with regular humans play EVENT CARDS which impress  or dissuade your date and earn LOVE POINTS to show your adoration        Good luck finding the love of your unlife     Story   The zombie apocalypse has come and gone and through pure luck youre still here even if youre a little undead And the dating scene is still as much of a gamble as it was before BUT Youve been dead for so long the interest on your bank account has added some extra zeros to your balance and your unique situation has attracted the attention of reality show producers Maybe being TVs favourite sugar daddy will change your fortunes   Controls   Use the MOUSE to navigate menus LEFT CLICK to select options   Gameplay   1 PLAN YOUR DATE   Spend your LOVE POINTS to build a deck of EVENT CARDS for your upcoming date Event cards have effects that change your score The more love points you spend the stronger the effects of each card Buy GIFTS to impress your date Gifts immediately add a global multiplier to all love points earned on a date but beware this can also multiply negatives   2 GO ON YOUR DATE   Your EVENT CARDS deck is shuffled and cards are played one at a time FEELING LUCKY The NEXT button plays another card Cards are revealed and take effect after they are played THINK YOU WON The STOP button ends the date and saves your current love points   3 HOW DID YOU DO   Now that the date is over see how many points you earned You win when you reach a points threshold and the game ends if you run out of love points   4 GO ON ANOTHER DATE   Return to the planning screen   Credits     Audio benniedavid Art ohitssla Isla Medina Game Design anander Chester Perez Luna Gwen Delos Santos nosodapls Max Zang Programming Chester Perez Luna nosodapls Max Zang Competing for Edmonton prize pool in the GamePop Game Jam

title: demo Plant Evolution
logline: evolution simulator
description: This evolution game now its a demo simulates plants growing using Lsystems  The plants compete with each other for sunlight  If energy runs out they will die and perish  Offspring are generated around a plant once it reached certain age   At the start of the simulation random parameters are generated ensuring that the plants are different each time      Many features are still in the planning or development stage Feedback and suggestions are greatly appreciated to help improve the simulation     Controls   F11   toggle fullscreen Esc   open option menu H   toggle debug infos P   pause simulationstart simulation WASD  Arrow keys   walking around Space   jump Click on a tree   show the genome of the tree   current features   predefined Lsystem structure parametric evolution in 10 dimensions   if you are interested in this project and expecting more contents you can support its development by donation or join  patreon page  for longterm support

title: Fit the Block
description: Descripcin de la aplicacin Fit the Block     Pon a prueba tu lgica y habilidades de resolucin de problemas con  Fit the Block  Este adictivo juego de rompecabezas te desafa a completar estructuras incompletas utilizando bloques de diferentes formas y tamaos El objetivo es sencillo ajusta los bloques para llenar los espacios vacos y completa la figura Cada nivel te presentar una nueva configuracin de huecos y t debers encontrar la manera perfecta de hacer que todo encaje      Caractersticas destacadas        Diversos niveles de dificultad  Comienza con formas sencillas y avanza hacia desafos ms complejos a medida que progresas    Bloques de diferentes formas  Cada bloque tiene un tamao y una forma nicos lo que aumenta el desafo y la creatividad para resolver los rompecabezas    Estilo visual relajante  Con grficos minimalistas y colores agradables  Fit the Block  ofrece una experiencia visualmente placentera    Desafos sin lmite de tiempo  Tmate tu tiempo para resolver cada nivel o si prefieres un reto ms rpido ajusta las reglas de juego a tu estilo    Actualizaciones peridicas  Nuevos niveles y desafos se agregan constantemente para mantener el juego fresco y emocionante      Con  Fill the Gap  no solo mejorars tu capacidad de resolver problemas sino que tambin disfrutars de una experiencia de juego casual y entretenida Descrgala ahora y comienza a llenar los huecos

title: Broken Lights

description: Oh no  The  lights  are  broken     This puts a whole new twist on the classic platformer genre because you cant see anything in the level Luckily theres the occasional lightning strikeand you also have a few matches to briefly illuminate the scene Just enough time to use your paint bucket to mark key spots and find your way   The game  Broken Lights  is my interpretation of the  kaputt  theme for the PULS Game Jam 2025 It was developed solo within 48 hours The only thirdparty elements are the rain shader and the music by Ozzed All other assets were created by  mago  during the Game Jam without the use of AI     Controls   Action Keys     Movement WASD   Jump Space   Use Matches F   Restart R   Paint Mouse1     Credits   Source code is released by NimbleBeasts under MIT  httpsgithubcomNimbleBeastsBrokenPulsGameJam25   Music Ozzed  httpsozzednet     For complete license information please have a look at the LICENSE file

title: Cell Control
logline: Dans un laboratoire le joueur incarne un chercheur qui travaille sur les cellules souches
description: Attention  la version navigateur a des problmes de graphismes  Prfrez la version Windows      CONTEXTE DE LA CRATION DU JEU     Ce jeu vido a t ralis lors de la Scientific Game Jam  Printemps 2025 dition Lyon du 14 au 16 mars 2024       Pour soutenir notre jeu au Coup de Cur du Public 2025 vous pouvez voter pour  Cell Control    httpsformsgleoVoBxXvjDXBxV8PY7    Lien vers les autres jeux de la jam   httpsitchiojamscientificgamejam2025entries         Lquipe se compose de        Nolla GROSSI  Scientifique Titouan Vaillant  Game Designer     Adjam TellierRozen  Programmeuse     Selenn Lamson  Programmeuse     David Brunel  Artiste 3D     Vincent BONNET  Artiste 3D     Benjamin Quellec  Sound Designer         BUT DU JEU     Dans un laboratoire le joueur incarne un chercheur qui travaille sur les cellules souches A partir dun chantillon de sang dun patient il va fabriquer une cellule souche la multiplier puis la transformer en cellules spcialises Le but du jeu est de matriser les diffrentes tapes du processus tout en grant des situations de stress des erreurs de laboratoire et un temps limit Chaque niveau reprsente un nouveau type de patient          QUESTCE QUUNE CELLULE SOUCHE      Elle est   lorigine de toutes les cellules qui composent notre corps En raison de leur origine embryonnaire ces cellules peuvent se dmultiplier et se spcialiser pour former tous les tissus de notre organisme La recherche dans ce domaine tant trs encadre on est maintenant capable de fabriquer des cellules souches en laboratoire   partir de cellules dj  spcialises on les appelle les cellules souches pluripotentes induites IPS           PROTOCOLE EXPERIMENTAL Tuto     Ouvrez les portes du laboratoire de cellules souches     Votre premier patient vient darriver il est atteint dune maladie qui affecte les muscles Pour mieux comprendre sa maladie il faut pouvoir ltudier en laboratoire Cest l  que les cellules souches entrent en jeu     Voici son chantillon de sang A toi de jouer pour transformer cet chantillon en une cellule souche      Dpose ton chantillon dans      la machine Yamanaka et verse les 4 gnes ncessaires   la transformation            Explication scientifique   Les 4 gnes OCT4 SOX2   KLF4 cMYC connus sous le nom de facteurs de Yamanaka du nom du chercheur   japonais qui a mis au point cette recette et obtenu un Prix Nobel en 2012   pour ces travaux permettent de transformer une cellule spcialise diffrencie   en cellule souche              Flicitation tu as obtenu ta cellule souche             Explication scientifique   Ces cellules aux   proprits tonnantes ont la capacit de se multiplier   linfini et de se   transformer en nimporte quel type de cellules spcialises dans le   corps            Une cellule cest bien mais il en faudrait des millions      Pour      dmultiplier ta cellule souche placel  dans le duplicateur     STOP  Tu en as largement assez  Il va falloir maintenant transformer tes cellules souches en cellule spcialises     Ajoute      la sauce molculaire indique pour produire le bon progniteur   Faites      chauffer dans lincubateur pendant le temps ncessaire Il ne te reste      plus qu  spcialiser ta cellule    Si      besoin ajoute une deuxime sauce et cest partie pour une deuxime CUISSON            Note  Attention tes cellules sont fragiles et rsistent peux   lair libre Utilise si besoin le conglateur pour conserver tes cellules       Flicitation  Tu as russi   crer une cellule spcialise Tu vas pouvoir la livrer   diffrents laboratoires         Explication scientifique  En utilisant les cellules   souches issus de patients les chercheurs sont dsormais capables de   reproduire les caractristiques de la maladie en laboratoire       Utiliser des cellules souches permet aussi de tester   plusieurs mdicaments avant de passer   chez lanimal puis enfin chez lHomme     On pourrait imaginer dans le futur pouvoir combiner ces   diffrents types de cellules et fabriquer des mini organe         THESE DE NOLLA       Dans ma thse jtudie une maladie qui affecte les muscles jutilise donc des cellules de patients que lon transforme en cellule souche pour les multiplier   linfini et on les diffrencie en cellule musculaire pour tudier la maladie         Plus dinfo avec cette interview de Nolla pendant la Game Jam   httpsvideospair2jeuxtubewvVUjfVvt3n6DTUtjrFm2QF

title: Rhyme God The First Rhyme Training Game Ever
logline: A rhyme training game for rappers trying to learn how to rhyme fast
description: Rhyme God The first ever rhyme training game    Dive into a world where words are your weapons and rhymes are your shield       Embark on an epic journey through the realms of language in  Rhyme God  where your quick wit and vocabulary are put to the ultimate test Are you ready to become the Rhyme King        Features        Two thrilling game modes Classic and Story     Battle quirky bosses from a Duck to the  Final Form Ultra Corrupt King   Test your rhyming skills against the clock     Watch your score soar as you chain rhymes together     Climb the leaderboard and prove youre the ultimate wordsmith      In Story Mode face off against a cast of colorful characters each with their own unique word challenges Can you outsmart the Rappers beats or tame the Wolf Mans howls      Classic Mode puts your skills to the test in a race against time How many words can you rhyme before the clock runs out With each victory the challenge grows but so does your mastery      Perfect for word lovers puzzle enthusiasts and anyone looking to sharpen their linguistic prowess Rhyme God is more than just a game  its a journey through the power and playfulness of language       Download now and let the rhyming revolution begin Who knows You might just become the next Rhyme King

title: Retropair
logline: Be a retro console repair shop owner
description: Its not all that glitter is gold Half the story has never been told                                  Led Zeppelin   Ever dreamt of owning a cozy retro console repair shop in a sweet buzzling smalltown   In  Retropair  you play as a repair person without money troubles you are known in the neighbourhood which is inhabited by many gamers and its not uncommon for them to fall for buying a retro console or finding a longlost but much beloved device in their attic   And of course the wheel of time or wear hasnt stopped at the darlings So every now and then someone comes to see you to get some part repaired And while there they of course tell your their entire lifes story Controls   This game can be played with mouse  keyboard only   Binding Action Left Mouse Button GrabRelease Device Right Mouse Button GrabRelease Part Mouse Scoll Wheel Switch Viewpoint Spacebar Advance Visitor Monolog   Gameplay Your job is to accept your customers consoles repair them and give them back The repair process involves deconstructing the console identifying broken parts with diagnosis tools and replacing them while building the console back together     Your central tool is the cursor with which you can pick up move and place consoles or console parts Press the right mouse button to pick up a single part of a console such as a power button top hull or eject mechanism Press the left mouse button to pick up the compound object without detaching any part     Parts can only be placed into specific slots on a console so take care you get a context UI hint when placing a part on a console If the part doesnt slot in it wont be connected to the console     For diagnosis and utility you have four devices at hand a TV the  RetroScope 3000  the  Bottomless Pit  and the  Trash    RetroScope 3000   The RetroScope 3000 can scan exactly one piece of hardware for functionality It doesnt consider any parts attached to it so in order to confirm that a system is fully functional you will have to remove all parts and test them individually     Your trusty TV   The TV can confirm that a console is up and running It cant test plastic parts or individual chips only the mainboard and anything connected to it Plugging a part to the TV can have one of these outcomes     Nothing happens The part youre testing doesnt contain a mainboard   Blue screen The TV is on but doesnt receive a video signal Is the mainboard broken   Black screen The TV received a black video signal This most likely happens when the system works but there isnt a game cartridge plugged into it   Light blue screen The system is running Hooray Bottomless Pit   This is where broken parts go never to be seen again     Trash   The trash is a nighinfinite source of parts They might be broken they might have parts missing but they might also work perfectly   Credits Team Katharina StumbleDuck Broswik  itchio  3D Art 2D Art Daniel Faulo Schulz  itchio  Code Tech Art Game Design Gregor Snnichsen  itchio title: Random shop
logline: Buy and sell different items while uncovering misteries of a dark past
description: WARNING This game is currently under development including its itchio page Characters items storyline and features are subject to change in the final release You may encounter bugs glitches typographical errors or missing translations Any feedback is highly valued No special requirementstry out  Random Shop  on any browser with mouse or touchscreen support For the best experience playing in fullscreen mode is advised Random Shop  doesnt include any ingame ads or purchases   Please note This game may contain flashing lights or patterns that could trigger reactions in individuals with photosensitivity   Thank you so much for visiting this game This is my first released game and Im excited to share it with you   This games demo is fruit of my everlasting passion for videogames All sprites and story dialogues are made by me Please enjoy and feel free to share any feedback to improve the final release   Overview   Welcome to Random Shop   a unique shop management game where as the shopkeeper youll have to buy sell and combine different items to meet your customers needs   Managing the store wont be as easy as it looks unreliable suppliers mean youll often have to rely on luck to stock certain items while also managing limited inventory space Customers wont care if you have abundance of one particular kind of item   The game features an interactive tutorial ingame tips a range of gameplay personalization settings support for two languagesEnglish and Italian and an exhaustive ingame guide filled with anything you could ever need to know   Personalization   Customize  your workspace to reflect your style Choose from different slot and door aesthetics to make your shop truly your own       Image of available door styles as of 25012025   More personalization options will be added in the full version   Make your job easier with extra inventory slots or machinery to combine items increasing exponentially their selling value   Story   Your choices shape the world around you   Certain customer requests will influence the storyline based on how you respond Accepting or refusing a characters request might trigger different events altering the narrative and impacting the games world So think twice about whom you side withevery decision carries weight   Exploration   Many locations will be added later with development   Dont worry you wont be stuck behind the counter Step out and explore  the areas surrounding your shop at any time and without even having to worry about thieves  Exploring locations like the forgotten forest will enable you to unlock extra items uncover clues about many characters fates or influence the games story by changing the very stakes at play

title: BitBreaker
logline: A fast paste shooter were you break the game with you hacker skills
description: Story   BitBreaker   The game is rigged The system is against you So why play fair      As a rogue hacker you dive into BitBreaker an unbeatable security simulationnot to win but to tear it apart Every enemy every obstacle every rule is just bad code waiting to be rewritten Hack the battlefield turn the system against itself and break the game piece by piece Buff yourself nerf them and watch the simulation struggle to keep up      They built it to be unbreakable Lets prove them wrong    Controls   WASD  Movement LMB  ShootSelect Shift  Dash R  Reload E  Hackmodule LMB  Scroll wheel  Scrolling in the Hackmodule    Disclaimer We had some issues with the ending Wave 13 was origninally our last wave for the game so now from here thank you for playing we hope that you had a lot of fun and leave us a comment how you liked our game We interpreted the theme as you being the hacker playing the game and you break the game using the hacker module This gives you an advantage and allows you to play in a way that the developers never intended      Credits   Submitted to the PulseGamejam 2025 with the theme kaputtbroken by     MrMemo Coding     Luco3003 Pixelart      Used Assets     httpsassetstoreunitycompackagesaudiomusicelectronicthe8bitjukeboxlitemusicpack70436   httpsassetstoreunitycompackagesaudiosoundfxkeyboardsandtypewriters173188

title: Foxrio Playtest PULS JAM 2025
logline: Guide Foxrio through the broken realm of the Skylands while listening to the two devs bickering in your discord call
description: Jammers read before playing   ADJUST THE VOLUMES BY ACCESSING THE PAUSE MENU via Escape Tab P Menu Controller      Intro      Welcome to the playtest version of  Foxrio  a goofy platformer created during a  the 48 hours PULS GAME JAM  Guide Foxrio through the broken realm of the Skylands helping him to evade trouble and jump your way to the Very important quest item Almost everything was made in those 48 hours   This playtest version includes     2 semifunny  devs to listen to while you are testing their latest game 4 unique levels  to explore   Fluid controls  for well uh platforming   A vibrant handcrafted world  void of any personality D   Wed love your feedback to help us improve the game Let us know what you think in the comments or via the feedback form          Controls        Walk WASD     Jump Space     Pause Escape Tab P Menu Controller        The Team        Stead UK Visual Art Story Level Design   Tidali GER Code Audio Design UI Design Jam Page Design      Fun Facts      Foxrio is a play on Fox and Mario   Mechanics Tidali coded that didnt make it in the final build   Speeding up infinitely while walking Kicking a wall to boost yourself into the opposite direction this was implemented and felt good but the level designer chose to not use it smh Basically anything that made his hard labour of making a working rigidbody2D worth such as bouncy or slippery surfaces      Every asset piece of code or sound was made by us after the start of the jam and we are EXCEPTIONALLY proud of that Sounds were made by hand mouth by Tidali D   EXCEPT     The background music ingame that was made by Tidali for another project long before  the jam the  ambient wind from pixabay  used for our Game Off 2024 Game  Ryans Drive  and the grass footsteps from  this Ocular Bundle

title: Contrary Casino
logline: Gamble your Stats
description: Story   You play as a police robot that must investigate a shady casino  following a string of missing gamblers  This casino named the Contrary Casino is one with a terrifying reputation In the past it was the talk of the town But following a huge loss of the houses end it was never the same It was closed down temporarily and that time is when the casinos owner snapped They figured that gamblers valued life and money equally And since life is being fed into the slot machines they could come to life as well Following the reopening every gambler that lost from this casino was never heard of again naturally people stopped going out of fear Investigations revealed nothing so police and casinos citywide teamed up Send the luckiest gambling police robot to the Contrary to beat the house for good this time   Gameplay   Your wallet represents your health so avoid running out of it The enemies           wont make it easy and will attack you to ironically prevent you from gambling they will steal from your wallet if you get attacked so be careful Now how to get stronger You can gamble on the green tables with the exclamation mark and can bet on various of your stats be careful you could lose it all Another way to get stronger is to beat the enemies and rewards from it each enemy has a different minigame so the rewards will be based on your performance   Get as strong as possible and make it to the boss   Controls   WASD to Move Left Click to Attack Has a long cooldown so be careful Shift to Dash  In Coin Minigame Left Click to drag coins In Dice Minigame Left Click to swap Right Click to lock   Credits   coloredasterisk  Programming and Art   jukmifgguggh   Music and SFX   CandyAndy77  Writing and Inspiration    Only Premade Assets Used are the fonts  httpswww1001fontscomkarmafonthtml   Made for the Game Pop Game Jam at the U of C site         Note Your attack range is pretty small so figure out a way to attack them better     What do you mean you have a billion speed and cant move

title: Devoted Vampire
logline: A cop a wolf and the mysterious one How do you survive
description: Social Media     TWITTER  X    INSTAGRAM    YOUTUBE    TUMBLR    WEBSITE     Currently only day 1 of Devoted Vampire is released About    Rarely do residents go out at night because they fear for their lives Police often leave this area alone due to its connections to unknown people of power It is the perfect hunting ground for a vampire such as yourself    However after seeing blood in your apartments hallway and a cop showing sudden interest in your turf you will need to put extra effort into finding your prey    Keep yourself from accusations and find out who is behind all the murders within the limited daylight hours your vampire body can handle    Features    Animated sprites   20 min of gameplay   3k words   Your choices impact the clues you find out   3 potential love interests characters are referred to as they or nicknames   Written in second person and has no mention of main characters gender    Credits   Artwork Story Game         CheriBeanArt     Sound   music   Euphluca   Engine     Rpg Maker Degica     Plug ins     VisuStella AutMouse Labs DKPlugins    Special thank you to       SilverYuki  for playtesting proofreading and providing moral support    The Sloth  for creating the journal entries that I failed to implement    Ikka  for playtesting and reading     The Emperor   for reading the first version of the script       For Mac users    It probably does not work   For Android users    This game has only been roughly playtested in  Bluestacks

description: rnga Idle  is a demoprototype made in 100 hours personal challenge see  YouTube Devlog Here  but Im working on a full version coming to Steam Wishlisting the game really helps Wishlist on Steam  Steam Page   Keep up to date with  rnga Idle  on discord  Discord   Support me develop the game on Patreon  penusbmic  Patreon   About the Game   Embark on a magical adventure in  rnga  Master powerful spells collect epic loot and uncover ancient secrets as you grow from a novice mage to an archwizard Upgrade your abilities automate your spellcasting and watch your power groweven while youre away          rnga   is an idle game meaning it primarily plays itself Your character automatically moves and attacks enemies without your input However you can choose to play actively by using characterspecific skills and controlling the hero While this active playstyle isnt required it can help you progress faster or overcome tougher challenges

title: aVoid

title: My Little Balcony Garden
description: Deutsch             Wolltest du dich schon immer um kaputte Balkonpflanzen kmmern Wenn ja dann ist dieses Spiel genau das Richtige fr dich            In  My Little Balcony Garden  kmmerst du dich mit Werkzeugen wie Giekanne Pinzette und Giftspray um die Pflanzen auf deinem Balkon um sie vor dem Sterben zu bewahren           Die Pflanzen knnen vertrocknen und von Unkraut sowie Parasiten befallen werden wodurch sie noch schneller eingehen                     Schaffst du es die Pflanzen zum Blhen zu bringen oder werden sie in deinen Hnden komplett sterben        Ps Du kannst die Katze streicheln        English             Have you always wanted to take care of broken balcony plants If so then this game is just the thing for you                   In  My Little Balcony Garden  you take care of the plants on your balcony with tools such as a watering can tweezers and poison spray to save them from dying           The plants can dry out and become infested with weeds and parasites causing them to die even faster                   Will you manage to get the plants to bloom or will they die completely in your hands        Ps You can pet the cat

title: Re
logline: Puzzle game using clones
description: In this immersive 8bit style game you will have to solve puzzle to escape an old house To achieve this you will need to use your own ghosts to solve puzzles Will you have enough coordination with yourself to escape  Lets find out     We hope youll have fun playing this game We putted a lot of effort creating this so you can enjoy it      Team 73     If you need hints spoiler        You have to hold interactions E in multiple places to let you time to do things that the interactions unlocks            More hints spoiler    For each problem you have to hold one or two interactions to unlock something that another yourself can do  Make sure you hold interactions long enough to give you time to explore the map to find what each problem unlocks what items or modification of the map           Well       Solution    First you have to get out of the first room by taking the keys in the drawer Next you have to interact with both shelves at the same time in the library to unlock the office In the office you will find something to light up the fire by searching in the desk Then you light up the fire and take the keys to unlock the laundry room where you have to interact with the electrical cabinet and the laundry machine you can then take the keys and go to the bottom bathroom where you have to interract with the toilet paper Thats the first part You need to interact with the other toilet paper at the same time in the top left bathroom wich can be unlocked by interacting with the clock wich is just next to the bathroom door When you finally interact with the two toilet papers a grey key spawns next to the exit and you can leave

title: FootyFaces Quiz
logline: Test your football knowledge
description: Welcome to FootyFaces Quiz  The ultimate trivia experience that combines your passion for football with the excitement of challenging quizzes Are you ready to test your knowledge and compete against players worldwide     Game Modes    Classic Quiz Dive into a world of trivia where your football knowledge is put to the ultimate test Guess the face of famous football legends and current superstars Can you identify them all          Online Duels Challenge friends and players from around the globe in thrilling headtohead trivia battles Prove youre the best and climb to the top of the leaderboard     Daily Tasks  Missions Keep your skills sharp with daily trivia tasks and missions Complete them to earn rewards and unlock new challenges     Leaderboard Show off your quiz skills Compete for top spots and earn your place among the trivia elite See how you rank against fellow football fanatics     Unique Events    TikTacToe  Crossword Events Experience unique gameplay twists with our special TikTacToe and Crossword trivia events Strategize your moves in TikTacToe or solve crossword puzzles to test your trivia prowess These events add an exciting layer of challenge and fun     Additional Level Packs Expand your trivia journey with various level packs covering different football themes and topics From legendary players to iconic matches theres something for every football enthusiast Unleash your inner quiz master     Why Choose FootyFaces Quiz    Completely Free to play with optional inapp purchases for an enhanced experience     Regular updates with new questions events and level packs    A fun and engaging way to learn more about your favorite sport while competing with a community of likeminded fans

title: CronoPunk
logline: Platformer and puzzle videogame
description: CRONOPUNK   Descripcin   Cronopunk es un juego para un solo jugador que combina los aspectos caractersticos de los gneros Plataformas y Puzzles el cual se presenta en vista lateral un mundo en 2D El objetivo del juego es avanzar a travs de las diferentes estancias de un mundo con estilo futurista punk para ello el protagonista utilizar su capacidad de crear versiones alternas de si mismo que le ayudan a superar las dificultades     Historia   El protagonista descubre como viajar en el tiempo y crear versiones alternas de si mismo es por este motivo que la Ojologa la polica de dicho universo alterno futurista  lo persigue incansablemente   Perks   Las siguientes habilidades se pueden obtener en las diferentes estancias del juego y estas permitirn al jugador fluir de un lugar a otro   Roca  Al ramificarse la prxima versin del personaje crear una roca esta permitir al jugador usarla de plataforma escudo o lo que se le ocurra Impulso  Al ramificarse deja un punto de impulso que permite a la versin actual del jugador propulsarse en la direccin indicada Explosin  Al ramificarse explota la versin alterna y con ella las paredes dbiles y enemigos que entren en su rango de destruccin   Controles   Movimiento  A y D   y     Apuntar  WASD      Salto  Barra espaciadora  Z   Disparo  X  J   Ramificar  C  K   Pausar  P  Esc Reiniciar nivel  R     Autores   Equipo de programacin   Adrin Del Pozo Hernndez  Rayian Samuel Garca Bazn  SamKiller30 Diego Snchez  Diegol22 Luis Parres Snchez  Luis Parres Miguel Norberto Prez Ballester  Miguelale23 Diego Montenegro Calvo  Dmontec   Equipo de arte   Mariya Magdalena Ivanova Zlayatrska  m_kitten Alejandro Conde  Games For Robots Tamara Lajusticia Jiale He   Chao   Equipo de msica y sonido   Adrin Del Pozo Hernndez  Rayian Miguel Norberto Prez Ballester  Miguelale23       Este juego ha sido realizado para la Game Jam  ConJamOn2025  recibiendo el segundo lugar en esta

title: ONE MINUTE LEFT
logline: A speedrun game made for the untitled game jam 107

THAAAAT      Story   the protagonist that you controlling is Michael Michael is kinda messy to deliver because he almost crashes but one day the boss says that he need to deliver a pizza to a kids boss talks to you that hes getting late but you are so but sooooo busy that you cant even hear him somethimes   but there all the call quotes   1st call MICHAEL WHERE ARE YOU YOU ARE IS TAKING TOO LONG   2nd call MICHAEL IM NOT JOKING WHERE THE HELL ARE YOU   3rd call oh gosh i should not call from that pizza because is tAKING TOO LO   4th call MICHAEL IF YOU DINT DELIVER THAT PIZZA IM GONNA FIRE YOU no seriously im GONNA FIRE YOU litteraly     gameplay     the game starts with the timer running out thats the title of this game  AWWWW MAN REALLY  anyway no matter that when you die or beated the game it will still run and theres 15 or 29 if you entered on the lap 2 portal levelsrooms to pass so its very easy rightRIIIIGHT well there are some parts that you will slip and die oh yea i almost forgot that when you die just wait to the timer run out and then when the timer run out you can play it again with a technique     controls     Press A or D to control michael            Press W to jump                                              Press E to dash   and   Press R to reset   inspiration   most of things like the controls and the charather was based from Pizza Tower title: Revive  Repeat
logline: Death is not in the cards
description: Revive  Repeat   My first game inspired by  FORWARD Escape the Fold  by Christophe Coyard This is a  cardbased roguelike RPG  where every decision brings you closer to victoryor defeat   Features   Tactical gameplay   choose your path combine artifacts and adapt to new challenges   Instructions       When you level up you receive 1 point for upgrades in the lobby    Every second level a new ability becomes available for selection    An ability activates automatically when the required mana amount is reached Enemies with a red outline attack first If you encounter issues with progress or gameplay you can perform a full reset in the game settings   Two game modes       Abyss   an endless survival challenge    Quick Mode   a storydriven adventure Character progression   collect artifacts upgrade your abilities and prepare for the final battle 5 biomes filled with dangers and bosses   can you clear them all in a single run   Credits   Card elements Sebastiaan van Hijfte Cainos   Can you survive the entire journey without failing Test yourself in Revive  Repeat

title: Stressed Out Level 1
description: Stressed Out es un videojuego psicopedaggico diseado para sensibilizar sobre la ansiedad en jvenes adultos A travs de una narrativa inmersiva y mecnicas de juego tipo metroidvania el jugador acompaa a Tyler en su lucha contra sus inseguridades La jugabilidad evoluciona de 2D a 3D a medida que Tyler enfrenta sus miedos ms profundos culminando en un enfrentamiento con Blurryface la manifestacin de su ansiedad Con un estilo visual surrealista y una ambientacin sonora inspirada en la banda Twenty One Pilots el juego busca generar empata y conciencia sobre la salud mental

title: Entropy Seekers PortfolioArchive
logline: Video Game prototype used as portfolio made in about a week as a begginer uploaded here just to be archived
description: ESPAOL      Este juego es el primero que hice   Hecho con Construct 2 Hecho para la Escuela Animaciones hechas en Dragon Bones   No est terminado y es un prototipo muy primitivo y precario Lo ms destacable son los dibujos realizados para los sprites y la idea del juego que permite cambiar entre controles de BeatEmUp y Plataformero   La nica versin es para Navegador     Controles   J  Para cambiar modos   WASD  Para moverse   SPACE  Para saltar   K  Para atacar          ENGLISH      This is the first video game I made   Made in Construct 2 Made for School Animations made in Dragon Bones   It isnt finished and its a primitive and precarious prototype The most remarkable features are the sprites drawn by me and the main game idea about changing between BeatEmUp and Platformer controls   Only Build is for Web     Controls     J  For changing modes     WASD  For moving     SPACE  For jumping     K  For attacking

title: Steve Harvey
logline: movementbased endurance game of dodging
description: An alternate reality where Steve Harvey became evil       This is a one button level based game where you must dodge the capture blocks and go through gates to make it to Steve Harveys evil secret lair       This is the story of Steve Harvey III a descendent of the evil mastermind Steve Harvey who took over the world 10 years ago Steve was born with the ability to transform into a block due to inheriting his great grandfathers DNA He is the only one who can break through the capture gates that his great grandfather created His other family members have been missing since he was a child so he has been training to take revenge on his great grandfather     You must grow stronger and avoid all of the obstacles in order to defeat Steve Harvey       cube  capture cube invunaribility       There is only a test level so far but more levels coming soon       Controls any key or tap

title: Cave of cards
logline: GamePop2025 submission page
description: This is a game jam submission by a group of 3 people for the GamePop 2025 gamejam The theme is Lets go Gambling Which made me think of the treasure dungeons in FF14 so we decided to create a arena wave shooter where after you finish a wave a card mini game would appear where you would use the circle infront of the two cards to guess if the card on the left is lesser or greater than the card on the right if your guess was correct it would give you an advantage for the next wave if you failed it would make the wave harder   Controls   Primary mouse Fire   Movement wasd Space jump   Advance to next level 2 Bunny hopping makes you go zooooooom   Gambling mechanic is current not fully implemented so advancing for further stages is bound to a button If you think the card on the right is greater than the one on the left you would go into the circle to change it to an up arrow If you think the card on the right will be a lower than select a down arrow The card game will disappear 10 seconds after its finished   Our group consisted of an architect 2nd year software developer and 1st year game programmer Everyone was quite new to using unity   Since we had limited experience we used premade assests and focused on building something with those assests we used assests from   loafbrr MinesAndCaveSet on the unity store   Kenney  for the circle on the ground and used assest forge to create the cards   Kitkays skeleton pack on itchio   Tallbeard  background sound   sfxr  sfx   JDSherbert  UI SFX pack   We are submitting for the edmonton prize pool

title: Le Chacalot Vengeur
description: Le Chacalot Vengeur     Dans les profondeurs mystrieuses de locan un chacalot nomm  Whaley  dcouvre un terrible secret  les bateaux humains polluent son habitat et mettent en danger ses amis marins Dtermin   protger son royaume aquatique  Whaley  dcide de prendre les choses en main Avec une force incroyable et une agilit surprenante il saute hors de leau pour renverser les navires et restaurer la paix dans locan     Chaque saut est une bataille pique contre les envahisseurs et chaque victoire rapproche  Whaley  de son objectif  un ocan pur et libre Mais attention les humains ne se laissent pas faire facilement Ils envoient des bateaux de plus en plus puissants et des piges dangereux pour arrter  Whaley      Aidez  Whaley    sauver son monde et   devenir le hros lgendaire des profondeurs marines  Comment jouer Tu scores en cassant des bateaux pour cela tu dois plonger pour sauter hors de leau et rattrir dessus Tu perds des points de vie si tu te fais toucher par un calamar un sous marins o si tu touches la coque dun bateau Au fur et   mesure que le temps passe ton chacalot grandi

description: ESPAOL     Ay Chancla Es un videojuego donde el jugador personifica a un nio llamado Juanito lleno de energa y curiosidad que tratar de escapar de Mara su madre luego de haberla desobedecido y cruzar la lnea de respeto hacia ella En un acto de disciplina Mara decide dar reprimenda a su hijo con su famosa chancla y en un abrir y cerrar de ojos Juanito se encuentra corriendo a toda velocidad por su vecindario esquivando obstculos y desesperado por evitar el golpe de la furiosa chancla   ENGLISH     Ah Chancla is a video game where the player takes on the role of a young boy named Juanito full of energy and curiosity who tries to escape from his mother Mara after disobeying her and crossing the line of respect In an act of discipline Mara decides to reprimand her son with her famous flipflopChancla and in the blink of an eye Juanito finds himself running at full speed through his neighborhood dodging obstacles and desperately trying to avoid the blow of the furious flipflop

title: Capuchin Adventures
description: Capuchin Adventures is an exciting fanmade game inspired by the popular mechanics of Gorilla Tag Set in a vibrant world filled with unique challenges  Capuchin Adventures  takes the iconic tag gameplay to a new level with fun creative twists and an adventurous spirit Players take on the role of agile capuchin monkeys navigating through immersive environments using natural climbing jumping and swinging mechanics      With a focus on exploration and teamwork  Capuchin Adventures  lets players engage in fastpaced tag matches dodge tricky obstacles and team up for epic multiplayer adventures The game offers various themed maps and zones from lush jungles to mysterious caves each designed to test your speed agility and strategic thinking      Whether youre a competitive tag player or just looking for some casual fun with friends  Capuchin Adventures  brings a fresh and exhilarating experience to the Gorilla Tag genre Race to outmaneuver your friends become the best at tag and discover hidden secrets along the way Get ready for endless hours of fun challenges and laughter in this playful capuchinthemed world

title: 2048Puzzle
description: This is a puzzle game inspired by the gameplay of  2048       Although its just a demo it already features 30 levels offering around 1 hour of gameplay   Mouse and gamepad are not supported at the moment   Here are the keyboard controls        Use the arrow keys or WASD to move    Press Space or Enter to confirm   This game supports the following languages   Chinese English   It is available on the following platforms    HTML Due to file size limits the game includes sound effects but no background music Windows Linux untested macOS untested   When playing online please note the following      Adjust the display to fullscreen or windowed mode through the ingame settings page In fullscreen mode the ESC key may cause conflicts so its recommended to play in windowed mode   Feel free to ask any questions or share suggestions and thanks to everyone who clicks on this page
