title: Skyy Tribes 2
logline: A hacknslash  type side scroller with many territories to claim with your soldiers
description: Game Description   A fun hack n Slash that follows and builds on Skyy Tribes The second game of the series takes you on another mission to cut down the enemies of Moon at Midnight and claim all the territories nearby   Expanding your claim of the land Recruit new allies and improve the quality of life for your citizens providing resources for them to build a better village   Controls   Skyy Tribes 2 is played with the keyboard only Use the directional keys to move around Up and Down switch your current battle lane 1 2 or 3 Press  Z  to attack and  X  to defend   There are a few things you can interact with in the background just move into the upper battle lane and Moon Chief will interact with them automatically   Some World Lore   The Skyy Islands are where the inhabitants live They are long juts of land that sit between clouds The upper and lower levels of the islands are connected through tall strong main veins   No one knows where the top or bottom levels are but as far as anyone seems to know the surface is just a huge ocean   Character Profile           Moon Chief This is a little about the Character         Golden Skyy Spear This is a little about the spear         Special Thanks   To all the consistent players     Play The Series   Skyy Tribes 1 Itch   Skyy Tribes 3 In Development

title: Heavenly Meadows
logline: Visual novel
description: Welcome to Heavenly Meadows     This is a small project by  Wand of Pixels  a new startup from Peru We are a group of friends from diverse backgrounds learning about game development and creating experiences that leave a lasting impact on players      We began our journey in January 2025 and were excited to present our first project  Heavenly Meadows       Set in a medieval magical world on the continent of  Thyresa   Heavenly Meadows  is a prestigious academy where students refine their magical abilities While renowned across the magical world the academy harbors dark secrets within its walls      Our protagonist is a new student abandoned by his parents and taken in by the academys headmistress At first he experiences a seemingly normal school lifeuntil everything changes      Join  Alfina Liefi and Francis  as they embark on thrilling adventures in this enchanting world      This is just the first step in our journey and wed love to hear your feedback to improve our writing and development Let us know what you think     Features   4 chapter game 2 stories and posible love interests   Multiple Endings 1 bad ending 2 good endings You will have to find which one is our prefer ending    Dark story       Content Warnings   Death and sacrifice mentioned   Lets know the team     Wand of Pixels  A new group from Peru ready to create games and learn new skills          Maru Ichiro  Writer founder and visual novel enthusiast Has played countless VNs He also works on music and composes some songs       Menita_dev  Programmer composer and soontobe mother and wife She learned to code from scratch and is determined to build a career in IT after transitioning from social work       KingPotatoe  Project manager editor and soontobe father and husband He decided to follow his dream of creating a video game company A psychologist by profession he aims to develop a psychological game that feels like a safe space     Warning   Because we didnt have enough budget we had to use IA art for all the scenes and characters We plan to hire and artist  based in our progress  I hope you can understand     SFX   Menita_dev   From Pixabay  Musictown  makesoundmusic Lexin_Music NoCopyrightSound633Tim_Kulig_Free_Music JuliusH TurtleBeats epic_musictracks  Jeremusic70 VitMatNotes trtasfiq NeoMmusic Universfield Nesterouk

title: A House Alone demo version
logline: A haunting psychological horror where a house twists with grief and reality warps with every step
description: Step into the eerie remains of a recently abandoned house where solitude loss and fear manifest through the Five Stages of Grief As you navigate a repeating room reality begins to warpeach iteration distorting the space unraveling its story piece by piece Objects scattered throughout the house hold fragments of its past waiting to be uncovered   Designed as an immersive psychological experience this game focuses on atmosphere and emotion blending a lofi VHSinspired aesthetic with haunting audio to heighten tension and unease      Inspired by indie horror and suspense titles we crafted this project with a passion for deep psychological immersion Developed in Unity 3D this game offers a short but intense journey into the unknown       Psychological horror with a strong narrative   Dynamic environment that changes with each iteration   Lofi degraded visuals inspired by VHS horror   Immersive audio design to amplify fear and tension      Can you face what lingers in the house or will it consume you       DISCLAIMER  This game was created as a   demo project by two students in 2019 for a Multimedia Computing class as part of the program for the Bachelors in Multimedia Art and does not reflect a fully polished experience

title: Ochre Heart
logline: Free your caverns from the infection that is running rampant in this metroidvania
description: Find the source of the infection to free the caverns from its grasp But beware  you may need its power to defeat the corrupted creatures that stand in your way      Save the caverns   Ever since the Ochre Sap appeared things have been falling apart The Custodians no longer keep their domains corrupted into inaction or violence   Only one Custodian remains unmarred You Make your way to the source of the infection and destroy it   Explore the domains   Travel through the domains crumbling under the Ochre Sap and discover ways to get stronger whatever the cost      Notes   Gamepad and keyboard supported controls shown ingame The game saves your progress when you rest at statues so if you softlock yourself somewhere we forgot to block off you can quit and load in again from the pause menu Esc and it should respawn you at the last statue you rested at There are 7 hearts to find some more hidden than others But you dont need all of them to beat the game collect a handful for progressing and the rest if youd like to explore and discover   Known issues   For some people releasing the analog stick on the gamepad while moving will flip the platypus in the other direction If thats happening to you and it bothers you too much theres a Windows build named Deadzone that has a much larger deadzone which seems to solve the problem   Credits   Adam Wilson   Music  SFX Cannice   Art  Animation Lead did the vast majority of the art in the environment Jaco van Hemert   Coding Game design Level design Art  Animation did some VFX and one or two level assets

title: Kaputt Factory
logline: 1 vs 1 krushing competition on a crazy recycling factory
description: Youre a lawful employee of the Kaputt Factory Your job is to krush objects to meet the quotas However only one employee could become the Krusher of the Month    This could be you or your working neighbour if you dont pay attention   Krush the right objects send the dangerous ones to your competitor and be the first to meet the quota   You have to You need to   Welcome to Kaputt Factory    This game is a local 1v1 party game playing on a single keyboard   This game was made in the context of the PULS Game Jam hosted by  httpsbayerischerrundfunkitchio     The theme of the jam was Kaputt The game was developped in Unity and here is the things we used to create the game faster     ChatGPT for code    Claude AI for shaders     Epic Toon FX pack    Fake Point Lights URP    Differents Sounds FX found on the internet     Members of the team    Victor CHIOREAN  Game design code   Philippe JOUSSE  Game design code   Oscar CHENEVIER  Game design code   Yoan AGOSTINI  Game design Shader art VFX art   Lucien DELMAS  Game design 3D art  musiic composer

logline: Memorization of wisdom and combination of spells to destroy your enemies

title: Block Combo Crunch
logline: Block puzzle game inspired by 2048
description: Block Combo Crunch is a free offline game thats perfect for passing the time and challenging your brain with fun block puzzle challenges The goal is simple yet enjoyable solve block puzzles by sliding and merging the same blocks to clear the board and achieve high scores Mastering the art of strategic block placement will make the block puzzles even more satisfying Whether youre looking to relax or test your mind Block Combo Crunch offers the perfect balance of fun and brainpower with blocks With two exciting game modesClassic Mode and Challenge ModeBlock Combo Crunch delivers hours of block puzzle action This offline game enhances your logic and problemsolving skills while providing a satisfying relaxing experience

title: reforge
logline: Forgs tower was shattered and now he has to collect the broken parts to restore his home

title: Project GAIA
description: This game was created for Puls Jam     Unfortunately this is an older build as the latest one just finished one minute after the jam deadline Still well be uploading the newest build as soon as possible   You can download the latest build for windows here httpsmeganzfileaoglxJRSxVEsLfhZmX8SRFJaSry6I1Q3PRQSbz0gtYvLYhNu8CQ   Controls   WASD  Walk E  Interact Pick up capsule and put in placementpoints Escape  Pause Left Click  You can Left click on the Map Right Click  Hold Inspect pickedup Item Q  Throw Item     Core Gameplay Features     Mix  Deploy Capsules  Craft experimental weathercontrolling capsules and carefully insert them into launch mechanisms But handle with careone wrong move and theyll shatter    Live Disaster Management  Monitor an advanced map system for realtime catastrophe updates Input coordinates manually to launch countermeasures before its too late    TimeSensitive Decisions  Every 30 seconds a new catastrophe emerges If four remain active for too long its game over    Fully Interactive Base  Operate control panels input data press buttons and pull levers Every interaction has weight every mistake has consequences    Dynamic Soundscape  Every storm comes with an audio warningalarms radio broadcasts and sirens will keep you on edge    A Dark Conspiracy  Your job isnt just about stopping storms Cryptic corporate posters unsettling announcements and a growing sense of paranoia will reveal a sinister truth

title: Just Twin Beaver
logline: Destroy your Beaver Twins Dam
description: ____________________________________________________________________________    What the heck is this    Just Twin Beaver is a  chaotic competitive  game where twin beavers  Tady and Dom  battle to  destroy each others dam first while keeping their own intact The twist  YOU have to share the controls  Each player wields a stick leading to teamwork or total disaster And of course  conflicts are settled by flinging cans with sticks in your mouths   __________________________________________________________________________   Controls   Keyboard or Gamepad   P1  WASD or Left Stick   P2  Moving Arrows or Right Stick   To Play on GamePad  Start  Option   __________________________________________________________________________     Why you should play this    Angry beavers in a legendary sibling showdown   Highspeed can fights that defy both physics and logic   We love beavers You love beavers  Also how many games let you throw cans with a stick in your mouth Exactly   __________________________________________________________________________   Who made this madness   A team of  sleepdeprived developers artists designers and composers  came together for  ComJamOn 2025  a local game jam at  Universidad Complutense of Madrid     The theme  Branches     Team   Francisco Miguel Galvn   Gameplay Programming  Cristina Mora Velasco   Gameplay Programming Victor Herrero   Gameplay Programming Francisco Blmel Araya   Gameplay Design and Production Younes Zaizoun   Programming Ignacio Lumbano   Programming Ian Jasper Frew   Programming Eva Robles Haloui   Art  Nerea Herreros Lpez   Music Composition Pablo Gavira   SFX Design   __________________________________________________________________________    Download it now   Come on  click the button  You dont want to miss out on this beaver war

title: Bertis Factory Escape

title: An Educational Game about Pinecones
logline: A definitelynothorror homage to early 2000s educational software Seriously this is definitely a normal game
description: Learn about pinecones   Welcome to a 2000s era educational nature program about pinecones narrated by a famous nature documentary narrator Absolutely  nothing  strange going on here   An homage to 1990s2000s era educational video games as well as Planet Earthnature documentaries David Attenborough is my hero     Content Warning     Unsettling imagery and audio         FEATURES     Learn about pinecones Enjoy 5 interactive pinecone activities Learn everything you could want to know about pinecones   Accessibility Feature  Click on the checkbox to enable subtitlesclosed captioning no audio descriptions If it is enabled in the middle of a voiceline it will wait for the next voiceline to show the subtitle             CREDITS     Kimya Taheri    Game ConceptDesign Audio Design Ben Hecker   Programming Game Design Media Background Music  Drivin from Animal Crossing A few sounds from Freesoundorg with some mixing and editing Images from old Windows XP image archives as well as nature websites for the pinecones       INFO     Engine  Unity Date  September 2024 Time to Make  1 Day plus another day later for creating a subtitle system Made For  1 week rapid prototype project for a studio game class NYU Game Design         CONTENT NOTE     Important note  this game uses a TTS software that recreated Sir David Attenboroughs voice I am strictly against genAI tools for image generation as well as deepfake technology that ruin peoples lives and livelihood As an artist and occasional voice actress I take deep offense to its use especially for commercial profitgenerating purposes Full disclosure I marked this game as containing AI because of the tool I used for the voice narration No other AI was used    This assignment was originally made for a project for uni and was supposed to pay homage to early 2000s educational games as well as Planet Earth and similar nature documentaries I grew up watching on the BBC hence why I felt it was necessary for the design of the game to include this voice The professor also approved its usage since this is an experimental game I was using it for lighthearted comedic noncommercial you cannot donate to this page and educational purposes That being said if anyone contacts me wanting to take it down for using the likeness of Attenborough especially if its someone within his circle I will take the game down out of respect Id like to think hed find this funny though        AUTHORS NOTE     Decided to pay homage to the super weird educational games I grew up on in school   Our prompt involved pinecones so I did research into how pinecones work and what role they play in their trees life cycle It was absolutely fascinating In the end I found a  lovely video produced by Headspace  that summarized the cycle neatly and used it as the basis for my pinecone descriptions   I wanted the game to feel simple similar to how 1990s2000s educational games felt These games made up the bulk of my childhood and while they were fun they could often be absurd or condescending with no consistency for difficulty I wanted to capture that in this game so I wrote all of the voicelines for the narratorteacher sound condescending and convoluted even when you get the correct answer I also made the game overly simplistic and used the background of a Windows XP desktop and the illusion of its UI to capture this oldschool feel I also used its startup and shut down sounds I thought it would be funny as this entire game is a bit of a joke to have the game slowly turn into horror with the sound effects music and narrative slowly devolving and becoming creepier over time    Lastly I wanted to pay homage to the nature documentary genre I grew up on Sir David Attenborough documentaries on the BBC and wanted to find a way to incorporate him I was also inspired by the  PokeEarth series on YouTube  where a VFX creator has taken to creating realistic documentaries of Pokmon and he originally began the series by using audio from David Attenboroughs documentaries with the occasional TTS voice to say Pokmon and other specific words I didnt have enough time to clip and splice pieces of voice clips from The Green Planet series he did several years ago so instead I used a TTS voice based on his voice to capture the nature documentary feel      Fun Tidbit  Worked with Ben to create a system so I could add subtitles manually Only realized once I presented my project to the class that none of the international students could understand what was being said and a handful of native English speakers couldnt understand it either because they werent used to the British dialect haha        KNOWN BUGS     made in a few days so anything is possible lol

title: Ricky The Runner
logline: Endless Side Scroller Prototype
description: This game is currently in prototype stages being created by university students for a mobile game development project  Please leave any comments that will help improve on our game anything is appreciated  Please fill out this quick google form to give us crucial feedback  httpsformsgleC88Qz9PkVKbK4Wm1A COMPATIBILITY This game can be played on windows and android devices WHAT IS IT Ricky The Runner is a side scroller game which took inspiration from other games such as Super Mario Run Dinosaur Game Jetpack Joyride  As the player it is your goal to gain as many coins as possible without falling off of the screen HOW TO PLAY Mobile Jump  Tap Screen Double Jump  Tap Screen again after Jumping once HOW TO PLAY Windows Jump  Left Mouse Button Double Jump  Left Mouse Button again after jumping once FUTURE PLANS In future we are focusing on implementing roguelike elements into the overall gameplay improving on replay ability and encouraging unique runs

title: Perfection
logline: Find the imperfections in the pattern
description: Repair the patterns to restore Perfection   A satisfying little puzzlelike game where you need to figure out which part of a given structure makes it imperfect  makes it Kaputt in a way   The game should be intuitive you dont have to read this But if youre struggling Click on the part of the structure that seems inconsistent misaligned or unfitting You can also just click on parts randomly if youre stuck  there is no penalty If you want to know all the keyboard controls from the getgo press  Esc   Q  or  E  to open a menu containing the level selection as well as a list of all the keyboard controls   The game was developed in 48 hours as part of the  PULS Game Jam  2025 with the theme Kaputt   I used Unity and the following additional assetstools   DOTween HOTween v2 by Demigiant Feel by More Mountains GUI  Mono Round by Layer Lab Modern UI SFX  sound pack by Cyberleaf Studio Odin Inspector and Serializer by Sirenix Pro Sound Collection by Gamemaster Audio Universal Sound FX by Imphenzia vFavorites 2 by kubacho lab   I also briefly used Inkscape

title: Whiskerium
logline: pointandclick space scifi mystery
description: Introduction   Embark on a pointandclick adventure to unravel the mystery onboard   You are a cat on a futuristic spaceship in the distant future All humans onboard have disappeared but how and why This demo features the first scene of the mystery   How to Play   Point and click on different objects in the scene to see how they interact Your goal is to help the cat escape the cryo chamber   The game currently comes with the first level I recommend using a desktop to play Stuck  Click on hint in the topright This hint is specific to your current step in the puzzle After the game jam is over and judging has concluded I plan to add more levels   Acknowledgements     Music by Shaydow License code EU5I6QQ3MSA   All the art is handdrawn and animated by me Most importantly this includes the isometric cryo chamber that you see in the game The sound effects are either created by me using various objects or are modified versions of sounds from freesoundorg

title: JANITORS Demo
logline: Step into the shoes of Bazza the galaxys top cleaner in this fastpaced FPS roguelite
description: Suit up as Bazza the most elite cleaner the galaxy has ever known When robot infestations threaten humanity world governments dont call the armythey call  The Janitors    Dive into the chaos of this scifi FPS roguelite blending the intensity of bullet hell with the thrill of firstperson combat Blast through endless waves of mechanical nightmares dodge their deadly projectiles and turn their mess into your masterpiece    Key Features    Bullet Hell Reimagined  Experience the frenetic splitsecond dodging of arcade classics in a fully immersive FPS format Endless Mayhem  Each run is a fresh challenge of mayhem in a chaotic fight for the high score  Upgrade Your Arsenal  Collect resources midbattle to unlock powerful upgrades devastating new weapons and special perks to suit your playstyle  Mechanical Chaos Human Precision  Hone your reflexes and aim in order to survive ever expanding waves of enemies  Roguelite Progression  Die learn repeat Bring your newfound knowledge and tools to the next run and aim to clean deeper than ever before   Are you ready to mop up the galaxys filthiest secrets and leave a pristine battlefield in your wake Its time to grab your mop and your gun and join  The Janitors    Alpha release demo for the upcoming Janitors Horde Survival game

title: Crystal Catch
description: Crystal Catch  Puls Game Jam 2025   Step onto the frozen lake where serene beauty meets thrilling challenge In  Crystal Catch  you have  10  minutes  to catch as many fish as you can  without breaking through the ice      The gentle glow of the  Northern Lights  dances faintly in the sky adding a touch of magic to your icy adventure Stay calm cast your line and carefully balance your movements Every successful catch inches you closer to a high score but every wrong move could send you plunging into the freezing depths Crystal Catch  was developed as part of the  Puls Game Jam 2025  Built within a limited timeframe this charming icefishing adventure invites you to test your skills and patience on thin ice     Controls  How to Play Crystal Catch     Move  Use  W A S D  to carefully walk across the ice Watch your step  the surface is fragile    Fish  Press the  Spacebar  to cast your line Hold it to reel in fish then release to catch them    Store Your Catch  Once youve caught a fish walk close to the  Storage Crate  to automatically place your fish inside        Tip  Keep moving and balancing your steps to avoid falling through the ice     Will you master the ice and prove yourself as the ultimate angler Or will the crystalclear waters claim another victim     Credits    Programming       Yannik Brndle    Nadine Schwch    Steffen Winternheimer      Graphics Envato       MographMotions    themefire    yandidesigns      Font Envato       giemons      Sounds Envato       HollywoodEdge    TibaSFX    GameChestAudio    SoundJay    sonicboom          AI Tools Used     GitHub Copilot  Assisted with code autocompletion ChatGPT  Game title and text generation

title: The WinForms of Isaac
logline: The Binding of Isaac Boss Fight fanmade recreation in WinForms
description: The WinForms of Isaac is a fanmade recreation of a The Binding of Isaac Boss Fight but using WinForms   The game only consists in the fight with a wellknown Boss using part of Isaacs classic arsenal     Setup   Just download the binary file from the here or from my  GitHub Page  and play    Project Usage Explanation   There is an ingame controls aid which pops up a window with all the games controls by pressing the  C  key   These are the controls     WASD Move the Character   Arrows Move the Attack   E Place bombs   Space AcceptSkip   Escape Exit      About the Project   This is one of the projects I made while studying for my Programming degree It involved creating an object that bounces off the screens edges and changes its direction accordingly   This project is merely a school prototype and does not attempt nor succeed in replicating the original games gameplay visuals or audio quality Its purpose is solely to demonstrate that a fairly simple game can be created using technology not specifically designed for gaming such as WinForms     All the sprites of the game are made from scratch based on the original games textures   You can  buy the original game  to support their great work      Releases   There are no real plans to enhance this project to make it closer to the original material but some updates may come in the future You can also visit my GitHub as this project was published as a Open Source with a  Apache 20 Licence  so anyone can use the code in it   If you find any nonintended functionality error or enhancement please report it to the  Issues Page  in the GitHub page

description: OVERVIEW       Night Prowler  is a short creepy horror experience through the eyes of  Sarah  a college student who recently started her night shift at a gas station located just outside of a small town     FEATURES       NPC Interactions       Interactive Tasks       Creepy and Atmospheric Visuals         PLAYTIME       2025 Minutes         GALLERY                               CONTROLS             WASD   Movement       SHIFT   Sprint       E   Interact       LMB   Action Skip MonologueEatClean       F   Flashlight Unlockable       SPACE   Get Up Drop Broom       ESC   Pause           BUGS       If you encounter any major bugs really sorry if you do do let me know in the comments I will do my best to fix them   DISCLAIMER       This games story is a work of fiction Any similarities to actual persons living or dead or events are purely coincidental     NOTE     This is my first game and its been a huge learning experience for me I hope you like it Im excited to create even better games in the future

title: Break Point
logline: Game Jam
description: I made this game for the official  Puls Game Jam 2025  with the theme   Kaputt    Instructions      Select a starting Weapon then battle against the strongest swordsmen Each element is strong weak and resistant against other elements Refer to the chart to understand the RPS system    The  Hammer symbol  represents how many times you can swing that weapon once it hits zero it is gone forever The  Sword symbol  represents your power AKA how much damage you deal   You can hold a maximum of 3 weapons 2 in your inventory and 1 equipped You will  NOT  receive rewards if your inventory is maxed out    Oh and BTW if you run out of weapons mid fight  GAME OVER All weapon  Names   Element Typing   Durability  and  Power  are  randomly generated   Same goes for the Enemy list    How it plays into the theme    My game fits the theme of  Kaputt  because the weapons have a durability that cannot be repaired Once the weapon runs out of durability it is permanently destroyed   A special thank you to Zel Zahid

title: Barrel Run Outside Edition
logline: Run through the land which has dangers lerking ahead
description: ABOUT   A college project to learn how to make games in JavaScript engine This game is inspired by Donkey Kong with its gameplay where you jump over barrels A sequal to the  Barrel Run  but with a few twist Smaller barrels random maps more details and even more No map is the same Always something new there is around 1353366092800 combinations     It is infinite gameplay until you eventually lose Every new level it gets harder as more barrels spawn  The barrels have a chance to spawn at a random interval The game ends when the players health is 0 You have shields to help you survive as long as possible you regain shields after you lose a heart I added a video of my video essay It is very cringe and it sounds like Im dead I am not   INSTRUCTIONS   Click PLAY in Main Menu   Head to the right side and enjoy the views   BE CAREFUL WITH BARRELS OR TRAPS OR HOLES IN THE GROUND   Dont lose   How many levels can you reach   MOVEMENT UP ARROW   To jump   LEFT ARROW   Move left   RIGHT ARROW   Move right FUTURE There is no plans in fixing bugs or developing this idea any further There some major issues which can be fixed by relaunching or some that you have to accept  There was fixes to make this work on itch   CREDITS   Player Sprites   Tiles  Decorations   Sounds Ouch   Jump   FailDeath   Success   Pickup   Barrel Breaking   Ambience   Barrel Rolling     Images Tent Shield

title: Crying to Elliott Smith Simulator
logline: 245 AM is emotionally devastating
description: Do you guys know Elliott Smith You should     Elliott Smith is an American singersongwriter Oscar nominee for best original song and the person I could have been in a past life If you ever watched Goodwill Hunting and wondered what that beautifully sad song that kept on playing was youve got Elliott Smith to thank for that and the song is called Miss Misery   This game is a tongue and cheek simulator representing how it feels like to listen to his seminal album EitherOr or at least how it felt to me     Hope you enjoy and hope that this will get at least one person to listen to Elliott Smith

title: The Early Bird
logline: WackAMole with worms and birds WackAWorm
description: PrefaceDisclaimer    This was a mini project made for a local Makerfaire This is uploaded mainly for archival reasons but those interested are welcome to play themselves I dont plan to continue with this project but expect more fleshedout games in the future   About   You play as a Robin trying to eat as many Worms as  possible within a time limit There are 3 different types of Worms  youll come across See how high you can get your score within  45 seconds   Think you can beat my score of 57   Worm Types   Normal   A  Normal  Worm is as titled the basic Worm type They are the most common Worm being worth 1 Point when eaten   Sick   A  Sick  Worm looks similar to a  Normal   Worm except being lower to the ground with a green hue These are not  as common but they will stay in their Hole for longer compared to  a  Normal  Worm If eaten you will  lose  2 points so avoid them if you spot them      Velvet   A  Velvet  Worm is a very uniquelooking Worm with a dark velvet basically blue color These are on the rarer side and are worth 3 points compared to 1 However Velvet Worms are much  faster than a  Normal  Worm If you see one its likely already retreating back into its Hole Catch them when you can      Note Your sound isnt broken there just is none Sorry

title: Discussion Culture
description: This is a game about how discussion culture sometimes seems to work in todays political climate 30 individuals meet to discuss their views and it is your task to guide them But be careful The steady stream of news influences how people feel and if any of them feel neglected or upset consequences might be not what you expect At all costs you must avoid that the overall opinion becomes too divided or the world could break apart   Controls   WASD  to move   SPACE  to interact with people Interacting works as follows interact with one person to select them Interact with a second person to make them talk with each other     Bugs  As submission are locked for now we currently can not fix any bugs We will still point them out here so you may have a better idea of what is going on   A small fraction of characters may be invisible on spawn On some browsers the game will crash when a Game Over is triggered Since the game is over at that point anyway there is not much impact of this However you would have seen a short sequence of the world breaking apart Later news messages may be bugged as they start coming in faster and faster This is a purely visual bug As you may notice the game name shown in the bottom right is different from the intended one Apologies for this one of our team members thought it would be funny at the time     Credits   Lucas Programming Design Marcel Programming Nico Additional Help   Assets used from the Unity Asset Store   Synty City Synty City People FEEL Epic Toon FX SOAP Total Music Collection Ultimate SFX Bundle Mega Animations Pack   AI used   ChatGPT and GitHub Copilot for Coding ChatGPT for generating the News Texts   We wanted the news articles to be satirical while showcasing the perspective of both sides hence we used AI as a neutral instance   Additional disclaimer   The game is a satirical take on how politics may sometimes turn out in todays social climate Rather than offending anyone with this showcase the games intention is to encourage questioning this view Any references or similarities to real events are purely coincidental We support individuals of all backgrounds ethnicities and ages encouraging them to embrace the gift of democracy and engage in friendly discussion

title: Shuriken Smash
logline: Show a ninja midaction throwing a shuriken at multiple enemies Survive waves
description: SILENT DEADLY AND UNSTOPPABLE Think youve got what it takes to be a ninja Step into the shadows in Shuriken Smash the ultimate stealthaction mobile game where every strike counts and every move brings you closer to mastery Slice throw and outsmart your enemies in a fastpaced adventure thats as thrilling as it is sneaky BECOME THE SHADOW  Master the art of the shuriken  Precision is key Take out enemies from the shadows with perfectly timed shuriken throws or close the distance and finish them with epic melee attacks  Navigate tricky terrains  Dodge traps slide through corridors and disappear in plain sight to stay one step ahead of your foes every level is a new challenge  Epic battles await  Test your skills against relentless waves of bad guys Only the strongest ninjas survive  Customize your ninja  Earn rewards to unlock new powerups weapons and abilities Whether you prefer stealthy tactics or allout action the choice is yours  Endless fun  Take on unique missions collect epic rewards and rise through the ranks to become the ultimate ninja master  NEW MISSIONS NEW MODES NEW CHALLENGES Explore stunning locations from ancient temples to neonlit cities Each level is packed with surprises and dangerous foes waiting to be defeated READY TO PROVE YOUR WORTH Training Mode  Train your self for compete mode Compete Mode  Engage in highspeed fights with waves of enemies Arcade Mode  How long can you last Test your endurance in an infinite challenge  BECOME THE LEGEND  Now with even more weapons levels and upgrades Shuriken Smash brings nonstop ninja action right to your fingertips Whether youre here to take out bad guys conquer new missions or simply show off your ninja skills theres always a challenge waiting for you  Think you have what it takes to become the ultimate ninja Download now and get smashing

title: AstroShift
description: English   AstroShift  is a fastpaced arcade space game where you pilot a highspeed spacecraft through a deadly asteroid field Your mission survive as long as possible by swiftly maneuvering left and right across multiple lanes to dodge incoming asteroids     To aid in your survival your ship is equipped with a rechargeable energy shield Activating the shield grants you temporary invincibility allowing you to smash through asteroids without taking damage However timing is key  use it wisely as the shield takes time to recharge      With increasing speed and unpredictable asteroid patterns  AstroShift  challenges your reflexes and strategic decisionmaking How long can you last in the depths of space      Franais   AstroShift  est un jeu darcade spatial o vous prenez le contrle dun vaisseau ultrarapide naviguant   travers un champ dastrodes dangereux Votre objectif  survivre le plus longtemps possible en vous dplaant rapidement de gauche   droite sur diffrentes lignes pour viter les obstacles      Votre vaisseau est quip dun bouclier nergtique rechargeable Lorsque vous lactivez vous devenez temporairement invincible vous permettant de traverser les astrodes sans subir de dgts Mais attention le bouclier met du temps   se recharger  utilisezle stratgiquement       Avec une vitesse croissante et des trajectoires dastrodes imprvisibles  AstroShift  mettra vos rflexes et votre sens de lanticipation   rude preuve Jusquo pourrezvous aller dans linfini de lespace

title: Tilted Tennis
logline: A competitive paddle and ball game with a twist
description: Welcome to Tilted Tennis a competitive paddle ball game where the camera moves and spins with the ball   Disorient Your Friends   Play with or against your friends spin the ball as you hit it towards their goal to try and catch them off guard and win the match But if you want to defend your goal be prepared to get disoriented yourself keeping track of which way is up   A Variety of Maps to Choose From   We have many styles of maps available for play from air hockey to volleyball style featuring different configurations for 14 players and beyond including team based maps and solo practice maps   Custom Map Support   If you cant find what youre looking for you can build your own map too Our builtin map editor will let your make the custom map of your dreams Not the creative type Thats okay You can download maps from other users We have a map sharing channel in our  Discord  Please note that this version of the game on itchio does not include a Steam key and therefore does not integrate with the Steam Workshop   Online and Local Play   Play with your friends locally Play with your friends over the internet Play with some friends locally and others over the internet Our flexible lobby system will allow you to play the way you want Including LAN and UPnP lobbies for crossplatform play   Rollback Netcode   Utilizing rollback technology in Tilted Tennis youll get a near seamless online play experience Neither you nor your friends will experience input latency while your connection is stable   Version Differences   The itchio version of Tilted Tennis is cheaper than the Steam version and does NOT include a Steam key The price difference is to account for the 30 revenue share that Steam takes but also means this version lacks any Steam specific features such as friend invites public lobbies and Workshop integration But this version should be able to join friend lobbies hosted from the Steam version and vice versa utilizing UPnP If you are interested in getting a Steam Key bundled with a  DRMfree copy you can do so via our website  httpskittensaresoftwaregitlabiotiltedtennis   As a DRM free release its possible to share the included file with your friends for online multiplayer You have our permission to do this not like you needed it such is the nature of DRM free but just be considerate and dont overshare If you are planning on doing this we would appreciate it if you would pay extra to account for the extra copies Recommended 16   if you intend to share with 1 friend 28   if you intend to share with 3 friends

title: Lock in
logline: Crawl your way out or create some distance from all the unnecessary medias of today and lock in to achieve your goal
description: Main objective   Obviously its to have fun but if you want to win the game you must  collect shattered lock in pieces    Controls   WASDArrow keysLeftShiftKey for movement ESC to pause the game and mouse to aim if you have autoaim off   Additional information   Books can provide buffs Enemies have a variety of annoying tricks ensure that you wont win the game all of them will damage you if you are near them Smartphone  It will chase you twice its moving speed Tablet  Has a wider detection range Laptop  It will shoot projectiles that have different effects Pause  All of your movement will be turned off for half a second End  Instantly kills you Shift  Teleports you in a random location Monitor  Inflicts confusion to the player for half a second confusion will cause the player to move towards the nearest enemy and wont let you attack Be wary of corrupted floors it will reduce your movement speed when youre on top of them You can modify the autoaim feature when you press ESC while ingame   Technical Details   If you want to ensure that the whole game covers your screen you could press F11 first before you launch the game   Credits   BGM by  nene   SFX by  Kenney   Fonts  Brackeys   Code Design Art   Local Hermit   Special Thanks   To my family friends and the wonderful game dev community     Have fun playing  Lock in  lets strive to achieve our goals together

title: El Juego Del Gambometer
logline: Escape the scrap yard By gambling
description: GAME ONLY WORKS IN FULL SCREEN   Click up to 3 cards to select them After selecting cards click the End turn to roll the die Even numbers result in positive outcomes odd numbers result in negative outcomes   The health bar and shield bar on the left are yours the right are your opponents The meter on the right is your  GAMBOMETER  which increases for positive dice rolls and decreases for negative dice rolls When it is full your next attack is multiplied by 10x Note this can also mean you take 10x damage so gamble wisely    Submitted to GamePop 2025 for the  Edmonton Prize Pool  Created by Lucia HernandezEchevarria TheKamiOfH Gerard van Genderen and Jonathan Fjeld   Unfortunately the game is not FULLY functional but we have submitted our prototype nonetheless to show our progress   Check back some day we might have something    STORY   You are a degenerate gambler you are thrown into a robot scrapyard by robot loan sharks Youve gambled away everything and only your miserable life as a scrap worker remains   But by chance you find a robot with a Gambometer a unique device that allows you to deal damage using playing cards and dice   You must use your new found powers to beat your scrapyard overlords and achieve the freedom to go back to the casino CREDITS Mix and Jams tutorial video for creating a Balatro Feel

title: Natural Shenanigans

description: Welcome to Natural Shenanigans     Game Overview      Here and this game you have pathways to different experiences in lifeThe paths you choose are multichoice and depending on your answers you can either live a lovely happy  wealthy life Or you can die in many ways     There are about 3 secret pathways and they can either lead  you to  your death or you will find yourself in a great scenario that you might enjoy     The whole purpose of this game is to have an entertaining but interesting  way of living life through certain decisions you make  GO OUT THERE AND DISCOVER THOSE SHENAIiGAN     Game Title   Natural Shenanigans     Genre  Comedy  Adventure  Multichoice Decision     Platform   Pc     Target Audience   People who like comedy and simple choice games     Important Characters   Yourself     NA Gods  Religions or Cultures     NA  Factions     The story is simple You start with nothing but the choice of Car or Boat Once you make your decision youre taken to different pathways of life and the basis to this game is to not die and find the best life for wealth and pleasure Goodluck  Have fun

title: My Little Magic With You
logline: A visual novel with a warm storybooklike atmosphere
description: Important Notice This game is only available in Japanese    This visual novel is written entirely in Japanese and does not include English translations Please keep this in mind before downloading      We appreciate your interest If you are studying Japanese or enjoy playing Japaneselanguage games we hope you have a great time        My Little Magic With You is a heartwarming visual novel with a gentle storybookstyle aesthetic Featuring handdrawn illustrations full of warmth and charm this game takes players on a cozy magical journey      Story Summary   The protagonist  Ruruka  is a young witch apprentice witch living alone in the forest       One day she encounters  Seina  a star child who has fallen to Earth       As they begin living together their days are filled with warmth and happiness but something is about to change        About the Game   A linear choicefree story  that can be completed in  30 to 60 minutes    Free to download  but available in a  Pay What You Want  format   Immerse yourself in a  soft and whimsical world  brought to life with delicate handdrawn artwork     Step into a world of small magic and quiet wonders Hope you enjoy this gentle tale       Streaming and Lets Plays are welcome  Please check the included  readme  file for more details        About the Readme File  The included Readme file is written in Japanese only  If you need help or have any questions please feel free to contact me through the games itchio page          Disclaimer  This game is provided asis We are not responsible for any issues damages or losses caused by playing the game or not following the instructions in the Readme file Please play at your own risk     Thank you for your understanding

title: Las Runas de Suyai
logline: A 2D visual novel with an Indigenous culture theme
description: Descripcin   En Las Runas De Suyai tu objetivo principal es ayudar a Suyai una pequea chamn a escapar de una crcel a la cual ha sido trada y encerrada por un grupo de conquistadores Suyai y t debern utilizar sus conocimientos para elaborar estrategias ingeniosas que le ayuden a pasar a salvo por cada habitacin pero cuidado No alertes a los guardias o te atraparn de nuevo Interacta con los diversos objetos que hay en las habitaciones para lograr alcanzar el conocimiento mximo   Equipo   Jos Bartra  Programacin Unity Salvador Donayre  Programacin Godot Danna Saucedo  Diseo de personajesescenariosnarrativo Marcelo Mendoza  Diseo de de personajesescenariosnarrativo Santiago Correa  Compositor musicaldiseo de audio   Instrucciones   Las Runas De Suyai es un juego de aventura de pointandclick donde podrs interactuar con distintos objetos en el escenario Utiliza los objetos que recolectes en el camino para progresar en el mapa y acercarte cada vez ms a la salida Piensa bien antes de usar cada objeto porque ante cualquier error volvers a aparecer donde comenzaste   Controles   Click izquierdo interactuar Enter continuar dilogo Escape Abrir inventarioterminar dilogo

description: A game made during the 5th edition of the GameJam UpsiJam which has the theme Split   Blu wants to escape  But wherever she goes she is followed or rather her nemesis a double that mimics her every move with a slight delay      In this game  every decision matters  Reach the end of each level before your reflection catches up to you and use the environment to your advantage    Walljump Activate switches to open doors Navigate moving platforms     But hurry  your  Nemesis  wont wait  One wrong move and it all starts over      Can you escape your own reflection

title: Sokoban in the Ruins 2nd
logline: This game is a classic puzzle game Sokoban
description: This game is a classic puzzle game Sokoban   I made it with Godot 360   I hope you enjoy it     How to play   Move  Press Arrow keys or click directional buttons   Reset Press R key or click icon   Redo  Press Z key or click icon   Undo  Press X key or click icon   Next  Press Enter or click the icon   Quit  Press Q or click the icon    Game Introduction   Norrea history 458 years During the reign of King Lucius the world was said to be in turmoil and a state of national disaster Unlike his predecessor King Albus the wise emperor King Lucius was mediocre but good enough as a peacetime king However when the world became chaotic he was unable to make appropriate decisions and stopped listening to anyones opinions Frustrated by this the Witch of the North divides the seven regions of the country of Norrea Fadra Izur Tiral Nanion Oolong Auris and Nords with a barrier in order to urge King Lucius to step down It is said that Princess Flora was sealed in the Norse temple nOnly a wise man who can unravel the difficult questions posed in her ruins can break the barrier and save Princess Flora Era was waiting for the appearance of a wise man    Notice   Please carry the stone statue to the designated stone slab The rules are as follows   Masonry can be pushed but cannot be pulled   Only one stone structure can be pushed at a time   Carry all the stonework to the stone slab   There are 36 puzzles in total    Features of this game    You can play at any level    You can reset undo and redo    Use the tutorial mode to find the route    Beware of pitfalls    Supports 10 languages     About ingame materials   We use materials from the following people   Sample Project   https2dgamesjpgodotsokobansample   Image material   Pipoya  httpspipoyanetsozai   REFMAP  httpsrefmaplblogjp   Black and White Patisserie httpsnoiretblanc   Riri House  httpsmizukiririwebfc2comindexhtml   Dot Art World  httpymsmainjp   Music material   hiromin   Naoyuki Takenaka   MOMIZizm  httpsmomizirizmboothpm   Youfulca  httpsyoufulcacom   Sound Effect Lab  httpssoundeffectlabinfo   Puzzle levels   Dear MB   David W Skinner   Aymeric du Peloux   Franois Marques   dimitri and yorick

title: TickTack Kaputt
description: Die Uhren stehen still der Sekundenzeiger bewegt sich nicht mehr  die Zeit ist kaputt Deine Aufgabe Ersetze alte Akkus und bring defekte Uhren wieder zum Laufen      Features    Repariere verschiedene Uhren mit den Akkus    Entsorge alte Batterien und halte deine Taschen leer    Sieh zu wie die Zeit nach jeder erfolgreichen Reparatur weiterluft   Entwickelt fr den 48Stunden Puls Game Jam      The clocks have stopped the second hand is no longer moving  time is broken      Your task Replace old batteries get broken clocks running again and restore the flow of time      Features   Repair various clocks using batteries   Dispose of old batteries and keep your pockets empty   Watch as time starts flowing again after each successful repair     Developed for the 48Hour Puls Game Jam   Used 3rd party assets audio clips by Ovani Sound and Gamemaster Audio

title: Fish  Chips
logline: Something fishys going on at this card table
description: Created for the Canada GamePop 2025 jam Submitted for Edmonton prize pool Fish  Chips is a game about getting the most points possible You and four opponents have three turns to accumulate a valuable hand of playing cards by either drawing and discarding a card passing your turn or trading your card with another player Multiple cards of the same rank will multiply their scores   The game is controlled with the mouse Press a button to choose an action To trade with other players hit the trade button then select one of your cards the one of your opponents and then click on their face to finalize the trade   To discard and draw a card select one of your cards then click the draw button   Special Thanks   CardEase Jazz Music by MFCC

title: Slashvival
logline: Slashvival is a thirdperson action RPG with roguelite elements
description: Slashvival is a thirdperson action RPG with roguelite elements Use swords to fight mutant creatures in a medieval lowpoly world Survive intense battles and rescue your family in this thrilling hackandslash adventure       About Slashvival   Slashvival offers an intense survival experience in a medieval fantasy world where every day brings a new challenge Face procedurally generated enemies unpredictable climates and scarce resources as you fight to protect your family       Key Features   Engage in epic battles against powerful bosses upgrade your characters abilities and discover new strategies with each playthrough With a blend of roguelite mechanics and hackandslash combat Slashvival provides endless replayability and excitement in a lowpoly environment Survive the night and face whatever the next day brings

title: Kaputt
description: Back in french at medieval era people used to play a card game named Kaputt the rules are simple    Each player have a full deck of 52 cards    3 cards are drawn each round    The players can chose if they want to trade 1 2 or no cards click on the cards to selectunselect    At the end of the round all 3 cards in players hand will be discarted    The objetive is to score more points then your opponet or reach 10 points first    Points distribution   Sequence with same suit  5 points   3 of kind  4 points   Sequence without suit  2 points   3 cards of the same suit  1 point        Sequences with A work from both sides Ex A 2 3 or Q K A   The code was all made with inputs to Copilot AI   The word Kaputt comes from french etr capot which means something like without tricks in a card game so I decided to use this reference to create this card game that consumes your cards after each round until you whole deck extingushes Kaputt The idea was to have an animation for your cards to be pulverized each round which would reinforce this idea but due to some mistakes I made at the beginning some stuffs end up not being added Have fun

title: Broken Brain  Web
logline: Broken Brain is a surreal and emotional exploration game
description: Controls   WASD   Move F   Collect Memory Mouse   Camera Shift   Sprint   Disclaimer   I had to translate the whole game in the last hour from C to GD Script since Godot 4 didnt allow for Web export the web version even though running local is missing the fog the FMOD audio and the camera controls   Description   Broken Brain is a surreal and emotional exploration game created as an entry for the Puls Game Jam It delves into themes of repressed emotions trauma and the complex process of healing   Players take on the role of a character navigating the labyrinth of their own mind represented by a haunting visceral landscape of bloodlike veins As they journey deeper they collect fragmented memorieseach one a piece of a forgotten past These memories awaken buried emotions forcing the character to confront the pain theyve long avoided   Used Software   Engine  Godot 43 Art  Crocotile3D Blender Aseprite Pixel Composer Audio  FMOD Studio Ableton Live 11 Splice

title: Ice Enough
logline: Drop ice in the cup
description: Made in roughly 18 hours for minijam 180 I was a bit irresponsible with the fridaysaturday time then was off my game with the sundaymonday time as a result Good lesson to learn   The general idea was a game where you drop ice in a cup to fill it up to the correct amount via displacement and try to drop the ice in the correct location so the cup doesnt overflow Overflowing isnt implemented so youre really just dropping icecubes in a cup They fuze together when in the liquid and theyre of equal size    You drop the ice cubes into the cup via mouse click

title: Mirror Exorcist
logline: Bullet hell but you need to use mirrors to damage enemies
description: The game was created for the 9th edition of WSEIcraft and placed 8th out of 24  We had about 18 hours to develop the game The theme was  Reflection     Mirror Exorcist  is a bullet hell game where instead of directly shooting at enemies you reflect an energy beam off mirrors to deal damage      The goal of the game is to achieve the highest possible score which is recorded on the leaderboard   The game may be buggy on weaker PCs  but we might release a patched version soon

title: Beyond
logline: Can you bear the burden of what lies beyond
description: Awaken by the sounds of terror you find uncomprehensible sights on your ship Uncover the mystery of what happened to your crew venture into the unknown Will you be able bear the burden of what lies     Beyond     Controls   AD  Move   Hold Left shift  Move Slowly   E  Interact   R  Restart after death     Jam   Made in 5 days for   Chili Code Jam 2   Theme  Space science fiction     Team   Programming  Art  SeeOne   Music  SFX  Razorflip httpsrazorflipitchio     Resources      Some SFX were taken and heavily reworked from here   httpswwwzapsplatcom     Note   Windows version has better graphics controls and runs smoother      SPOLIERS   Help   Please do not read if you want to play the game yourself this is a help section   Your goal is to finish quests while avoiding the monster the monster hears your footsteps so you should only move slowly when you are in the same room as him Quest 1  Go to the upper bridge room and turn back instantly Quest 2  Go to the escape pod Quest 3  Find 3 gearboxes  Crew quarters Landing deck and engine bay Quest 4  Go in the escape pod and turn on its alarm using the console Quest 5  Go in Lower bridge and interact with the big console

title: Crabs  Cocktails
logline: A yaoi love story between a himbo lifeguard and a handsome southern bartender
description: Special Note from the Meant to Bee Studios Team   We will not be taking donations for our games but if you feel so inclined please consider donating to the Maui Strong Fund in relation to the wildfires in Hawaii     ResourcesInfo     httpswwwkitvcomnewslahainahowtohelpthoseimpactedbythemauifiresa     Fund   httpswwwhawaiicommunityfoundationorgmauistrong     Makai and Rhett have two things in common they both work at Cloudville beach Makai as a lifeguard and Rhett as a bartender    They also slept together      Makai and Rhett both want to see each other again and as luck would have it they are able to    As they both have to work together to plan Cloudville Beachs annual Luau with the help of their two best friends Lola and Sunny     Will this be the hottest summer yet Or will it go down in flames      30K words 7 Chapters  Epilogue    SFW Romance but plenty of mentionsjokes about sex Split POV of our 2 leads Rhett and Makai  This is a kinetic novel so no choices or branching paths 4 Gorgeous CGs   Original artwork throughout made by real people   Original soundtrack   Partial voice acting       Creative Director Casting Director Social Media Manager and Writer  FlowersforjoyJoy   Programmer  Snakkiez   SpriteCG Artist  VeryFatCat   Background Artist  Pinachs   GUI Artist  Farb   Logo DesignerBeta Reader  Olivia   Composer  Orpheo Fenn Faefield Productions   SFXAudio Design  Jojo Worthington   BetaProofreaders  Chimeriquement   Sylvia Wilde   LuluCat  and  Samantha Laine     Playtesters  Lacydigital   Trenton Butt   Trailer  Lacydigital     Makai Kawai  Trenton Butt   Rhett Cyrus Walker  Mark Stiehl   Lola Castillo  Priscilla VATrixify   Julian Sunny Hill  Steven Etienne   Bartender  Lily Yatsuda

title: A Wizards Unnecessary Quest
description: This game was made in 42hours for Create Jams 10th anniversary   Once the pesky owl  stole  borrowed the Wizards smoking pipe  When the owl returned to the Wizard it was revealed that it had forgotten his pipe at the top of the Tower of the Undead and it couldnt go back for it because they had closed the window Now the Wizard sets out on a cumbersome quest to retrieve his pipe   This game was made for actual Gameboy hardware and can be played on an emulator or Gameboy Gameboy Color Gameboy Advanced or Analogue Pocket The Web version is also mobile compatible   Keyboard Controls   Arrow Keys to move   Z to shoot   X to jump   Gamepad Controls   Dpad to move   A to shoot   B to jump

title: Dsorientation
logline: Un jeu narratif o chaque lancer de d faonne ton destin scolaire
description: Quand on veut on peut    Dans  Dsorientation  chaque lancer de d et chaque choix faonnent votre parcours scolaire Bas sur des travaux de recherche en sociologie de lducation ce jeu narratif met en lumire les mcanismes invisibles des ingalits scolaires et comment elles influencent ds le dpart lorientation et la russite des lves       Comment jouer    Vous commencez avec un  d unique  refltant votre genre et origine sociale Chaque lancer influence les choix qui soffrent   vous  certains chemins restent inaccessibles dautres sont plus faciles   emprunter Mais attention votre d volue  En fonction de vos dcisions il peut  samliorer ou se dgrader  modifiant vos chances pour les tapes suivantes        Un jeu entre libre arbitre et dterminisme       Lancez votre d  pour dcouvrir vos opportunits    Prenez des dcisions  qui influencent votre avenir    voluez dans un systme biais  o tous les choix ne sont pas gaux    Explorez diffrentes trajectoires  et dcouvrez limpact des ingalits scolaires        Fins multiples  succs   dbloquer     Votre parcours peut mener    plusieurs issues  refltant la diversit des trajectoires scolaires en France Arriverezvous   surmonter les obstacles du systme ducatif ou confirmerezvous les tendances sociologiques   vous dexplorer les diffrentes fins et de dbloquer tous les succs         Un jeu pour exprimenter et questionner la ralit des ingalits scolaires  Prt   jouer avec votre avenir       Explication de la thse   Ma thse sinscrit dans le cadre de rflexions sociologiques autour des dernires rformes du secondaire franais et porte plus particulirement sur la recomposition des accs au suprieur Elle se construit comme une rflexion autour des modalits et dterminants daccs   lenseignement suprieur et interrogera plus prcisment le sujet de lappariement des lycens dans lenseignement suprieur en investissant le processus de transition entre lenseignement secondaire et lenseignement suprieur Cette tude sappuie sur une title: Aporia in the Dark
logline: Escape room puzzle game
description: Aporia in the Dark is an escape puzzle game heavily inspired by the we were here series and escape simulator goal is simple just solve the puzzles to escape there are 5 puzzles in total played in any order as the player wants    Estimated clear time 1  2 hours   Art assets used      Low poly Dungeon Pack by Synty studios seriously their assets are op as fuck     Music used     Hollow Knight OST  White Palace       notes   my largest solo project yet it was made as part of my final year project obviously a ton of work super proud that the game could come alive   cant not mention its predecessor norohana which paved the way for aporia in the dark key technical differences are the increased use of 3D clues and puzzles as opposed to norohana which used 4 combination locks on a 2D canvas   mega thanks to the playtesters who had to suffer through earlier versions of the game

title: Spelunky Classic HD
logline: Modification of Spelunky Classic
description: Spelunky is a cave exploration  treasurehunting game inspired by classic platform games and roguelikes where the goal is to grab as much treasure from the cave as possible Every time you play the caves layout will be different Use your wits your reflexes and the items available to you to survive and go ever deeper Perhaps at the end you may find what youre looking for Dont be afraid to die But also dont be afraid to live Happy Spelunkying       NB The HTML5 version which you can play in a browser and on macOS is significantly different from the downloadable version and more buggy       About this version   This is a modified version of  Derek Yus  game  Spelunky Classic  Based on the source code published in  Humble Weekly Bundle Play and Create with GameMaker  not original 11 release   New features       builds for different operating systems   different aspect ratios originally 43   touch input   support for translations   proper ingame menu   better gamepad support       If playing in a browser       The PWA version  that can be installed for offline use eg on Chrome OS is  here    To openclose the menu without breaking fullscreen use Tab instead of Esc     Contributors      nkrapivin   bugfixes and improvements to gamepad support     grheavy   Spanish translation     Spenjo   Esperanto translation     Gabriel Albuquerque Ferreira   Brazilian Portuguese translation       bakustarver   Ukrainian translation       LeRetardatN   French translation         Source code and more builds on  Github   If anyone is interested you can translate the game into your language

title: Super Donuts
logline: Roll through 8 worlds and over 50 stages
description: Super Donuts    Roll around and rescue  the stolen Baby Donuts across 8 worlds and over 50 stages      Note  For the time being Ive removed PC downloads of the game Various errors were occurring and I cant find an easy fix Once Ive figured out the root cause Ill reexort them For now please enjoy the browser version Thank you for your patience and enjoy the game      Controls   Move Left  Right A  D     Enter Level Space W  Up  Enter     Jump in bonus levels Space Up     Reset Level R     Pause Esc Shift     Gameplay     Super Donuts is a momentum and physics based 2D platformer without a jump button mixed with the exploration and challenges of classic 3D Collectathons    Each level has a set of baby donuts to find collect them all to open the exit   Theres also three extra extra challenges per level   Find the hidden Secret Sweet Collect all 100 sweets Beat RetroBreaks Time Trials   Each of these challenges will add 25 to the level completion beat them all to get 100 and a flag next to the stage   During your adventures through Sweetzerland youll also encounter  a colourful cast of characters feed them a certain amount of special sweets to unlock fast paced bonus stages   As you beat the challenges the board next to the level will update showing your progress if you manage to get 100 completion youll see a flag next to the stage too   If you beat everything theres an exciting prize to unlock             Note from the developer   This game has been a labor of love over the past ten years I began working on it back in 2015 when bored at work one day eating doughnuts I prefer the American spelling though     I made a prototype of the game in a weekend and thought it was a fun idea little did I know that 10 years later Id still be working on it   The game was originally released in 2017 as a mobile game for iOS and Android but this brandnew PC version is a complete overhaul    Everything has been completely revamped and reprogrammed including   Redesigned levels New graphics enemies boss fights sound effects and UI   Improved physics for tighter controls   Two new gameplay modes unlocked later in the game Extra challenges exclusive to this release Author time trials for every stage Special 100 completion bonus   I hope you enjoy this game that Ive poured so much time and love into over the past decade   Want to know more about the development of the game Heres a making of video   A Decade In Development My Game Is Finally Finished

title: Carne
logline: Aventura de terror sangriento para el juego de rol Haunted House
description: Carne es una aventura para nuestro juego de rol de terror rpido  Haunted House Transcurre en una zona montaosa del centro de Espaa a  la que los personajes jugadores un grupo de periodistas extranjeros  acudir para realizar un reportaje sobre los horribles crmenes  sucedidos diez aos atrs y sobre la obscena conmemoracin que una banda  de rock quiere realizar     Hacia dnde guiar a los personajes el  aullido del viento entre los pinares Lograrn un reportaje que les  catapulte a lo alto de su profesin o morirn a manos de la misma  historia que viene a cubrir Les embriagar el olor a carne fresca  proveniente de la casa donde ocurrieron los asesinatos Les aturdir el  rasgar discorde de las guitarras de Cianuro      Aventura completa  para una a dos tardes de investigacin y accin en un libro digital  interactivo con enlaces para la navegacin interna      Extensa descripcin del escenario de juego desde el punto de vista de un turista      Glosario de trminos periodsticos      Seis personajes jugadores pregenerados listos para usarse      Mapas de localizaciones      Ayudas de juego en un documento separado y listas para imprimir      Hiperenlaces a material multimedia externo      Sugerencias para extender la aventura ms all de los acontecimientos del juego

description: The school newspaper is running dry No big stories no scandalsjust another ordinary semester That is until a mysterious forum called  Mokshawelco  starts predicting reallife deaths      When an anonymous user posts cryptic clues about future tragedies a group of young journalists sees an opportunity to uncover the truthand make headlines But as they dig deeper they find themselves entangled in a dangerous web of secrets deceit and murder      Will you expose the mastermind behind the forum or become their next target      Features     Interactive Investigation   Gather clues analyze forum posts and connect the dots   Twisting Narrative   Choices matter your decisions shape the outcome     A Digital Mystery   Immerse yourself in the eerie world of online secrets     Multiple Endings   Your actions determine who lives who dies and who disappears

title: AGNOSYS
logline: Un RPG por turnos donde el conocimiento se desvanece con cada batalla
description: Sinopsis  En  AGNOSYS  asumes el papel de  Ghost  un individuo atrapado en un mundo digital incompleto ruinoso sin recuerdos de cmo lleg all A medida que exploras este entorno incompleto y extrao te enfrentas a fragmentos del sistema que buscan evitar tu escape pero sin mucho esfuerzo Sin embargo cada enfrentamiento tiene un costo en lugar de fortalecerte pierdes conocimiento y comprensin del mundo que te rodea provocando que el mundo se sienta mas incompleto o destruido      Tu nica opcin es avanzar aunque con cada paso la realidad se distorsiona ms y la derrota se vuelve inevitable es el desconocimeinto e ignorancia paz o un completo caos    Mecnicas Bsicas Combate por turnos  Enfrenta tres enemigos antes del combate final contra el  Jefe del Nivel     Prdida de conocimiento  En lugar de ganar experiencia Ghost se debilita con cada enfrentamiento    Historia inmersiva  Un mundo digital defectuoso donde la desesperacin y el destino juegan un papel crucial      No es un juego sobre ganar sino sobre descubrir cunto puedes entender antes de perderte para siempre en el sistema     Dessarroladores   Darius 1Player Sebastian Aparicio Rivera Behigin Mendoza Ftima Rafael Star

title: Heroes Suck
logline: Defend your dungeon against an onslaught of heroes as they try to steal your precious loot
description: Defend your dungeon against an onslaught of heroes in this physicsenabled tower defense Build your dungeon tile by tile placing deadly traps to protect your loot Upgrade your defenses and powers as you amass wealth and unleash havoc on these cheese wheelstealing heroes     Build your dungeon  your way Place tile by tile and fill your dungeon with deadly traps to keep the pesky heroes away from your loot As you level up you gain the ability to place more and more tiles to further grow your dungeon     Unleash havoc  with your traps With physics enabled send heroes flying around  or even play bowling with their bodies You can even light them on fire or electrocute them What fun   Unravel the mystery  of the stolen cheese wheels in a plot against the town by a secretive guild of heroes   Defeat powerful foes  that cast an array of magical powers Its oh so worth it to fell these baddies because they drop some seriously good loot     Expand your town  to increase your potential Unlock and upgrade buildings like the Forge Scriptorium Town Hall and more The villagers are happy to help you in any way they can to get their precious cheese wheels back   Learn new powers  and barrage your foes with them With only 4 slots available you must be strategic with your selection Its extra satisfying to blast the heroes around  especially into each other Collateral damage is totally a thing here Use your abilities wisely and you can cause some serious chaos   Grow your power  As youre beating up heroes theyll drop their loot for you how generous Take your wellearned loot and use it to further power up your dungeon With an array of masteries that improve the damage of your traps allow you to build more tiles improve your gold and item find and many more  you can be sure theres plenty of options

title: Most Peaceful American Argument
logline: Bullets solve problems
description: Duel shooter except your bullets    ricochet and destroy obstacles       Story   In the  Most Peaceful American Argument  you play as an American cowboy who seems to have gotten into      a confrontation with your identical twin brother This scoundrel had an affair with your wife and you are not going      to let him get away with it You and your brother ready your weapons for a duel but as you start shooting it seems      like everything that could possibly get in the way of your bullets keep getting in the way From cactuses to station      wagons it seems like universe is trying to prevent you from winning your duel but you will prevail     Controls         Player   Move up and down only   Aim   Shoot       1    Up arrow Down arrow    Left arrow Right arrow    Forward Slash        2  Used in Multiplayer   W S   A D   Space           How to score points     Kill the other player to gain  1 point        Players have  2 lives   shown by the hat on their head   2 lives  Hat on   1 life  Hat off           A player respawns with 2 lives and a short invincibility period       Find the treasure floating around and get a powerup       Game modes         Single player   Description   How to win       Shoot The Dummy   Target practice   Practice gamemode       Duel It Out   Play against an AI enemy 3 levels with increasing difficulty complete a level to immediately progress                  to the next   Score  7  points before the AI enemy or have a  higher  score when the                   timer runs out  99 seconds                             Multi player   Description   How to win       Two player   Share the keyboard and play against a friend or foe   Score  7  points before the other player or have                  a  higher  score when the  timer runs out  99                  seconds

title: Survival of the Cubest
description: Survival of the Cubest is a challenging actionpacked game Play as a cubeshaped blue  slime trapped in a      temple of  red slimes who are all out to eat you      Each bite is fatal and can mean difference between life or death Utilize unique slime properties and your own fatal      bite to overcome your adversaries     Features    Slime Skills     Mass Change Taking damage or consuming enemies can increase  decrease your size   Consume close ranged attack that can consume smaller enemies and grow in mass    Slimy Throw sacrifice some mass to throw sticky slime residue at enemies to slow them down   Bait Throw sacrifice some mass to attract the attention of enemies with a radius    Absorb thrown slime and baits can be reabsorbed to regain mass      Enemy The Red Slime     Take on slimes of varying sizes   Large slimes may be slower but their size more than makes up for it   Typical slimes are quick especially when they close in for a bite Be on your toes    Their fatal bites will reduce your size and increase their own     Controls     WASD  movement direction control   Mouse  camera control   SPACE  closeranged attack to eat smaller slimes   Leftclick HOLD  charges up a slimey throw   Leftclick RELEASE  launches a slimey throw   Rightclick HOLD  charge up a bait throw   Rightclick RELEASE  launches a bait throw              Thanks for checking out the page

title: In This House
logline: horror puzzle game
description: where are the lights   where are my parents   whats happening    dont be afraid take a seat on the floor and enjoy your games    i wont hurt you       An entity has trapped you inside your House and your only respite is the TV screen and your video games   The objects in your House seem to have an effect the game  some in more obvious ways than others   Try to see where the game level resembles parts of the house     Controls   WASD to play the games on the TV screen E to use items Click objects to interact with them Click arrows to move in the House        Built for Week 4 of Manchester Metropolitan Universitys  Game A Week  course     The theme was  The Puzzle Box

title: A Quiet Forest
logline: Shhh Dont make a sound
description: Shhh Dont make a sound Sneak your way back to camp without alerting the Ghosts Solve puzzles and play tricks on the creatures of the dark in this forest that rearranges itself every night   Controls   Move  WASD Slow Down  Hold LShift Throw Rocks  LMB Throw Bombs  RMB Restart  R Pause  Esc Adjust Music Volume  Up  Down Arrows     This project was near completion over a year before it ended up published and it was intended to be my first completed game but it ended up getting abandoned After finishing Trapped Innside I decided  to return and reboot the project in Godot 4 with a slightly smaller scope A level editor is planned for a future update to make up for the low level count

title: Strange Cravings Restaurant
logline: Entry for Trijam 313 The 3 hour game jam httpsitchiojamtrijam313
description: Strange Cravings Restaurant   Welcome to  Strange Cravings Restaurant  where you play as a krab running an undersea diner that caters to the bizarre cravings of deepsea creatures Your goal Fulfill as many strange orders as possible before time runs outwhile managing a chaotic kitchen conveyor system      Food arrives from the kitchen on  four food mats  but not everything is part of the current order If its the wrong dish quickly recycle it to save money Drop food on the floor and youll lose cash Inspired by classic  Atari 2600 arcade gameplay  this fastpaced challenge will test your reflexes and decisionmaking Can you outearn the other krab restaurant owners and become the ultimate deepsea chef      How to Play     Move   Use the arrow keys to navigate    Serve Orders   Deliver the correct food to earn  10     Recycle   Dispose of incorrect food for  1    Dropped Food   Lose  5  per fallen dish    Time Limit   You have  120 seconds  to make as much money as possible      Credits    Developed by  Diego Giacomelli   Sound FX by  Peter Wayne   Created for  Trijam 313  The 3 Hour Game Jam    Theme   Strange Cravings

title: Cauldron Cravin
logline: Brew potions for your strange evil master
description: Controls Mouse only Drag and drop ingredients into the cauldron then click and drag the lever down to create the potion Use the bars above the ingredients to discern what ingredients are good for which craving You can throw away ingredients by dropping them on the trash can Currently there is no win or lose condition and the ingredient traits are somewhat arbitrary Entry for TRIJAM 313 Didnt get as far as I wanted to as far as making an actual game but Im happy with the visuals of the hand and how tactile the picking up  dropping feels Three hours is not a long time
