title: Refresh At A Snails Pace
logline: Refresh this Snail with water welled up in their leaves within the six levels of this fallingoriented platformer
description: Refresh the page if player control is lost Please refrain from clicking out of the game to prevent this issue   Play as a snail simply trying to refresh themselves as they try to reach a leaf filled with some fresh water       Avoid enemies by being patient and sticking to walls      Use gusts of air from within the ground to get over ledges     Six short and fun levels   This game was made in under three days during Mini Jam 180 The theme was refresh and the limitation was falling down This was my first game jam it was very fun All assets used were created by me   Thank you for dropping by This project was made for Mini Jam 180 in under 3 days   KNOWN BUGS       Colliding with corners for a repeated period of time will  result in  the player character becoming stuck around the eye stalks  Game Restart is required Press  R      Idling around the corner of ledges for a prolonged period   may result in the player character becoming stuck Game Restart is   required   Press R      Sometimes music will not loop      HTML build may cause a small visual bug on startup due to a transition issue      HTML build has an issue where the player may lose control of the player character when clicking out of the game

title: This Cant Work
logline: Two devs One game jam Zero chance of success
description: Two devs One game jam Zero chance of success     Forget polishing your own project Your only goal is to sabotage your opponents work by any means necessary Keyboard slamming Dirty tricks Relentless sabotage Absolutely And when the dust settles who knows if anyone will actually finish their game   This aint just a game jam  its allout war Doublecross your rival hatch sneaky plots and pull off every cheap trick in the book Fair play Forget it Why would you work yourself into the ground when you can just bury your opponent instead Just remember this cant work     How to Play   Player 1 Move with WASD interact with Left Ctrl   Player 2 Move with Arrow Keys interact with Right Ctrl     Credits   Made in 48 hours for  Game Jam Zln 2025   Creators   Programming     Luk Urban   Samuel Slovak     Visuals     Vt  vda     Audio Design      tpn Kikava     and this one has worked on just about everything     Ondej Siuda       Our thanks also go to  PolyPerfect   Flying Rat Studio   Vision Game   UPPER  and others for organizing this event     Fun Facts     Ondej managed to drink over 20 cans of redbull in one day during the whole production hes still alive   Apart from the music all the sound effects are the product of  tpns mouth   Luk forgot to go to school on Monday due to sleep deprivation     This Cant Work by Luk Urban Ondej Siuda Samuel Slovak Vt  vda  tpn Kikava   Ive made builds for linux and mac as well but Im not able to test them right now If the native linux version doesnt work for you there is an option to run the Windows version of the game using Wine Whether the game works on mac will remain a mystery at least until someone writes it in the hate comments  Love Luk 3

title: Get Down Mr Human
logline: Catch a bullet for humans
description: You are a robot doing your daily tasks when you suddenly encounter a human about to be shot According to the first law of robotics you must do everything in your power to protect humans but there is little time     Get down Mr Human  you yell as you throw yourself in front of the bullet     How to play  Move mouse to aim  Press  Space  to lunge forward   Q    E  to decreaseincrease the game speed   R  to reset the level   Absorbing all bullets will succeed the level Absorbing a bullet will knock you back use this to your advantage A bullet or you colliding with a human will fail the level   Created for the Puls Game Jam 2025   Assets used  Gun shot sound  httpsfreesoundorgpeoplemartiansounds182272  Wilhelms scream original WIlhelms scream

title: Riega la Nota o Aplasta la Bichota
logline: Juego cooperativo de ritmo Escoge entre matar insectos o regar tu planta para hacer que crezca
description: Sois dos cientficos que quieren hacer crecer plantas a travs de la msica Hay difernetes  Facundos  que te ofrecen msica tradicional de su cultura que debes tocar bien para hacer crecer sus respectivas plantas   Pero ojo no todo es regar tambin debis protegerla de insectos y plagas extraas    Es muy importante que lo hagis todo a ritmo Si no la planta no crece y se nos acumulan los insectos D   Coged un teclado y un ratn y lanzaos a experimentar     Instrucciones para aadir mods    En la misma carpeta donde se encuentra el ejecutable crear una carpeta con el nombre GodotMods dentro de esta carpeta irn todas las canciones que queramos meter al juego    Crear una carpeta para la cancin que queramos meter el nombre da igual    Dentro de la carpeta tiene que haber necesariamente 3 archivos la cancin que queramos reproducir en formato OggVorbises importante que sea ese formato se puede exportar con esa extensin desde audacity el nombre del archivo de sonido ser el nombre que se muestre en el juego En segundo lugar es necesario crear un archivo enemiestxt que contenga en la primera linea del archivo los beats por minuto de la cancin en formato numrico Y por ltimo es necesario un archivo notestxt que tenga en cada linea los instantes de tiempo en los que aparece una nota ej 254 254    Esto indica que la nota se generar en el segundo 2 con 54 dcimas este archivo se puede rellenar manualmente o mediante el uso de labels de audacity una vez puestas las labels en una pista se pueden exportar a un archivo txt desde el propio programa de Audacity   Si todos los pasos anteriores se cumplen la cancin aparecer en la lista de canciones disponibles   Adems el programa crea un archivo scoretxt donde guarda todas las puntuaciones de los jugadores para cada cancin para borrar los datos de una cancin basta con borrar dicho archivo de la carpeta del mod correspondiente

title: Claires Blender Museum

description: Welcome to my Blender Museum This is a showcase of all my 3D modeling work from the past year or so It includes school assignments personal projects character modeling and even some animated exhibits   Walk up to each exhibit and inspect the placard to learn more about it like when it was made what I made it for and what I learned during the process

title: Like new but better
logline: Bruchstcke Gold und ein bisschen Chaos  repariers wie ein Profi oder tu so
description: Sorry this game is unplayable   In  Like New but Better  reparierst du kaputtes Geschirr mit der traditionellen KintsugiTechnik  oder versuchst es zumindest Setze die Scherben zusammen verziere die Bruchstellen mit goldener Farbe und erflle die manchmal fragwrdigen Wnsche deiner Kunden Aber Vorsicht Nicht jedes Teil passt so perfekt wie du denkst   Steuerung       Maus   Linksklick   Drehen und anpassen    Rechtsklick   markieren   Story  Aus Zeitgrnden nicht implementiert   Intro und Tutorial wird beim Spielbeginn angezeigt   Endlich ist dein Tag gekommen Nach drei Diplomabschlssen einem Doktor im Ingenieurwesen 20 Jahren Berufserfahrung und unzhligen Nebenjobs hast du endlich genug angespart um deinen Traum eines eigenen KintsugiLadens auszuleben       Du kaufst dir eine 20 Quadratmeter Wohnung in der fast nicht existenten Innenstadt des kleinen Dorfes Keramos Hier soll dein Imperium entstehen Die Ausgangslage ist optimal Mit 450 Einwohnern die alle ein Faible fr Keramikobjekte haben und keiner Konkurrenz weit und breit bist du dir sicher schon nchstes Jahr in der Liste der reichsten Menschen aufzutauchen       Mit dem riesigen Kapital dass du angespart hast musstest du keine Kompromisse eingehen Die besten Werkzeuge und Materialien waren schon in deinem Keramazon Warenkorb Die Deko penibel ausgesucht und bereit fr den Import aus Japan Sogar einen KintsugiGromeister mit goldenem Grtel hast du als Mitarbeiter anwerben knnen      Leider hast du dein gesamtes Geld in Kryptowhrung investiert und in deiner alten PCFestplatte aufbewahrt die deine Mutter vor 2 Wochen weggeschmissen hat Dieser winzige Rckschlag hlt dich aber nicht von deinem Vorhaben ab       Letztes Jahr ist dein reicher Grovater verstorben und als einer seiner 32 Enkel durftest du dir was aus seinem Erbe aussuchen Whrend die anderen sich komischerweise um seine Uhren und Autosammlung gestritten haben hast du die wahren Perlen entdeckt Den massiven und robusten Schreibtisch der selbst den zweiten Weltkrieg berlebt hat und das Regal welches all die den Uhren zur Schau stellte Ein Visionr wie du erkennt natrlich den wahren Wert eines Objektes und wei ihn zu nutzen       Der Schreibtisch dient dir in deinem KintsugiLaden nun als Arbeitsbereich Hier entstehen all die Wunder die du vollbringen wirst und all die Schnheit die du erschaffen wirst      Das Regal wird das Podium dieser Schnheit whrend du darauf wartest dass der Kunde das Meisterwerk abholt       Bevor du deine Fertigkeiten der Welt zur Schau stellst geh noch mal in dich und mach einen Probedurchlauf Es ist nicht so als httest du es ntig schlielich hast du schon mindestens fnf KintsugiTutorials auf KeramaTube gesehen Es dient lediglich zum Aufwrmen       Die Schssel die dir vor 5 Minuten beim Instantnudeln machen aus der Hand gefallen ist bietet sich perfekt fr diese bung an      Whle mit dem Mauszeiger Keramikstcke aus und markiere sie mit deinem inneren Auge also mit Rechtsklick       Such nach weiteren Stcken die an den Rand des ersten Stckes passen knnten Dass die Stcke zusammengehren merkst du daran dass sich dein sechster Sinn einschaltet Ein nerviges Gerusch das dich schon durch so manche Puzzleturniere gebracht hat       Wenn du keine passenden Stcke findest solltest du die Stcke aus einer anderen Perspektive betrachten Aktiviere dein Adlerauge mit Linksklick um dir ein Keramikstck genau anzusehen und es zu drehen       Hast du mehrere Teile zusammengesetzt musst du sie nur noch miteinander verbinden Glcklicherweise hast du noch genug Kleingeld in der Tasche gefunden um den entsprechenden Klebstoff im ein Euro Laden zu kaufen       Eigentlich msstest du an den Klebestellen mit Goldstaub rbergehen Aus Kostengrnden machst du das erstmal mit einem goldenen Marker zumindest bis die erste Million in der Tasche ist       Sobald du fertig bist kannst du dir dein Meisterwerk noch mal von allen Seiten anschauen und anschlieend auf das prchtige Regal stellen      Danach kannst du direkt mit dem nchsten Auftrag weiter machen Schau dafr in dein Notizbuch       Es kann passieren dass du im Arbeitsprozess durch ein Klopfen unterbrochen wirst Das wird hchstwahrscheinlich ein Kunde sein der seine Bestellung abholen mchte Auch wenn er deine Konzentration unterbrochen hat versuch freundlich zu sein denk dran du hast einen KintsugiLaden und er nicht      Okay jetzt reicht es aber mit den Selbstgesprchen Rann an den Porzellan       Kurzer Text vor Level 1     Die InstantnudelnSchssel Tutorial       Ich glaube ich sollte noch mal in mich gehen und den Ablauf durchgehen       Zum Glck zerbrechen bei mir stndig Schsseln       Kurzer Text vor Level 2     Die Tasse Leicht       Mein erster richtiger Auftrag Ich wrde ja sagen dass ich aufgeregt bin wenn die Kundin nicht meine Mutter wre und ich sie nicht gezwungen htte den Auftrag einzureichen      Kurzer Text nach Level 2     Mutter Hallo mein Kind du hast mir 30 Nachrichten geschickt dass die Tasse fertig ist Wow das sieht wirklich interessant aus       Ich bereue zwar ein wenig dass ich sie nicht weggeworfen und mir einfach eine neue gekauft habe so wie ich es eigentlich geplant hatte Aber nun habe ich ein tolles Dekostck fr die freie Stelle hinten im Regal      Kurzer Text vor Level 3     Die Vase Mittel       Ein Kunde hat mir diese Vase zum Reparieren gegeben Er hat irgendwas ber seinen Vater erzhlt ich war aber so aufgebracht ber seine Strung whrend meiner Mittagspause dass ich ihm nicht richtig zugehrt habe Den komischen Sand den er mitgegeben hat kann ich aber super als Streckmittel fr den Kleber benutzen       Kurzer Text nach Level 3     Trauender Mann Die Urne sieht nun tatschlich viel besser aus als vorher Mein Vater wrde sich bestimmt freuen in einer so schicken und edlen Urne seinen Frieden zu finden Ich sehe Sie haben den Deckel versiegelt Das war eine gute Idee von Ihnen so geht nichts mehr verloren      Kurzer Text vor Level 4     Die Statue Schwer       Diese groe schwere Statue wurde mir von einem Mnch zumindest sah er so aus wie einer vorbeigebracht Das ist die bis jetzt grte Herausforderung Er faselte was von Ebenbild und Reinheit Ich war da aber bereits in Gedanken daran wie ich das Objekt in was wahrlich wunderschnes verwandele und konnte nicht richtig zuhren       Kurzer Text nach Level 4     Komischer Mnch Wie knnen Sie es W bla bla bla Das ist Blasphem  bla bla Ich sagte das Ebenbild darf nicht verun bla    Du erwischt dich selbst wie du dein Werk bewunderst und den Mnch ignorierst Ich sollte aufhren so oft in Gedanken zu schweben und den Menschen zuhren Egal er scheint nachvollziehbarerweise so begeistert davon zu sein dass er ganz aufgeregt ist Ich lasse die Zwei mal alleine Zum glck lasse ich mich im Voraus bezahlen

title: SPooL
logline: SPooL a splity twist on billard
description: What is Spool    Spool Split poolis not an ordinary game of  billard Its a roguelite game when you play a living slime Your goal  Clear the table before enemy balls countdown hits 0  But there is a twist  Every time you shoot your slime it splits in half  Make sure to merge it back in order to be heavy enough    Roguelite Progression   Losing is not the end Its just the beginning  Each atemps offer you the possibilities to stack up coins to unlock upgrades making your slime stronger for the next rounds     Upgrade Your Slime    More Speed   Slip across the table faster  More Weight   Smash through obstacles with force  Higher Coin Value   Earn more from each coins  Slicker Movement   Slide more easily for shots   Aim Assist  Precisely shoot enemies    How to Play      Meet the Team   Valentin  Baptiste   Tom Dedicated to Yannis

title: Deck Dungeon Die
logline: Retro roguelike form poker combos master risk  reward conquer dungeons Your fate is in your hands
description: Embark on a retroinspired card game roguelike adventure where every step in the dungeon tests your sanity Drawing inspiration from legends like  Slay the Spire   Balatro  and the classic card game  Scoundrel  this journey pays homage to the spirit of retro gaming while forging its own path      Dive into a world where strategy meets chance as you collect and play cards to form pokerstyle combos against fearsome monsters to earn gold Explore eerie corridors and hidden chambers filled with peril and mystery Every card you play and every risk you take could mean the difference between fortune and oblivion      Uncover dark secrets and unexpected treasures in a dungeon that challenges both your wits and your courage Your destiny is crafted with every shuffle of the deckwill you master the art of the card and claim your legacy or will the dungeon consume you The choice is yours and your fate lies in your hands

title: RESET  A prologue
logline: Five people going through a time loop The catch is that two of them arent experiencing time linearly
description: Five people wake up in a closed space   Again   And Again And Again And Again   The catch is that two of them arent experiencing the time loops linearly   Potential Trigger warnings       Implied suicide implied self harm A lot of swearing and smoking is involved     Controls     Standard RPGMaker with one point and click room     Hi Hello Ive never made a game before Heads up this is held together by duct tape and hopes and dreams so apologies for how awkward it may be   This dinky little prologue is only 1015 minutes long with numerous typos and bugs   That being said I hope you enjoy the premise the art the music and the vibes Thank you for having me

title: Slot Override
logline: Gamble away your life savings and discover what happens when you hit the jackpot
description: Step into the electrifying neondrenched world of Slot Override a highstakes slot machine simulator set in a futuristic cyberpunk universe Here the air is thick with the hum of holographic advertisements the glow of neon lights and the promise of untold riches In this world the line between man and machine blurs and the thrill of gambling is amplified by cuttingedge technology   This game includes    Symbolbased scoring different symbols can be rolled such as cherries bananas and sevens and each one has a unique effect such as score bonuses and multipliers   Progressive rounds each round increases the difficulty by increasing the target score  to overcome this you can purchase upgrade modifiers   Streak bonus getting 3 of a kind or more can further increase score encouraging strategic betting   Shop system spending money for upgrade modifers enhances gameplay   Winloss condition players can progress through the rounds win the game or run out of money and lose     Try and get through all 5 rounds   Bonus Easter egg for hitting 5 7s   All assets were hand drawn audio and sound was either bought or from free libraries   Credits          Art  imbretirl samanthaliu Sound  Ovani sounds The Costco Guys5 big booms Pixabay freesound_community fake cash register mixkit slot machine wheel Font  dafontcom name 04b_30 Programming  imbretirl samanthaliu boba_7   Competing for Calgary prize pool

title: AI Combat
logline: A Prototype of combat AIs that are capable of dodging and countering your attacks
description: Combat AI was a prototype project I created so I could learn how to make AI and get a better understanding During my first sprint of development I looking into the the basics and learned about behaviour trees AI Controller AI Perception and stimulus sense and already the AI toward the player as well as reacting the projectiles the player shoot at them and have animations also implemented   The second sprint was a bit of catch up to where I intended to be but I managed to have the AI capable of dodging and countering already the way I got where the projectile was to the player was by using the AIs viewpoint and the projectiles location to make a point that is checks four sections that decide if the player is front right left and back and with this I also made a front and back roll task that allows the AI to disengage or close the distance   The third sprint is where I implemented the attack and also started to use GDC talks as a reference to my design such as SpiderMans  talks on AI which gave valuable information on how I could solve some issues like enemies building up and making AI that dont overwhelm the player like by getting the closest AI character and indicating they can attack but if hat isnt completed after a while another character takes that role      In the end this project was the result of trial and error and if I tried and made this from scratch I believe I would have a much better outcome

title: Promise Me Youll Live
logline: VN Created in 4 Days for Velox Turbo
description: You keep your promise Ill keep mine       This game was created in 4 days for the Velox Turbo jam 2023         In the moments between life and death a promise for second chances can be found at the crossroads            Petitioners come to the crossroads seeking a promise for more time To take care of their loved ones To not fear death again You as the Keeper of the Crossroads have a simple enough job You offer promises in exchange and bind these promises so that the souls can be collected         But now someone else has found your crossroads and wishes to exchange promises Someone  alive         References to death murder abandonment adultery and abuse           Reaper Crossroad devil Demon Death incarnate Youve been called many things but none are quite true to what you are The holder of thousands of promises and second chances you are a dealer in promises They make theirs you make yours As long as they keep up their end youll keep yours      But is there more to you than being a dealer of promises and hope               A living man who wanders into your crossroads seeking promises Hes definitely not your traditional clientele and the more you see of him the more sure you are that he has ulterior motives for coming to your crossroad            The voice inside your skull the claws at your back and sometimes the large shadowy manifestation that appears in your crossroads to make sure you meet your quotas You know he collects the souls you collect with your dealings but what he does with those souls are anyones guess             Spirits that have come to the crossroads between the inhale and exhale of their last breath to deal for a second chance Some are worthy and some arent its up to you to decide              11 riddles with 1 worded answers Hints and answers available ingame 3 Endings 1 Love interest 3 CGs Original soundtrack Partial voice acting Dyslexic font options Gender neutral MC       After selecting You propose a different promise while making a deal with Lidia if you answer the riddle correctly the game will break  Either choose to enter the riddle incorrectly or rollback and choose You will accept the terms she presents Theyre lopsided but theyre her wishes to continue and complete the story     Cath  Director Narrative design Writer Quality assurance Twitter  httpstwittercomshewassaying Itch title: Enzonauta
logline: Enzonauta is a 2D space shooter where you face hordes of aliens in a changing maze
description: Enzonauta     Defend the boy astronaut on his space journey    In Enzonauta youll guide a brave boy astronaut lost in the vastness of outer space His mission is to find his way back to Earth but it wont be easy a labyrinth of galaxies and hordes of aliens will try to stop him    Defend him with a variety of weapons and strategies    Survive each wave of enemies while exploring an everchanging environment    Explore a dynamic maze full of challenges and surprises   Will you manage to get him home safely or will he be trapped in the void of the cosmos    Controls Use the arrow keys to move and the mouse to aim and shoot Try it with a touchscreen only Next   Download and play now to test your reflexes in this intergalactic shooter

title: Belly Flop
logline: simple C64 platformer
description: Belly Flop   For the Commodore 64     Nuclear War has wiped out all life on the surface of planet But life persist Freshly crawled from the ocean this floppy fish is ready to recolonize the land    Living on the land seems to involve a lot of falling down flat on your belly  Watch out for radioactive dust particles     The goal of this game is to get to end of the level all the way to the right without getting killed      Controls   Web emulator Left  Right  Arrow keys to move Space  to start  restart game    Note  you may need to mouse click inside the game window once to enable sound and controls    C64 Use  Joystick 2 Left  Right  to move Fire  to start  restart game    Post mortem   This is my first game for the C64 written entirely in assembly language The code for  game mechanics and all graphics sprites screens were  all made over a weekend for MiniJam 180  A lot of  code for screen scrolling basic sprite handling  16 bit integer math  other infrastructure was written  before the Jam But oh boy did I do a lot of debugging   Im also really happy that I found the C64 emulator from Flooohs awesome Chips project I made some really simple changes to the source code to load a PRG file from the start and its perfect for hosting on Itch        The game itself is really basic and simple Just one small level No animations Writing a game in assembly for a weekend jam is a bit too much really Still im pretty happy with how far I got     The music is probably the best bit in the game but I just took it from the internet See Credits    Credits   Code  graphics kwikrick   Music  Man Oil  by  Jeguri  2024 Zymosis     Tools   C64 emulator Chips by Floooh  httpsflooohgithubiotiny8bit   Kick Assembler  httpsthewebdkKickAssemblerMainhtmlfrontpage   Relaunch 64  httpwwwpopelgandaderelaunch64html   Petscii   Editor  httpspetsciikrisszhu

title: I Got This
logline: navigate the challenges of teenage life and type 2 diabetes
description: Navigate the challenges of teenage life and type 2 diabetes I GOT THIS is an interactive firstperson educational story that follows a young teenage girl who discovers that she has type 2 diabetes one of the fastest growing diseases in the US and around the world Told in a realworld setting I GOT THIS focuses on the causes symptoms prevention and social aspects of the lifechanging disease  MORE I GOT THIS was created by UC Berkeleys The Lawrence Hall of Science in 2015 with funding from the National Institutes of Health in collaboration with the UCSF Benioff Childrens Hospital Oakland and using advice from curriculum developers at the Hall and Tufts University

description: Synopsis   Vous tes un  Conodonte   un grand groupe de petits poissons qui ont vcu   lpoque palozoque et sont morts au tout dbut du Jurassique   Votre objectif est de  vous adapter    diffrentes circonstances avant la  disparition de votre ligne   Cherchez des moyens de vous diffrencier et dobtenir lvolution finale ncessaire   votre adaptation   Chassez un maximum de proies pour voluer et obtenir les formes vous permettant aux diverses catastrophes cologiques Forgez votre propre stratgie en adaptant votre parcours dvolution     Gameplay   Le jeu repose sur deux mcanismes distincts La premire est de trouver de la nourriture pour gagner des points dexprience en choisissant vos proies en fonction de vos forces et faiblesses La seconde rside dans le cheminement aux travers des branches dvolutions qui confrent des statistiques diffrentes  occasionnant des stratgies diffrentes pour survivre et progresser   Gagnez avant la fin du chronomtre ou ce sera la fin de votre espce     Comment jouer          La barre de charge avec une dent reprsente lendurance utilise lorsque la charge est active Elle se rgnre lentement et passivement Certaines capacits la rgnrent plus rapidement     Amusezvous        Ralis lors du Scientific Game Jam 2025   Lyon avec la Fluor Team       Lquipage      Arthur GairinCalvo  Scientifique      Jal Bourguignon  Artiste Concepteur     Lo Dubret  Game Artist     Evan Desnier  Programmeur     Clment Francoz  Programmeur     Benjamin  Quellec  Concepteur sonore     Hadrien Peaucelle  Concepteur systme

title: Finares DEMO
logline: Finares Chapter 1 Demo
description: Please remember that the game is still in active development and this is only a demo   The Game   You are Ares a stray dog who returns from an adventure only to discover that all humans have disappeared At first you dont worry too much but then a mysterious female dog appears in your village and everything changes   Discover notes diary entries newspaper clippings official announcements and more to uncover what happened in the final days before humans vanished Each chapter is an openworld setting filled with secrets waiting to be explored    Use your nose to follow trails and reach hidden locations Rely on your companions abilities to interact with the worldopening doors picking locks restoring power finding passwords and solving puzzles But beware Interacting with human objects is exhausting for dogs Your companion will need regular breaks and distractions to regain her strength    The Dogs   The main characters in this game are all dogs of course and Ill introduce you to the most important ones here   Ares as himself     Runa as Fina      as  not in the DEMO     This Version   This free demo only includes Chapter 1 The other chapters are mostly developed but not completely finished yet Dont worry Im working on it I would be very happy to receive your feedback

title: Phantom Leap AMIGA  WIP
logline: A classic Amiga jump and run puzzle game
description: Phantom Leap  The Great Forest Adventure AMIGA  WIP         A winding path cuts through the deep forest hidden among mosscovered ruins and ancient trees Legends speak of untold secrets hidden treasuresand countless dangers Only the bravest adventurers dare to enter seeking to uncover the mysteries that lie within      As a fearless explorer you leap into this adventure jumping over deep chasms climbing towering platforms and searching for the hidden paths that lead to valuable coins But bewarethe forest is teeming with strange creatures that dont take kindly to intruders Furious mushrooms hop aggressively in your way trying to stop you at all costs And theyre not alone Other mysterious beings lurk in the shadows ready to challenge your every move      But youre not defenseless With a daring head stomp you can defeat enemies and clear your path forward However not all creatures go down so easilysome are quick others are tough and a few guard secret passages that only the sharpest explorers will uncover      Every coin you collect brings you closer to the top of the highscore list But its not just about reaching the finish linetrue masters explore every inch of the forest uncover hidden areas and break records Will you be the one to discover all the secrets and claim the number one spot      Leap into action and find outonly in  Phantom Leap       PhantomLeapV1_1WIP  Fix for the game   Unfortunately the previous version crashed I have uploaded a new version in the hope that it will work again Unfortunately I no longer have an AMig to test because mine is defective The game ran on Winuae without any problems I hope the problem is solved now    PhantomLeapV1_2_WIP   Teleporter tubes renewed I hope they are now easier to recognize  Added more coins to level 1  Added level 1 tutorial not a nerdy tutorial but I explained some features in the game to make it easier to recognize Level 2 small fix on a platform now you cant fall through anymore Characters outlines have been changed from dark red to black  Level two at the end made the teleporter more visible and made a coin under it  fixed some bugs    Note   Phantom Leap  is still in development Currently there are only four playable levels but more content and challenges will be added in future updates Stay tuned for more adventures      Minimum Requirements real Amiga Hardware   Commodore Amiga 500 512 KB Ram extension    Kickstart 13     Devoloper     HooGames   Programming     HooGames   Powered by the  Scorpion Engine  created by  Earok   The Scorpion Engine is an outstanding tool for creating games on the Amiga     Special Thanks     Earok  for developing the Scorpion Engine and supporting the Amiga development community   The Amiga community whose feedback and enthusiasm made this game possible     If you like you can support this and other projects of mine The game is free but I have nothing against a donation

title: Eclipsia Chronicles
logline: The balance of light and darkness is in your hands
description: One day Helia Town is visited by the princess But when shes kidnapped by a mysterious dark sorcerer named Malazra to carry out his evil schemes Taiyo must step up and become the hero With the help of your allies and the guidance of Trila a mysterious voice coming from the crystal on your bracelet youll travel the world to find the three orbs   Along the way youll meet various friends and foes Theres Violet a shy girl whos new to fighting Captain Caravela an old pirate captain who loves treasure Camilla Malazras lackey who can turn invisible and Nightshade a woman who wants the orbs for her own mysterious reasons   Will you be able to collect the three orbs and save the world Adventures and mysteries lie before you     Credits   This game was created with the RPG Maker VX Ace engine   This game also uses scripts which were created by the following authors   Ace Status Menu Ace Message System  Ace Battle Engine Enemy HP Bars Gab Window Slippery Tiles Activate Common Events  Yanfly   Venkas Bestiary  Venka

title: Laberinto Chulongo El Arbol Repongo
description: Hace siglos en lo ms profundo de las catacumbas de  Nova Roma  la familia  Magister  dej un secreto olvidado por la historia  el Arbor Vitae  un pergamino que contena la genealoga de la familia ms influyente del Imperio Pero este no era un linaje cualquiera pues entre sus nombres se hallaban grandes emperadores gladiadores legendarios y figuras de dudosa seriedad como  Antonius Navarrius   Magiter  Pressmanius   Virginia Misculare  y la enigmtica  Encarnita Gabius    Con la cada de Nova Roma el rbol se perdi y con l la gloria de la dinasta  Magister  Sin embargo una profeca dej escrito que un descendiente digno descendera a las catacumbas y reunira las piezas del  Arbor Vitae  para restaurar el honor de su linaje     Ese descendiente eres t     La misin   Armado solo con una  linterna de aceite y un pergamino en blanco  debes explorar el  laberinto subterrneo  desentraar los enigmas de las criptas y encontrar los fragmentos del rbol genealgico Cada sala oculta  inscripciones acertijos y trampas  dejadas por los antiguos guardianes de la historia     Algunos espritus de tus ancestros an vagan por las catacumbas ofreciendo su sabidura Otros sin embargo han olvidado su deber y se han convertido en  sombras burlonas  que tratarn de confundirte con trampas y falsos linajes     El destino de Nova Roma est en tus manos   Completa el rbol descubre quin eres realmente y  decide el futuro del linaje Magister      Restaurars la gloria de tu familia   Forjars un nuevo destino   O quedars atrapado en la oscuridad de las catacumbas olvidado como los dems     La historia la escriben los vencedores

title: Haunted House
logline: El juego de rol de terror rpido
description: Haunted House es un juego de rol donde las propias reglas ayudan a  crear el ambiente Son reglas completas pero de estilo gil breve que  permiten jugar aventuras de misterio terror y crimen    Este manual  bsico incluye todo lo necesario para crear personajes y enemigos as  como enfrentarse a todo tipo de situaciones peligrosas incluyendo  combate y magia Pero el plato fuerte son dos bloques de reglas las  creadas recrear el ambiente de pelculas de terror y las pensadas para  crear aventuras en solo media hora Las primeras incluyen normas para el  miedo huidas a ciegas accidentes mortales locura perderse y  separarse del grupo asesinos en apariencia invencibles desgracias que  se vean venir desde el principio y otros motivos para no quedarte a  solas en la oscuridad Las otras son un conjunto de mecanismos para  crear partidas rpidas incluyendo motivaciones argumento mapas  enemigos y obstculos en un lugar encantado en solo media hora    Esta  descarga incluye tambin la hoja de personaje en un pdf separado el  documento de erratas y el tema musical instrumental coraza del grupo  de rock Las Madres pensado para sonar al final de cada partida de  Haunted House a modo de tema para los ttulos de crdito

title: A Little Inconvenience
logline: Every roadblock to you is just a little inconvenience
description: Love always begins with a flicker   Darius life was zapped of any meaning and feeling Everything that  used to make him feel something became nothing To cope with it he  stopped by the Quick Stop to pick up a cheap beer Thats when he was  greeted by an angel Sabrina Her serene voice her undeniable beauty  and the way she carried herself Upon seeing her Darius heart  started to beat again         That was one year ago and although Sabrina doesnt remember the day its Dariuss most treasured memory Every day he comes to visit her dawning the same bag she gave him the day they met He wishes to repay her for giving him his life back himself so they can always be together and make each others lives better But when someone threatens that possibility Darius is willing to do whatever it takes to ensure his angel remains his             While A Little Inconvenience does contain any sexual content because of its inherent dark nature it is aimed at a 17 audience With that being said here are the content and trigger warnings that are featured in the demo andor full game Please play with caution   NOTE Due to this being an ongoing project this list can be added to   A Little Inconveniences Content and Trigger Warnings as of 3225   Blood Flashing or flickering lights Can be disabled in the options Grotesque discussion of cutting up fish ie blood fish guts their smell etc Kidnapping Manipulation Murder Stalking Unhealthy obsession       Renameable protagonist 8k words Accessibility Options Set up your accessibility options during the first time set up and adjust them any time in the options menu Font Choice Default Atkinson OpenDyslexic SelfVoicing Can also be activated by pressing V Screenshake Toggle Flashing Lights Toggle Sound  Image Captions Adjustable font size Multiple scene variations depending on your choices and Darius behavior 4 CGs With 2 more in an upcoming update Alternating POVs A  soon to be dead  goober of a boyfriend A nice  yandere  man who wears a bag over his head  who totally wont kill you or your loved ones if you manage to piss him off enough         Project Lead Writer Programmer  Kristi  HusbandoGoddess  Jimenez Sprite Artist Title Screen Artist Concept Artist   Mole CG Artist   ktswulf   Editor Sensitivity Reader    AlwaysJMB Proofreaders   Rachel H Rameau   Morgan of Job at Place   Logo Artist   Hadara Madrak Food Artist   Floramisu Promotional Artwork   Saleha Chowdhury GUI   Static Horror GUI Theme  by essvnassets Backgrounds Obtained From   Minikle   DLSite   minchi Music Obtained From   DOVASyndrome   Peritune SFX Obtained From  Pixabay Zapsplat   RenPy Ripple Transition   Feniks RenPy Speech Pauses   KigyoDev RenPy AutoHighlight   Wattson Caption Tool   npckc Emotes   TORaIKI Thank you to my patrons for their support  Pyonkotchi       As of right now players can see a glimpse of A Little Inconveniences story and its characters As the game takes shape one final demo will be released and then itll be the full version which will be a commercial product  The price for the final product has not been determined     If you would like to support the development of A Little Inconvenience and help me maintain my gig as an indie game developer consider donating a few bucks here on Kofi or subscribing to my Patreon Every bit of money I earn goes towards helping me as an individual and my projects    Kofi    Patreon     Consider  leaving a review   spreading the word about my work It helps out the game a lot with reaching more people     Follow me on Bluesky    Follow me on Tumblr     Criminally Yours 18 by Meant to Bee Studios     Under Your Skin 18 by HelloYinny     Bound by Fate  Cursed Soulmates by bigmamafatcat

title: Wisdom Quest
logline: Help Sylvia to recover the lost spell books from the haunted castle
description: Explore the Haunted Castle   Enter a gloomy abandoned castle that was once home to an ancient society of witches until they were turned into monsters and ghosts  Control Sylvia a young wizard who unknowingly carries the legacy of an ancient lineage in her blood  Recover the ancient books of wisdom and discover the spells you can cast Survive the monsters and prepare for the final battle   Face Dangers in your Journey   During your journey through the abandoned castle youll face various ghostly enemies who will try to stop you Shoot them or hit them with precision   Use your powers   Youll need to find ancient scrolls to fill your Wisdom bar More scrolls more power Fire spells and eliminate enemies or regenerate your health Use your Wisdom wisely     Controls   W Move up A Move left S Move down D Move right Mouse  Target 1 Activate hit with the stick Close attack no Wisdom 2 Activate magic bullet Shoot use Wisdom  4 Activate healing use Wisdom Left Click Use the hability you activated     Developers   Fabiana Perez  Artist Giorgio Hinostroza  Artist   Paz Aorga  Artist   Piero Taboada  Game Designner   Salvador Donayre  Programmer Braulio Morales  Programmer narrative Pedro Reyes  Music

title: PIPEDEMONIUM EARLY DEMO
logline: Psychological Horror Plumbing Game
description: Psychological Horror Game about plumbing in an abandoned hospital   My name is Kiel I work at a plumbing service I was tasked with fixing the piping systems of an abandoned hospital I had a brother who tragically died at a young age And I want to uncover the truth How everything happened How I became like this How I almost gave up on life and how Did he leave     You play as Kiel A plumber tasked with fixing the piping systems of an abandoned hospital He had a brother who died unknowingly You learn more about the hospital as you make your way to the piping systems Where it all happened     The game currently only offers 4 maps 3 campaign maps and 1 Testing Map   EVERYTHING IS SUBJECT TO CHANGE     Made with Godot Engine 36 GLES2 Video Driver     horror   other   godot   indie

title: Do Up
logline: A parkour game inspired by old Minecraft maps
description: Do Up  is a parkour game inspired by recent viral games and the classic Minecraft parkour maps      To make up for my limited artistic skills I opted for a prototypestyle artistic approach using the excuse that its a grand intellectual experiment as part of the games lore      I still have a lot of work to do to improve the experience as the player climbs through the map I feel like its too difficult and the map is too short so Im posting it here on itchio to gather feedback      For those who managed to finish it it would be interesting to know how long it took you to do so   I added support for multiple languages so theres a good chance it will be available in your language too     Minimum Requirements  I have added various graphical options to make the game accessible to everyone The only requirement is that your GPU supports the Vulkan renderer

title: No more Bubbles
logline: Pop pop pop you just cant stop
description: If you like the game please consider the kickstarter so I can buy the licences required httpswwwkickstartercomprojectsbengauntnomorebubbles   Join the discord here httpsdiscordggkfJ6q6h   This is almost in a finished state please read the incomplete instructions before playing Although its fairly obvious Updates will appear depending on user interaction and requirements and the below   HOW TO PLAY   On starting the game bubbles will float up to the top of the screen If any bubble reaches the top of the screen it will cause you to lose a life If all your lives are lost the game is over   ClickTap on the bubbles to Pop them but be careful any miss clicks or taps will result in the bubbles starting to speed up and increase in number   Every now and again bonus bubbles will spawn   5 and 10 will add the respective value to your score   Lighting will pop all bubbles on screen and any in the bubble bath about to appear   Skull  Unknown   Duck will spawn a rubber duckie that will swim across the screen popping bubbles as it collides with them   Snail will start to slow down the bubbles this is not instant   Heart will give you an extra life   Be warned the bubbles will start to get faster as the level progresses   After a while a boss will appear and and you must defeat them by surviving the extra bubbles they will spawn   Good luck       Things yet to add Real Animations Boss Bonus and Animated titles Online High Scores Local only at the moment Better Music More mayhem Titles of people who supported when and if And the final polish and anything you want

title: Interview with an Ichthyologist
logline: A Pulp Horror Comedy Chooseyourpath Adventure
description: Work in progress   Brace yourself for 5 minutes of premium 1930s pulp horror comedy schlock   Youve managed to land an interview with the illustrious Doctor Phineas Eelman legendary ichthyologist and infamous recluse  the first interview hes granted since returning as the sole survivor from his disastrous expedition a year ago   But something is rotten in the crumbling Eelman family Castle   Will you live to write your tellall expos or will your plucky reporter windup fish food   The game only takes about 5 minutes to beat but theres a bajillion different endings Seriously I kind of lost count Did I mention that you can shield surf down stairs like Legolas   Anyways try it out   IF YOU DARE   I started this as a writing test for a prospective employer and enjoyed it so much that I kept filling it out Its still pretty rough around the edges but Im enjoying it quite a bit More endings to come

title: 7 Precious Chances
description: 7 PRECIOUS CHANCES     RECLAIM THE KINGS TREASURE     The dragons have taken over the castle and stolen all the kingdoms treasures As the brave prince you must dodge fireballs outmaneuver these greedy beasts and take back what rightfully belongs to your family But beware  you only have seven precious chances to survive     FEATURES     TwoStage Action Run across the bridge dodging fireballs then navigate the treasure room to collect valuable loot   Simple Controls Jump crouch and strafe to avoid danger as you venture deeper into dragon territory   Escalating Challenge Face increasingly difficult dragons as you progress through the castle   Retro Aesthetic Enjoy vibrant 16x16 pixel art with a limited color palette that changes as you progress   Score Attack How much treasure can you reclaim before losing all seven of your precious chances     STORY     The Royal Court has been driven out by a hoard of dragons These greedy flying lizards have taken over the Castle and are hoarding all of the familys treasure The King laments begging for someone to take back what has been stolen     You are the Prince bravely raiding the castle to take the treasure back Despite being just a normal human you are nimble enough to jump and duck to dodge the dragons fireballs Can you recover the kingdoms wealth and restore honor to your family name     GAMEPLAY     BRIDGE STAGE Cross the dangerous bridge while dodging incoming fireballs from the castles dragon guardians     TREASURE ROOM Navigate the topdown store room collecting treasures while continuing to avoid dragon attacks then make your daring escape     With each successful raid youll loop back to the bridge to attempt an even more challenging run How many treasures can you collect before your seven precious chances run out     CONTROLS     WASDArrow Keys Move strafe leftright on bridge all directions in treasure room   Space Jump bridge stage only   SDown Arrow Crouch bridge stage only

title: Dragonskeep
logline: A whimsical card game about being the best dragon shopkeeper
description: To play this game you must own  Tabletop Simulator  on Steam    Then click  here  and click Subscribe while logged into your Steam account  It will add Dragonskeep to your list of Tabletop Simulator games   The rulebook is included digitally in the Tabletop Simulator game or you can download the rulebook as a PDF below      What is Dragonskeep   Dragonskeep is a whimsical strategic card game that transports players into a fantastical world where dragons run their own item shops Players take on the role of  dragon shopkeepers  each managing a unique item shop filled with oddities and magical wares to attract a variety of customers       You have only one year until the annual street festival a gathering where dragon shopkeepers from faraway lands come together to showcase and sell their goods Make your homedwelling proud by offering up rare goods no other dragons have and establishing yourself as the greatest dragon shopkeeper that ever lived      This game was created for a Game Design class in December 2023

title: Path of the Ronin
logline: Your master was murdered and you have been stripped of your rank as a samurai  The Path for revenge is set
description: Premise   Your master was murdered and you have been stripped of your rank as a samurai    The Path for revenge is set      Tutorial   Remember your masters training     To hit your enemy you must keep the right distance A and D to move left or right       While you have exactly the right distance to your enemy your focusbar will light up green and you will be able to strike unharmed         Wait for the right moment plan your attack Only the final strike will count LEFTCLICK to visualise your attack when the line appears yellow       If you attack at the wrong moment or from the wrong distance your enemy will punish your mistake        Your enemy will not wait for you to act Watch his movement closely and learn when to dodge his attacks SPACE  A or D to evade   Now avenge your master restore his honor     Credits Code and Music by  Liamkl Art and Music by  ChristopherGr OST on Soundcloud

title: Dish  Deal Full Early Access
description: Unlock  100  unique  PowerUps      Build  your Decks     Use  your powerups wisely in the game     Serve   dishes to the customers     What is Dish  Deal   In  Dish  Deal  players must serve customers by completing their meal orders Every dish successfully served earns  money  but failing to complete an order means  losing money so every choice matters     The game features       Strategic meal serving   Complete as many dishes as possible before running out of options     Powerup deckbuilding   Unlock and use special abilities to influence each round     Risk  reward system   Every dish is a gamble play it safe or go all in     Four unique food pools   Start with three pools of meals and if youre skilled enough unlock the  ultimate challenge  where all food types are combined     The game is in early access and will be released on Steam in early summer 2025 Steam keys will be given to those who purchase it here      For more updates Id love for you all to follow me on my Discord server    Discord  httpsdiscordggGYBZbxFhyN   Find me everywhere  httpsallmylinkscombinarysheep1011   Play the Demo   httpsbinarysheepitchiodishanddealdemo

title: Barrel Run
logline: Run through a mysterious cave which has dangers lerking ahead
description: ABOUT   A college project to learn principals of Unity This game is inspired by Donkey Kong with its gameplay where you jump over barrels It is infinite gameplay until you eventually lose Every new level it gets harder as more barrels spawn and more bigger ones spawn The barrels have a chance to spawn at a random interval and random size small or big random powerups spawn to help the player health and hammer Use hammer to smash barrels to not get yourself concussed The game ends when the players health is 0 I added a video of my video essay It is very cringe and it sounds like Im dead I am not   INSTRUCTIONS   Click play in the Main Menu   Go through as many levels as you can   Dont lose     MOVEMENT   WSpace   To jump   A   Move left   D   Move right FUTURE   There is no plans in fixing bugs or developing this idea any further There some major issues which can be fixed by relaunching or some that you have to accept    CREDITS   Player Sprites Tiles  Decorations Sounds Ouch Jump FailDeath Success Pickup Barrel Breaking Ambience Barrel Rolling

title: El Gorrin Mola Mogolln
logline: No lo s mola mogolln
description: El jugador juega como un gorrin que vive tranquilamente en la copa del  Yggdrasil  un da un halcn su depredador natural va a atacar l se salva pero en el intento de atacar se engancha en el nido y se lo lleva intentando deshacerse de l empieza a perder palos a lo largo de las dimensiones en el rbol  El jugador tiene que ir a recuperar esos palos en las dimensiones las cuales contendrn un mundo diferente En el camino se encontrar con enemigos que tiene que tratar de esquivar o matar para llegar a su destino e ir reparando el nido   CONTROLES   A D   Movimiento de izquierda a derecha    W  Salto  Si mantienes presionado la tecla W el personaje planear    E  Para interactuar    S  Ataque Huevo  Si se hace en suelo el huevo se quedar en el sitio y si cae encima de un enemigo este infringir dao    Barra espaciadora  Dash  Al darle al botn definido en controles el jugador realizar un impulso hacia la direccin en la que est posicionado el ratn si combinas propulsor hacia delante con ataque har una estocada     Click Izquierdo  Ataque Ala  El ataque ala ser un combo de tres ataques izquierda derecha y ambos    Click Derecho  Estocada L a estocada es un ataque que estoca a los enemigos evitando el dao infringido por el enemigo   MEJORA DE PERSONAJE   El personaje tendr mejoras que subir las estadsticas del personaje a medida que hagamos dao a enemigos al matar un enemigo nos dar un porcentaje de la barra de fase y al completarlo subir de Gorrin  Paloma  Cuervo  Gaviln  HALCN   Golpeando enemigos subirs la barra de fase pero ten cuidado si no pegas muy rpido tu fase volver a abajar descubrirs q pedazo de mejoras te hemos dejado preparadas   Muchas gracias por leer esto y disfruta de nuestro jueguito

title: Ultimate Racing
logline: Racing cars
description: Simple and challenging game for car racing lovers Choose from two racing circuits and two cars Each racing circuit has its own challenging turns and straights Race against competitive AI cars accompanied by exciting background music One of the cars the HyperCar is very fast and 4WD It is a high polygon car with three different views both cars has three different views Inside hoodbonnet and behind the car are the available views The other car a muscle car also high polygon is RWD and has its own sound and is more challenging because it drifts easily  Both cars have damage sensing technology that makes the car damaged in the body of the car if it hits other cars or barriers at a specific speedimpactforce   You need to have a relatively modern computer with a not to old graphics card My recommendation is an Intel Core i7 or comparable computer The graphics is advanced and require and relatively new card Nvidia Geforce RTX 4060 or newer The more recent card the better the frame rate fps  You need Windows 10 or Windows 11 to run the game

title: LEAF
logline: Metroidvania where you can use the seed abilities of your gardening robot to modify your environment
description: Controls are shown in screenshots of the game     We are aware of a bug near the end of the game that causes significant lag when picking up a certain upgradeability We sincerely apologize for the frustration this may cause We will do our best to fix it and upload a patch as soon as the jams voting period ends This game was made during the  MVM 27 Game jam   Plot Woken up by a mysterious entity called LEAF you play as an old gardener robot in a forest lost and defiled by the remnants of humanity Your goal is to explore fight the evil machines and heal the forest The journey will be long but who knows what you will find along the way     Key features      A 2D Metroidvania action adventure game with a shooting combat system Unique seed system to interact with your environment Get various upgrades choice as you cure the flora More than 10 enemies to discover Original visuals mixing cartoon and flat design      Credits       Emberstaff Studio   Game Design  Programming and SFX Martin Beaussart   Narrative Design and Programming David Brevers   Art direction  Animation Marthilde Dochy        Additional UI asset Kenney   Musics Ovni sounds humble bundle tier 3 pack

title: The Fae King Is My Roommate
logline: SliceofLife Dark Fantasy Romance VN
description: The Fae King Is My Roommate   SliceofLife Dark Fantasy Romance VN     WARNING  for  DARK  fantasy themes including being spirited away by a fae dubious consent attempted lies and manipulation mentions of NPC deaths medical experiments on animals and people suggestive themes consensual drug and alcohol use strong language     Summary   Your peaceful life as a hermit is rudely interrupted when a delicate young man gets himself caught in a mutated Venus flytrap   Will you save him or let him be eaten That is if he even needs saving in the first place     Features Demo    Customizable protagonist name sprite    Around 5k words for about a half hour playthrough    1 CG and 3 item images    One 1 definitelynotaFae Romance Interest   Bob    A dog   Rating Mature see warning     Characters   MC   A local hermit  Youre studying botany minding your own business and trying not to step into any wayward mushroom circles on your way back from foraging    Bob   A man whom you definitely havent been seeing wandering around the forest before Since youve been taught manners you also ignore his unnaturally sparkly eyes and his talking dog Its only polite to tactfully ignore anothers oddities      Sir Albert the Brave   Bobs loyal and faithful  valet  pet corgi       Credits   Engine  RenPy by Tom Rothamel    Writing  PDRRook   Dom    Art Assets GUI Design  PDRRook    Coding GUI Coding  Dom    Music and SFX Nicolas Jeudy of DARK FANTASY STUDIO Ovani Sound  Joel Steudler   Fonts Free for Personal and Commercial Use  Fredericka the Great   Atkinson Hyperlegible    Leaf Transition Stock Videos  Vecteezy      Disclaimer   This is the  official  Itchio page for the  Demo and future Full Game  of the The Fae King Is My Roommate game     Any version of the game downloaded from a different page besides the official future Steam page is not ours and was redistributed without permission   We are not responsible for any malicious software or viruses that may appear when visiting andor downloading from sites having nonofficial distributions   Streaming is only allowed for the  DEMO with commentary  added to it Streaming the FULL game is  NOT  allowed     Links    Carrd   Tumblr   Bluesky   Kofi  Individual Studio Carrd  PDRRook   Dom  The Cottage Workshop      FAQ   Q When will the full game be released   A Since were working on this game in our spare time between work were unable to provide a concrete release date It will be however announced in a devlog and on our  Tumblr  and  Bluesky    Q Will there be a Steam release   A Yes More concrete information will be announced in a devlog and on our  Tumblr  and  Bluesky  Please do bear in mind that Steam offers only the desktop version If youd like to play the game on mobile Android purchase the game from itchio   Q Will the game be paid   A Yes this game is a commercial project The final price depends on the number of assets script length coding time and additional costs like Steam fees and licenses   Q Will there be any 18 spicy NSFW  content   Maybe If there is it will be in a separate standalone ExtraDLC build NOT in the base game itself due to restrictions Steam has for 18 content

title: Heart Hunter
logline: A rougelike game where your health ammo and inventory are all in one place as hearts
description: Heart Hunter  is an 8bit topdown rougelike combat game where you fight mobs and harvest their hearts Each time you get attacked or try to shoot you lose one of your heart   Different enemies drop different hearts with special effects or not The effect is triggered when hearts are shot or hit the target    Wisely manage your hearts because they are your ammo health bar and also your inventory   Characters   I dont have a story for this game yet but I can tell you about the mobs   Lancer fun fact the pronunciation of lancer resembles that of blue  in Chinese drops  Librarian He spends too much time in between the bookshelves Now he can only walk horizontally FYI its contagious drops  Spiger A spider with a pigs nose on its head Well heres another linguistic fact half of the Chinese word for spider is pronounced exactly the same as that of pig drops    Citrus Liluton A flying orange with creepy eye Oh just so you know the two black lines on its forehead are not eyes Librarian helped drew that for her with a marker drops    Pokob Walking beaker with mysterious red liquid in it Kind of makes you wonder huh Is it  p aint  o r  k etchup  o r  b lood drops      Controls   Move  press W A S D to move around Shoot  leftclick to shoot your rightmost heart Punch  rightclick to punch shortranged and not very effective but the knockback sure can help Select bullet  press QE to select a heart to shoot the selected heart will look slightly larger   press CtrlCommand  QE to quickly select the first or the last one of your hearts scroll your mouse wheel to quickly select a heart you want   Language   Heart Hunter now only supports English and Chinese English is the default If you want to switch languages press  CtrlCommand  L        Credit  Copyright   The characters and effects sprites are drawn by me with Resprite The rest of the assets are from different sources stated as follows   Heart Images   All the heart images used in this game is originally from the opensource Operating System  SerenityOS  emoji images   Copyright c 20182023 SerenityOS Developers Copyright c 20222023 Gegga Thor xexxaserenityosorg All rights reserved   This resource is licensed under BSD 2Clause license   Music   Music is from  Freesound  listed as follows   httpsfreesoundorgpeopleEVRetrosounds583613 httpsfreesoundorgpeopleorginaljunsounds531459 httpsfreesoundorgpeopleVictor_Natassounds642313   Credit goes to EVRetro orginaljun and Victor_Natas   Sound   Sound effects are from  Freesound  listed as follows   httpsfreesoundorgpeopleVolvionsounds324088 httpsfreesoundorgpeoplejeckkechsounds391660 httpsfreesoundorgpeopleMrthenoronhasounds507703 httpsfreesoundorgpeopleJohanDeeckesounds368326 httpsfreesoundorgpeopleFupicatsounds538148 httpsfreesoundorgpeopleJagadambasounds253847 httpsfreesoundorgpeople7103sounds575784 httpsfreesoundorgpeopleEVRetrosounds533034   Credit goes to Volvion title: Gamble Sword
logline: Gamble you way to victory
description: Submitted for the Calgary Prize Pool for GamePop 2025   Left click for main fire Right click for alt fire   CtrlShift  Crouch   Space  Jump   Your are given a swing type and an effect type each round Destroy all the enemies with your random abilities to progress   You can deflect projectiles with your swings   You also deal more damage the faster you go   Also wallrunning is a netpositive You will ALWAYS gain some speed while wallrunning   There are some waves and each wave has some enemies When you beat a level the music will have a low pass applied and an exit will open up at one end of the stadium just check the outside perimeter Another movement tech Walking allows you to turn around fast So if you hold in the direction you are going and turn your camera smoothly you can completely redirect your velocity This is useful at high speeds just uncrouch while holding W and looking where your going and turn your camera to change your direction Then quickly crouch again to keep your speed Another Another movement tech Grabbing onto a wall only takes into account the direction your holding You can abuse this to turn around really fast   Swing Types   BASIC Basic Attack     LONG Long Swing     GUARD Guard then Swing     QUICK Quick Stab     BLASTER Quick swing with long cooldown     CHARGE Charge swing   Effect Types   LAUNCH Hitting walls and enemies will launch you     STUN Any enemies you hit will be stunned     EXPLODE Explosive enemies on death     COMBO Each consecutive hit boosts damage     SPEED Each hit gives you a speed boost     FOLLOWUP Landing one hit allows you to pull out a second quickly The second has more damage and knockback     RAGE Taking damage will double your damage and attack speed for a while   Sorry for how unclear it is of what abilities you get I didnt have time to implement that   Assets Used   httpsfreesoundorgpeopleBennettFilmTeachersounds486234   httpsopengameartorgcontentadventuretheme   httpswwwfontspacecompixelatedelegancefontf126145   httpsstocksnapiophotobusinessmanJJUUYMLKOC   Tools used   Audacity JFXR Unity Blender Kirta   I also used my own inhouse first person movement script     ONE FUNCTION was AI ONE

title: House of Yokai
description: House of Yokai is a 3D firstperson game inspired by Minesweeper There will be 2 rooms in the game and each is a different version of Minesweeper    Player can press  WASD  to walk around and  E  to interact with the environment F to pause the game   Rules   Our game is basically a 3D Minesweeper with the same rules for all rooms Players need to avoid the hidden mines and escape safely from the room    Players uncover squares on a grid avoiding hidden mines  Numbers on revealed squares indicate adjacent mines  Players use logic to deduce safe squares and flag mines  The game is won when all nonmine squares are uncovered  Clicking on a mine results in a loss    Members   Jiaqi Li Andressa Zhu Xin Zhou Yidan Zhang

logline: Relax and enjoy cute spotthedifference puzzles

description: Falling is the cause of rising   Does it hurt Impossible you fell on sand     SauteorFaute  is a punishing game where you need to jump to reach the end This game is nothing more complicated than that two keys one to move forward and the other to jump Not hard right Well youre wrong This game will challenge your jumping skills But dont worry youll have all the time you need to think about your strategy when youve fallen     This world has always been hidden beneath a mysterious sky In reality we know nothing about this world only dunes as far as the eye can see and a ceiling that hides most of the sky But then what lies behind this false ceiling Perhaps magnificent treasures or floating islands like in fantastical tales One thing is certain to discover it theres only one way jump     Warning This is a trial version The full version is available on the Steam platform Link in More Information  Links   Steam

title: RUN RUN ADORA
logline: Take a quick jog next to the sunset and see how far you can go
description: The game is not intended to be played in fullscreen The fullscreen button has been added for you to be able to enjoy the game regardless of your display settings   About this game   RUN RUN ADORA was made as a gift for the streamer Adora Bunny and is an endless runner with the goal to achieve the highest score possible by running and collecting various collectibles   Controls   All you need is to use is the left mouse button or alternatively the space bar to play the game   List of collectibles   Collectible Description Image Coins A common floating coin Collecting it adds  10 points  to your score Coffee Mug A rather infamous coffee mug Collecting it adds  25 points  to your score Jar Its a normal jar with a cute ribbon on its side Collecting it adds  50 points  to your score Takoyaki A delicious snack with a nostalgic taste Collecting it adds  100 points  to your score

title: Burning Out PreAlpha
logline: Online Coop Horror MazeEscape Game
description: Multiplayer Horror MazeEscape Game   In  Burning Out  a multiplayer horror mazeescape game you and 3 others are trapped in a monstrous dark maze armed only with fire Light your way with your torch to unveil the mazes secrets all while trying to keep contact with prox chat but be warned you may not be alone Your time is ticking once your fire burns out soon will you too           Mechanics   Movement is simple with WASD Space jump and Shift sprint However its essential to move carefully The faster you move the louder you are but the slower you move the more fire you waste Not to mention the risk of encounters You have 2 hands for inventory slots Picked up items are managed by swapping hand dominance   WASD movement Shift sprint Space jump     Items   Every item has a unique use case The torch given is essential to seeing in the darkness but they burn out Flames eat away at the wood and the torch may blow out if handled poorly The only constant source of fire is the central hearth but it too may burn out     Multiplayer   Youre not alone here because you have 3 friends Areas will require you to work together to access others only one of you may enter Stay together to share a flame or disperse to cover the halls Just dont get lost alone Use proximity chat to make yourselves known Or dont     The Maze   The maze is huge Structured as what seems to be a colosseum of disorientation Massive walls scaling ladders drop zones Loops dead ends crossed paths Repeating patterns long hallways dead spaces strange structures Not just do corners obstruct your vision but the dense fog reeks Why are you here     The Team    Burning Out  is brought to you by   PETER YOON  Web Developer Gameplay Design Combat Design   MALACHY KENNEDY  Design Lead Systems Design Gameplay Engineering Writing CONNER WOOD    ArtStation  Lead Artist 3D Environment 3D Props 3D CharacterCreature Shaders and Materials Lighting VFXParticles UIUX JOEY JARA  Audio Lead Technical Sound Design Network Engineering Audio Engineering BRANDON RETANA  Lead Programmer Network Engineering Tools Engineering AI Engineering ALEX MADAS  Core Design Level Design GHASSAN ALHAMDANI  Gameplay Engineering

title: One Piece dating sim
logline: Its your first day as a transferred student at Grandline High School Try not to mess things up
description: About   Its your first day as a transferred student at Grandline High School And this is a dating sim  As if I need to complain anything at this point   Downloading is highly recommended for a better gaming experience  The game is in active development right now theres only Zoros route     Since Zoros route is finished and released you can fill out this form to let me know what other routes youd like to see in this game    httpsformsgleQx68DbnCwXSbTKA1A   If you have any questions you can ask them  here  or in the comments    Features     16 CG for now  19k words for now  Many choices Multiple endings Customizable MC   One Piece is the intellectual property of Eiichiro Oda Toei and Shueisha I do not own any rights except for my art and script This is just a fan game as you see    Other stuff   Well if you have nothing else to do dont really want to play this game or have already played it then you can read this I guess   To be honest this game was planned as a really short and simple dating sim with just Zoro I never thought it would become as big as it is with endless possibilities for expansion It seems that I love One Piece a little bit too much So it took me almost a year to complete this one route as I had no experience in game development at all But now when I replay this game and think about how to expand it or make it better I think its worth it So Im going to keep working on it as much as I can Thats all I have to say Dismissed Go and do something useful

title: The Return of Pluto
logline: Restore Plutos planetary status
description: HOW TO PLAY   Goal Destroy all of Plutos moons so that it can be considered a planet again    If you die youll keep your upgrades and resources so keep trying   Press  and hold space to shoot Use the arrow keys or AD to rotate your space ship Use leftshift to rotate more precisely Zoom in and out with the mouse wheel Press R to open the shop Destroy blocks to collect resources Use resources to purchase upgrades in the shop Dont run into the moon Look out for aliens Once youve destroyed an entire planet move on to the next one Make Pluto a planet again   ATTRIBUTIONS   Everything was made by me in 1 week for the Chili Code Jam 2 except for the following   I made two of the music tracks a long time ago My 10yearold son made the third track during the game jam The main game font is from Google Fonts   NOTE       My apologies for not making this playable on the web   Im still trying to resolve the error that is preventing the web version to run

description: Escape the Crash A Race Against Time   In this thrilling survival adventure you play as Blue and Orange the only survivors of a plane crash caused by a mysterious and unstable substance After the crash the duo is exposed to the dangerous energy of the substance granting them the ability to dash at supersonic speeds But theres a catch the longer they stay near the wreckage the more they risk being consumed by the negative effects of the substance      Now they must race against time dodging explosive dangers and fighting against the harmful forces within to find safety before its too late Can you help them escape the wreck and make it to safety in record time      Challenge yourself to beat the clock and share your best times with us How fast can you get away from the wreckage Post your top scores and see if you can be the fastest survivor

title: Rhythm Reckoning
logline: Master the rhythm defeat the bosses and save the world from eternal silence in this intense rhythmbased action game
description: Rhythm Reckoning The Beat of Battle       Step into a fastpaced rhythmbased action game where your timing and reflexes are put to the test  Rhythm Reckoning  challenges you to defeat powerful bosses by completing Quick Time Events QTEs in sync with a dynamic soundtrack The faster and more accurately you hit the notes the stronger your attacks become But bewareevery missed beat weakens your defenses and failure could cost you everything       Your Mission     Fight  Press the correct keys  A   S   D   F  in time with the music to execute combos and deal damage to the boss    Survive  Manage your health bar while avoiding mistakes that leave you vulnerable     Win  Keep up with the rhythm until the bosss theme music reaches its climax If you can survive until the song ends you win        Why Rhythm Reckoning     Dynamic Boss Battles  Each boss has unique attack patterns visual designs and a theme song that evolves as the battle progresses    Interactive Soundtrack  The music only plays when you interact with the QTE creating a tense and immersive experience    Progressive Difficulty  As you defeat bosses the game becomes more challenging with longer combos faster timers and stronger enemies    Stunning Visuals  Vibrant dynamic visuals that react to your performance and the intensity of the battle        Controls     QTE System  Press  A   S   D  or  F  in sync with the music to execute combos    Health Management  Deplete the bosss health before yours runs out Missing combos damages your health    Music Interaction  The music speeds up as you perform better adding to the intensity Can you keep up        Join the Community   Download  Rhythm Reckoning  and help us improve the game Report bugs share suggestions or support development to have your name in the credits Your feedback makes all the difference       Ready to Face the Reckoning   Dive into  Rhythm Reckoning  and prove your skills in this intense rhythmbased battle The beat is callingwill you answer

logline: Small town Disappearances Love Loss
description: CONTENT WARNINGS       Gladston Valley is intended for  mature audiences  and includes    explicit depictions of violence gore and death   strong language   mild suggestive themes loud sounds flashing images and jump scares   The following list includes more specific triggers which may potentially be a spoiler for the game The game is best played without spoilers but in case you want to be safe  click here      SYNOPSIS   Two friends reunite amidst a disturbing string of murders in the small town of Gladston Valley The crime scenes are gruesome leading many of the townspeople to believe a monster lives in the valley   Torches and pitchforks are drawn as the bloodshed feeds into a growing unrest At the precipice of disaster only Leo knows what is truly going on   DEMO FEATURES     Cinematic story with lots of CGs and cutscenes Horrorsuspensetoxic romance 84k words   Created in 2 months for  Monstrous Desires VN Jam   FULL GAME FEATURES     Ending CGs more polished art and GUI 20k words   2 Endings impactful choices   CREDITS   Art writing programming Ladymeowsith    SFX Pixabay UNIVERSFIELD imagne_impossible SoulProdMusic Soul_Serenity_Ambience Freesoundorg minecraftgamerlr   Music Walt the Fish Hurt Record Pixabay basement Aki Yuu   Background source Pixabay Pexels Freepik

title: Bomberman online
logline: Fastpaced online Bomberman with unique bomb types powerups and explosive multiplayer battles
description: Bomberman Online   A fastpaced  multiplayer Bomberman  game with explosive action powerups and strategic destruction Play online with friends and outsmart your opponents with different bomb types and wellplaced explosions      Controls     Movement  Arrow Keys or WASD    Place Bomb  Spacebar      Bomb Types     Standard Bomb  A regular explosion with a small blast radius    Ice Bomb  Freezes everything in its blast radius for a few seconds    Fire Bomb  Has a slightly larger explosion radius than the standard bomb    Lightning Bomb  The explosion travels instantly along open paths hitting everything in its way    Triple Bomb  Places three bombs at once with the  largest  explosion radius      PowerUps   Collect powerups scattered across the map to upgrade your bombs Once picked up the next bomb you place will have  special abilities  before reverting to the standard bomb      Gameplay Features     Multiplayer with ENet   Play against friends in realtime    Randomly generated maps   Every match is different    Destructible and indestructible blocks   Plan your strategy    Smooth animations  dynamic explosions   Feel the power of destruction    Classic Bomberman mechanics   But with fresh new bomb types   Are you ready to  outwit outblast and outplay  your opponents

title: Lost in Space
logline: You were left behind How long will you survive
description: Youve been left behind on a unpowered Space Station The oxygen is depleting fast and there are things in the shadows Find oxygen tanks  and  search for the exit of each level  while avoiding the extraterrestrial horrors  How long can you survive   Controls and Gameplay  Arrows or WASD to move the camera  Mouse wheel to zoom in and out  Right Click to Move  Left Click to shoot  Esc to pause   Blue bar  represents   oxygen and keeps depleting  Red bar  represents health and decreases  when damaged Credits  Tilemap and spritesfrom  httpstrevorpupkinitchio  Fonts from  httpsamorphousitchio  and  httpsggbotitchio  UI from  httpswenrexaitchio  Shaders from  httpsgodotshaderscom  Some sound effects from  httpspixabaycom  Soundtrack from  DDM Known Bugs  The levels are almost ok but the mapping is far from 100 so there are some strange wall generation  The Aliens and pickups oxygen are also sometimes spawn inside the walls or too close to the starting point  The dark empty floors are not colliding  There is some problem with the menu shaders maybe something about GLES3 web support  Sometimes the Alien animations do not work propperly and sometimes the explosion does not affect the player Notes  The aim was to learn Godot Tilemaps procedural generation of levels pathfinding and better understand shaders  The original idea was play with a squad and not only one character  The aliens can see a close space hear a larger area but the original idea was for them to also smell and follow the path of the character
