title: RoCeX Robotic Cave Explorer
logline: Unearth the truth about what happened in cave system 0393
description: RoCeX Robotic Cave Explorer   Dive into the experience of piloting a robotic scout  through what appears to be an ancient cave system leading down to the  centre of the Earth With the help of advanced sensors guide your robot  explorer along dark tunnels and caverns avoiding obstacles collecting  relics of aeons past and hopefully discover what happened to its  predecessor      We hope playing the game will teach you about how sensors  work how they are used in reality and perhaps give a glimpse into the  mind of the robot With luck this can show how exciting it can be to  work in robotics    Mickey Li Julian Hird G Miles Valentina Lo Gatto Alex Smith and WeiJie Wong most from the  FARSCOPE CDT   programme of the University of Bristol and the University of the West  of England have created this educational game as part of the  UKRAS festival of Robotics 2021   The game has been designed to teach you about how sensors work how  they are used in reality and perhaps give a glimpse into the mind of the  robot With luck this game can show how exciting it can be to work in  robotics      As the authors suggest you can check out the DARPA Subterranean Challenge  video   website  not affiliated for an example of the real life version of this game      The game is hosted on  this website   The site is secured and no data is collected when playing the game  apart from if you decide to fill in the anonymous feedback form The  source code for the game is available open source  here on Github  Enjoy     A talk from Professor Jonathtan Rossitor and Dr Mickey Li with some background to the game and a game walkthrough as part of UKRAS 2021 is available here      Extending the game     This game is build using the  Godot Engine  Simply clone or download the zip of the project and open up using the godot editor      License     This project is licensed under the MIT License See  License  for further details We just ask that you link back to the original game   Credits     Producers     Mickey Li   Julian Hird   Gabriella Miles     Game Development     Julian Hird   Mickey Li   Wong Weijie   Arturs Elksnis   Kirsty Aquilina   Peter Wharton   Hendrik Eichhorn   Zhun Chen Yek   Mihai Anca     Game Design     Gabriella Miles   Valentina Lo Gatto   Alex Smith   Vimbai GoreStrachan     Story     Gabriella Miles   Valentina Lo Gatto   Alex Smith   Julian Hird     Modellers     Gabriella Miles   Alex Smith   Wong Weijie     Testing     Liam Fletcher     Thanks to     Paul Harper   Michael Secker   Aneta Taylor   Prof Jonathan Rossiter   Claire Asher   UKRAS Robotics Festival 2021 ESPRC FARSCOPE University of Bristol University of West England Bristol Robotics Laboratory   Made with Godot  godotengineorglicense

description: This is a Demo version  Final version will be released soon     Travel through six distinct areas each with its own unique biome and enemies in a journey filled with dangers and rewards To progress youll need to strengthen your character in two ways   Leveling up by defeating enemies   Forging powerful equipment by finding blueprints hidden in chests   Each new area is more challenging than the last requiring strategy and preparation to face the terrors of the Bleak Dimension       The Camp serves as the games central HUB where youll find NPCs offering essential services for your journey Here you can   Upgrade equipment   Enhance your healing Elixir   Swap characters as needed       Choose from three distinct combat styles   Melee   Ranged   Magic   The game features nine characters three from each class Initially only three are available while the others can be unlocked by meeting certain conditions       Venture out to find rare blueprints hidden in chests and bring them to the blacksmith at the Camp to craft new gear Loot prioritizes items for your current class ensuring continuous and efficient progression Available equipment includes   Swords   Staves   Bows   Shields   Armor   Accessories   As you collect all blueprints from an area chests will start offering gear for other classes encouraging exploration of new regions       The Elixir is your main healing resource and can be enhanced with crystals collected throughout your journey Use the Alchemy Table at the Camp to increase both healing potency and maximum charges       Each new piece of equipment forged unlocks a unique skin to customize your character Weapon skins are earned by crafting specific weapons while character skins are unlocked by completing armor sets     Face increasingly brutal challenges uncover hidden secrets and become the hero who will seal the Bleak Dimension forever Are you ready for this journey

title: Project Crow
logline: A 4 Key Rhythm Game
description: What is Project Crow   Project Crow is a solodeveloped proof of concept 4key rhythm game intended to support both builtin maps and usercreated levels    This project was conceived as an experiment in creating a fullytraditional rhythm game to contrast with previous projects rhythmgame adjacent game play It also serves an exploration of the usage of FMOD in rhythm games and how it can be leveraged to play both music from prebuilt banks and user files   How can I adjust my game   Project Crow support several quality of life features such as note speed adjustment offset adjustment and controller rebinds These options can be found in the settings menu which can be opened via the ESC key in the main menu or by pressing the Options button These settings can be reset via the System Panel   How does importing work   Project Crow loads crow files from the Import Folder of the game  This folder is located in the AppDataLocalLow folder under WarspitefulGamesProjectCrow  Alternatively while ingame the system panel in the settings menu contains a button for opening directly to this directory    An example file has been provided below the game download to demo After downloading ClearBlueSkiescrow  drag the file into the Import folder You must close the game and reopen for new imports to be processed   What are the future plans   The goal of this project was to have a prototype ready for GDC 2025 As such there are a few items of interest that are planned but were cut for scope at this current iteration Hold notes are the next immediate interest Following that the next step for this project is the creation of a charter intended to remove dependence on external programs for mapping Once this is complete 6K key support will be provided as the limitation for this comes from the mapping side rather than the implementation side   Additional Notes   Music has been graciously provided by provided by dante gofar and  Eric R Franklin    Bluesky  reused from an old Game Jam in 2023

title: Color Match Memory
logline: How fast can you complete the puzzle
description:
https://medium.com/@tmaurodot/creating-color-match-memory-a-journey-in-game-deve... 
 Here's a brief description you can share: 
 Updates for my memory match game. Ive just added three timed difficulty modes (Easy, Medium, Hard) and a chill Free Play mode with no timerperfect for relaxing or challenging yourself. Im super excited to share this update with you. Play, and lets see if you can beat Hard (60 sec). 
 How to Play "Color Match Memory" 
 Objective  Match all 8 pairs of colored cards as quickly as you can! 
 Instructions 
 Start the Game : Click the "Start Game" button to begin. Youll hear the menu music fade out and game music kick in. 
 Flip Cards : Click any card to flip it, revealing its color. Click another to try for a match. 
 Match or Miss :  
 If the colors match, the cards stay flipped. 
 If they dont, they flip back after a brief pause. 
 
 Win : Find all 8 pairs to win! Youll see "You Win!" with your time (e.g., "Time: 32.15 seconds"), hear a victory sound, and watch the cards disappear. 
 Loop Back : A 10-second countdown starts, then the "Start Game" button returns for another round. 
 
 Controls 
 Just a mouse or touch inputclick away! 
 Who Its For 
 "Color Match Memory" is a game for almost anyone: 
 Casual Players : Its simple to pick up, with no complex rulesjust click and match. 
 Kids : The bright colors and straightforward gameplay make it a fun brain teaser for young minds. 
 Puzzle Fans : If you love memory challenges or classic card games, this offers a quick, satisfying fix. 
 Speedrunners : Beat your own time or challenge friends to find all pairs faster. 
 Developers : Aspiring coders can see how a small game comes togethercheck it out as inspiration! 
 
 Its perfect for a five-minute break or a lazy afternoon. Whether youre 5 or 95, theres something here to enjoy.

title: Ping Out
description: Overview    Ping Out  est un jeu de pingpong tactique au tour par tour o les joueurs planifient leur stratgie et mouvements en essayant danticiper ceux de ladversaire le tout avec une esthtique mignonne et minimaliste     Prsentation du sujet     Aymric ERADES est un scientifique travaillant sur la collecte de donnes de match de tennis de table pour aprs traitement prsent   un entraneur des tactiques efficace en fonction dun opposant spcifique     But de notre jeu     Ping Out  est un jeu minimaliste qui souhaite montrer au joueur que le tennis de table nest pas quune affaire de performance physique mais aussi dun dploiement dune stratgie sous forme denchanement de frappe spcifique et rflchie dpendant de son adversaire     Comment jouer      Dans Ping Out  tout se passe avec la souris et dans un  temps donn par les frappes de son adversaire     Lorsque son adversaire effectue une frappe la balle est projete avec plus ou moins de vitesse de son ct de la table Le joueur devra profiter de ce temps plus ou moins important Le joueur devra cliquer sur les cases adjacentes   son personnage et ainsi se positionner pour rceptionner la balle Attention car chaque clic fera avancer la balle       Une fois bien positionn le joueur pour choisir de frapper en coup droit ou alors en revers l  encore si le joueur dcide de se positionner en coup droit ou en revers cela fera avancer la balle     Une fois positionn et que le joueur a dcid sil voulait frapper en coup droit ou en revers le joueur dcide du type de frappe      Toutes les frappes ne se valent pas  Directement tirs de la vritable technique du tennis de table Ping Out  introduit 3 types de frappe       Le  TopSpin  laisse peu de temps de raction   ladversaire trs efficace si ladversaire utilise un  Coup  mais facilement contrable avec un  Block   Le  Coup  une frappe qui permet de contrer efficacement le  Block  mais nest pas adapt face   une frappe  TopSpin   Le  Block  est une frappe dfensive parfaite pour ragire rapidement face   un  TopSpin  mais dmuni devant les frappes  Coupes      Pour chaque frappe utilise dans le bon timing et contre la bonne frappe le joueur fera monter sa jauge de SMASH  une fois celleci compltement  remplie le joueur effectue automatiquement un smash et remporte le match     Mais attention pour chaque frappe mal choisie et dans le mauvais timing cest la jauge de smash de ladversaire qui se remplira   Team      Aymeric ERADES Nicolas ASRI Doris MOCANU Lisa RANAIVOSON Arthur DELEYE Camille SABY Tristan WALGER Lo ARTHAUD

title: The Lost Temple of Gold Atari 8 Bit by Eric Carr
logline: BASIC 10Liner 2025 EXTREM256
description: The Lost Temple of Gold  BASIC 10Liner Contest 2025   Author   Eric Carr   Language FastBasic 47   Platform Atari 8bit   Category EXTREM256   Video    Requirements      Atari 8bit 800XLXE or AltirraAtari800 emulator      Joystick    About    This is a puzzle adventure game inspired by the PC DOS game Paganitzu It includes five room designs borrowed from the original game plus new rooms of my own design to form a mini adventure that will fit in a 10liner    Story    You finally have found it  the hidden entrance to the fabled LOST TEMPLE OF GOLD If the rumors are true a vast mountain of gold awaits you at the deepest chamber of the temple    Unfortunately danger lurks around every corner Relying on only your wits and quick reflexes can you navigate through all of the obstacles and reach the fabled treasure    Only time will tell Good luck    Starting the game    Start the game by booting TEMPLEATR or TEMPLEXEX    Game play     Use the joystick to move your player around the room    Your goal is to collect all of the gold bars This reveals a door    Enter the door to advance to the next room    If you get stuck press R to restart the current room    If you die the room will restart    You have unlimited lives due to unexplainable temple magic    TIPS     If you are stuck in a room and just cant seem to figure out how to proceed remember this tip the humble boulder is key to solving most of the puzzles Try to think outside the box and interact with items in different ways There is always a solution sometimes two    Tools Used     FastBasic 47 Cross Compiler  Compile BASIC to XEX      httpsgithubcomdmscfastbasicreleasestagv47    Visual Studio Code  Editing the BAS file      httpscodevisualstudiocomdownload    FastBasic Debugger for VSCode Extension I wrote it to help debug FastBasic      httpsmarketplacevisualstudiocomitemsitemNameEricCarrfastbasicdebugger    Atari FontMaker  Defining chars as block sprites      httpmatosimiwebsupportskatariatarifontmaker    Altirra      httpswwwvirtualduborgaltirrahtml

title: Do the Units Week 4  Puzzle Box  No Combat
logline: Do the Units is a relaxing puzzle game with a dynamic grid Solve puzzles undo actions and manage space no combat
description: Do the Units  is a dynamic and engaging puzzle game created in Unity developed as part of the Week 4 assignment in the Rapid Game Prototyping course The game features a gridbased system where players interact with units to solve puzzles manage resources and avoid gameover scenarios With intuitive mechanics undo functionality and a clean user interface this puzzle box game provides a relaxing yet challenging experience The game is built around the theme  Puzzle Box  and the modifier  No Combat  offering players a serene puzzlesolving experience without the need for combat or fastpaced action   Key Features        Dynamic Grid System  Units are spawned and placed on a grid requiring strategic thinking to solve puzzles    Undo Action  Reverse moves when you make a mistake to keep solving without penalty    No Combat  A relaxing puzzle experience with no combat mechanics focused purely on problemsolving    Clean UI  An intuitive easytouse interface to navigate the game    Sound Effects  Relaxing sounds and background music enhance the player experience      Dive into the world of puzzles with  Do the Units  and test your logic skills while enjoying a calming nocombat gaming experience

title: ReConnect IV
logline: Greatly expanded fourinaline gameplay
description: MAY TAKE A MOMENT TO LOAD   ReConnect IV is a remake of the classic FourInARow game now featuring several new modes and options to enhance the overall gameplay All new additions are listed below   This game is more focused on the gameplay styles than being an overall polished video game so dont expect any animations or sound effects   New Additions   Five game styles    Normal traditional 4inaline gameplay   Grav in addition to dropping tokens from the top you can now drop them from the left Any tokens dropped from the left will drop to the right ignoring gravity Duel rather than dropping tokens from the top you can drop them from either the left or right with a centre line acting as a gravity source Elim traditional 4inaline gameplay but when a row or column is filled it gets cleared from the board Slots traditional 4inaline gameplay but every turn the columns are spun like slots in a slot machine Increased player count  Rather than being limited to the traditional 1v1 gameplay ReConnect IV features up to  24 players  The board size scales with the number of players Evil mode  Togglable on or off in evil mode rather than the sole winner being the first to get 4inaline that person is the  sole loser  Works best with low player counts or in Slots style   Credits  Assets   Programmed by Donian Designed by Donian Ivy Hedge Ivy Leaf Kenney Fonts Lora Font FreeSans Font Medieval Sharp Font

title: Klathuu Bob Makes Friends in The Office
description: In Klathuu Bob Makes Friends in The Office you play as Klathuu Bob a Klathuu alien descendant disguised as a human that has landed a job in an office Bob has never had a Klathuu friend since he was a kid because Klathuus are illegal on earth So it is your job to find Bob some new Klathuu friends dont get caught   How to play   WASD to move around   Get near people and press space to talk and interact

title: Glide and Seek
logline: Deliver packages faster than ever with a wing suit
description: Its a tough job but you take pride in knowing you are responsible for refreshing this small towns pantry and household necessities  The residents of this town have many delivery points so keep your eyes peeled and seek them out as you glide through the sky   Objective   Deliver as many packages as you can to the yellow platforms without crashing    1 for hitting things that arent the doorstepbasketchimney   2 for hitting the doorstepbasketchimney   1 if a package hits an object and bounces to the delivery platform     Controls   A  Pitch counter clockwise   D  Pitch clockwise   Click  drop package   Click  hold  Charge up package throw     Sound effect credits   Beep 05 Positive by PaulMorek   httpsfreesoundorgs330052   License Creative Commons 0   glass brakewav by max2587   httpsfreesoundorgs548230   License Attribution 40   Grassy thud by Coolshows101sound   httpsfreesoundorgs412125   License Attribution 40

title: EarthQuack
description: You are working late as the manager of a warehouse Suddenly a huge earthquake hits and you decide to check the damages only to find fear incarnate This game was made for fun and is the first game I am proud of enough to upload I am still learning Unreal Engine so sorry if this project is a bit rough around the edges

title: Falling Drop
logline: Control gravity and guide raindrops to dying plants
description: There are plants dying at the cave bottom It is up to you to get them the refreshing water they need by controlling gravity Race the best times to see how many plants you can save   Controls   Use the mouse to increase gravity in a specific direction   Beware Raising gravity up too much will result in it snapping back down   Note   This was made for Mini Jam 180 Refresh and was my first time participating in a game jam I learned a lot along the way but unfortunately that meant a lot of planned features and better assets didnt get finished in time

title: The Paths is Clear
logline: Clear the paths gather resources and survive nightly raids
description: You inherited an old cabin deep in the woods from a distant relative With only 10 days before your vacation ends you must clear the overgrown paths gather resources and fend off nightly monster raids Chop craft survivecan you finish in time     How to Play     Move  WASD  Arrow Keys    Chop trees gather fruits and break stones  Left Mouse Click    Interact with the bed and crafting bench  Left Mouse Click    P  PauseUnpause M  Mute song   Your  energy  is shown in the top left corner Some actions consume energyrecover it by sleeping in the bed      At  night  survive enemy attacks      You have  limited arrows craft more at the crafting bench before heading to bed

title: Planet Miner
description: Head up to the terminal to start Unfortunately losing doesnt reset the game properly so just refresh the page and you should be good to go If youre having issues placing turrets make sure you have enough currency and click a spot on the map in the corner before buying Defend your sentient mining ship from aliens trying to stop you from extracting the sweet sweet resources from their home planet by shooting and building defenses

description: Assemble your team of adorable Plushie friends and lead them against mutated hordes in this fast paced autobattlerSurvivorslike Collect relics earn merit badges discover secrets rescue friends and take out the trash Portal across the parks many biomes visit challenge levels and more are coming to the game Can you defeat the growing menace of the evil Mother Ducker   Plush Rangers is currently in a prealpha state The current functionality shows the core gameplay loop and the art style we are aiming for We are releasing new builds almost daily that can possibly break Please share any feedback or ideas     We will be announcing more details on the official demo and upcoming timeline soon       CONTROLS   KeyboardMouse   Move   WASDCursor Dash   SpaceRight mouse button   Gamepad   Move   Left stick Dash   B XBox

title: Prestons Hourglass 2 Prestons Personal Hell
logline: Time Twas Ticking
description: You are once renowned researcher Preston Ramirez Creator of a device called The Hourglass Through the past 40 years youve been fast asleep and your mind is one fucked up place     Do you recall all those people you killed How your wife left The process of building the Hourglass Well one thing is for sure     You fucking ruined it all and now the manifestation of your anger and murderous tendencies Psycheston is planning to take over     Collect all 8 remnants of your memory to escape your slumber but beware sometimes your mind can be the most dangerous catacomb of all     Cast   Psycheston voiced by Himself   Prestons ExWife voiced by InterpretConnor     Now that its been a day Ill make this clear This mod was not made by Dreadful Studios and was purposefully designed to be as hoaxish as possible This mod was actually made by Canhead StudiosFan The Can and was made both in hopes of showing that Preston still has interest in it but also to send a love letter to the original game Link Here  httpsdreadfulstudioitchioprestonshourglass

title: ORC SMASH
logline: Chess but pawns are dumb orcs and its chaos
description: ORC SMASH   Chess but pawns are dumb orcs and its chaos    HOW TO PLAY   Choose your level   Desert Castle or Hell Place Orcs on the left side of the board  Left Click to Place Right Click to Delete  You have 1000 points to hire different types of Orcs  They have a cost depending on their power They are all equally stupid and unpredictable though Play  START Give orders  with the 4 buttons at the bottom of the screen  Orders are executed  by all your orcs at once Chaos  ensue Have Fun     ORCS    BOW   Attack  Shot   Shoots arrow in a straight line Special  Volley   Shoots arrows at 3 random positions   HOGRIDER   Attack  Knock   Move forward and knockback enemy  Special  Charge   Pass through enemies and get back to position   LANCE Attack  Thrust   Attacks a random forward diagonal Special  Impale   Attacks 2 tiles in front of him    SHAMAN   Attack   Fireball   Attack a random enemy  Special  Spirit Walk   Teleports at a random and attacks all around him   SWORD Attack  Swing   Strong forward attack  Special  Cleave   Attack the 3 adjacent tiles in from of him    ASSETS   Homemade   Orc Chaos Soundtrack its  orc hestral music got it  Orcs sprites fighters orc king spectators Demons sprites cool satan spectators Throne Torch Banner Snake Interface Panels and Buttons  Interface Sound Effects  Castle Desert and Hell Arenas but made using borrowed tilesets Borrowed    Cave Tileset   Desert Tileset   Castle Tileset   Orc Speech SFX   Bow and Arrow SFX   Spellcast SFX   Swoosh SFX   Sword Swipe SFX   Brick Background   Murphys Folly Font    CREDITS   EvilBunnyMan   Art  Game Design Seveen   Code  Game Design Made for the  Odin 7 Day Jam

title: Hover Racing
logline: Embark on a a colorful race
description: Hover Racing  is a highspeed gravitydefying racing game set on a dazzling rainbow road stretching through the vastness of space Compete against rivals as you shift gravity at will racing along the top sides and even underneath the track to find the fastest path Dodge cosmic hazards destroy asteroids to collect boost energy and pull off insane aerial maneuvers to leave your opponents in the dust With stunning neon visuals dynamic physics and adrenalinepumping speed  Hover Racing  delivers a heartpounding spaceracing experience like no other     Keyboard   Input Action Z Forward S Backward QD Turn Shift Boost Left Click Shoot Mouse Movement Crosshair E  Esc Pause     Gamepad   Input   Action   RT Forward   Gamepad Face Left Button Backward   Right Joystick Turn   Gamepad Face Bottom Button Boost   LB Shoot   Left Joystick   Crosshair   Gamepad Right Special   Pause

title: Brummagem Instruments and Curiosities I
logline: Six new exotica for Vaults of Vaarn
description: BRUMMAGEM INSTRUMENTS AND CURIOSITIES I  contains six new exotica for Vaults of Vaarn  Compendium of Universal Knowledge Crystallized Dreams Farvoyer Horn of Pretite Locquacity and the Temporal Monitor    Thee exoticat are converted or rather transposed from the Dungeon  Crawl Classics Dying Earth Box Set based on the Dying Earth Series by  Jack Vance       This set is part of my project to transpose content especially  monsters and treasures  exotica from the DCC Dying Earth into Vaults of  Vaarn      Cover illustration  by TyloPilo      If you are interested in collaborating on illustrations layout or elsewhere feel free to contact me

title: X17 The Silent Ward
logline: Chilling pointandclick horror Explore a facility solve puzzles in a 15min prototype Work in progress
description: X17 The Silent Ward   X17 The Silent Ward is a short puzzledriven pointandclick adventure game entirely created by a single developer using HTML CSS and JavaScript      Be warned this game isnt easy and wont hold your hand  it requires keen observation and some thinking to progress To use items rightclick on them in your inventory and choose use or combine     Step into the role of a soul trapped in an abandoned hospital from which you must escape by combining items and exploring interactive locations Face unsettling puzzles chilling effects and a haunting atmosphere steeped in mystery Do you dare to uncover the secrets of the X17 experiment   This 1530 minute prototype is dark immersive and built from scratch      It took me a month of intense work to create and shaping it  from the code to its eerie atmosphere  brought me immense satisfaction This is my first project of this kind      Id be grateful for your feedback     PL   X17 The Silent Ward to krtka zagadkowa gra pointandclick w klimacie mrocznego horroru stworzona od zera przez jedn osob w HTML CSS i JS  Wciel si w bohatera uwizionego w opuszczonym szpitalu z ktrego musisz si wydosta czc przedmioty i eksplorujc interaktywne miejsca Czekaj na Ciebie niepokojce zagadki efekty straszce i atmosfera pena tajemnic Czy odwaysz si odkry co kryje si za eksperymentem X17  To 1530 minutowy prototyp  mroczny wcigajcy i rcznie wykonany od podstaw   Gra powstaa w miesic intensywnej pracy a jej tworzenie dao mi ogromn satysfakcj  to mj pierwszy projekt tego typu    Feedback mile widziany wspieramitpl X17 The Silent Ward  2025 Maciej Lesiski wspieramitpl All rights reserved Free to play but code and assets are not for reuse or distribution without permission
